text_table:
A broken high-performance assault rifle.
Performance of the rifle is greatly reduced due to it having been repaired with spare parts.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

At the moment being fire, the bullet's power is the maximum of the spec (Damage value shown on the right). 
Its power will gradually decrease and become the minimum of the spec (Damage value shown on the right) when reaching its limit of the range.

A special rifle developed to battle against powered exoskeletons. Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will consecutively fire armor-piercing high explosive shells.

The APHE shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stages—hitting the target and the explosion that follows.
The large shells result in slow speed and short range, but can cause devastating damage. The explosion power doesn't reduce with distance, so it's very effective even for enemies in long range.

A new assault rifle that specializes in its destructive power. In exchange for the intensified power, the accuracy drops sharply and it takes longer to reload.

Although a huge budget was put into the development of this weapon with the expectation to surpass PA-11, the outcome wasn't satisfying.
This development project was frozen and left with only this prototype.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the PA-11. The basic performance is somewhat improved. A laser sight is attached.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

A semi-auto rifle with outstanding destructive power. It can fire the special large AP bullets. Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.
It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

A new assault rifle with excellent rapid fire performance. Because its bullets are lightweight, its firepower is inferior to the PA-11; however, the rate of fire can be doubled. Its overall firepower is fairly high.
Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the PA-11 LS. Its basic performance is somewhat improved. Equipped with a laser sight and a scope. You can use the scope with the zoom/activate button.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

The next generation assault rifle which has been newly developed after the Slugger project being called off. Although it's still in the prototype stage, it already exceeds the performance of the PA-11.
Due to the complex structure, it takes more time to reload.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the G&M-21S with various performances improved. A scope is attached.

A semi-auto rifle with outstanding destructive power. It can fire the special large AP bullets. Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.
It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

The burst-shooting version of the Minion Buster. Pulling the trigger (pressing the attack button) will consecutively fire three armor-piercing high explosive shells.

The APHE shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stages—hitting the target and the explosion that follows.
The large shells result in slow speed and short range, but can cause devastating damage. The explosion power doesn't reduce with distance, so it's very effective even for enemies in long range.

An upgraded version of the M1 Raven. In order to make a good use of its improved accuracy, a laser sight is added.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.
It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

A mass-produced atomic ray gun, a miniaturized version of the EMC (Atomic Ray Cannon) that can be operated by infantry.
Because it is a mass-produced type, its output is not high, but it has a long range and strikes the target instantly.

The prototype Blazer, despite its small size, had about 15% of the output of the EMC. However, its production cost was on par with the EMC, so only a few were made.

A multi-purpose personal missile launcher. It fires missiles with homing capability. As this is a prototype, the homing capability is low, and it often misses its mark. The lock-on range is not very good, so support from Air Raiders is necessary in ranged combat. 

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A giant guided missile with a focus on destructive power. It has a good lock-on range, so it can attack from afar. Its firing speed is slow, but its homing capability is excellent. After being fired, it will descend a little, so it is necessary to aim upwards to avoid injury to yourself. As this is a prototype, its essential destructive power is not as great as it could be and its lock-on time is relatively long. 

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A missile launcher with a rapid rate of fire. It fires small missiles so its destructive power is poor. However, it can lock-on to multiple targets at once and attack them at the same time. Also, once it has locked on, even if the target moves away from the sight (for a short time), the sight will follow, making it easy to lock-on to multiple enemies. It is a very powerful weapon, but its lock-on range is short. It is thus necessary to have the support of Air Raiders when using in ranged combat. 

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A battle-ready version of the Emerald personal guided missile launcher. A vastly improved guidance system makes this an excellent weapon. 

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A missile launcher that fires 15 small missiles with good guidance system at once. It can only lock-on to one target at a time with its multiple missiles. For this reason, it can inflict a lot of damage on a single target. The sight is smaller, but this is to make it easier to select a single target. 

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

The second version of the large guided missile Air Tortoise. Firepower is increased tremendously, making it effective in actual combat. The resulting explosion measures 40 meters in diameter. The lock-on distance is fairly good, making it possible to attack from a distance. After being fired, it will descend a little, so it is necessary to aim upwards to avoid injury to yourself. 

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

An upgraded MLRA missile launcher with improved homing capability.  Missiles are constantly guided towards the enemy, making this model an extremely powerful weapon. However, the lock-on distance is slightly shorter, and in ranged battles, an Air Raider's support is necessary.

Once locked-on, even if the target moves away (for a short time), it will stay locked-on. Therefore, by moving the sight, it is easy to lock on to several enemies.


Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A large guided missile with terrifying destructive power. The lock-on distance is long so it can be used in ranged combat. The missile will ride for a few seconds, and then descend on the target. Therefore it is possible to attack a target on the other side of an obstacle. Equipped with a scope to confirm point of impact.

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A powered-up Emerald personal missile launcher. It is possible to lock on to three targets at once, and its destructive power has enhanced. The lock-on distance is also improved. Fortified firepower makes this an even better weapon, but lock-on time has increased.

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

An upgraded MLRA model with better firepower and an improved guidance system. Also its lock-on maximum has increased to 30, making it possible to attack a group of enemies with just one soldier. The lock-on distance is shorter, so the support of an Air Raider is necessary in ranged combat.

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A giant guided missile with immense destructive power. Its blast range and firepower are greatly improved. It has a good lock-on range, but lock-on takes longer. The missile will ride for a few seconds, and then descend on the target. Therefore it is possible to attack a target on the other side of an obstacle. Equipped with a scope to confirm point of impact.

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A missile launcher that fires 20 small high-speed missiles at once. It can only lock on to one target, and all missiles will be fired at the singular target. Thus it can inflict a huge amount of damage on one target. The sight is small, but this is to make it easier to select a single target.

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

An improved version of the Emerald personal missile launcher. Overall performance is massively improved. It is possible to lock on to four targets at once. It has a wider range and improved destructive power. The lock-on distance is also improved. The time it takes to lock on has been greatly reduced.

A battle-ready Air Tortoise missile that boasts even greater firepower than the prototype model and causes an explosion of 60 meters in diameter. Missile speed is still characteristically slow. After launch, the projectile will descend slightly, making it necessary to aim upward in order to avoid self injury.

A powered-up MLRA model. This is a double-barreled version that fires 2 small guided missiles at once. Each missile now has greater firepower. This terrifying missile launcher can lock on to multiple targets and fire small missiles with good guidance system at once. Shots are fired to the left and right before chasing the enemy.
A power-up version of the ME4 Emerald. It is possible to lock on to four targets at once, and both its lock-on system and homing capacity are improved.

A giant guided missile with immense destructive power. Its blast range and firepower are greatly improved. It has a good lock-on range, but lock-on takes longer. The missile will ride for a few seconds, and then descend on the target. Therefore it is possible to attack a target on the other side of an obstacle. Equipped with a scope to confirm point of impact.

A powered-up FORK-A20. 
This model fires 20 small high-speed missiles at once. 
It has improved destructive power and better lock-on range.

Boasts as the most powerful MLRA series missile launcher.
Greatly improved from MLRA-TW, this new model has greatly enhanced rate of fire and now it can lock on to multiple targets. 
This weapon fires small missiles with good guidance system at once. Shots are fired to the left and right before chasing the enemy.
The final spec of the Emerald personal missile launcher. It is possible to lock on to five targets at once. Its overall performance is also much improved.

A massive missile. It has unbelievable destructive power, but lock-on takes a long time. The missile will ride for a few seconds, and then descend on the target. Therefore it is possible to attack a target on the other side of an obstacle. Equipped with a scope to confirm point of impact.

A personal grenade launcher. It fires high performance grenades that explode on impact. Since these shots travel along an arc, it is possible to attack enemies hidden in trenches or behind cover.

Since the grenades fly in a parabolic trajectory, it is difficult to predict the point of impact (compared to a rocket launcher, which has a straight trajectory). However, skilled soldiers can make predictions (shown as a red line) through experience and intuition.
Though not an exact science, one can take advantage of the grenades' parabolic trajectories to attack enemies hidden behind shields or in trenches.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A napalm discharge device for military use. Napalm sets everything it touches ablaze. The intense flames damage not only its target, but the surrounding area as well. Napalm can be sent at different trajectories so it is possible to hit enemies hiding behind obstacles. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A personal grenade launcher. It fires high performance grenades that explode 3.0 sec after firing. Since these shots travel along an arc, it is possible to attack enemies hidden in trenches or behind cover.

A multi-barreled grenade launcher for support fire. It fires several small grenades simultaneously. By aiming this weapon into the air, you can carpet bomb the enemy with grenades. Its speed has been sacrificed, however, to increase its accuracy and efficacy.

A new grenade launcher with an excellent rate of fire. It successively fires grenades with incredible speed.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A special grenade launcher that fires as many as 20 splash grenades at once. These grenades bounce around and explode after a few seconds. Since they bounce in an unpredictable pattern, caution is advised.
A prototype special grenade launcher. It fires as many as 20 sticky grenades at a time. These grenades stick to whatever they hit and detonate after 4 seconds.

A special gun that discharges flames. This device can be easily directed at any target and will completely engulf it on contact, generating a giant column of fire where it previously stood. Because the device ejects in the opposite direction of the surface, it is possible to choose the surface and thus control the direction. For example, if fired towards the ground, the column of fire will reach up into the sky; if fired at a wall, a horizontal pillar of flame will be ejected (perpendicular to the surface of the wall). For this reason, it has many uses such as blocking the progress of an enemy. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A new grenade launcher model with amazing performance. Its firepower is a step above the previous model and blast area is large. Shots fly unhindered towards the target, making it possible to fire accurately at distant targets with practice. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A new triple grenade launcher that fires time-detonated grenades in 3 directions simultaneously. The resulting blast area is immense, and can wipe out a large group of enemies.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A special grenade launcher that fires as many as 20 splash grenades at once. These grenades bounce around and explode after a few seconds. Since they bounce in an unpredictable pattern, caution is advised.

A napalm discharge device for military use. Napalm sets everything it touches ablaze. The intense flames damage not only its target, but the surrounding area as well. Napalm can be sent at different trajectories so it is possible to hit enemies hiding behind obstacles. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

An upgraded BRUTE-J triple grenade launcher that fires grenades in 3 directions simultaneously. These grenades now explode upon impact, making it easier to use in battle.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.
A special grenade launcher. It fires as many as 20 sticky grenades at a time. These grenades stick to whatever they hit and detonate after 4 seconds.

A supreme version of the UM grenade launcher. Its firepower and blast area have been pushed to the limit in this ultimate model. The grenades of this fearsome weapon detonate on impact and can utterly annihilate enemies with their tremendous force.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.
A powered-up version of the Stampede M1 grenade launcher. This fearsome weapon fires more shots than before, launching a rain of grenades to drop onto the enemy.

A twin grenade launcher with incredible firepower that fires grenades in two directions. The grenades detonate on impact, creating a huge explosion. Extreme caution is advised at close range. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

An enhanced napalm discharger that releases giant napalm payloads carrying terrifying firepower. It has to be reloaded after each shot. Napalm sets everything it touches ablaze. The flames damage not only its target, but the surrounding area as well. Napalm can be sent at different trajectories so it is possible to hit enemies hiding behind obstacles.

An upgraded sticky grenade launcher. It fires one sticky grenade at a time, but each one can cause immense destruction. These grenades stick to whatever they hit and detonate after 4 seconds.

Equipped with a scope.

The finalized version of the UM grenade launcher. The ultimate grenade launcher based on the UMAX model design.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

The final specs of the Flame Geyser, a special flame-discharging gun. This device can be easily directed at any target and will completely engulf it on contact, generating a giant column of fire where it previously stood. Because the device ejects in the opposite direction of the surface, it is possible to choose the surface and thus control the direction. For example, if fired towards the ground, the column of fire will reach up into the sky. If fired at a wall, a horizontal pillar of flame will be ejected (perpendicular to the surface of the wall). For this reason, it has many uses such as blocking the progress of an enemy.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

An upgraded Stampede M2 grenade launcher.
It fires a greater number of shots and creates a larger explosion, making it one of the strongest weapons capable of obliterating anything over a wide area.

The final specs of Volatile Napalm, which is a napalm discharge device for military use. Napalm sets everything it touches ablaze. The intense flames damage not only its target, but the surrounding area as well. Napalm can be sent at different trajectories so it is possible to hit enemies hiding behind obstacles. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

The special-ops version of UM Grenade Launcher. 
Its firepower and blast area surpass even those of the UMAZ. Easily one of the most powerful weapons ever made.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A special gun that sprays strong acid that can dissolve metal in an instant. 

The original plan was to have the weapon spray acid over a wide area, but this is just a prototype and has only a narrow spray area.
A special gun that fires strong acid steadily. Compared with Acid Shower, this weapon fires a stream of acid directly at the target and its rate of fire is well improved.
The completed Acid Shower model. This special gun fires a spray of strong acid over a wider area than before.
A stronger Acid Gun. This special weapon now fires large volumes of strong acid scattered over a horizontal area.

The final Acid Gun model. 
Its destructive power has been dramatically improved using a more powerful type of acid newly developed.

A gas burner for welding.
Since it's for job purpose, one should lower the expectation of it as a weapon.
The most powerful flamethrower available that emits deadly flames.
A flamethrower that has been strengthened for combat.
An upgraded flame cannon that emits deadly flames.

A new gun developed by EDF. It fires high speed compressed plasma bullets which rebound off walls and continue to fly till they reach the range limit.
The power isn't reduced by air resistance, making it possible to cause consistent damage to objects at long distances.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

A quick-fire model of the Bound Gun. It fires high speed compressed plasma bullets which rebound off walls and continue to fly till they reach the range limit.
Although it's not deadly destructive, both of its rate of fire and range are excellent.

The power isn't reduced by air resistance, making it possible to cause consistent damage to objects at long distances.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

A long-ranged model of the Bound Gun. It fires high speed compressed plasma bullets which rebound off walls and continue to fly till they reach the range limit.
Although it's not deadly destructive, its range is notably improved.

The power isn't reduced by air resistance, making it possible to cause consistent damage to objects at long distances.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

An enhanced version of the long-ranged Bound Gun. It fires high density plasma bullets which rebound off walls and continue to fly till they reach the range limit.
Although it's powerfully destructive, the bullet speed has been reduced.

The power isn't reduced by air resistance, making it possible to cause consistent damage to objects at long distances.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

A new shotgun developed by the EDF that fires lots of compressed plasma bullets which rebound off walls and continue to fly till they reach the range limit. 
Its range is exceedingly longer than other shotguns and the firepower isn't reduced by air resistance, making it an amazing weapon.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

The prototype of a special piece of equipment called %dq%Reverser%dq% that sprays nanomachines, which is almost useless due to its low performance.

A device for applying nanomachines to others. Not originally intended to be used on oneself... but can also be used to bounce nanomachines off walls and other surfaces to recover the user's health.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.)

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

A basic hand grenade that detonates on contact.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A timed (J type) hand grenade.
It no longer detonates on contact, but increases its destructive power. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade, which will then explode in a few seconds.
There is a definite pause between the throw and the explosion, so it is difficult to blow oneself up. It is also possible to bounce grenades off the walls of a building and/or throw them inside.

A small hand grenade.
Since it is smaller than the MG model, a larger number can be carried at once, which can be thrown in quick succession.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A prototype DNG long-range hand grenade. It has an improved blast radius and detonates on contact with amazing destructive power.

Due to its large size and weight, throwing it requires the use of the entire body. Although it takes some time from the start of the throwing motion until it is actually released, it is possible to change direction during the throw. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

Officially known as the Spread Grenade, this weapon throws out multiple coin-sized grenades at a time.
It's not powerful enough as a single grenade, but the rounds can be spread over a wide area, making it possible to hit several enemies at once.

Originally developed for riot control, now it has been fairly fatal after constant improvements.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

A powered-up MG11 hand grenade with a far greater blast radius, making this an effective weapon. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A hand grenade with incredible power behind it. Although it is powerful, it is very heavy and difficult to throw far. Few people carry it because there is a risk of throwing it incorrectly, but if you can master it, it becomes a very powerful weapon.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A modified version of the T5 Mouse, a small hand grenade.
Comprised of two bombs (in the shape of a figure 8). When thrown, the two bombs separate and land in different places.

Since it is smaller than the MG model, a larger number can be carried at once, which can be thrown in quick succession.

A special capsule containing nanomachines. When the capsule strikes a target, it explodes and disperses nanomachines over a wide area.
The nanomachines drift through the air in a cloud, affecting surrounding objects. The density of the cloud increases as one approaches the detonation site, as does its effect.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user. Heals allies, vehicles, and the user, but also enemies in the cloud.)

A chemical explosive.
Throwable capsule containing several chemical substances. When the capsule hits a target, the chemicals inside it mix to produce a corrosive gas. While the gas is airborne, it slowly eats away nearby objects.

Because it destroys biomatter as well as machines, it has been classified as a highly dangerous weapon, banned from use by international treaty. However, as circumstances worsened, its use was permitted under special exemption only during wartime.

A new directional landmine that detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range.
Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation. After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

It has excellent firepower and can turn swiftly. This gun is the pinnacle of automatic tracking weapon technology.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

The final model in the ZE-Gun series.
The gun turret's high rotation speed results in excellent rapid-fire performance. The  ammunition used and destructive power have also been increased, making it the ultimate automatic weapon.

Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

A perfect version of the FZ-Gun. After installation, it detects enemies using cameras and sensors and fires automatically.

No safety mechanism is installed, as priority was given to increasing the power output.

Light Machine Gun (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1200 Damage:16.5 Range:160.0m)</font>
Light Machine Gun (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1200 Damage:16.5 Range:160.0m)</font>

A military motorcycle fully armored and equipped with light machine guns on the flanks since it's produced for combat use. Able to gallop on the battlefield and eliminate enemies with its firepower.

Since it's still under tests and adjustments, there are some issues unsolved. The engine output is insufficient because it's been heavily armored, and the size of the fuel tank is thus smaller than planned, making it difficult to run for a long time. Other than that, its body balance is lost, and has to be equipped with smaller-caliber weapons.

Able to request underground.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

The final model of the military motorcycle Freed.
Equipped with a high power turbo engine, its speed and acceleration are successfully pushed to the limit. Due to its overly-high power, this bike is hard to control; a sudden acceleration can bring the front tire float. Nevertheless, the basic performance is high, so it would be the fastest bike if one can properly control it.

Able to request underground.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Anti-Aircraft Machine Gun (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1500 Damage:4.5 Range:320.0m)</font>

1 person.
Anti-air attack vehicle. Not only is it equipped with a powerful anti-aircraft machine gun, but its body is protected by armor that is greater than that of the BLACKER.

Originally, anti-aircraft guns were not designed for ground combat and were lightly armored, but this machine was given a heavily armored body in order to be a key component of ground forces in the war against aliens.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
105mm Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:245.0 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>

1 person.
The main combat vehicle of the EDF. It has been designed small in size under the assumption of urban warfare, so it can go off unimpededly either in urban main roads or narrow alleys. Both its firepower and defense are second to none comparing to current combat vehicles.

Its main cannon is a 105mm Howitzer. It has been developed for urban battles against terrorists, so its attack range has been prioritized over penetration power. It fires shaped charges which detonate on impact, causing damage to a wide area. 


In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Railgun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:[PT]600.0 Range:2025.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Right):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:6.0 Range:210.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Left):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:6.0 Range:210.0m)</font>

3 people.
A vehicle equipped with a state-of-the-art electromagnetic launcher (Railgun) with accelerated shells and rapid fire support. The shells can penetrate objects and inflict damage on many enemies. The Railgun is equipped with a laser sight to ensure pinpoint accuracy, and the trajectory can be confirmed with the red line before firing. This is a very powerful weapon, but it lacks the blast area of the Howitzer, making it somewhat difficult to use in combat against monsters. To make up for this shortcoming, it's been fitted with a right and left Machine Gun on the rotating turret, which can be manned from either of the gunner seats. However, gunners should be aware that the seats face whatever their respective turrets are aiming at. Since this vehicle needs to transport the electromagnetic railgun, its mobility and functionality alike are a bit lacking.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Atomic Ray Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:7000  Damage:6.5 (1000 burst)  Range:600.0m)</font>

A large combat vehicle equipped with a super weapon still under development—the Atomic Ray Cannon. This super weapon is able to generate and irradiate high-pressure energy capable of destroying a mountain instantly.
It can cause terrible damage, but the energy consumption and costs are enormous. The current manufacturing cost is said to be 100 million dollars per vehicle, making it impractical for actual combat. However, in order to destroy the aliens' golden armor, dozens of these vehicles have been produced in a hurry.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Officially known as the Zero Range Plasma Arc Gun, this is a super weapon specifically developed for the Wing Divers. Best for close-range combat with only 30-meter range, however it's amazingly destructive, and can discharge countless plasma arc blades to destroy almost everything. Since you have to use it close to the target, it's highly risky, but its overwhelming power in close range is certain.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire plasma arc blades.

%dq%Power Lance%dq% is a generic term for a category of short-ranged particle laser cannons, which are made for Wing Divers. Their range is extremely short, but their firepower is devastating.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

The first prototype of a new short-range weapon currently under development. Emits rays of energy to destroy its target.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

A new Rapier equipped with a power amplification device called 'Casket.'

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy in the Casket. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will discharge the accumulated energy and fire off the Plasma Gun continuously in a certain time span.
The output is amplified according to the amount of stored energy and so is destructive power. The more energy accumulated, the greater flying distance, shot number and firepower. Also, the diffusion range converges more toward the front.
Although the Plasma Gun is very extremely effective , its power decreases greatly with distance, so you have to be as close as possible to the enemy, make it a high-risky weapon to use.

A high-output Power Lance. It deals great damage with a single shot. However, it requires several times the energy of a standard Power Lance, so it has a longer charge time.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

A new type of short-range weapon that diffuses 6 rays of energy. The diffuse energy concentrates on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

A new Rapier equipped with a power amplification device called 'Casket.'
This weapon is a very powerful weapon designed for striking multiple enemies at once. For this purpose, the Plasma Gun is modified to be able to shoot rays of energy that diffuse horizontally. Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy in the Casket. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will discharge the accumulated energy and fire off the Plasma Gun continuously in a certain time span.
The output is amplified according to the amount of stored energy and so is destructive power. The more energy accumulated, the greater flying distance, shot number and firepower. Also, the diffusion range converges more toward the front.
Although the Plasma Gun is very extremely effective , its power decreases greatly with distance, so you have to be as close as possible to the enemy, make it a high-risky weapon to use.

This weapon developed from the Spark Whip. It diffuses 5 beams of energy in different directions.
Compared to the W3, its firing speed is greatly increased.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

Officially known as the Zero Range Plasma Arc Gun, this is a super weapon specifically developed for the Wing Divers. Best for close-range combat with only 30-meter range, however it's amazingly destructive, and can discharge countless plasma arc blades to destroy almost everything. Since you have to use it close to the target, it's highly risky, but its overwhelming power in close range is certain.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire plasma arc blades.

A burst-fire Power Lance that fires 2 shots of high-output beams in succession.
Because a Triple Power Lance placed too much load on the body of the weapon itself, the 2-round burst Power Lance was enhanced instead. As a result, this formidable weapon boasting numerous functional improvements was developed.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

This ultimate Rapier is at the top of its class--so powerful that no one could wield it effectively for the longest time, resulting in it being sealed away and nearly forgotten.
Its capacity and firepower are both high, and its reload time is short.

Officially known as the Zero Range Plasma Arc Gun, this is a super weapon specifically developed for the Wing Divers. Best for close-range combat with only 30-meter range, however it's amazingly destructive, and can discharge countless plasma arc blades to destroy almost everything. Since you have to use it close to the target, it's highly risky, but its overwhelming power in close range is certain.

A 3-round burst Dragoon Lance that fires 3 high-output beams. Its energy cost is greatly increased, but it also has impressive destructive power.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

A perfected Spark Vine. It emits 12 rays of energy. The diffuse energy concentrates on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

A new type of Power Lance. While it is single-barreled, it has the longest range of any Power Lance. It also has greatly improved destructive power.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

A new Rapier equipped with a power amplification device called 'Casket.'

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy in the Casket. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will discharge the accumulated energy and fire off the Plasma Gun continuously in a certain time span.
The output is amplified according to the amount of stored energy and so is destructive power. The more energy accumulated, the greater flying distance, shot number and firepower. Also, the diffusion range converges more toward the front.
Although the Plasma Gun is very extremely effective , its power decreases greatly with distance, so you have to be as close as possible to the enemy, make it a high-risky weapon to use.

This ultimate burst-fire Power Lance. It fires 3 high-output beams in succession. It is able to destroy multiple targets at once depending on situations.
Compared to the single-barreled Power Lance ZA, it has a shorter range, but has a greater destructive power in general.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

Having better performances than the Star Rapier, this unparalleled, ultimate Rapier knows no limits. It costs as much of an EMC to make this weapon. Its few makers are all missing.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire plasma arc blades.

The perfected Spark Whip. It diffuses 12 beams of energy. Different from the Spark Vine, which concentrates its attack on a single point, this weapon can attack over a wider area.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

A high-performance Dragoon Lance that excels in all fields.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

The final model of the Phalanx. It fires all of its plasma guns out front, destroying its target completely.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy in the Casket. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will discharge the accumulated energy and fire off the Plasma Gun continuously in a certain time span.
The output is amplified according to the amount of stored energy and so is destructive power. The more energy accumulated, the greater flying distance, shot number and firepower. Also, the diffusion range converges more toward the front.
Although the Plasma Gun is very extremely effective , its power decreases greatly with distance, so you have to be as close as possible to the enemy, make it a high-risky weapon to use.

A particle beam rifle developed for use by Wing Divers. It is more accurate and destructive than a ballistic weapon.
The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. 
However, its output decreases as the power stored in its energy core depletes. When the power left in its energy core is at half of its maximum amount, its greatest level of destruction falls to about 25 percent of the maximum amount. For that reason, as long as the situation allows it, you should reload to preserve its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

A diffuse beam cannon. It fires numerous beams over a wide area. It has a short range, but boasts immense destructive power.
It is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. When the energy in tank reduces, the beams able to shoot lessens accordingly. Therefore if the situation allows, you should reload at any time to keep the firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

A new type of gun that fires pulse energy bullets rapidly. It's a super weapon that has recently been developed.
When a pulse energy bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.
Although it's not as destructive as a ballistic weapon, it boasts an excellent rate of fire, allowing it to be able to strike multiple targets at the same time, making it a powerful weapon overall.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

It is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the weapon to be fired upon flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

The final model of the super high-output long-range laser gun 'Monster'.  It fires off all of its stored energy at once to instantly destroy the target in the distance.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
Because it was designed with the idea that it would consume a lot of energy, when its stored energy is low, its power reduces significantly.

The ultimate Closed Laser upgrade. It has the longest range of any Closed Laser, and the projection time to match.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will continuously irradiate the laser until the stored energy runs out.
The projection time increases with the amount of energy accumulation. The more the accumulation is, the higher the energy efficiency can be and the longer time for the weapon to fire.

An ultra high powered long-range weapon that fires off stunning lightening to instantly destroy the target in long distance. Its power greatly surpasses the Monster, but it consumes tremendous energy, not even the aerial unit can afford. To accumulate power to the max, emergency charge is required.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
Since it was designed on the premise of large energy consumption, as the stored energy reduces, the power decreases badly accordingly, and so does its accuracy.

A weapon that fires plasma balls. Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A special shotgun that incorporates Plasma Cannon technology.
Fires multiple small, high-speed plasma bullets at a time that explode on impact.
Has a much longer range and can be used at a more significant distance than the more standard shotgun used by Rangers. It also boasts a high rate of fire.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. 
The number of bullets fired increases according to the amount of charged power.

A high-output Plasma Cannon. It's a powerful weapon that boasts a wide blast area, but the speed of its plasma balls is slow, and its energy cost is high.

A weapon that fires plasma balls. Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

It discharges high-density plasma balls. The plasma balls discharged are very dense and heavy, so their trajectory changes quickly. Just as firing a mortar, you have to aim high when you fire this weapon.
Be careful not to injure yourself by aiming too low.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
When the accumulated power reaches the maximum amount, this weapon can attack with its full power, and its effective area will be the widest.

A 2-round burst Plasma Cannon that fires 2 plasma balls in a row.
Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A new weapon that fires numerous high-density plasma balls continuously. The high-density plasma balls are small but heavy, so they will fall quickly after they are fired, making the weapon a short-range weapon. But it can be fired towards the sky or be used in the air to strike multiple enemies.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off.

A super high-output Plasma Cannon that fires super high-density plasma balls. It's a formidable weapon that takes firepower and blast area to an unimaginable whole new level.
The super high-density bullets begin to drop from the weight of gravity shortly after discharge. In order to hit the target locations, this weapon has to be aimed high and fired towards the sky just as a mortar. It can also be used to attack from the sky.

Because it was designed with the idea that it would consume a lot of energy, when its stored energy is low, its power reduces significantly.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A six-barreled Plasmafall that fires 6 high-density plasma balls at once. Because the six plasma balls have different initial speeds when discharged, they cover different distances. As the weapon can hit 6 different places per shot, it is capable of attacking over a very wide area.

It is a very powerful weapon, but since the development of the Pulse Machine Gun got too far ahead, research of the Grit Gun has to be called off.

An enhanced model of the Plasma Cannon C. It can accumulate energy in a short period of time, allowing it to fire continuously. It has been improved in all aspects.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

An enhanced model of the Splasher with improved firing speed and range, making it easier to handle. It also takes shorter time to accumulate energy.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

An enhanced model of the Plasma Heavy Cannon that fires super high-density plasma balls. It's a formidable weapon that takes firepower and blast area to an unimaginable whole new level.
Compared to the Plasma Heavy Cannon, the projectile speed is significantly faster, striking the target instantly. As a result, long-range attacks have become possible.

Because it was designed with the idea that it would consume a lot of energy, when its stored energy is low, its destructive power reduces significantly.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A high-performance Plasma Cannon. It boasts a wide blast area, and excels in many other aspects.

A weapon that fires plasma balls. Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A double-barreled Plasma Cannon. It shoots out 2 plasma balls that diffuse over a horizontal arc at once.
Compared to the Triple Plasma Cannon, its discharge capacity is lower, but has a better rate of fire.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

The ultimate Grit Shot upgrade.  It fires multiple small, high-speed plasma bullets at a time that diffuse horizontally.
These bullets explode on impact. The weapon has a much longer range and can be used at a more significant distance than the more standard shotgun used by Rangers. It also boasts a high rate of fire.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. 
The number of bullets fired increases according to the amount of charged power.

An super high-performance Plasma Cannon. Compared to the D, its blast area is smaller, but has been improved in many other aspects.

A weapon that fires plasma balls. Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A 4-round burst Plasma Cannon that fires 4 plasma balls in a row. It features excellent firepower and a wide blast area.
The interval between each shot is short, and it can shoot out 4 plasma balls instantly. But as a result, it can't deal with multiple enemies by hitting at different locations.

Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

The final Plasma Cannon upgrade. An ultimate weapon that is high-output and energy-efficient.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

An enhanced model of the Plasma Burst Cannon 4D that fires 4 plasma balls in a row. It features excellent firepower and a wide blast area.
The interval between each shot is stable, making it easier to handle.

Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A 20-barreled Plasmafall that fires 20 high-density plasma balls at once. Because the plasma balls have different initial speeds when discharged, they cover different distances. As the weapon can hit multiple locations per shot, it is capable of attacking over a very wide area.

The plasma balls discharged are very dense and heavy, so their trajectory changes quickly. Just as firing a mortar, you have to aim high when you fire this weapon. Be careful not to injure yourself by aiming too low.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
When the accumulated power reaches the maximum amount, this weapon can attack with its full power, and its effective area will be the widest.

A prototype of the brainwave-guided weapon known as 'Mirage.' When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on to. Pressing the attack button will fire spears of the homing energy, which will explode on impact. The weapon is operated by linking to the brainwave-guided kit 'Psionic Link' that is fitted in the Wing Diver's helmet. As this 'brainwave-guided' requires a certain trait, only certain people are capable of wielding this weapon.

This brainwave-guided weapon fires spears of energy that obey the user's thoughts. The spears are not high-speed, but their homing performance is excellent, and they will chase any target down.
When a target is captured within its sight (represented by a red square), it will be automatically locked on. At this time, you may press the attack button to discharge.

The weapon is operated by linking to the brainwave-guided kit 'Psionic Link' that is fitted in the Wing Diver's helmet. As this 'brainwave-guided' requires a certain trait, only certain people are capable of wielding this weapon.

A rapid-fire version of the Mirage brainwave-guided weapon. 
It rapidly fires fast-moving spears of energy that will chase down the enemy. 
When a target is captured within its sight (represented by a red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge.

A quintuple-barreled Mirage brainwave-guided weapon that can lock on to five targets. It fires 5 spears of energy at once, able to attack multiple enemies. The speed and homing performance are excellent. When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge. The energy spears will detonate on impact.

An upgraded Geist brainwave-guided weapon featuring greatly improved firepower and slightly reduced shot speed. When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on to. Pressing the attack button will discharge the weapon, and the discharge will explode on impact. Also it is excellent at tracking an enemy.

Because it requires long-term use of a Psionic link, the demands on the users are high and so few people are suitable.

An improved version of the Mirage 5-Way with greatly improved shot speed and rate of fire. A powerful weapon, although the homing feature can struggle to keep up with the faster shot speed.

When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge. The energy spears will detonate on impact.

A 10-barreled brainwave-guided weapon. A formidable weapon that can lock on to many targets at once.
When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge spears of energy. The spears will chase down their targets and explode on impact.

It is very effective against multiple enemies... but because it fires so many spears of energy, the trajectory is hard to control, and will result in the spears shooting in different directions.  When the spears shoot downwards, they might injure the user on the ground. So the weapon is most suitable for aerial shooting.

A specially improved version of the Mirage brainwave-guided weapon. It has greatly improved destructive power and homing capabilities. However, its output can be difficult to control, so the direction of discharge can be unstable. As the direction of each discharge changes, there is a risk of hitting the ground and injuring yourself. For that reason, this weapon is highly recommended for aerial use. Despite its shortcomings, it has excellent homing capability and thus good accuracy.

A 15-barreled brainwave-guided weapon. It can lock on to 15 targets at once, and after discharge, it'll fire 15 needles of light, which will disperse and pierce the enemy. When a target is captured within its sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge. This weapon was developed for use against huge throngs of enemies, and is not generally recommended for small groups. It also uses the same amount of energy regardless of the number of enemies being targeted, so efficiency is not one of its strong points.

A brainwave-guided weapon that creates powerful arrows of light. After an arrow has been released, it will speed toward its target. It will pierce the enemy and explode. It got its name by the fact that it looks like a glittering blade. It is excellent at tracking an enemy. Once locked on, even if the enemy leaves line of sight for a short time, the weapon will maintain the lock-on.  When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge.

A triple-barreled version of the Geist brainwave-guided weapon. It can lock on to three targets. It fires three spears of energy at the same time. It has greatly improved blast range and speed, making it a fearsome weapon. When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Pressing the attack button will discharge the weapon, and the discharge will explode on impact. 

It requires mastery of the Psionic Link, so very few people can use it, and as a result, only a few units were made.

An improved Mirage 15. It can lock on to 15 targets at once, and after discharge, it'll fire 15 needles of light, which will disperse and pierce the enemy. When a target is captured within its sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. You can then press the attack button to discharge. This weapon was developed for use against huge throngs of enemies, and is not generally recommended for small groups. It also uses the same amount of energy regardless of the number of enemies being targeted, so efficiency is not one of its strong points.

A brainwave-guided weapon with superlative rate of fire, the Fenrir is based on the Rapid Mirage, and its performance is on a whole new level. It only locks-on to a single target, but it can shatter that target with its frightening shot speed.
When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Pressing the attack button will discharge the weapon, and the discharge will explode on impact.

A perfected five-barreled Mirage, with excellent destructive power and homing performance. Its speed has been reduced as a side effect of its improved output, but its overall performance is much greater.

The Psiblade's ultimate model that has been improved to the maximum level possible. Its destructive power and blast range are extraordinary.
Within two seconds of the arrows of light being released, they will fly straight for the target which has been locked-on. It will pierce the enemy and explode. It got its name by the fact that it looks like a glittering blade.
This weapon pushes the Psionic Link to the maximum, and it once destroyed the nervous system of the test subject. It is thus feared by many and no one uses it.

The final model of the Geist. It is a super weapon with extraordinary firepower. It can lock on to three targets. It fires three spears of energy at the same time. It requires a high talent to use the Psionic Link, and only one person to this day has shown that talent. For that reason, it was never mass-produced and still remains in testing.

A 30-barreled brainwave-guided weapon. It's a fearsome weapon that can attack 30 targets simultaneously.
When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge spears of energy. The spears will chase down their targets and explode on impact.

It is very effective against multiple enemies, but because it releases too many spears of energy at once, the trajectory is difficult to control, and will result in the spears shooting in different directions. When the spears shoot downwards, they might injure the user on the ground. For that reason, it is most suitable for aerial combat.

Compared to the early model, it has a wider blast area, and thus it is more dangerous when in use on the ground. So it's highly recommended that this weapon be limited to aerial deployment only.

The ultimate model of the Mirage brainwave-guided weapon. It can lock on to 15 targets and attack them simultaneously. It boasts a high rate of fire, and can deal great damage to multiple enemies. Such a brainwave-guided weapon can only be used by those with extraordinary psionic aptitude, but even within the Wing Divers, there is no one yet who has quite made the grade for it.

The final model of the rapid-firing brainwave-guided weapon Fenrir. As a triple-barreled weapon, it can lock on to 3 targets and attack them simultaneously. It is an ultimate homing weapon with absolutely devastating power. When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Pressing the attack button will discharge the weapon, and the discharge will explode on impact. It requires a user with extraordinary Psionic Link capabilities, and no one has yet been found who fits the bill.

Creates plasma balls to be thrown by hand.
The Plasma Balls fly in a gentle parabola and explode on impact, causing damage over a wide area.
It's equipped with an independent energy generator, so it doesn't deplete the energy of the aerial unit. Reloading is also possible during an emergency charge.
Although not particularly devastating, it can be an excellent sub-weapon when equipping a high consumption weapon.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

High performance plasma sphere generator.
Creates numerous small plasma balls to be thrown by hand. After being thrown, the plasma spheres continue to drift through the air and explode when they touch an object, causing damage over a wide area.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit.
Therefore, it can be used even during an emergency charge so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. It only takes a short time to reload.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

Creates numerous small plasma balls to be thrown by hand. After being thrown, the plasma spheres continue to drift through the air and explode when they touch an object, causing damage over a wide area.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit.
Therefore, it can be used even during an emergency charge so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. It only takes a short time to reload.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

The final Blink Ball upgrade. It has been improved to the maximum level possible in all aspects.
The Plasma Balls fly in a gentle parabola and explode on impact, causing damage over a wide area.
It's equipped with an independent energy generator, so it doesn't deplete the energy of the aerial unit. Reloading is also possible during an emergency charge.
Although not particularly devastating, it can be an excellent sub-weapon when equipping a high consumption weapon.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

A device that generates an energy barrier by curving space. Visible light rays can pass through the shield, allowing the user to see who or what is on the other side.

Blocks both friendly and enemy attacks. Soldiers and enemies alike can pass through the barrier.

Developed to compensate for the Wing Diver's low defensive capabilities.
Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

A device that generates a special energy barrier by curving space. Visible light rays can pass through the shield, allowing the user to see who or what is on the other side.

A device that generates a blade of energy.
