A device that generates a sphere of energy. The sphere radiates light energy in one direction while airborne.
Its lethal light ray can act as a trap when placed in the enemy's path.

If used effectively, it can stop a large number of enemies at once, increasing Wing Divers' rate of survival.

Ally soldiers' equipment is covered with a special reflective coating, preventing them from taking damage.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A top-secret super weapon. Its very existence is highly classified; it's anyone's guess how exactly it works. Discharges a ball of energy which stays in the air and releases arrows of light in the vicinity continuously. When discharged (the speed will have an impact on the direction) it is possible to control the height and trajectory.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A super weapon that can only be used by Wing Divers. Discharges a ball of energy. The ball stays in the air and continuously releases missiles that home in on nearby enemies. One shot won't do much, but this weapon can launch continuous attacks, making it a very effective weapon.
It requires mastery of the brainwave-guided kit Psionic Link, so only the elite members from Wing Divers are capable of using it.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

This super weapon operates in midair. Discharges a ball of energy which stays in the air and fires off numerous bolts of lightning downward continuously. When discharged (and note that speed will have an impact on direction), it is possible to control the height and trajectory. When activated in a high location, the lightning will disperse over a wide area; conversely, when activated in a lower location, the dispersal area is small and the damage will be concentrated on a single group of enemies.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

An anti-aircraft Diffuser model. Designed to be fired upward, and is thus especially effective against flying enemies. Discharges a ball of energy which stays in the air and fires off arrows of light in the vicinity continuously. Because it requires a large amount of energy, it placed a heavy burden on the flight unit when it was first developed. However, the problem was solved by installing a high-performance generator. It has become one of the best equipment for wing divers.

The Plasma Core is the heart of the Wing Diver's aerial unit. It is the device for generating energy. The performance of the aerial unit varies with equipped Plasma Core type.

A high-performance core can generate more energy than what is needed for flying. In addition, a powerful weapon requires high energy, and it will not be operational without a high-performance core. So it's no exaggeration to say the Plasma Core's performance directly affects the Wing Diver's combat strength.

A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability.
Forward acceleration is increased.

The Plasma Core is the heart of the Wing Diver's aerial unit. It is the device for generating energy. The performance of the aerial unit varies with equipped Plasma Core type.

A high-performance core can generate more energy than what is needed for flying. In addition, a powerful weapon requires high energy, and it will not be operational without a high-performance core. So it's no exaggeration to say the Plasma Core's performance directly affects the Wing Diver's combat strength.

A Plasma Core with increased maximum energy capacity. The maximum amount of energy the core can accumulate is greatly increased. However, its power supply efficiency to the aerial unit is low, so the flying speed is slightly reduced.
A special Plasma Core with improved the energy-generating speed. It recovers energy quickly, and its emergency charge time is reduced.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the energy supply to weapons. Supplies energy to weapons faster.

A new model of the plasma core. Compared to the previous models, the performance of this model has been greatly improved.

The newly developed weapons for Wing Divers are all high-performance weapons, but they also have sky-high energy cost. This Plasma Core not only makes it possible to use them, but also greatly increases a Wing Diver's combat ability.
An improved model of the V2 Plasma Core. It raises the Wing Diver's abilities to a new level.

A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability.
Forward acceleration is increased.

A Plasma Core with increased maximum energy capacity. The maximum amount of energy the core can accumulate is greatly increased. However, its power supply efficiency to the aerial unit is low, so the flying speed is slightly reduced.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the energy supply to weapons. Supplies energy to weapons faster.
An enhanced model of the Turbo Core. The forward boost speed has been improved to the maximum level possible.
An improved model of the V2 Plasma Core. It raises the Wing Diver's abilities to a new level
A special Plasma Core with improved the energy-generating speed. It recovers energy quickly, and its emergency charge time is reduced.
A new model of the Plasma Core. It boasts better performance than the V2.

A big Plasma Core. It has been improved on various aspects by increasing the size of the core unit. In particular, the maximum energy it can accumulate, and the speed of supplying power to weapons are several times of the previous models.
However, its flying ability is slightly reduced as a trade-off of the increased weight of the unit.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. Its boost speed at charging forward and sideways is increased.
An enhanced model of the V3 Plasma Core. It has been improved in various aspects.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the energy supply to weapons. Supplies energy to weapons faster.
A Plasma Core specifically designed for a fast-paced aerial combat. Its power consumption during boosting is reduced, and it can take the full advantage of the speed during combat.
An enhanced model of the V3 Plasma Core. It has been improved in various aspects.
A new model of the Plasma Core. It boasts far better performance than the V3, and it greatly increases the Wing Diver's ability.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. After all the effort put into development, the flying speed is finally improved.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. In order to increase the survival rate of Wing Divers, the boost speed at charging backward and sideways is improved.
An enhanced model of the V4 Plasma Core. It has been improved in various aspects.

A Plasma Core specifically improved on its maximum energy. The maximum amount of energy the core can accumulate is greatly improved. However, its power supply efficiency to the aerial unit is low, so the flying speed is slightly reduced.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. Its boost speed at charging forward and sideways is increased.
An enhanced model of the V4 Plasma Core. It has been improved in various aspects.
The latest Plasma Core model. It boasts far better performance than the V4.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the energy supply to weapons. Supplies energy to weapons faster.
An enhanced model of the V5 Plasma Core. It has been improved in various aspects.

An extra large Plasma Core based on the Big Core. It has been improved on various aspects by increasing the size of the core unit. In particular, the maximum energy it can accumulate, and the power supply speed to weapons are several times of the previous models.
However, its flying ability is greatly reduced as a trade-off of the increased weight of the unit.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. The flying speed has been taken to a whole new level.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the energy supply to weapons. Supplies energy to weapons faster.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. Its boost speed at charging forward and sideways is greatly increased.
The ultimate Plasma Core. The Wing Diver's ability has been improved to the maximum level possible.

A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is formed in the area of the massive vibration which reduces the damage taken when attacked. 
Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output, and when it's reached its max, release to unleash a powerful slashing maximum voltage attack.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The Vibro Drive is not suitable for rapid attacks. If you want to engage with a large number of monsters, equipping two hammers at the same time is recommended.

A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). Through the improvement, a third stage attack is possible. It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted to objects, so it has no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. 
Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Release to unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output. The second stage attack is a long-range high voltage attack. When the output has increased to maximum, a maximum voltage attack will be unleashed after stepping forward. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The Vibro Drive is not suitable for rapid attacks. If you want to engage with a large number of monsters, equipping two hammers at the same time is recommended.

A combat blade made using Force Field (Shield Screen) technology. The force field generated by the blade is launched forward to cut through enemies from a distance as the blade is swung. It does not have the destructive power of the Vibro Hammer, but its attack speed is better and it can attack aerial enemies. Press and hold the attack button to increase the output, then release it when the maximum has been reached in order to unleash a powerful slashing maximum voltage attack.

It is recommended that you equip two Force Blades concurrently, as the pairing of this weapon type with itself is the best way to unlock its true potential. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target.
An improvement on the Vibro Hammer, the impact part has become a roller to compensate for the short range. Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the output of the roller. Immediately after it has been swung down, a charge attack will be unleashed by the roller. 
The vibrations are transmitted through objects, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the output. Releasing the button will unleash a three stage attack (regular attack, high voltage, maximum voltage) depending on the output.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A mechanical spear that stretches with a high speed to attack. Rotating the spear can penetrate several objects and afterwards high-pressure plasma will be released from the front end, destroying objects from within. The expansion and contraction of the spear are instantaneous, making it an extremely fast attack. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable and can penetrate multiple targets at a time. It is also possible to use it with a shield. This is the main weapon of a Fencer. It has short range, so it is necessary to get accustomed to it, but it's a valuable weapon. During a continuous attack, the second attack will be a rush. These attacks can be sustained over a long period.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A mechanical spear that incorporates an acceleration mechanism. As a result of this improvement, it can now better support continuous attacks, though it lacks the strength of a standard Blasthole Spear. Press and hold the attack button to launch multiple attacks. Each spear will rotate to penetrate the target, after which point high-pressure plasma will be released from its tip, destroying the object from within. The expansion and retraction of the spear are virtually instantaneous, allowing for extremely fast attacks. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable. It can penetrate multiple targets with its power. Pairs well with a shield.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A mechanical hammer. Used in place of a spear to crush the target rather than penetrate it. Though simple, it does allow for chain attacks, and is fitted with a mechanism to absorb shocks. It does not need to be fixed to the lower body, so attacking while moving and even while wielding a shield is entirely possible.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A blade for close combat. It produces a jet of light to slash the enemy.
Its range is very short, forcing the user to attack point-blank. However, it delivers massively destructive blows.

Unlike the Force Blade, it can be swung without too much effort. Therefore, it can be used effectively even when wielded single-handedly.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A mechanical hammer with great destructive power. Instead of attacking with a spear, it attacks with a hammer fitted with a blade to crush the target. Rotating the spear can penetrate several objects and afterwards high-pressure plasma will be released from the front end, destroying objects from within. The expansion and contraction of the spear are instantaneous, making it an extremely fast attack. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable and can penetrate multiple targets at a time. It is also possible to use it with a shield. This is the main weapon of a Fencer. It has short range, so it is necessary to get accustomed to it, but it's a valuable weapon. During a continuous attack, the second attack will be a rush. These attacks can be sustained over a long period.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A mechanical hammer. Used in place of a spear to crush the target rather than penetrate it. Though simple, it does allow for chain attacks, and is fitted with a mechanism to absorb shocks. It does not need to be fixed to the lower body, so attacking while moving and even while wielding a shield is entirely possible.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A blade for close combat. It produces a jet of light to slash the enemy.
Its range is very short, forcing the user to attack point-blank. However, it delivers massively destructive blows.

Unlike the Force Blade, it can be swung without too much effort. Therefore, it can be used effectively even when wielded single-handedly.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A double mechanical spear. Used in conjunction with a booster, it is possible to rush forward and attack with two spears at once. Each spear will rotate to penetrate the target, after which point high-pressure plasma will be released from its tip, destroying the object from within. When performing combo attacks, the second attack is much larger and more destructive, utilizing a bigger blast cartridge. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable, making it a very strong weapon.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A special alloy shield.
Holding the attack button will keep raising the shield and reduce Damage coming from the front. (The defense angle differs based on shields. Please refer to %dq%Defense Angle.%dq%)
Some weapons allow you to attack with the shield raised. While it is not possible to pair the shield with a hammer or blade that requires full body usage, it is possible to attack with the Blasthole Spear and other weapons that can be fired with one hand when the shield is raised. 
The heat will increase as it continues to absorb attacks. When it reaches the limit, it won't be usable again until it has cooled down. 

There is a device called Deflector installed inside the shield.  It forms a magnetic field which reverses physical motion by 180 degrees. The Deflector is activated with the use button. It can repel any attack with the right timing.

A personal Gatling gun, made possible to carry due to the development of the powered exoskeleton. It does take a short time for the first shot to leave the gun, but its rate of fire and the power of subsequent shots are terrifying. Press and hold the attack button to start the barrel rotation. When rotation reaches a certain speed, it will start firing. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A light autocannon for personal use. Despite its light weight, it is a massive piece of mobile machinery, and therefore can only be used when you are equipped with a powered exoskeleton. It fires large caliber bullets rapidly, making it the most powerful personal firearm. But due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A large shotgun with a self-loading mechanism that automatically loads new shells in the magazine after each shot, making continuous fire possible. When the magazine is empty, however, it takes several seconds to reload. As its shot will spread out after being fired, its range is shorter. Therefore, this weapon should be considered a close-range weapon.

It's possible to launch a wide range attack, but it has short effective range. Once the distance is long, its power decreases sharply.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A high-performance flamethrower. It discharges flames of much greater intensity than a regular flamethrower by generating a high temperature inside its cylinders, and then rotating them at high speeds. Though it boasts tremendous power, it takes some time to reach the necessary temperature, resulting in a four-second delay between pressing the attack button and seeing any results. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing. This means you need to adjust your aim regularly in order to hit your targets continuously. When you are wielding two weapons, it is nearly impossible to adjust your aim at the same time.

Its emitted flame gets cooled down by the air, making the firepower to greatly decrease with distance. In order to use the weapon effectively, you need to get as close as possible to the enemy.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A personal Gatling gun, made possible to carry due to the development of the powered exoskeleton. It does take a short time for the first shot to leave the gun, but its rate of fire and the power of subsequent shots are terrifying. Press and hold the attack button to start the barrel rotation. When rotation reaches a certain speed, it will start firing. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A cannon with excellent rapid fire performance. Despite its light weight, it is a massive piece of mobile machinery, and therefore can only be used when you are equipped with a powered exoskeleton. It fires large-caliber bullets rapidly, making it a powerful weapon. But due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

An enhanced model of the Dexter Automatic Shotgun. A large shotgun with a self-loading mechanism. It has larger shells, but at the cost of a reduced magazine capacity. Automatically loads shells in the magazine with each shot, making continuous fire possible. When the magazine is empty, however, it takes several seconds to reload. Its range is fairly short, making it effective only in close-range combat.

It's possible to launch a wide range attack, but it has short effective range. Once the distance is long, its power decreases sharply.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A Gatling gun with an excellent ammo capacity, designed to fire for 40 seconds straight. Its destructive power is outstanding.
Press and hold the attack button to start the barrel rotation. When rotation reaches a certain speed, it will start firing. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

An enhanced model of the Galleon Lightweight Cannon. A light autocannon for personal use. Despite its light weight, it is a massive piece of mobile machinery, and therefore can only be used when you are equipped with a powered exoskeleton. Fires large-caliber bullets, limiting its rapid-fire abilities but increasing the raw force of its projectiles. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A plasma arc cannon that mounts on the shoulder and can discharge a continuous plasma arc to decimate the enemy. Its destructive power is immense, but its output may be a little overzealous: after activation, it will continue firing until it runs out of power. Also, Fencers that don't carry Plasma Generators will not be able to reload on the battlefield.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A personal Gatling gun, made possible to carry due to the development of the powered exoskeleton. It does take a short time for the first shot to leave the gun, but its rate of fire and the power of subsequent shots are terrifying. Press and hold the attack button to start the barrel rotation. When rotation reaches a certain speed, it will start firing. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

An improved Gatling gun with exceptional rapid-fire performance. Can be aimed at multiple targets within a set range, making it ideal for attacking enemies over a wide area.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A specially designed machine gun. With constraints placed on its rapid-fire capabilities, its destructive power has been successfully increased. It can fire 3 high-caliber bullets at a time. These three shots are fired at very short intervals, but there is an interruption between every 3 shots, hurting its usability a bit. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each firing.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

An enhanced Flame Revolver with its temperature increased to ludicrous, terrifying levels. Because of the high temperature, only Fencers with their heavy armor are able to use this weapon. Because of the increase in temperature, the discharge time is extended to 5 seconds, and the recoil is notably more powerful.

Its emitted flame gets cooled down by the air, making the firepower to greatly decrease with distance. In order to use the weapon effectively, you need to get as close as possible to the enemy.

A personal artillery that fires armor-piercing ammo with excellent penetration power. This large-caliber weapon is impossible for an unarmored human to handle. It can only be managed with a powered exoskeleton. Even then, the powered exoskeleton requires a second to absorb the recoil. In that period, you will be defenseless so it is necessary to take proper precautions when handling it. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

A personal heavy artillery that fires special shells with excellent penetrating force. Easily one of the largest personal weapons available, the weapon is so heavy that it takes the full strength of a powered exoskeleton only to barely lift it. Because of its large caliber, the recoil on discharge could kill an unarmored person. The recoil takes even a powered exoskeleton time to absorb. And in that time, you will be left completely vulnerable. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

An arm-mounted missile launcher capable of attacking multiple enemies at once.
Holding down the attack button will display the sight (red square). When a target is captured with the sight (within the lock in range), lock-on will begin.
It's possible to lock on multiple foes. Releasing the attack button will unleash a missile, which will chase down the locked-on targets and explode on impact.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A Blood Storm convergent missile cannon. Missiles launched from this weapon will separate in the air and rain down on the enemy's head. Their damage pattern isn't limited to a single target, but an entire area. Though exceptionally powerful, misuse of the homing feature when the enemy is too close can reduce its effect.

Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured with the sight, a positive lock will be established. A maximum of two enemies may be locked on at any given time. Release the attack button to unleash missile to the locked-on target or targets.

A massive missile launcher that launches enormous laser-guided missiles.

Because a laser guide is necessary for targeting, this weapon cannot be used alone: it must be paired with an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit (or a guide beacon)  to establish a viable target lock. Through the Laser Guide Kit, the lock-on location is confirmed. When the laser guide location (or a guide beacon)  is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. After the lock-on, releasing the attack button will launch the missile. The missile will fly at the targeted location and cause a tremendous explosion, damaging the whole area. 

The lock-on process requires not only the support of an Air Raider, but also a considerable amount of time. When used effectively, however, it can be absolutely devastating to the enemy.

A massive multi-missile launcher that can fire multiple laser guided missiles.
This weapon cannot be used alone: it must be paired with an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit (or a guide beacon) to establish a viable target lock. 
Through the Laser Guide Kit, the lock-on location is confirmed. When the laser guide location (or a guide beacon) is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. After the lock-on, releasing the attack button will launch the missile. The missile will fly at the targeted location and cause a tremendous explosion, damaging the whole area.

A high-performance six-barreled missile launcher that can fire six missiles at once.
Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured within the sight, a positive lock will be established, up to the pre-established maximum of six. Release the attack button to unleash missiles, which will track the target or targets and explode on contact.

An arm-mounted missile launcher capable of attacking multiple enemies at once.
Holding down the attack button will display the sight (red square). When a target is captured with the sight (within the lock in range), lock-on will begin.
It's possible to lock on multiple foes. Releasing the attack button will unleash a missile, which will chase down the locked-on targets and explode on impact.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A high-performance missile launcher designed for urban warfare. It has excellent hit performance. After firing, the missile will rise to a high altitude, and then be directed towards its target on descent. Due to its high arc, obstacles such as buildings will have little impact on its targeting capability. The lock-on speed is fast and it is possible to attack several enemies. It is an easy-to-use weapon.

Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured with the sight, a positive lock will be established. Release the attack button to unleash a missile on the locked-on target or targets.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A large missile launcher that launches laser-guided missiles.
This weapon is devastating, but cannot be used alone: it must be paired with an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit (or a guide beacon) to establish a viable target lock. 

Through the Laser Guide Kit, the lock-on location is confirmed. When the laser guide location (or a guide beacon) is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. After the lock-on, releasing the attack button will launch the missile. The missile will fly at the targeted location and cause a tremendous explosion, damaging the whole area. 

Although it's a powerful weapon with a wide explosive range, it takes long to lock on. Please be cautious when using it.

A high-performance six-barreled missile launcher that can fire six missiles at once.
Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured within the sight, a positive lock will be established, up to the pre-established maximum of six. Release the attack button to unleash missiles, which will track the target or targets and explode on contact.

A massive multi-missile launcher that can fire multiple laser guided missiles.
This weapon cannot be used alone: it must be paired with an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit (or a guide beacon) to establish a viable target lock. 
Through the Laser Guide Kit, the lock-on location is confirmed. When the laser guide location (or a guide beacon) is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. After the lock-on, releasing the attack button will launch the missile. The missile will fly at the targeted location and cause a tremendous explosion, damaging the whole area.

A Blood Storm convergent missile cannon. Missiles launched from this weapon will separate in the air and rain down on the enemy's head. Their damage pattern isn't limited to a single target, but an entire area. Though exceptionally powerful, misuse of the homing feature when the enemy is too close can reduce its effect.

Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured with the sight, a positive lock will be established. A maximum of two enemies may be locked on at any given time. Release the attack button to unleash missile to the locked-on target or targets.

A massive missile launcher. It launches enormous laser-guided missiles. 
Because a laser guide is necessary for targeting, this weapon cannot be used alone: it must be paired with an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit (or a guide beacon) to establish a viable target lock. Through the Laser Guide Kit, the lock-on location is confirmed. When the laser guide location (or a guide beacon) is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. Then, when the attack button is released, the missile will launch directly toward the targeted location. On impact, it will explode spectacularly, inflicting damage across the entire area.
The lock-on process requires not only the support of an Air Raider, but also a considerable amount of time. When used effectively, however, it can be a formidable weapon, wiping out the enemy in the entire area.

A device to keep the Deflector System installed on the shield working with small output. Since it functions with small output, it's powerless to repel attacks; however, the impact of bullets can be reduced.
By being equipped with armor plating, the shield is increased in size, and as a result, its defense angle is increased. Its durability is also improved thanks to the armor plating.

A device to specially fortify the Deflector System installed on the shield and make it protective. It will instantly strengthen the shield when getting hit. Although Damage can be greatly reduced, a massive load is put on the shield and increases its consumption rate.

A smoke grenade used to request a Mortar attack from the Artillery Squad directed at the location of impact. The shells from this attack detonate as they land, causing damage to the area.

The Mortar is small in built, making it easy to use. Only requires a small amount of Credit to re-launch.

Press and hold the attack button to wind up your throw, then release to let the smoke grenade fly. Its expected trajectory will be indicated by a red line.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A smoke grenade used to request a Howitzer attack from the Artillery Squad directed at the location of impact. The shells from this attack detonate as they land, causing damage to the area.  While this weapon can attack over a wide area, it may wipe out all foes.

Press and hold the attack button to wind up your throw, then release to let the smoke grenade fly. Its expected trajectory will be indicated by a red line.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A smoke grenade used to request a Cannon attack from the Artillery Squad directed at the location of impact. 
The powerful armor-piercing ammunition can cause extraordinary damages to the hit objects.
Although these shells scatter widely, they don't detonate like howitzers, so the attack range is fairly small. You must throw the smoke grenade precisely to hit the enemy.

Press and hold the attack button to wind up your throw, then release to let the smoke grenade fly. Its expected trajectory will be indicated by a red line.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A smoke grenade used to request a crossfire attack from the specially-formed Mortar Squad directed at the location of impact. The shells from this attack detonate as they land, causing damage to the area. 

Lots of mortars are required, so you'll need much more credits to request this.

Press and hold the attack button to wind up your throw, then release to let the smoke grenade fly. Its expected trajectory will be indicated by a red line.

A Beacon Discharger.
Use this beacon to signal a Rocket Cannon attack from the gunship that is circling the skies, and it will launch an attack where the beacon hits. It can discharge only one Rocket Cannon each time, but it can fire consecutively if loaded with multiple Rocket Cannons.

Press the attack button to discharge a beacon which will start guiding only when hitting an object, so it could be useless if you target at somewhere with no objects. Also, a beacon out of range will activate its safety device and disable it. In short, the beacon must hit an object in range. There is a laser device equipped on the Beacon Discharger to determine the range. Once you confirm the laser light has hit the object in range, you can discharge the beacon with certainty that the beacon can be activated properly.

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from the combat bomber. It will come in to launch a low strafing run upon the target area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack from the scout bomber, and it will start bombing the indicated area.
It is mostly equipped with scout equipment and carries a smaller bomb load.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack from the Combat Bomber Kamuy, which will start bombing the indicated location.

Compared with a Heavy Bomber, Kamuy has lower bomb loads. However, its mobility is outstanding, it can reach the battlefield in high speed and start bombing the exact area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this communication system to request support from the heavy bomber equipped with napalm bombs. It will proceed to drop its napalm payload upon the designated area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from the combat bomber. Three combat bombers will come in to launch a low strafing run upon the target area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack from the heavy bomber, and it will launch an airstrike on the designated area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from the combat bomber. Two combat bombers will enter the designated attack area from different angles and launch a strafing run.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack.

Use the Laser Guide Kit to transmit coordinates to a large airship to launch 4 missiles. The laser must be maintained until the missiles hit. 

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.
The Laser Guide Kit is equipped with a scope.

Missile reloading is conducted in an airship, so  the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

A device which launches a sticky bomb that attaches to whatever surface it strikes.

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode.

Use this Limpet Gun for a precise, long-range launch of sticky bombs with a wider range and improved rate of fire.

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode. It is mounted with a laser sight to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

To prevent allies from being attacked, it is equipped with a high performance safety device. You don't have to worry about allies getting hit or self exploding.

Use this improved model of the Limpet Gun to launch sticky bombs with greatly increased destructive power. 

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode.

Device that sends the lock-on information to your allies' homing weapons (missiles, etc.) The device has no ability to attack by itself. 
 
By projecting a laser to a spot, it 'paints' the target, confirming the location for an allied lock-on target weapon. The lock-on time for your allies' homing weapons is greatly reduced. Also, the range is extended up to 3 times their own range. (For example, if the Fencer has a weapon with a lock-on speed of 3 seconds and a lock-on distance of 100m, he can lock on the target that is up to 300 meters away 1 sec later when the Air Raider uses this weapon.)
 
The homing weapon locks on to the point indicated by this weapon, not the enemy itself. When your allies launch the homing missile, it will head in the direction indicated by the laser. Therefore, if the laser is moved after launch, the missile will move accordingly. For that reason, the laser needs to be maintained until the target is hit.
 
Usually only one missile can be launched per lock-on, but it is possible to have multiple lock-ons for the laser point. It is therefore possible to launch multiple missiles at one target.  
 
The majority of Fencer missiles rely on the support of this device. When Fencers are equipping missiles, you should equip this device as well.

An improved Laser Guide Kit model that improves lock-on speed at the cost of a shorter range. However, lock-on speed is dramatically improved.

A device that discharges a beacon to offer lock-on information. The beacon focuses on a hit point and transmits location information. The beacon confirms the lock-on target for ally tracking weapons, making it possible to lock-on. The lock-on time is reduced and the lock-on range is increased. Even though it does not have the performance of the Laser Guide Kit, it has a wide variety of uses as it is not necessary to maintain the beacon until the target has been hit. It is possible for multiple lock-ons. By using the beacon on the enemy, it is possible to launch multiple missiles at the enemy. Also, the target can be attacked many times as the beacon will not be lost even after the missile has hit. Enemies that have been hit by the beacon will not be able to escape. Pressing the reload button releases the beacon, then it reloads.

A high-performance guide beacon gun. Discharges a beacon to provide lock-on information, marking any foe it hits as a lock-on target for allied weapons. This, in turn, decreases the time it takes to establish a lock and increases the effective range of those weapons. Though these beacons can't offer the same level of precision as a Laser Guide Kit, they also require no maintenance of any kind until a target has been hit, giving them numerous situational advantages. Each beacon also supports multiple lock-ons, allowing for easy bombardment of particularly troublesome foes. Additionally, marked targets can be attacked as many times as needed, as beacons will remain intact even after missile detonation. If it should become necessary to reset a beacon in play, simply press the reload button to destroy it and ready a new one.

A new shotgun developed for Air Raiders to protect themselves in city combat.

This weapon fires multiple special bullets at once, which will scatter widely, even an Air Raider with poor shooting skills can capture the target. These special bullets can penetrate object and neutralize the enemy. 
However, because it scatters in ultrahigh speed, its range is very short. Also, since its uses is limited, it's better to equip it as a sub weapon instead of a main weapon.

Air Raiders may not be able to perform well in an urban scuffle or a close-range combat. Carrying this shotgun could possibly increase their survival rate.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A device that discharges nanomachines. It automatically discharges nanomachines to living targets and weapons within the effective range. The nanomachines will solidify on a target, forming an invisible wall around the it. Temporarily repairs damaged armor and can be used to restore vehicle durability and Armor.

This device does not distinguish between friend or foe. It is very large and it cannot be reloaded.

A device that increases the attack power of allies. They link to ally equipment when in range, supplying power and increasing attack power. They will confer benefits on all allies in range. They will also have an impact on passengers in vehicles. Also, they can determine friend from foe and will not increase the attack power of enemies. This is a top-secret device, so its origins are not fully known.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

Thus, the damage inflicted by allies on the enemy is not affected.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

A device which erects a wall of energy that not only stops bullets, but optical weapons as well. Also has on-the-spot collision detection, allowing all allies and friendly fire to pass through -- meaning it doesn't just offer cover, but serves as a legitimate shield that permits the users to fire from behind it safely.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

A device that discharges a balloon that mimics a human. Warmth, soft noises and particles come from the balloon, distracting the attention of the enemy. The balloon will only be active for a limited time. Afterward, it will self-destruct before the enemy realizes its true form. It will also be destroyed when it has no durability left. It has several uses, such as being installed on a vehicle as a decoy, or to distract the enemy in an area being bombed. It is a very useful weapon.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to activate the installed device.

A device that creates a wall of energy. When installed, it creates a wall of energy that extends upwards. Attacks from above can be blocked.  The wall senses objects that collide with it. Allies are allowed to pass through it. It not only acts as a shield, but also permits the users to fire from behind it safely.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

A powerful Electromagnetic Bunker. When installed, it creates a wall of energy that extends forward. The wall provides lateral defense across its area. In addition, it senses objects that collide with it. Allies are allowed to pass through it. It not only acts as a shield, but also permits the users to fire from behind it safely.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

It expands a small, semi-circular defensive wall. It is only wide enough for one person, but its defensive capabilities are excellent. The defensive wall senses objects that collide with it. Allies are allowed to pass through it.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

Its impossible momentum allows it to make its way up slopes or on bumpy roads without losing speed.
It locks onto a target and automatically finds its way approaching the enemy. When a direct path is blocked by an obstacle, it will detour, making it possible to attack enemies hiding behind a building.
It will explode when close to the target. Should the target disappear before the bomb reaches it (or a certain time has passed), it explodes itself for safety reasons. In this case, the scale of the explosion will be small to avoid damaging the surroundings.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button to activate.
Hold the Use Backpack Tool button to stop.

A portable support drone.
One of the Capsule Soldier series, robotic soldiers (drones) produced by the Soulless Soldier Project led by the Advanced Technologies Lab.
The drone deploys via fan blades, allowing it to fly about and defend the user.
As AI technology is still in its infancy, it is unable to make advanced judgments and can only be active for a short period of time.

It is designed to follow the user and automatically attack approaching enemies.
Since it is equipped with advanced safety devices, there is no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

Four units activate simultaneously and fly out in front of the user.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, machine gun fire rains down from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
Can distiguish friend from foe, posing no danger to the user and his/her allies.

Improved version of the R2+ type. Formation of 2 unmanned attack aircraft that fly fast and return swiftly after each attack (can be reused for a short period of time).
Equipped with machine guns with excellent rapid-fire performance and high attack power.

Can distiguish friend from foe, posing no danger to the user and his/her allies.

A portable unmanned attack aircraft equipped with a flamethrower. Although not as deadly as a bomb, its flames spread over a wide area, damaging many enemies.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Portable unmanned bomber. It inflicts damage over a wide area using air strikes.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, bomb from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Complete spec G-type formation of 4 unmanned attack aircraft equipped with machine guns.

Can distiguish friend from foe, posing no danger to the user and his/her allies.

The user indicates the target using a laser guidance system.
Once the target has been set, the entire aircraft swoops down upon it and detonates.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.
Naturally, this results in a longer reload time.

Armed multicopter equipped with a high-powered beam cannon.
The user indicates the target with a laser, and the aircraft fires a beam of energy at it from above.
The beam can be fired continuously for a certain period of time, so by moving the laser point, another target can be selected.

Once the aircraft's energy is depleted, it crashes.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.

A multicopter equipped with an electrical discharge device.
The user indicates the target with a laser, and the aircraft fires a bolt of electricity at it from above, damaging surrounding objects.
Since electrical energy weakens as it diffuses, the further away the aircraft is from the target, the less damage it inflicts.

Electricity can be fired continuously for a certain period of time, so by moving the laser point, another target can be selected.

Once the aircraft's energy is depleted, it crashes.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1250 Damage:14.4～2.4 Range:240.0m)</font>
Rocket Cannon (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:20 Damage:120.0 Blast Range:Radius 5.0m)</font>

1 person.
This boardable enhanced exoskeleton was designed to counter terrorism in urban warfare. The full-body armor can block blasts, while offering mobility to carry out various tasks. Hold the Jump button to activate jet thrusters in the back to fly for a short period of time.

Being able to carry multiple weapons is one of its key features. Both arms can be mounted with weapons that provide excellent firepower. It is practical in many uses because of the multiple weapons with different purposes.

Model A uses light armor and light weapons.
The right arm is equipped with a 'machine gun' and the left with a 'rocket cannon'.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver

1 person.
An enhanced model of the Powered Exoskeleton Nix equipped with a large grenade discharger that boasts a wide blast area.

Has a large grenade launcher on the right arm. The shells detonate several seconds after being fired. It can attack from range, because of the long interval until explosion.

The left shoulder is armed with a special grenade launcher called 'Explosion' which fires multiple grenades at once. The grenades will detonate right after discharge, and cause damage to a large area.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

1 person.
A powered exoskeleton that has been customized for close combat. Its mobility has been improved with close combat in mind. In particular, its legs have been improved, increasing its jump power. It has also made speed jumps possible. It has a Combat Burner and a machine gun on its arms, granting it amazing ability to exterminate at close-range. It is also equipped with huge Canister Shots on both shoulders. Because of the dispersal nature of its weapon, it can attack a wide area, and it can also penetrate objects to defeat several enemies. Its range is short because it is a dispersal weapon, so it is only really best at close-range.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Has customized Powered Exoskeleton Revolver Cannons on both arms. Making it especially deadly at mid and long range. 
Both shoulders are armed with missile pods. The missiles can automatically lock-on enemy within the sights (red square).

This mass-produced yet effective model can handle most situations with its powerful Revolver Cannons and homing missiles. 90% of the EDF's Powered Exoskeletons are model B.

1 person. Can be requested from underground locations.
A walking tank developed for underground battle. Since it has four hook-like limbs and moves in a crawling fashion, it performs well on rough roads and can even scale walls. Its hooks work in conjunction with its powerful joints to leap up and cling to walls or roofs. It also comes with large headlights that can greatly enhance visibility in the dark. They provide essential support to teams infiltrating the underground. Although it was designed primarily for subterranean combat, its versatility makes it a force to be reckoned with on the ground as well. It can chase enemies up the sides of buildings by using its hook-like limbs.

4 people.
A giant humanoid battle machine. It is one of the trump cards for the EDF's land battles. It does not have the greatest mobility because of its large size, but the large weaponry offers impressive destructive power. It has special plate armor all over its body, so its defensive capabilities are much higher than a tanks. It can carry a large amount of ammo. It is a walking fortress with excellent combat ability. But it is necessary to have four people to make use of its potential. One person must be a pilot. So you need to have gunners if you want to attack. 

Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle. 
Anyone can ride in the gunners seat. 

In order to request this, you need to achieve a certain amount of credits in the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Its main cannon is the EDF's state-of-the-art Requiem Cannon, originally developed as a naval gun but then equipped on tanks after reducing the size of its barrel. This has resulted in a further reduction to its initial velocity, so some skill is necessary to hit the desired target.

There are two Smooth-Bore Guns above the main cannon. It can fire armor-piercing ammunition and one shot can hit many enemies. The left and right weaponry has been changed to missile launchers to improve its combat capabilities. 
The main cannon and sub-cannons all rotate. The sub-cannons are located on the top of the main cannon so when the main cannon rotates, the direction of the sub-cannons will also change.

Blow-up dolls created by the EDF Public Relations Department for the purpose of recruiting soldiers, converted into combat decoys.
They were made to resemble idols contracted by the Public Relations Department to recruit young people at events.

The doll is equipped with a function that allows it to be moved by fine-tuning the air pressure in various parts. It also has a small built-in speaker and can talk.
Although these functions are excessive for a decoy, it can be difficult for the enemy to tell that it's not a real soldier, making it an effective decoy against monsters.

The content of its speech remains unchanged from its time as a recruitment tool.
Its song repertoire includes the official EDF theme used in the recruitment commercials. A different version is sung by the soldiers.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button to install. Press and hold to remove the installed device and prepare for re-use (reload).

A metal-coated version of the Nix enhanced exoskeleton. Only a very small number were ever produced. It is coated with a special paint that reflects radar waves, but the actual effect has not been proven.

This boardable enhanced exoskeleton was designed to counter terrorism in urban warfare. The full-body armor can block blasts, while offering mobility to carry out various tasks. Hold the Jump button to activate jet thrusters in the back to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A high-caliber sniper rifle with a damaged scope. Its shots can pierce through any enemy and inflict damage on any target within the line of fire. Its range and accuracy are also high. However, because of its unique build, it must be reloaded after each and every shot.

A chemical explosive.
Throwable capsule containing several chemical substances. When the capsule hits a target, the chemicals inside it mix to produce a corrosive gas. While the gas is airborne, it slowly eats away nearby objects.

Because it destroys biomatter as well as machines, it has been classified as a highly dangerous weapon, banned from use by international treaty. However, as circumstances worsened, its use was permitted under special exemption only during wartime.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

A special capsule containing nanomachines. When the capsule strikes a target, it explodes and disperses nanomachines over a wide area.
The nanomachines drift through the air in a cloud, affecting surrounding objects. The density of the cloud increases as one approaches the detonation site, as does its effect.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user. Heals allies, vehicles, and the user, but also enemies in the cloud.)

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the projectile.

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

A device that generates a blade of energy.
Small and lightweight, it is used as a sidearm by Wing Divers.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. However, the blade maintains its form for only a brief moment immediately after being swung. This weapon's destructive power is rather low, and it is intended only for emergency self-defense.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use. Press and hold to reload.

A special Plasma Core with improved the energy-generating speed. It recovers energy quickly, and its emergency charge time is reduced. The Plasma Core is the heart of the flight unit, and the performance of the flight unit changes depending on the Core equipped.

A hammer disguised as a body pillow with the same specs as the Vibro Hammer. Fencers' equipment looked terrifying, and many citizens around the base voiced their concerns. As a result, a less intimidating version was developed.

A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is formed in the area of the massive vibration which reduces the damage taken when attacked. 
Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output, and when it's reached its max, release to unleash a powerful slashing maximum voltage attack.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.
(Clash Close Range Charge:0.0 Damage:15.0 Effective Range:Radius 2.0m)

A blade for close combat. It produces a jet of light to slash the enemy.
Its range is very short, forcing the user to attack point-blank. However, it delivers massively destructive blows.

Unlike the Force Blade, it can be swung without too much effort. Therefore, it can be used effectively even when wielded single-handedly.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A shield that reverses movement.
As long as the attack button is held down, it continues to form a magnetic field that reverses movement by 180 degrees.
The heat value increases during activation and cools (reloads) when it reaches its maximum limit.
Special exoskeleton tuned for gunfire. Equipped with stabilizers to absorb recoil and enhanced performance required for shooting.
Eqpt Weight Impact on Rotational Inertia

A complete version of the EMC (Atomic Ray Cannon) gun, the Blazer. In theory, it has 30% of the output of an EMC.
It has a longer range and strikes the target instantly.

An ultra high-power atomic ray gun developed for the final battle. Despite its small size, it has firepower comparable to that of an EMC. Its production cost is close to that of the EMC, so only a few were made.
It has a long range and strikes the target instantly.

An improved version of the atomic ray gun Blazer. Assuming combat with a large number of monsters, it fires a large number of horizontal light rays simultaneously. It can defeat a wide range of enemies.

Because it has been adjusted for use against monsters, each time the trigger is pulled, it takes only an instant to fire.
In addition, the output of each ray is suppressed and tends to spread out. Therefore, the further away from the point of impact, the less powerful the beam becomes (although only slightly).

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

An improved version of the atomic ray gun Blazer. Assuming combat with a large number of monsters, it fires a large number of horizontal light rays simultaneously. It can defeat a wide range of enemies.

Because it has been adjusted for use against monsters, each time the trigger is pulled, it takes only an instant to fire.
In addition, the output of each ray is suppressed and tends to spread out. Therefore, the further away from the point of impact, the less powerful the beam becomes (although only slightly).

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

The perfect insect-shaped bomb. The Advanced Technologies Lab has personally seen to its successful development.
The number of bombs that can be activated simultaneously has been increased and they spread out to cover a wider area.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. Press and hold the Use Backpack Tool button to detonate.

A complete spec Vibro Hammer. Its performance surpasses that of the Finest Hammer.
A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is formed in the area of the massive vibration which reduces the damage taken when attacked. 
Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output, and when it's reached its max, release to unleash a powerful slashing maximum voltage attack.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The final spec form of the Blasthole Spear, further modifications to the MS model have resulted in an increase in power output.

A mechanical spear that stretches with a high speed to attack. Rotating the spear can penetrate several objects and afterwards high-pressure plasma will be released from the front end, destroying objects from within. The expansion and contraction of the spear are instantaneous, making it an extremely fast attack. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable and can penetrate multiple targets at a time. It is also possible to use it with a shield. This is the main weapon of a Fencer. It has short range, so it is necessary to get accustomed to it, but it's a valuable weapon. During a continuous attack, the second attack will be a rush. These attacks can be sustained over a long period.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A special capsule containing nanomachines. When the capsule strikes a target, it explodes and disperses nanomachines over a wide area.
The nanomachines drift through the air in a cloud, affecting surrounding objects. The density of the cloud increases as one approaches the detonation site, as does its effect.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user. Heals allies, vehicles, and the user, but also enemies in the cloud.)

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the projectile.

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

Final model in the Orchid series of assault rifles. A fearsome rifle with tremendous destructive power.

Fires special bullets with excellent penetrating power. It can penetrate targets up to 1/4 of its range.
Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A high-caliber sniper rifle with a focus on tremendous destructive and penetrative power alike. Its shots can pierce through any enemy and inflict damage on any target within the line of fire. Its range and accuracy are also high. However, because of its unique build, it must be reloaded after each and every shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

The final model Force Blade, specially designed for the last boss battle. 
The force field generated by the blade is launched forward to cut through enemies from a distance as the blade is swung. It does not have the destructive power of the Vibro Hammer, but its attack speed is better and it can attack aerial enemies. Press and hold the attack button to increase the output, then release it when the maximum has been reached in order to unleash a powerful slashing attack.

It is recommended that you equip two Force Blades concurrently, as the pairing of this weapon type with itself is the best way to unlock its true potential.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The final model Vulcan Hammer that is installed with a high output ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive), developed specifically for the last boss battle. It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. It has tremendous destructive power, but control is difficult and attacks while moving are not possible. Its short range may also pose difficulties.
The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked.
Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the output. Releasing the button will unleash a three stage attack depending on the output. The second and third stage attacks create enormous explosions on impact, which can be used to destroy enemies in a wide area.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A large assault rifle developed for elite units. Because of its size and weight, it requires skillful handling.
Its destructive power is tremendous, and its penetrate the enemy up to 80 meters.

Equipped with a scope and laser sight.

A new Slugger-type assault rifle. Equipped with an innovative loading system to reduce reload time. Various other specs have also been improved.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
