Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A special shotgun that fires diffuse, armor-piercing grenades.
The grenade contains an explosive charge and a delay fuse, penetrating the target's armor before exploding. Damage can be inflicted in two stages: when the shot hits the target and when it explodes.
The damage inflicted by the explosion is not affected by distance, making it effective even against faraway enemies.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

Redesigned SGN semi-auto shotgun. Not only the highest spec model, but now also an automatic thanks to its innovative loading system. Can now load more rounds than ever with a decreased reloading time.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A shotgun that can fire armor-piercing ammunition %dq%Slugger Bullets%dq% and it fires only one shot at a time without scattering.
However, the bullets contain tremendous destructive power and penetrative power until it reaches the limit of its range.

Due to its large size, Slugger Bullets fired are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance with a shorter effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

Improved version of the Dunkel N236 full-auto sniper rifle with maximum rapid-firing performance. Also has an expanded magazine that gives it a much greater bullet capacity.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots. 
A scope and a laser sight are attached.

The newest type of personal artillery. It can be operated without a powered exoskeleton, and its performance is similar to that of the Gallic Heavy Cannon. Firing it creates a shockwave so great that only the strongest soldiers can withstand it, and the user is left vulnerable to recoil immediately after firing.

Due to its severe recoil, using regular scopes may lead to injury. Since this weapon was introduced so rapidly, a new scope could not be completed in time, so the user must use a simple sight to aim.

An enhanced weapon developed from the Goliath rocket launcher, now with greater destructive power than ever as a result of its super-sized rockets.
These rockets are slower due to their size, but they gradually accelerate.

Equipped with a scope.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A redesigned version of the Volcano rocket launcher. Continuously fires 20 loaded rockets. The rockets are accurately fired in the forward direction.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

The completed model of the Flame Geyser flamethrower series with dramatically increased output and destructive power.

A special gun that discharges flames. This device can be easily directed at any target and will completely engulf it on contact, generating a giant column of fire where it previously stood. Because the device ejects in the opposite direction of the surface, it is possible to choose the surface and thus control the direction. For example, if fired towards the ground, the column of fire will reach up into the sky; if fired at a wall, a horizontal pillar of flame will be ejected (perpendicular to the surface of the wall). For this reason, it has many uses such as blocking the progress of an enemy. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

Finalized MG-type hand grenade.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A chemical explosive.
Throwable capsule containing several chemical substances. When the capsule hits a target, the chemicals inside it mix to produce a corrosive gas. While the gas is airborne, it slowly eats away nearby objects.

Because it destroys biomatter as well as machines, it has been classified as a highly dangerous weapon, banned from use by international treaty. However, as circumstances worsened, its use was permitted under special exemption only during wartime.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

The final enhanced form of the Anti-Aircraft Impulse mine with dramatically improved sensor performance. It is capable of striking even the highest-flying enemies. Ejects larger ball bearings, and although it can be fired fewer times, each blast is more powerful than ever.

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

A stationary automatic tracking gun that fires high-speed rockets. An upgrade to the ZEX model, it fires rockets at high velocity to smash its targets.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.
Lightweight liquid armor. It is designed to reduce movement speed reduction when struck by bullets and to allow easy movement.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
HV Anti-Aircraft Machine Gun (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1500 Damage:[PT]102.0 Range:480.0m)</font>
HV Anti-Aircraft Machine Gun (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1500 Damage:[PT]102.0 Range:480.0m)</font>

Complete spec version of the KG6 Kepler Self-Propelled Anti-Aircraft Gun, equipped with a new heavy machine gun with excellent penetrating power.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
140mm High Pressure Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:30 Damage:11200.0 Blast Range:Radius 18.0m)</font>

1 person.
Redesigned version of the EDF's most advanced combat vehicle with improved driving performance and increased shell carrying capacity.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Enhanced version of Rapier Nova with greatly improved output. It is the final, most powerful Rapier model.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire plasma arc blades.

The finalized version of the Spark Whip. It diffuses 12 beams of energy horizontally, enabling it to attack over a wider area. Its energy consumption has also been reduced, making it easier to handle.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

Customized version of the Mag Blaster DX. In exchange for its high energy consumption, its destructive power and range have been improved.

It has tremendous firepower, but can only sustain it for a short period of time; at half its stored power, its destructive power drops to 1/8 of its original level.

As long as the trigger is pulled (or the attack button is held down), it will continue to fire its beam.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

A all-new type of firearm developed with the help of alien scientific knowledge. It fires a particle beam that reflects off any obstacle it strikes.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will shoot off beams continuously.
This weapon is extremely powerful when it's fully charged, but when the stored power decreases, the shooting range shortens accordingly, and so does its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

A super weapon based on the Stardust Cannon that fires numerous pulse energy bullets at once.
The bullets fall rapidly after being fired due to their great mass.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more energy stored, the more energy bullets able to shoot. As the amount of accumulation increases, energy efficiency increases, it is suggested to accumulate as much energy as possible.

The final completed Lightning Bow. Its performance far surpasses that of the ZA model.

It continually emits rapid bolts of electricity that damage whatever they hit. Because the bolts leap from target to target throughout their range, they can take out several targets at a time.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. The more power stored, the longer time you can fire.
As the accumulated energy decreases, accuracy declines.

Enhanced version of the Thunder Crossbow RZ with improved horizontal scattering performance.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The more power accumulated, the more likely the lightening concentrates on the aiming direction; whereas the energy accumulation decreases, the lightening diffuses. In that case, it's difficult to hit the target, but you can attack in a wider range.

A new type of long-range laser gun. Its laser penetrates objects and damages everything in the line of fire.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will continuously irradiate the laser until the stored energy runs out.
The projection time increases with the amount of energy accumulation. The more the accumulation is, the higher the energy efficiency can be and the longer time for the weapon to fire.

The ultimate model of the super high-output long-range laser gun, Monster. It fires off all of its stored energy at once to instantly destroy the target in the distance.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
Because it was designed with the idea that it would consume a lot of energy, when its stored energy is low, its power reduces significantly.
The ultimate five-barreled Mirage, with excellent destructive power and homing performance.

The ultimate enhanced Geist weapon, based on the model D. It has been further improved to achieve a level of performance beyond all known limits.
By reducing blast range, its destructive power has been doubled. Bullet velocity, as well as the number of energy spears fired simultaneously has also been increased. This formidable weapon requires a highly talented user of the Psionic Link, of which there are very few.

A large Plasma Cannon developed for use by elite units. Its destructive power and blast range exceed those of the F-type.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A high-output Plasma Cannon. It's a powerful weapon that boasts a wide blast area, but the speed of its plasma balls is slow, and its energy cost is high.

A weapon that fires plasma balls. Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

Creates numerous small plasma balls to be thrown by hand.
The plasma balls will diffuse vertically.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit.
Therefore, it can be used even during an emergency charge so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. It only takes a short time to reload.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

The final Blink Ball upgrade. It has been improved to the maximum level possible in all aspects.
The Plasma Balls fly in a gentle parabola and explode on impact, causing damage over a wide area.
It's equipped with an independent energy generator, so it doesn't deplete the energy of the aerial unit. Reloading is also possible during an emergency charge.
Although not particularly devastating, it can be an excellent sub-weapon when equipping a high consumption weapon.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

The ultimate Handy Saber model with greatly enhanced destructive power.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. However, the blade maintains its form for only a brief moment immediately after being swung. This weapon's destructive power is rather low, and it is intended only for emergency self-defense.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use. Press and hold to reload.

A device that fires guided energy projectiles, developed for emergency self-defense.
Although it requires the helmet's brain wave guidance system, it is not connected to the Plasma Core and operates solely on the built-in battery. Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

Enhanced output model whose energy rays now reach even greater distances.

A device that generates a sphere of energy. The sphere radiates light energy in one direction while airborne.
Its lethal light ray can act as a trap when placed in the enemy's path.

If used effectively, it can stop a large number of enemies at once, increasing Wing Divers' rate of survival.

Ally soldiers' equipment is covered with a special reflective coating, preventing them from taking damage.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

Improved Pulsar Spear that fires particle beams in 2 directions.

In order to shorten the reload time, the sphere's total energy has been halved.
Therefore, its beam can only be emitted for a short period of time.

A device that produces an energy sphere that fires a particle beam.
The sphere emits a powerful beam while airborne, albeit for a short period of time.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

A Plasma Core specifically improved on its maximum energy. The maximum amount of energy the core can accumulate is greatly improved, and it generates a massive amount of power during an emergency charge.

However, its power supply efficiency to the aerial unit is low, so the flying speed is slightly reduced.

A Plasma Core that specializes in the energy supply to weapons. Supplies energy to weapons faster.

An improved version of the VM Rush Core. By decreasing the power supply speed to weapons, the maximum amount of power it can accumulate has been increased.

The final perfected spec Force Blade model with destructive power at extreme levels. Its maximum voltage attack spreads out and destroys enemies in a wide area.

Holding down the Attack button increases the power output. When output reaches maximum, release the button to unleash a powerful slash.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

An improved version of the Jackhammer MA. Destructive power remains the same, but range is now longer.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A double mechanical spear. Used in conjunction with a booster, it is possible to rush forward and attack with two spears at once. Each spear will rotate to penetrate the target, after which point high-pressure plasma will be released from its tip, destroying the object from within. When performing combo attacks, the second attack is much larger and more destructive, utilizing a bigger blast cartridge. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable, making it a very strong weapon.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A blade for close combat. It produces a jet of light to slash the enemy.
Its range is very short, forcing the user to attack point-blank. However, it delivers massively destructive blows.

Unlike the Force Blade, it can be swung without too much effort. Therefore, it can be used effectively even when wielded single-handedly.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A mechanical spear that incorporates an acceleration mechanism. As a result of this improvement, it can now better support continuous attacks, though it lacks the strength of a standard Blasthole Spear. Press and hold the attack button to launch multiple attacks. Each spear will rotate to penetrate the target, after which point high-pressure plasma will be released from its tip, destroying the object from within. The expansion and retraction of the spear are virtually instantaneous, allowing for extremely fast attacks. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable. It can penetrate multiple targets with its power. Pairs well with a shield.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The perfected Dexter Automatic Shotgun. Compared to the ZG model, it fires with reduced scattering to deliver more damage to the target. Its destructive power also greatly exceeds that of the ZG.

It's possible to launch a wide range attack, but it has short effective range. Once the distance is long, its power decreases sharply.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A high-performance firearm developed for exterminating monsters. It fires small napalm rounds at high speed, but due to the unique shape of the rounds, its accuracy is remarkably low. However, when a round lands, it bursts into flames that damage a wide area.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

The highest performance machine gun with overwhelming destructive power. It fires large-caliber rounds that obliterate the enemy. Innovative design tweaks have reduced recoil while increasing destructive power.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A piece of personal heavy artillery developed for the Storm Corps that fires shells specially designed for massive penetrating force. Easily one of the largest personal weapons available, the weapon is so heavy that it takes the full strength of a powered exoskeleton only to barely lift it. Because of its large caliber, the recoil on discharge could kill an unarmored person. The recoil takes even a powered exoskeleton time to absorb. And in that time, you will be left completely vulnerable. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

A cannon with top specs across the board. It fires armor-piercing rounds with virtually unmatchable penetrating force. Would be impossible for a human being to wield were it not for the invention of the powered exoskeleton--but even with a powered exoskeleton, the recoil is quite severe, requiring one second to absorb it. During that time, the wielder will be rendered completely defenseless, so it is necessary to take proper precautions when handling it. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

An excessive piece of personal heavy artillery that fires special shells with excellent penetrating force. Easily one of the largest personal weapons available, the weapon is so heavy that it takes the full strength of a powered exoskeleton only to barely lift it. Because of its large caliber, the recoil on discharge is too much for even a powered exoskeleton to absorb, requiring use of the thrusters to balance it out.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

An improved version of the FH29 Mortar with drastically enhanced rapid-firing performance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A Blood Storm convergent missile cannon. Missiles launched from this weapon will separate in the air and rain down on the enemy's head. Their damage pattern isn't limited to a single target, but an entire area. Though exceptionally powerful, misuse of the homing feature when the enemy is too close can reduce its effect.

Press and hold the attack button to display the sight, represented by a red square. When a target within the lock-on range is captured with the sight, a positive lock will be established. A maximum of two enemies may be locked on at any given time. Release the attack button to unleash missile to the locked-on target or targets.

A shield that reverses movement.
As long as the attack button is held down, it continues to form a magnetic field that reverses movement by 180 degrees.
The heat value increases during activation and cools (reloads) when it reaches its maximum limit.

A special alloy shield. 
Holding the attack button will keep raising the shield and reduce Damage coming from the front. (The defense angle differs based on shields. Please refer to %dq%Defense Angle.%dq%)
Some weapons allow you to attack with the shield raised. While it is not possible to pair the shield with a hammer or blade that requires full body usage, it is possible to attack with the Blasthole Spear and other weapons that can be fired with one hand when the shield is raised. 
The heat will increase as it continues to absorb attacks. When it reaches the limit, it won't be usable again until it has cooled down. 

There is a device called Deflector installed inside the shield.  It forms a magnetic field which reverses physical motion by 180 degrees. The Deflector is activated with the use button. It can repel any attack with the right timing.

A device to keep the Deflector System installed on the shield working with small output. Since it functions with small output, it's powerless to repel attacks; however, the impact of bullets can be reduced.
Highest-performance powered exoskeleton. Enhanced actuators throughout the body reduce recoil when firing.
Eqpt Weight Impact on Rotational Inertia

Highly mobile powered exoskeleton. Enhanced actuators throughout the body enable it to run at high speeds.
The arms also have superior power output to reduce the armor's weight on the user.

A smoke grenade used to request a Mortar attack from the Artillery Squad directed at the location of impact. The shells from this attack detonate as they land, causing damage to the area.

The Mortar is small in built, making it easy to use. Only requires a small amount of Credit to re-launch.

Press and hold the attack button to wind up your throw, then release to let the smoke grenade fly. Its expected trajectory will be indicated by a red line.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.
Heavy Bomber Phobos J Cluster Round

Use this communication system to request an air strike.
Heavy bombers will then bring large cluster munitions, which have extremely high destructive power and fall in a diffuse manner.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

A Laser Guide Kit that transmits coordinates to a submarine aircraft carrier to launch Lionic missiles. By continuously irradiating the laser, the coordinates are transferred to the submarine mothership. As many as 45 missiles are then continuously fired at that point, arriving at a higher speed than those of the UA45.

The Lionic missile is built with an excellent guidance system, and will make the missile correctly hit the designated target location. Moving the laser grants the missiles the ability to destroy multiple targets.

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.
The Laser Guide Kit is equipped with a scope.

Missile reloading is conducted in a submarine carrier, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

Activate the Spritefall's Super Destroy mode.
All Limiters have been removed, allowing it to fire consecutively at maximum power.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Power-enhanced version of the heavy armed multicopter. Equipped with a large caliber heavy mortar that fires powerful shells over a wide area. Enhanced mobility enables speedy returns.

Flies around the user. When the target is indicated by a hand-thrown beacon, it moves into position and fires a series of shots at the beacon's impact point.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

A sniper multicopter equipped with a single-shot rifle.
The high performance of the marker ejector makes it possible to strike targets even from a great distance.  

It silently approaches the marker impact position and fires.
It flies at high speed, but some time is required between aiming and firing.

Armed multicopter with large guns that can fire several heavy metal bullets at once.
When the bullets strike an object, they ricochet over a wide area.

The user indicates the target by ejecting a marker. One machine fires at the point of impact.
One marker corresponds to one aircraft. By ejecting markers in succession, the user can direct multiple aircraft.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

A portable unmanned attack aircraft equipped with a flamethrower. Although not as deadly as a bomb, its flames spread over a wide area, damaging many enemies.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, a flamethrower will be deployed from above.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Portable unmanned bomber. It inflicts damage over a wide area using air strikes.
Due to the weight of the bombs, its flight speed is slower than that of other portable UAVs, and the return time is longer.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, bomb from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

An unmanned multicopter equipped with a high-spec bomb. Improved onboard equipment enables it to target and then strike the enemy within a short amount of time.

The user indicates the target using a laser guidance system.
Once the target has been set, the entire aircraft swoops down upon it and detonates.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.
Naturally, this results in a longer reload time.

Improved Beam Carrier with a much longer fire duration. Redeployment takes longer due to charging.

The user indicates the target with a laser, and the aircraft fires a beam of energy at it from above.
The beam can be fired continuously for a certain period of time, so by moving the laser point, another target can be selected.

Once the aircraft's energy is depleted, it crashes.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.

Armed multicopter that fires corrosive gas.
The user indicates the target with a laser, and the aircraft fires gas at it from above.
The gas is highly toxic to living organisms. It also corrodes metals, making it effective against machinery.
Gas can be fired continuously for a certain period of time, so by moving the laser point, another target can be selected.

It cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new aircraft to arrive.

A portable support drone.
One of the Capsule Soldier series, robotic soldiers (drones) produced by the Soulless Soldier Project led by the Advanced Technologies Lab.
The drone deploys via fan blades, allowing it to fly about and defend the user.
As AI technology is still in its infancy, it is unable to make advanced judgments and can only be active for a short period of time.

It is designed to memorize the user's movement and attack a target position.
Its simple AI allows for more drones to be activated at once, compared with other models.

Since it is equipped with advanced safety devices, there is no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

Complete Z-type autonomous combat aircraft equipped with a high-power laser cannon. 
It has powerful offensive capabilities, but its high energy consumption results in a short operating time.
Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Treatment Room 1:</font> None (Treatment) Recovery (Total):50000.0 Recovery:14.0
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Treatment Room 2:</font> None (Treatment)
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Treatment Room 3:</font> None (Treatment)

4 people.
Customized Caliban Armored Rescue Vehicle S Turbo. Its enhanced rescue facilities have resulted in improved treatment efficiency.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
140mm Long-Range Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:32 Damage:12000.0 Blast Range:Radius 15.0m)</font>

1 person.
The final enhanced version of the Blacker E series. Equipped with a new type 140mm long-range Howitzer that fires molded explosive shells. The shells explode upon impact, inflicting damage over a wide area.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
XE Requiem Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:12 Damage:37500.0 Blast Range:Radius 30.0m)</font>
Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:900 Damage:500.0 Range:480.0m)</font>

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner (Right):</font> Melt Streamer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:3000 Damage:200.0 Range:600.0m)</font>
Grenade Discharger (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:48 Damage:6000.0 (8 burst) Range:120.0m)</font>

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner (Left):</font> Melt Streamer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:3000 Damage:200.0 Range:600.0m)</font>
Grenade Discharger (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:48 Damage:6000.0 (8 burst) Range:120.0m)</font>

3 people.
A modified version of the giant fighting vehicle, Titan, equipped with two melt streamers on top of its main cannon. It fires powerful melt streamers at high speed, even over a great distance.
Its main gun is the XE Requiem Cannon, an enhanced version of the Requiem Cannon with more destructive power and higher projectile speed.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
FK210 Gatling Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1600 Damage:300.0 Range:240.0m)</font>
High-Cycle Launcher (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:320 Damage:450.0 Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>
High-Cycle Launcher (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:320 Damage:450.0 Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>

1 person. Can be requested from underground locations.
A new Depth Crawler based on the IV Custom model. In exchange for reduced jump power, it can travel at increased speeds. It also carries enhanced armament.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Heavy Revolver (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:140 Damage:[PT]2500.0 Range:1200.0m)</font>
Heavy Revolver (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:140 Damage:[PT]2500.0 Range:1200.0m)</font>
Grenade Pod (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:40 Damage:1500.0 (4 burst) Blast Range:Radius 20.0m)</font>
Grenade Pod (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:40 Damage:1500.0 (4 burst) Blast Range:Radius 20.0m)</font>

1 person.
Heavily armed Powered Exoskeleton.
Its tank-like design is based on the concept of heavy armor and high firepower.
It was deployed in various regions as a key component of land battles, achieving great results. However, because of its outdated walking system and lack of mobility, it suffered heavy damage in the field.
Because of this, the Nix models, which are equipped with the latest mobility systems, became preferred... but in battles against monsters, the Gravis's firepower and armor have proven indispensable.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Power Saber <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:6000 Damage:[PT]200.0 (300 burst) Range:75.0m)</font>
Power Saber <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:6000 Damage:[PT]200.0 (300 burst) Range:75.0m)</font>
Power Dyne MC (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:8 Damage:[PT]17500.0 Blast Range:----)</font>
Power Dyne MC (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:8 Damage:[PT]17500.0 Blast Range:----)</font>

1 person.
Powered Exoskeleton Eiren model designed for close combat.
It is equipped with the short-range laser cannon, Power Saber, on both arms, and the large high-power beam cannon, Power Dyne MC, on each shoulder.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A complete spec version of the large assault rifle, Slade. Because of its size and weight, it requires skillful handling. Its destructive power is tremendous, penetrating enemies up to 120 meters away.

Equipped with a scope and laser sight.

A complete spec Raven assault rifle. Penetrates the enemy at very close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

Scientists from around the world have rallied against the aliens, producing the highest performance atomic ray gun ever made. Although small in size, the Planet Blazer's firepower is comparable to that of an EMC, inflicting major damage to alien shields.
Due to the exceptionally high cost, only a small number were produced.
Scientists from around the world have rallied to the cause of exterminating Earth's invaders, producing a fearsome weapon that emits ultra-high-pressure flames as a result.

A special shotgun that fires needle-like projectiles. The needles penetrate up to several hundred meters after being fired. They also spread laterally over a wide range, making it even easier to strike the enemy.

Equipped with a laser sight.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A very high-power version of the Destruction Blazer. The rays of light emitted blast forward wildly, a result of maximizing power output and sacrificing lateral range.

Because it has been adjusted for use against monsters, each time the trigger is pulled, it takes only an instant to fire.
In addition, the further away from the point of impact, the less powerful the beam becomes (although only slightly).

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

Enhanced version of the KFF70 sniper rifle, significantly modified to improve its destructive power. At close range, it is powerful enough to penetrate the target.

There is virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.
A scope and a laser sight are attached.

The perfect Lysander model sniper rifle with a shortened firing interval. Destructive power has also been dramatically increased, penetrating the enemy from up to a distance of about 300 meters.

Equipped with a scope and a laser sight.

A larger caliber version of the Planet Sniper Cannon. Not only is its destructive power greatly improved, but the time required to fire it is now shorter.

The newest type of personal artillery. Firing it creates a shockwave so great that only the strongest soldiers can withstand it, and the user is left vulnerable to recoil immediately after firing.
Due to its severe recoil, using regular scopes may lead to injury. Since this weapon was introduced so rapidly, a new scope could not be completed in time, so the user must use a simple sight to aim.

A finalized model of Hornet Rocket Launcher with its destructive power being pushed to the limit.

Equipped with a scope.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

An ultra-high performance model of Grant Rocket Launcher. This firearm really is the ultimate rocket launcher designed and manufactured by the top talents.
The precisely structured weapon is with excellent accuracy and includes a scope attachment for a long-distance attack.

Although it's capable to turn the tide, there're only very few of the products and they have been lost in chaos.

A timed detonation version of UMFF Grenade Launcher that fires grenades with more destructive power than that of the UMFF type.
Grenades explode at 3.0 sec after firing, inflicting damage over a wide area.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.
The final spec Stampede model grenade launcher with maximized destructive power.

All-new personal missile launcher. Vertically launches a large number of highly guided missiles that fly toward a locked-on target.

Pressing the attack button initiates lock-on. It locates enemies within the sight (red square) that are in range. When the sight changes shape, lock-on is complete. Release the button to fire.

A powered-up FORK-X20. 
This model fires 20 small high-speed missiles at once with improved destructive power and better lock-on range. In addition, the missiles travel even faster than before and are guaranteed to strike the target.
An all-new type of acid gun developed by scientists from around the world. It fires a powerful acid that can only be produced in special facilities. The acid diffuses laterally.

An improved version of the Meta-Thermite Round with greatly increased destructive power. Its 10-piece projectile engulfs a wide area in flames.

It is made up of several small projectiles that, when thrown, separate and fly off in different directions. Ignites upon impact, discharging tremendous heat.
Its flames cannot be extinguished with water, meaning it can be used underwater or underground because it does not require oxygen for combustion.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

A special capsule containing nanomachines. When the capsule strikes a target, it explodes and disperses nanomachines over a wide area.
The nanomachines drift through the air in a cloud, affecting surrounding objects. The density of the cloud increases as one approaches the detonation site, as does its effect.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user. Heals allies, vehicles, and the user, but also enemies in the cloud.)

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the projectile.

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

All-new long-range sentry gun.
The high-performance sensor enables the gun to target enemies at greater distances. The gun's range and power have also been enhanced.

Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

The highest spec stationary sentry gun (automatic enemy tracking gun), this super weapon's development was suspended for humanitarian reasons, due to the fact that it is so deadly.
Equipped with a laser cannon, it detects enemies using cameras and sensors and fires automatically.The laser penetrates the enemy and damages everything within range.

Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

Improved version of the Firecracker 1000 Spread Grenade.

Officially known as the Spread Grenade, this weapon throws out multiple coin-sized grenades at a time.
It's not powerful enough of a single grenade, but the rounds can be spread over a wide area, making it possible to hit several enemies at once.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

The final form of the Impulse series, with its firepower pushed to the absolute limit.

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

Probe and ally relief assistance, all in one device.
Can collect items within a wide range and heal subordinate soldiers.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Anti-Aircraft Explosive Artillery (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1000 Damage:360.0 Range:500.0m Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>
Anti-Aircraft Explosive Artillery (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1000 Damage:360.0 Range:500.0m Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>

A multi-purpose combat vehicle developed hastily in response to the critical state of the war.
New anti-aircraft guns are mounted on the body of a KG6 that rapid-fires multipurpose explosive shells. It can counter not only aircraft, but also alien invaders and androids on the ground.
The shells explode upon impact and inflict damage over a wide area.
As this vehicle was rushed into production, not many have been made yet.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
140mm High Pressure Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:30 Damage:12000.0 Blast Range:Radius 18.0m)</font>

1 person.
Improved version of the Varius TZ4.
The vehicle body has been modified to improve stability while driving. Although it is a combat vehicle, it is also designed to be comfortable to ride in.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Nu Epsilon Electromagnetic Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:[PT]18000.0 Range:5062.5m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Right):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:180.0 Range:210.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Left):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:180.0 Range:210.0m)</font>

3 people.
Equipped with the new railgun, Nu Epsilon Electromagnetic Cannon, developed by scientists from all over the world. The larger caliber means improved destructive power and bullet velocity, but continuous-fire performance has been slightly reduced as a result.

A vehicle equipped with a state-of-the-art electromagnetic launcher (Railgun) with accelerated shells and rapid fire support. The shells can penetrate objects and inflict damage on many enemies. The Railgun is equipped with a laser sight to ensure pinpoint accuracy, and the trajectory can be confirmed with the red line before firing. This is a very powerful weapon, but it lacks the blast area of the Howitzer, making it somewhat difficult to use in combat against monsters. To make up for this shortcoming, it's been fitted with a right and left Machine Gun on the rotating turret, which can be manned from either of the gunner seats. However, gunners should be aware that the seats face whatever their respective turrets are aiming at.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Anti-Aircraft Explosive Artillery (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1000 Damage:396.0 Range:500.0m Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>
Anti-Aircraft Explosive Artillery (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1000 Damage:396.0 Range:500.0m Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>

Mass production prototype of KG7. It can be requested immediately after arrival upon the battlefield due to its improved performance and lower production cost.
New anti-aircraft guns are mounted on the body of a KG6 that rapid-fires multipurpose explosive shells. It can counter not only aircraft, but also alien invaders and androids on the ground.
The shells explode upon impact and inflict damage over a wide area.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
140mm High Pressure Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:30 Damage:13200.0 Blast Range:Radius 18.0m)</font>

1 person.
Mass production prototype of the Varius TZ4-R. Due to its reduced production cost, it can be requested immediately upon arrival at the battlefield.
Modifications to the vehicle's body have resulted in further improved stability. Though a combat vehicle, it offers a comfortable ride.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

The final, complete spec model of the Phalanx. Its output has been increased to the utmost limit, and its destructive power far surpasses that of the ZT model.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy in the Casket. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will discharge the accumulated energy and fire off the Plasma Gun continuously in a certain time span.
The output is amplified according to the amount of stored energy and so is destructive power. The more energy accumulated, the greater flying distance, shot number and firepower. Also, the diffusion range converges more toward the front.
Although the Plasma Gun is very extremely effective , its power decreases greatly with distance, so you have to be as close as possible to the enemy, make it a high-risky weapon to use.

An improved version of the ZA model with the longest range of any Power Lance. It also has greatly improved destructive power.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

Ultra-high performance Dragoon Lance whose output exceeds even that of the ZM model.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

An ultra high-power short-range laser gun developed based on the Monster. With reduced range for maximum destructive power, this weapon far surpasses the Monster's performance.

It shatters targets by firing a series of ultra-powerful lasers. Since it takes up to one second for its attacks to land, targets must be kept in focus until then. Effective operation will require a high level of skill.

Because it is more difficult to handle than the single-shot Power Lance, it was never tested in actual combat. As the war intensified, it was given only to select elite soldiers.

All-new quadruple-barreled Spine Blaster that fires particle beams in four directions simultaneously.
Its high-density converged laser beam can pierce through objects and inflict damage on everything within the line of fire.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will shoot off beams continuously.
This weapon is extremely powerful when it's fully charged, but when the stored power decreases, the shooting range shortens accordingly, and so does its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

Ultra high-power Mag Blaster model.
It fires long-range beams with excellent destructive power at regular intervals. However, due to its high output, its power decreases significantly as supply depletes.

An improved version of the ZDM Pulse Machine Gun with greatly improved destructive power as a result of limiting its area of effect.

It fires high-powered pulse energy bullets. When the bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

An eight-barreled High-Pulse Machine Gun that fires pulse energy bullets in 8 directions.
When a pulse energy bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

All-new Bolt Gun. Further improvements were made to the Bolt Maximum Gun, the previous finalized model, to raise its destructive power to the utmost limit.
The bolts of electricity it discharges will diffuse and then concentrate on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point. This characteristic can be used to enable all of the bolts to hit a single target.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

The highest performance Thunder Crossbow. Further improvements were made to the completed RZ model to push output beyond previously known limits.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The more power accumulated, the more likely the lightening concentrates on the aiming direction; whereas the energy accumulation decreases, the lightening diffuses. In that case, it's difficult to hit the target, but you can attack in a wider range.

A new long range laser gun developed based on the Closed Laser. It inflicts tremendous damage to all enemies in the firing line.
It releases all its power with each shot, so the power of the flying unit is transferred immediately after firing.
This weapon's power efficiency is somewhat poor due to the fact that it was hastily designed.

A long-range attack weapon based on the Raijin. By conserving power output, it is now possible to fire multiple times. It is also equipped with a small energy tank, allowing it to be operated without overloading the flight unit.
These improvements have made the weapon easier to handle and have increased its versatility in battle.

High-power Cosmic Laser model. It inflicts tremendous damage to all enemies in the line of fire.. It inflicts tremendous damage to all enemies in the firing line.
It releases all its power with each shot, so the power of the flying unit is transferred immediately after firing.
This weapon's power efficiency is somewhat poor due to the fact that it was hastily designed.

The final enhanced model of the rapid-firing brainwave-guided weapon Fenrir that can lock on to 5 targets and attack them simultaneously. When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Pressing the attack button will discharge the weapon, and the discharge will explode on impact. It requires a user with extraordinary Psionic Link capabilities, and no one has yet been found who fits the bill.

High performance plasma sphere generator.
Creates numerous small plasma balls to be thrown by hand. After being thrown, the plasma spheres continue to drift through the air and explode when they touch an object, causing damage over a wide area.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit.
Therefore, it can be used even during an emergency charge so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. It only takes a short time to reload.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

The final Blink Ball upgrade. It has been improved to the maximum level possible in all aspects.
The Plasma Balls fly in a gentle parabola and explode on impact, causing damage over a wide area.
It's equipped with an independent energy generator, so it doesn't deplete the energy of the aerial unit. Reloading is also possible during an emergency charge.
Although not particularly devastating, it can be an excellent sub-weapon when equipping a high consumption weapon.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

A high-powered Pulsar Spear. It radiates a beam of tremendous destructive power in 3 directions, albeit for a short period of time.

A device that produces an energy sphere that fires a particle beam.
The sphere emits a powerful beam while airborne, albeit for a short period of time.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

Discharges a ball of energy into the air. The energy sphere then scatters vertically to form a wall of light in front of the user. The light it emits is powerful enough to penetrate the enemy, making it the ultimate defensive wall.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

An improved version of Planet Saber. Scientists from all over the world joined forces to develop mankind's most powerful weapon, using an astronomical budget. Its performance far surpasses that of Planet Saber.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. However, the blade maintains its form for only a brief moment immediately after being swung. This weapon's destructive power is rather low, and it is intended only for emergency self-defense.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use. Press and hold to reload.

A top-secret EDF super-weapon.
It produces a sphere of energy that hovers in the air before exploding into countless smaller balls of light. The light balls are then pulled by gravity to the ground.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

Improved version of the Electromagnetic Shaft 2L. Radiates energy in 5 directions to reach long distances.

A device that generates a sphere of energy. The sphere radiates light energy in one direction while airborne.
Its lethal light ray can act as a trap when placed in the enemy's path.

If used effectively, it can stop a large number of enemies at once, increasing Wing Divers' rate of survival.

Ally soldiers' equipment is covered with a special reflective coating, preventing them from taking damage.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

Customized version of the Luminous Shield Z4, capable of generating three shields in a row.
Although the number of consecutive uses is lower than that of the Z4 model, the ZR3 has better reloading performance, allowing for more flexible use.

Blocks both friendly and enemy attacks. Soldiers and enemies alike can pass through the barrier.

Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

Improved version of Harmonic Shield S that produces three shields simultaneously. The shields are small but last longer.

Blocks enemy attacks but allows attacks from allies to pass through.

Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. The EX Bird Core's energy capacity has been taken to a whole new level.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. In order to increase the survival rate of Wing Divers, the boost speed at charging backward and sideways is improved.

A complete Plasma Core that combines the characteristics of all others.
As such, each of its individual characteristics is inferior to those of a specialized Core.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. The VM Jet Core's energy capacity has been taken to a whole new level.
Highest performance Plasma Core. The VZ Plasma Core's energy capacity has been taken to a whole new level.

A complete spec Quake Haken featuring further improvement on the ZD model's destructive power.

A special hammer that is installed with multiple ultra-vibration generators (Vibro Drive). By reducing contact surfaces, it is possible for the vibrations to diffuse in several directions. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the Vibro Drive output. Releasing the attack button will unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A complete spec Vibro Hammer featuring further improvement on the Finest Hammer's output.

It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Release to unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The final spec form of the Blasthole Spear, further modifications to the MSXE model have resulted in an increase in power output.

A mechanical spear that stretches with a high speed to attack. Rotating the spear can penetrate several objects and afterwards high-pressure plasma will be released from the front end, destroying objects from within. The expansion and contraction of the spear are instantaneous, making it an extremely fast attack. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable and can penetrate multiple targets at a time. It is also possible to use it with a shield. This is the main weapon of a Fencer. It has short range, so it is necessary to get accustomed to it, but it's a valuable weapon. During a continuous attack, the second attack will be a rush. These attacks can be sustained over a long period.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A long-range version of the Flashing Spear, with more than twice the range and increased destructive power of the M5 model.

A mechanical spear that incorporates an acceleration mechanism. As a result of this improvement, it can now better support continuous attacks, though it lacks the strength of a standard Blasthole Spear. Press and hold the attack button to launch multiple attacks. Each spear will rotate to penetrate the target, after which point high-pressure plasma will be released from its tip, destroying the object from within. The expansion and retraction of the spear are virtually instantaneous, allowing for extremely fast attacks. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable. It can penetrate multiple targets with its power. Pairs well with a shield.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A Spine Driver specializing in destructive power. With each press of the attack button, the hammer extends three times in succession.

A mechanical hammer with great destructive power. Instead of attacking with a spear, it attacks with a hammer fitted with a blade to crush the target. During impact, high-pressure plasma will be released from its tip, destroying the target from within. Though it has no penetrative power, its recoil is excellent. Press the attack button to attack with the hammer. Even allows for its user to attack while wielding a shield.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The strongest and final Power Blade model. It delivers eight slashes in a single swing.

A blade for close combat. It produces a jet of light to slash the enemy.
Its range is very short, forcing the user to attack point-blank. However, it delivers massively destructive blows.

Unlike the Force Blade, it can be swung without too much effort. Therefore, it can be used effectively even when wielded single-handedly.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A complete FG model Gatling gun that boasts impressive destructive power, but it can take a while for the first shot to leave the barrel. Press and hold the attack button to start the barrel rotating. When rotation reaches a certain speed, it will start firing. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

The final completed version of the Dexter Automatic Shotgun.
Modified from the ZGXE model. By slightly downsizing the load, its continuous-fire performance has been significantly improved.

It's possible to launch a wide range attack, but it has short effective range. Once the distance is long, its power decreases sharply.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

Enhanced version of the Red Blast Gatling whose rounds feature an expanded burn range after impact. Its destructive power has also been increased.

A high-performance firearm developed for exterminating monsters. It fires small napalm rounds at high speed, but due to the unique shape of the rounds, its accuracy is remarkably low. However, when a round lands, it bursts into flames that damage a wide area.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

The perfected Cannon Shot model. Due to its rounds' restricted spread, it can only be handled by skilled soldiers. If it strikes the target, it can inflict devastating damage.

Personal dispersal artillery that fires multiple armor-piercing rounds at once. Its dispersal area isn't that wide, but it has excellent destructive power. Because multiple shells are fired at once, the recoil is greater than average and may take some time to absorb. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A large mortar that fires huge shells. When the shells land, they explode, shattering an area up to 100 meters in diameter.
Though a powerful weapon, the excessive caliber of this particular armament results in some truly intense recoil, often leaving the wielder frozen and vulnerable until the powered exoskeleton has fully absorbed the impact.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

Enhanced version of the Planet Cannon. For greater destructive power, it fires double the amount of shells at once, resulting in even greater recoil. It fires six shells in succession, but there is an angular misalignment with each shot. Manual braking is therefore necessary to control the timing of the firing.

A huge piece of personal heavy artillery that fires special shells with excellent penetrating force. Easily one of the largest personal weapons available, the weapon is so heavy that it takes the full strength of a powered exoskeleton only to barely lift it. Because of its large caliber, the recoil on discharge is too much for even a powered exoskeleton to absorb, requiring use of the thrusters to balance it out.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A new missile launcher developed based on the Arm Hound models.
The missiles it launches are small and have low destructive power, but its rapid-firing performance is very high.

Holding down the attack button displays a sight (red square). It starts locking on to enemies caught in the sight (and within lock-on distance).
Multiple enemies can be locked on at once. When the attack button is released, homing missiles are fired at the locked-on target(s) and explode upon impact.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

Improved version of the large caliber missile launcher Phoenix, featuring doubled destructive power. Its guidance system has been further enhanced to enable independent lock-on. It no longer requires the support of an Air Raider and can be operated by an individual. However, it takes time to lock on.

The final spec High Altitude Impact Launcher model with greatly improved bullet velocity and homing performance.

After firing, the missile will rise to a high altitude. It will then be directed towards its target on descent. Due to its high arc, obstacles such as buildings will have little impact. The lock-on speed is fast and it is possible to attack several enemies. It is an easy-to-use weapon. 

Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured with the sight, a positive lock will be established. Release the attack button to unleash a missile on the locked-on target or targets.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

Enhanced version of the super-large missile launcher Leviathan with exponentially increased destructive power. Its guidance system has been further improved, allowing it to lock on to a target without the support of an Air Raider. However, it takes time to do so.

A perfected Ion Mirror Shield model equipped with a new type of deflector. The effective range has been expanded horizontally and the load on the shield when the deflector is activated has also been reduced.

Holding the attack button will keep raising the shield and reduce Damage coming from the front. (The defense angle differs based on shields. Please refer to %dq%Defense Angle.%dq%)
Some weapons allow you to attack with the shield raised. While it is not possible to pair the shield with a hammer or blade that requires full body usage, it is possible to attack with the Blasthole Spear and other weapons that can be fired with one hand when the shield is raised. 
The heat will increase as it continues to absorb attacks. When it reaches the limit, it won't be usable again until it has cooled down. 

There is a device called Deflector installed inside the shield.  It forms a magnetic field which reverses physical motion by 180 degrees. The Deflector is activated with the use button. It can repel any attack with the right timing.

A large shield with excellent damage reduction capabilities and high durability, but a hefty weight that makes it a bit unwieldy.

Holding the attack button will keep raising the shield and reduce Damage coming from the front. (The defense angle differs based on shields. Please refer to %dq%Defense Angle.%dq%)
Some weapons allow you to attack with the shield raised. While it is not possible to pair the shield with a hammer or blade that requires full body usage, it is possible to attack with the Blasthole Spear and other weapons that can be fired with one hand when the shield is raised. 
The heat will increase as it continues to absorb attacks. When it reaches the limit, it won't be usable again until it has cooled down. 

There is a device called Deflector installed inside the shield.  It forms a magnetic field which reverses physical motion by 180 degrees. The Deflector is activated with the use button. It can repel any attack with the right timing.

A thruster enhancer.
Enables 13 consecutive thrust-dashes.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster)

A booster enhancer.
Enables 8 consecutive boost jumps.
(Must be used with a Jump Booster)

New powered exoskeleton designed to improve stability while shooting.
Built-in stabilizers absorb gunfire recoil. It has excellent output in the legs and arms that balances the weight of its equipment.
However, since it is specialized for posture stabilization during gunfire, its mobility is relatively low.
Eqpt Weight Impact on Rotational Inertia

New powered exoskeleton designed for close combat. Features a very fast walking speed and enhanced lateral boost jumps when equipped with jump boosters. When equipped with side thrusters, thruster dash reuse intervals are shorter.
Also has a wider range of item recovery.
Eqpt Weight Impact on Rotational Inertia
New powered exoskeleton designed to use guided weapons. Equipped with a guidance aid software that improves the distance and speed of missiles.
New powered exoskeleton designed for rescue. Heals allies more when acquiring recovery items. Also has a wider range of item recovery.

New powered exoskeleton designed for close combat that is highly stabilized and won't get knocked over by explosions. Features a very fast walking speed and enhanced lateral boost jumps when equipped with jump boosters. When equipped with side thrusters, thruster dash reuse intervals are shorter.
Also has a wider range of item recovery.
Eqpt Weight Impact on Rotational Inertia

A Beacon Discharger.
Use this beacon to signal a Rocket Cannon attack from the gunship that is circling the skies, and it will launch an attack where the beacon hits.

An improved version of the T2 Rocket Cannon. Its destructive power is the same, but the rockets will now strike the target even more swiftly than before.

Press the attack button to discharge a beacon which will start guiding only when hitting an object, so it could be useless if you target at somewhere with no objects. Also, a beacon out of range will activate its safety device and disable it. In short, the beacon must hit an object in range. There is a laser device equipped on the Beacon Discharger to determine the range. Once you confirm the laser light has hit the object in range, you can discharge the beacon with certainty that the beacon can be activated properly.
