The loading work for the coming fire is conducted in a gunship, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from combat bombers. A squad of 18 combat bombers will come in to launch a low strafing run upon the target area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.
Heavy Bomber Vesta E Plan X2

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack from 2 heavy bombers.
Equipped with multiple large napalm bombs, the bombers will fly to the indicated area from different directions before dropping their payload.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Enhanced version of the ZD model Limpet Splendor, further improvements were made to increase its destructive power.

The sticky bombs attach to where they land (friend, foe or vehicle), and can be detonated remotely with the Zoom/Activate button. When detonated, several flechettes will be fired into the surrounding area. The flechettes are made of special material so they will ricochet off walls. This means that they will affect a wide area, but in a confined space they can deal impressive damage. If you do not want to detonate it, you can defuse it by pressing the reload button.

The highest performance electromagnetic bunker, further enhanced to double the durability of its energy wall.

Creates a wall of powerful energy. The wall not only stops bullets but also optical weapons. It can act as a shield, but it cannot block blasts. The defensive wall senses objects that collide with it. If it was fired by an ally, it will be allowed to pass through.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

Customized model R Multicopter equipped with a small laser gun. By eliminating the use of live ammunition, it is lighter and can fly at higher speeds.

Multiple units activate simultaneously and fly out in front of the user.
When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter moves into position and fires at the marker's impact point.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Model E Stuncopters in a formation of 4 for greatly enhanced performance.
Fires an electrode attached by a wire that pierces its target and delivers an electric shock.
This weapon was first developed as a stun gun for riot control, but its output was increased to lethal levels for use against monsters.

When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter fires an electrode.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Armed multicopter with a large caliber gun that fires heavy metal bullets.
The bullets ricochet through objects, damaging multiple enemies.
Some time is required between aiming and firing.

The user indicates the target by ejecting a marker. One machine fires at the point of impact.
One marker corresponds to one aircraft. By ejecting markers in succession, the user can direct multiple aircraft.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Customized model A Multicopter equipped with a laser gun.

Multiple units activate simultaneously and fly out in front of the user.
When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter moves into position and fires at the marker's impact point.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
G4 Delta Portable Attack Aircraft (Machine Gun)

Complete spec G-type formation of 4 unmanned attack aircraft equipped with machine guns.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, machine gun fire rains down from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
Can distiguish friend from foe, posing no danger to the user and his/her allies.

Formation of 10 unmanned attack aircraft that fires its laser guns from front of the target area. Advances at a low speed for extended periods of attack.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, laser gun fire from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
Can distiguish friend from foe, posing no danger to the user and his/her allies.

An unmanned multicopter equipped with a small bomb.

The user indicates the target using a laser guidance system.
Once the target has been set, the entire aircraft swoops down upon it and detonates.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.
Naturally, this results in a longer reload time.

An unmanned multicopter equipped with a large bomb. Flies slower due to its greater weight.

The user indicates the target using a laser guidance system.
Once the target has been set, the entire aircraft swoops down upon it and detonates.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.
Naturally, this results in a longer reload time.

A multicopter equipped with an electrical discharge device.
The user indicates the target with a laser, and the aircraft fires a bolt of electricity at it from above, damaging surrounding objects.
Since electrical energy weakens as it diffuses, the further away the aircraft is from the target, the less damage it inflicts.

Electricity can be fired continuously for a certain period of time, so by moving the laser point, another target can be selected.

Once the aircraft's energy is depleted, it crashes.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.

An improved version of the Heavily Armed Multicopter equipped with newly developed electromagnetic bombs that can be dropped over a wide area. When the bombs land, they inflict damage to the surrounding area for a certain period of time.

Flies around the user. When the target is indicated by a hand-thrown beacon, it moves into position and fires a series of shots at the beacon's impact point.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

A portable support drone.
One of the Capsule Soldier series, robotic soldiers (drones) produced by the Soulless Soldier Project led by the Advanced Technologies Lab.
As AI technology is still in its infancy, it is unable to make advanced judgments and can only be active for a short period of time.

The drone deploys via fan blades, allowing it to fly about and defend the user.
It is designed to follow the user and fire at targets.
Since it is equipped with advanced safety devices, there is no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Once all rounds are fired, the equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

An improved tracer drone equipped with a high-pressure, short-range laser cannon that can penetrate the enemy.

It is designed to memorize the user's movement and attack a target position.
Its simple AI allows for more drones to be activated at once, compared with other models.

Since it is equipped with advanced safety devices, there is no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A portable support drone designed to destroy targets. It deploys horizontally in front of the target before firing a high-powered, long-range laser cannon with tremendous destructive power.
Preferably operated at close range, as its power decreases in proportion to its distance from the target.

Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Once all rounds are fired, the equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A high-performance guard capsule whose upgrades are based on actual battle data. Two units can now be activated simultaneously in order to protect the user from a distance. Both units can respond independently to multiple approaching targets.

Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver Shotgun Rapid-Fire Artillery <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:400 Damage:[PT]116.0×10 (5 burst) Blast Range:----)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Compartment 1:</font> None
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Compartment 2:</font> None
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Compartment 3:</font> None

4 people.
Customized version of the Armored Vehicle Grape RZ equipped with a newly developed rapid-fire shotgun. In addition, it can now acquire more items. 

An armored vehicle. Aside from the pilot, there are rear compartments for up to three troops. The main role of this vehicle is to transport soldiers to the battlefield. 
Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle, but anyone can ride in the rear compartments.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
140mm Long-Range Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:32 Damage:12800.0 Blast Range:Radius 15.0m)</font>

1 person.
Reinforced version of the Blacker E10. Not only is it about twice as heavily armored, but its speed has also been increased. In addition, it can now acquire more items.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Vulture (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:150 Damage:2500.0 (5 burst) Range:1200.0m)</font>
Vulture (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:150 Damage:2500.0 (5 burst) Range:1200.0m)</font>
Twin Napalm Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:60 Damage:1875.0 (6 burst))</font>

1 person.
The final spec model of the N9 Eros Vulture equipped with a completed version of the %dq%Vulture%dq% laser cannon. Its output is greater than that of the ZA model, and it is equipped with a Twin Napalm Guns as a secondary weapon. Multiple napalm bombs can be fired at the same time, which can burn an entire combat site on impact.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

1 person.
Copper Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:180 Damage:15000.0 (60 burst) Blast Range:Radius 50.0m)</font>

1 person.
A gigantic unloader designed to combat monsters. Its performance is superior to that of the War Barga.

A gigantic unloader that has been found to be effective against monsters. In order to speed up the introduction of this vehicle into actual combat, it was designed as a modified War Barga equipped with a Copper Cannon, a superweapon developed by the Advanced Technologies Lab. The Copper Cannon has the power to defeat monsters with a single blow.
Due to the astronomical cost of construction, only about 20 units have been completed to date, several of which have been sent to the battlefield to be used exclusively by the Storm Team.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Flamethrower <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:3000 Damage:62.5)</font>
Giga Launcher <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:15 Damage:2500.0 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>

1 person.
In order to reduce the maintenance cost of the Nix model powered exoskeletons, the walking system was detached so that only the upper body could be mounted onto a civilian wagon, rather than to a vehicle designed specifically for this purpose. As a result, stability is low and rough terrain can be hazardous. Care must be taken to avoid tipping over while traveling.
Since the vehicle was hastily constructed, there were no operational tests conducted, so its performance cannot be guaranteed.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Treatment Room 1:</font> None (Treatment) Recovery (Total):50000.0 Recovery:14.0
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Treatment Room 2:</font> None (Treatment)
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Treatment Room 3:</font> None (Treatment)

4 people.
Customized Caliban Armored Rescue Vehicle SA Turbo with increased item acquisition range.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Guided Particle Beam Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:2000 Damage:150.0 Blast Range:Radius 2.0m)</font>

1 person.
Equipped with a guided particle beam cannon developed by scientists from around the world. It can instantly lock onto a large number of enemies and can re-fire within a short period of time after firing.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Hyper Laser Cannon (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:[PT]312.5(Shield x 2.0))</font>
Hyper Laser Cannon（Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:[PT]312.5(Shield x 2.0))</font>
Explosion (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:10 Damage:[PT]2250.0×20 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>
Powerdyne GC <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:8 Damage:17500.0 Blast Range:Radius 30.0m)</font>

1 person.
Ultra-high performance powered exoskeleton. The leg mechanisms and actuators have been modified to improve operating speed. Armament and armor have also been greatly enhanced.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
FK210 Gatling Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1600 Damage:330.0 Range:240.0m)</font>
High-Cycle Launcher (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:320 Damage:495.0 Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>
High-Cycle Launcher (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:320 Damage:495.0 Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>

1 person. Can be requested from underground locations.
Mass-produced model V prototype. The initial achievement value required to request it is higher due to the lower production cost.

Blow-up dolls created by the EDF Public Relations Department for the purpose of recruiting soldiers, converted into combat decoys.
They were made to resemble idols contracted by the Public Relations Department to recruit young people at events.

The doll is equipped with a function that allows it to be moved by fine-tuning the air pressure in various parts. It also has a small built-in speaker and can talk.
Although these functions are excessive for a decoy, it can be difficult for the enemy to tell that it's not a real soldier, making it an effective decoy against monsters.

The content of its speech remains unchanged from its time as a recruitment tool.
Its song repertoire includes the official EDF theme used in the recruitment commercials. A different version is sung by the soldiers.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button(briefly) to install. Press and hold to remove the installed device and prepare for re-use (reload).

Blow-up dolls created by the EDF Public Relations Department for the purpose of recruiting soldiers, converted into combat decoys.
They were made to resemble idols contracted by the Public Relations Department to recruit young people at events.

The doll is equipped with a function that allows it to be moved by fine-tuning the air pressure in various parts. It also has a small built-in speaker and can talk.
Although these functions are excessive for a decoy, it can be difficult for the enemy to tell that it's not a real soldier, making it an effective decoy against monsters.

The content of its speech remains unchanged from its time as a recruitment tool.
Its song repertoire includes the official EDF theme used in the recruitment commercials. A different version is sung by the soldiers.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button(briefly) to install. Press and hold to remove the installed device and prepare for re-use (reload).

Blow-up dolls created by the EDF Public Relations Department for the purpose of recruiting soldiers, converted into combat decoys.
They were made to resemble idols contracted by the Public Relations Department to recruit young people at events.

The doll is equipped with a function that allows it to be moved by fine-tuning the air pressure in various parts. It also has a small built-in speaker and can talk.
Although these functions are excessive for a decoy, it can be difficult for the enemy to tell that it's not a real soldier, making it an effective decoy against monsters.

The content of its speech remains unchanged from its time as a recruitment tool.
Its song repertoire includes the official EDF theme used in the recruitment commercials. A different version is sung by the soldiers.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button(briefly) to install. Press and hold to remove the installed device and prepare for re-use (reload).

strings:
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Menace 4D Burst <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:64 Damage:[PT]1800.0 (4 burst) Range:3375.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Right):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:54.0 Range:210.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Left):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:54.0 Range:210.0m)</font>

3 people.
A vehicle equipped with a four-barreled railgun called Menace 4D Burst. This gun fires 4 penetrating shells successively.
The equipped high-performance engine gives it increased movement speed.

A vehicle equipped with a state-of-the-art electromagnetic launcher (Railgun) with accelerated shells and rapid fire support. The shells can penetrate objects and inflict damage on many enemies. The Railgun is equipped with a laser sight to ensure pinpoint accuracy, and the trajectory can be confirmed with the red line before firing. This is a very powerful weapon, but it lacks the blast area of the Howitzer, making it somewhat difficult to use in combat against monsters. To make up for this shortcoming, it's been fitted with a right and left Machine Gun on the rotating turret, which can be manned from either of the gunner seats. However, gunners should be aware that the seats face whatever their respective turrets are aiming at.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

The final KFF sniper rifles with all performance improved to the ultimate with a scope and a laser sight attached.

There's virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.

An improved shooter drone equipped with a pulse machine gun by the Advanced Technologies Lab.
When the pulse energy projectile lands, it causes an electromagnetic explosion and destroys surrounding objects.

It is designed to follow the user and fire at targets.
Since it is equipped with advanced safety devices, there is no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Once all rounds are fired, the equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

An upgraded Y10 Impulse directional land mine. It scatters ball bearings over a wider horizontal area, attacking enemies over a wider field. 

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

A nanomachine spray device of high output. It can spray a large amount of liquefied nanomachines.

Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.)

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Convergence Guided Missile Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:100 Damage:880.0 Blast Range:Radius 1.0m)</font>

1 person
The final battle spec of the Naegling Self-Propelled Missile Launcher with improved movement capacity.

It's equipped with a Convergence Guided Missile. The rockets it fires have a homing feature in order to directly target specific foes, and they separate into small missiles in mid-flight. Because the resulting missiles are small, their individual damage is minor, but the system is designed on the assumption that every last one of them will hit their target. And even when the enemy is moving at a high speed, at least one shot should always hit, meaning some damage will be dealt no matter what. When a target is within its sight, the weapon will automatically establish a positive lock, and it is entirely possible to lock on to several enemies at once. Press the attack button to fire when ready.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A shotgun that can fire armor-piercing ammunition %dq%Slugger Bullets%dq% and it fires only one shot at a time without scattering.
However, the bullets contain tremendous destructive power and penetrative power until it reaches the limit of its range.
Due to its large size, Slugger Bullets fired are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance with a shorter effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A heavy cannon that discharges canisters. After the canisters are fired, they disperse multiple specialized shells, which bounce off of obstacles and create utter chaos in the vicinity. Though it's a destructive beast within its range, its range is fairly limited, and it takes a significant amount of time to reload. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

The powered-up X400-Orchid with improved accuracy and destructive power. Equipped with a scope.
Although its power decreases due to air resistance, it can still deliver powerful damage at mid-range.

Fires special bullets with excellent penetrating power. It can penetrate targets up to 1/4 of its range.
Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The new type of the next generation assault rifle Stork. Equipped with a laser sight and a scope. It has a better accuracy compared with T1 Stork.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the PA-11 LS. Its basic performance is somewhat improved. Equipped with a laser sight and a scope. You can use the scope with the zoom/activate button.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

A blade for close combat. It produces a jet of light to slash the enemy.
Its range is very short, forcing the user to attack point-blank. However, it delivers massively destructive blows.

Unlike the Force Blade, it can be swung without too much effort. Therefore, it can be used effectively even when wielded single-handedly.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A high-output Power Lance. It deals great damage with a single shot. However, it requires several times the energy of a standard Power Lance, so it has a longer charge time.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

The new Raven assault rifle. Its rate of fire is much better than the M1 type. However, in exchange for this amazing rapid fire, its accuracy is sacrificed a bit.

Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A rocket launcher firing off up to twenty successive rockets which scatter horizontally.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A broken high-performance assault rifle.
Performance of the rifle is greatly reduced due to it having been repaired with spare parts.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

At the moment being fire, the bullet's power is the maximum of the spec (Damage value shown on the right). 
Its power will gradually decrease and become the minimum of the spec (Damage value shown on the right) when reaching its limit of the range.

3 people.
A huge combat vehicle, spanning a massive 25 meters. Basically a mobile fortress developed for land combat. Equipped with a main battleship-class cannon and two rotating turrets, as well as thick armor. The trade-off, however, is that all of these features add to its weight, making it a bit sluggish.

Its main cannon is the EDF's state-of-the-art Requiem Cannon, originally developed as a naval gun but then equipped on tanks after reducing the size of its barrel. This has resulted in a further reduction to its initial velocity, so some skill is necessary to hit the desired target.

There are two sub-cannons (Howitzer) located on the top of the main cannon. The main cannon and sub-cannons all rotate. The sub-cannons are located on the top of the main cannon so when the main cannon rotates, the direction of the sub-cannons will also change. It is equipped with a grenade discharger on the left and right to prevent enemies from approaching.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A new type of G&M semi-auto rifle. The bullets are changed to the initial type, so they don't have the penetrating power, but possess excellent destructive power.

Since the bullets are somewhat unique, the rifle is designed semi-auto.
It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

1 person.
The final Nix Grenadier model. Equipped with Explosion launchers on both shoulders and grenade launchers on its arms.

The shells detonate several seconds after being fired. It can attack from range, because of the long interval until explosion.
The Explosion Launcher is a special grenade discharger which can fire multiple grenades at once. The grenades will detonate right after discharge, and cause damage to a large area.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A special sniper rifle that fires four shots at once, each with a trajectory slightly different from others that will scatter and hit the targets around.

A scope and a laser sight are attached. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use the equipped scope. 

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target.
The impact part has become a roller. Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the output of the roller. Immediately after it has been swung down, a charge attack will be unleashed by the roller. 
The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the output. Releasing the button will unleash a three stage attack depending on the output.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

Personal dispersal artillery that discharges multiple armor-piercing shots off to the side--perfect for attacking enemies in your periphery. Its range is short, however, and it's fairly slow to reload. Additionally, because multiple shells are fired at once, the recoil is greater than average and may take some time to absorb. The muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A special gun developed using Raven assault rifle as a model sample. It rapidly shoots out lightweight bullets like needles. Since the bullets are smaller, the destructive power is less serious; but they can penetrate objects and attack multiple enemies with a single shot.
In addition, because the bullets are downsized, the magazine capacity is enhanced, which lead to a better battle continuation ability.

Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

1 person.
A devastatingly strong model of the Nereid. It is equipped with a Ground Auto-acquisition Blaze Gun (a variety of flamethrower). The blaze gun has a sensor that can detect when an enemy is in range and automatically target it. It's limited to a lower firing angle, however, as it is a ground support weapon, and it cannot handle enemies from above. Also, it's equipped with unguided bombs that can be thrown straight down. It is necessary to engage the enemies in close combat to effectively use the blaze gun. Its mobility has been improved to the maximum level possible, making it the easiest machine to operate. 

In order to request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.
The final spec of the Emerald personal missile launcher. It is possible to lock on to five targets at once. Its overall performance is also much improved.

An upgraded version of the PA-11. The basic performance is somewhat improved. A laser sight is attached.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

An upgraded MLRA model with better firepower and an improved guidance system. Also its lock-on maximum has increased to 30, making it possible to attack a group of enemies with just one soldier. The lock-on distance is shorter, so the support of an Air Raider is necessary in ranged combat.

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

Improved version of the R2-type. Formation of 2 unmanned attack aircraft that fly fast and return swiftly after each attack (can be reused for a short period of time).
Equipped with machine guns with excellent rapid-fire performance and high attack power.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, machine gun fire rains down from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
Can distiguish friend from foe, posing no danger to the user and his/her allies.

1 person.
The main attack helicopter of the EDF. It comes equipped with two fixed autocannons and missiles. When a target is within its sights (red square), the tracking system will lock on automatically.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Activates the top secret Bulge Laser Beam Mode Z system.
Every feature has been engineered for optimal performance so that this Bulge Laser fires at full energy.

The loading work is conducted on a satellite, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

A multi-purpose personal missile launcher. It fires missiles with homing capability. As this is a prototype, the homing capability is low, and it often misses its mark. The lock-on range is not very good, so support from Air Raiders is necessary in ranged combat. 

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A timed (J type) hand grenade.
It no longer detonates on contact, but increases its destructive power. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade, which will then explode in a few seconds.
There is a definite pause between the throw and the explosion, so it is difficult to blow oneself up. It is also possible to bounce grenades off the walls of a building and/or throw them inside.

The burst-shooting version of the Minion Buster. Pulling the trigger (pressing the attack button) will consecutively fire three armor-piercing high explosive shells.

The APHE shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stages—hitting the target and the explosion that follows.
The large shells result in slow speed and short range, but can cause devastating damage. The explosion power doesn't reduce with distance, so it's very effective even for enemies in long range.

A brand new shotgun with improved power and ammo capacity after redesign. Considering its high range and penetrative power, it is a very powerful weapon

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A special rifle developed to battle against powered exoskeletons. Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will consecutively fire armor-piercing high explosive shells.

The APHE shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stages—hitting the target and the explosion that follows.
The large shells result in slow speed and short range, but can cause devastating damage. The explosion power doesn't reduce with distance, so it's very effective even for enemies in long range.

A 10-barreled brainwave-guided weapon. A formidable weapon that can lock on to many targets at once.
When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge spears of energy. The spears will chase down their targets and explode on impact.

It is very effective against multiple enemies... but because it fires so many spears of energy, the trajectory is hard to control, and will result in the spears shooting in different directions.  When the spears shoot downwards, they might injure the user on the ground. So the weapon is most suitable for aerial shooting.

1 person.
The final spec combat vehicle Blacker A. It has reached the peak of its performance. It is equipped with a large caliber main cannon that has accelerated turret rotation, increasing its chance to hit enemies.
Its main cannon is a 110mm Smooth-Bore Gun, which can fire armor-piercing ammunition capable of penetrating many enemies at once.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Request to fire the Bulge Laser at high output.
It has destructive power, but isn't too accurate. It also has a long cool down.

The loading work is conducted on a satellite, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

A large missile launcher that launches laser-guided missiles.
This weapon is devastating, but cannot be used alone: it must be paired with an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit (or a guide beacon) to establish a viable target lock. 

Through the Laser Guide Kit, the lock-on location is confirmed. When the laser guide location (or a guide beacon) is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. After the lock-on, releasing the attack button will launch the missile. The missile will fly at the targeted location and cause a tremendous explosion, damaging the whole area. 

Although it's a powerful weapon with a wide explosive range, it takes long to lock on. Please be cautious when using it.

A rapid-fire version of the Bolt Gun with greatly increased ammo capacity.
The bolts will diffuse and then concentrate on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point. This characteristic can be used to enable all of the bolts to hit a single target.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

A weapon that fires multiple powerful bolts of electricity.
The bolts will diffuse and then concentrate on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point. This characteristic can be used to enable all of the bolts to hit a single target.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

A massive missile launcher that launches enormous laser-guided missiles.

Because a laser guide is necessary for targeting, this weapon cannot be used alone: it must be paired with an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit (or a guide beacon)  to establish a viable target lock. Through the Laser Guide Kit, the lock-on location is confirmed. When the laser guide location (or a guide beacon)  is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. After the lock-on, releasing the attack button will launch the missile. The missile will fly at the targeted location and cause a tremendous explosion, damaging the whole area. 

The lock-on process requires not only the support of an Air Raider, but also a considerable amount of time. When used effectively, however, it can be absolutely devastating to the enemy.

An upgraded version of the M1 Raven. In order to make a good use of its improved accuracy, a laser sight is added.

An assault rifle with excellent rapid fire performance. Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

4 people.
A giant humanoid battle machine. It is one of the trump cards for the EDF's land battles. It does not have the greatest mobility because of its large size, but the large weaponry offers impressive destructive power. It has special plate armor all over its body, so its defensive capabilities are much higher than a tanks. It can carry a large amount of ammo. It is a walking fortress with excellent combat ability. But it is necessary to have four people to make use of its potential. One person must be a pilot. So you need to have gunners if you want to attack. 

Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle. 
Anyone can ride in the gunners seat. 

In order to request this, you need to achieve a certain amount of credits in the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A final spec DNG long-range throwing grenade.

Due to its large size and weight, throwing it requires the use of the entire body. Although it takes some time from the start of the throwing motion until it is actually released, it is possible to change direction during the throw.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A new assault rifle that specializes in its destructive power. In exchange for the intensified power, the accuracy drops sharply and it takes longer to reload.

Although a huge budget was put into the development of this weapon with the expectation to surpass PA-11, the outcome wasn't satisfying.
This development project was frozen and left with only this prototype.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A Mag Blaster equipped with a large tank. Because a large tank can store more energy, the weapon can fire for a long time.
However, it also takes more time and requires more energy to fill up a large tank.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. 
However, its output decreases as the power stored in its energy core depletes. When the power left in its energy core is at half of its maximum amount, its greatest level of destruction falls to about 25 percent of the maximum amount. For that reason, as long as the situation allows it, you should reload to preserve its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

V3 Anti-Aircraft Gun (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1500 Damage:45.0 Range:320.0m)</font>

Improved version of the KG6 Kepler Self-Propelled Anti-Aircraft Gun, equipped with a powerful V3 Anti-Aircraft Gun.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A Beacon Discharger.
Use this beacon to signal a 150mm Quadruple-barreled Cannon attack from the gunship that is circling the skies.

Shoots four shells at once, dealing devastating damage. It has a complex mechanism and thus takes more time to reload.

Press the attack button to discharge a beacon which will start guiding only when hitting an object, so it could be useless if you target at somewhere with no objects. Also, a beacon out of range will activate its safety device and disable it. In short, the beacon must hit an object in range. There is a laser device equipped on the Beacon Discharger to determine the range. Once you confirm the laser light has hit the object in range, you can discharge the beacon with certainty that the beacon can be activated properly.

The loading work for the coming fire is conducted in a gunship, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

A mechanical hammer. Used in place of a spear to crush the target rather than penetrate it. Though simple, it does allow for chain attacks, and is fitted with a mechanism to absorb shocks. It does not need to be fixed to the lower body, so attacking while moving and even while wielding a shield is entirely possible.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A super high performance Limpet Gun. Its destructive power and blast area both have increased dramatically. 

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode.

A double mechanical spear. Used in conjunction with a booster, it is possible to rush forward and attack with two spears at once. Each spear will rotate to penetrate the target, after which point high-pressure plasma will be released from its tip, destroying the object from within. When performing combo attacks, the second attack is much larger and more destructive, utilizing a bigger blast cartridge. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable, making it a very strong weapon.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A final model of Hornet Rocket Launcher with its acceleration being pushed to the limit.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

An improved weapon developed from the G&M-22S. Its destructive power is greatly boosted. The special AP bullets have enough power to penetrate objects and deal damage to multiple enemies they hit. 
The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.
It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

A semi-auto rifle with outstanding destructive power. It can fire the special large AP bullets. Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.
It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

The ultimate Thunder Crossbow W upgrade. It shoots out electric bolts, which diffuse horizontally.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The more power accumulated, the more likely the lightening concentrates on the aiming direction; whereas the energy accumulation decreases, the lightening diffuses. In that case, it's difficult to hit the target, but you can attack in a wider range.

The final, complete spec model of the Phalanx. Its output has been increased to the utmost limit, and its destructive power far surpasses that of the ZT model.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy in the Casket. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will discharge the accumulated energy and fire off the Plasma Gun continuously in a certain time span.
The output is amplified according to the amount of stored energy and so is destructive power. The more energy accumulated, the greater flying distance, shot number and firepower. Also, the diffusion range converges more toward the front.
Although the Plasma Gun is very extremely effective , its power decreases greatly with distance, so you have to be as close as possible to the enemy, make it a high-risky weapon to use.

The powered-up M2 Raven with stable performance and improved accuracy.

Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The completed model of Volcano rocket launcher that fires off up to thirty successive rockets which scatter horizontally.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A self-propelled bomb with built-in sensors. When set, it will start moving, and after several seconds, the sensors will activate. If an enemy is detected in range, the bomb will detonate automatically. If it hits an obstacle, it will change direction.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button to activate.
Hold the Use Backpack Tool button to stop.
