A large combat vehicle equipped with a super weapon still under development—the Atomic Ray Cannon. This super weapon is able to generate and irradiate high-pressure energy capable of destroying a mountain instantly.
It can cause terrible damage, but the energy consumption and costs are enormous. The current manufacturing cost is said to be 100 million dollars per vehicle, making it impractical for actual combat. However, in order to destroy the aliens' golden armor, dozens of these vehicles have been produced in a hurry.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An upgraded version of the Grant M41, which has been prioritized because Grant MA50 was a sticky deal.
This new model possesses firepower surpassing MA50 with enlarged rockets. Its firepower and blast radius are now amazing, but since it has been modified in a rush, the accuracy is fairly low due to lack of adjustment.

It's equipped with a scope for use at great distances.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A booster enhancer.
Enables 7 consecutive boost jumps.
(Must be used with a Jump Booster)

A new assault rifle with excellent rapid fire performance. Because its bullets are lightweight, its firepower is inferior to the PA-11; however, the rate of fire can be doubled. Its overall firepower is fairly high.
Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A high-output model of the Gleipnir. It consumes a great deal of energy to create a ball of energy that fires off numerous homing missiles for a long period of time.

It requires mastery of the brainwave-guided kit Psionic Link, so only the elite members from Wing Divers are capable of using it.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Nu Epsilon Electromagnetic Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:[PT]18000.0 Range:5062.5m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Right):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:180.0 Range:210.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Left):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:180.0 Range:210.0m)</font>

3 people.
Equipped with the new railgun, Nu Epsilon Electromagnetic Cannon, developed by scientists from all over the world. The larger caliber means improved destructive power and bullet velocity, but continuous-fire performance has been slightly reduced as a result.

A vehicle equipped with a state-of-the-art electromagnetic launcher (Railgun) with accelerated shells and rapid fire support. The shells can penetrate objects and inflict damage on many enemies. The Railgun is equipped with a laser sight to ensure pinpoint accuracy, and the trajectory can be confirmed with the red line before firing. This is a very powerful weapon, but it lacks the blast area of the Howitzer, making it somewhat difficult to use in combat against monsters. To make up for this shortcoming, it's been fitted with a right and left Machine Gun on the rotating turret, which can be manned from either of the gunner seats. However, gunners should be aware that the seats face whatever their respective turrets are aiming at.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A large-caliber shotgun that can fire over a wide area. This refurbishment of the D55 Breacher makes it a terrifying weapon possible to fire more shots than before.
It has a short range, but can fire an incredible number of bullets simultaneously, resulting in overwhelming damage when all rounds hit at short distance.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

The final model of the rapid-firing brainwave-guided weapon Fenrir. As a triple-barreled weapon, it can lock on to 3 targets and attack them simultaneously. It is an ultimate homing weapon with absolutely devastating power. When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Pressing the attack button will discharge the weapon, and the discharge will explode on impact. It requires a user with extraordinary Psionic Link capabilities, and no one has yet been found who fits the bill.

The next generation assault rifle which has been newly developed after the Slugger project being called off. Although it's still in the prototype stage, it already exceeds the performance of the PA-11.
Due to the complex structure, it takes more time to reload.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A high-performance firearm developed for exterminating monsters. It fires small napalm rounds at high speed, but due to the unique shape of the rounds, its accuracy is remarkably low. However, when a round lands, it bursts into flames that damage a wide area.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

An upgraded version of the G&M-21S with various performances improved. A scope is attached.

A semi-auto rifle with outstanding destructive power. It can fire the special large AP bullets. Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.
It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

A hand grenade with incredible power behind it. Although it is powerful, it is very heavy and difficult to throw far. Few people carry it because there is a risk of throwing it incorrectly, but if you can master it, it becomes a very powerful weapon.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.
Heavy Bomber Phobos J Cluster Round

A special shotgun that incorporates Plasma Cannon technology.
Fires multiple small, high-speed plasma bullets at a time that explode on impact.
Has a much longer range and can be used at a more significant distance than the more standard shotgun used by Rangers. It also boasts a high rate of fire.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. 
The number of bullets fired increases according to the amount of charged power.

Fires an electrode attached to a wire that pierces its target and delivers an electric shock.
This weapon was first developed as a stun gun for riot control, but its output was increased to lethal levels for use against monsters.

When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter fires an electrode.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from a high-speed bomber.
It will come in to launch a low strafing run upon the target area.
Only one high-speed bomber, that will continuously fire its machineguns from a long distance, will show up upon request, but you also need less credit to request this.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

A mass-produced atomic ray gun, a miniaturized version of the EMC (Atomic Ray Cannon) that can be operated by infantry.
Because it is a mass-produced type, its output is not high, but it has a long range and strikes the target instantly.

The prototype Blazer, despite its small size, had about 15% of the output of the EMC. However, its production cost was on par with the EMC, so only a few were made.

Super high-output long-range laser gun. Fires off all of its stored energy at once to instantly destroy the target in the distance.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
Because it was designed with the idea that it would consume a lot of energy, when its stored energy is low, its power reduces significantly.

An upgraded version of the Grant. The enlarged rockets can cause even greater damage over a wide area. However, the velocity is somewhat compromised due to the large size of rockets.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Revolver Cannon (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:600 Damage:28.8 Range:320.0m)</font>
Revolver Cannon (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:600 Damage:28.8 Range:320.0m)</font>
Missile Pod (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:40 Damage:96.0 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>
Missile Pod (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:40 Damage:96.0 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>

1 person.
A mass produced, general-purpose model of the Powered Exoskeleton Nix. It has thicker armor than the A model, and its firepower is also enhanced.

Has customized Powered Exoskeleton Revolver Cannons on both arms. Making it especially deadly at mid and long range. 
Both shoulders are armed with missile pods. The missiles can automatically lock-on enemy within the sights (red square).

This mass-produced yet effective model can handle most situations with its powerful Revolver Cannons and homing missiles. 90% of the EDF's Powered Exoskeletons are model B.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Full-auto sniper rifle. Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots. 

A scope and a laser sight are attached.

An upgraded version of the Slaughter E20. Rounds are concentrated in a small area, making it possible to deal terrifying damage to a single target.
Equipped with a laser sight, you can fight while checking the range of fire.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

An upgraded version of the next generation assault rifle T1 Stork. Its performance has become stable after repeated adjustments. In order to make a good use of its upgraded accuracy, a scope is added.
In addition, the power reduction due to air resistance has been somewhat improved.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Heavy Revolver Cannon (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:72 Damage:[PT]190.0 (3 burst) Range:720.0m)</font>
Heavy Revolver Cannon (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:72 Damage:[PT]190.0 (3 burst) Range:720.0m)</font>
Shoulder Howitzer (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:10 Damage:760.0 Blast Range:Radius 20.0m)</font>
Shoulder Howitzer (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:10 Damage:760.0 Blast Range:Radius 20.0m)</font>

1 person.
A heavy Powered Exoskeleton equipped with dual Shoulder Howitzers that fire ammunition which detonates on impact, inflicting damage to enemies in a wide radius. Additionally, it has Heavy Revolver Cannons equipped on both arms, from which it fires three armor-piercing shells per shot. These shells disperse and penetrate to strike several enemies at once, though the weight of the massive artillery significantly reduces its mobility.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.
A stronger Acid Gun. This special weapon now fires large volumes of strong acid scattered over a horizontal area.

An upgraded version of the next generation assault rifle T1 Stork. A laser sight is attached and various performances are boosted. The loading mechanism is also improved to shorten the reload time.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the Minion Buster with various performances improved. The effective range also greatly increases.
Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will consecutively fire armor-piercing high explosive shells.

The APHE shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stages—hitting the target and the explosion that follows.
The large shells result in slow speed and short range, but can cause devastating damage. The explosion power doesn't reduce with distance, so it's very effective even for enemies in long range.

A personal grenade launcher. It fires high performance grenades that explode 3.0 sec after firing. Since these shots travel along an arc, it is possible to attack enemies hidden in trenches or behind cover.

Since the grenades fly in a parabolic trajectory, it is difficult to predict the point of impact (compared to a rocket launcher, which has a straight trajectory). However, skilled soldiers can make predictions (shown as a red line) through experience and intuition.
Though not an exact science, one can take advantage of the grenades' parabolic trajectories to attack enemies hidden behind shields or in trenches.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A full-auto shotgun. Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots. It has immense destructive power at close range regardless who the user is.
This weapon was made with convenience in mind and sacrifices some performance of the rapid-fire, but its stability and accuracy are thus improved.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

The final model of Electromagnetic Bunker, it creates a wall of powerful energy. Its durability has been increased to the max, so it is almost impossible to destroy. The wall not only stops bullets but also optical weapons. It can act as a shield, but it cannot block blasts. The defensive wall senses objects that collide with it. If it was fired by an ally, it will be allowed to pass through.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

An upgraded and enhanced version of the Lysander. Its shot speed is the fastest among all sniper rifles.
Due to its complex loading mechanism, it's unable to fire consecutively, but it's extremely powerful.

A scope and a laser sight are attached.

Having better performances than the Star Rapier, this unparalleled, ultimate Rapier knows no limits. It costs as much of an EMC to make this weapon. Its few makers are all missing.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire plasma arc blades.
(Clash Close Range Charge:0.0 Damage:15.0 Effective Range:Radius 2.0m)

A small multicopter equipped with an improved machine gun.
Four units activate simultaneously and fly out in front of the user.
When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter moves into position and fires at the marker's impact point.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

An ultra-high-performance bomb. Because of its massive destructive power and blast range, it is extremely dangerous to use.

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. After installation, Hold the Use Backpack Tool button to detonate.

A new triple grenade launcher that fires time-detonated grenades in 3 directions simultaneously. The resulting blast area is immense, and can wipe out a large group of enemies.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A device that protects allies within range. They create an invisible force field around allies in its effective range that can reduce the damage taken from attacks. They will confer benefits on all allies in range. They will also have an impact on passengers in vehicles. Also, they can determine friend from foe and will not interfere with ally attacks. Thus, the damage inflicted by allies on the enemy is not affected.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

A new assault rifle specializing in destructive power. In exchange for a devastating destructive power, all other performances are sacrificed.
Fires a special bullet with excellent penetrating power. Penetrates targets up to half the range of the projectile.

The Slugger project was put on hold, but it was reopened later and thus this whole new prototype was born.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A modified version of the TJ444 Mouse, a small hand grenade.
Comprised of several bombs linked in the shape of a ring. When thrown, the bombs separate and fly off in different directions. Although it can attack a wide area, it is timed to avoid the risk of misfiring.

Press and hold the Use Backpack tool button to see the path of the projectile(s), indicated by a red line (different from the actual display, as the projectile(s) travel in multiple directions). Release the button to throw. Once thrown, the grenade explodes after a few seconds.

An upgraded version of the T2 Stork with various performances improved. Because the bullets are improved and thus the power reduction due to air resistance is successfully improved as well.
It's equipped with laser sight and scope.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.
An improved model of the V2 Plasma Core. It raises the Wing Diver's abilities to a new level.

A weapon that fires multiple powerful bolts of electricity. It requires a great deal of energy for each shot, but it boasts incredible firepower and a wide range.
The diffused bolts will gather immediately, shooting straight towards the aiming direction.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The more power accumulated, the more likely the lightening concentrates on the aiming direction; whereas the energy accumulation decreases, the lightening diffuses. In that case, it's difficult to hit the target, but you can attack in a wider range.

A Gatling gun with far greater capacity than its predecessors, allowing for about one minute of continuous fire. Its destructive power is outstanding.
Press and hold the attack button to start the barrel rotation. When rotation reaches a certain speed, it will start firing. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

An enhanced model of the Lightning Rapid Bow.
It can fire continuously for a longer period of time. And because the bolts of electricity diffuse horizontally, they can take out several targets at a time. 

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. The more power stored, the longer time you can fire.
As the accumulated energy decreases, accuracy declines.

An enhanced model of the Closed Laser MA with greatly increased firepower. Affected by the increased output, its accuracy is slightly reduced.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will continuously irradiate the laser until the stored energy runs out.
The projection time increases with the amount of energy accumulation. The more the accumulation is, the higher the energy efficiency can be and the longer time for the weapon to fire.

An upgraded version of the G&M-A23. Various performances are improved and a laser sight is attached.

The special AP bullets have enough power to penetrate objects and deal damage to multiple enemies they hit. The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.
It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

The powered-up M2R Raven. The Raven assault rifle fired too rapidly, meaning it required frequent reloading. Therefore, the M2RER Raven boasts improved magazine capacity to solve this problem. Equipped with a scope.

Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A complete spec Quake Haken featuring further improvement on the ZD model's destructive power.

A special hammer that is installed with multiple ultra-vibration generators (Vibro Drive). By reducing contact surfaces, it is possible for the vibrations to diffuse in several directions. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the Vibro Drive output. Releasing the attack button will unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

Hand-thrown incendiary device. Ignites upon impact, discharging tremendous heat.
Its flames cannot be extinguished with water, meaning it can be used underwater or underground because it does not require oxygen for combustion.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

An unmanned multicopter equipped with a large bomb. Flies slower due to its greater weight.

The user indicates the target using a laser guidance system.
Once the target has been set, the entire aircraft swoops down upon it and detonates.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.
Naturally, this results in a longer reload time.

A large mortar that fires huge shells. When the shells land, they explode, shattering an area up to 100 meters in diameter.
Though a powerful weapon, the excessive caliber of this particular armament results in some truly intense recoil, often leaving the wielder frozen and vulnerable until the powered exoskeleton has fully absorbed the impact.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

An improved weapon developed from the T2 Stork. Its basic structure has been changed greatly and thus dramatically improves the performance; however it's difficult to adjust the weapon stats. Therefore it's still unstable.
Although it can deliver immense destructive power, the bullets are susceptible to air resistance and their power significantly declines depending on distance, making it impossible to deliver fatal damage at long distances. The great destructive power brings along large recoil and thus lowers the accuracy.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

Self-propelled Robot Bomb. The bomb's movement capacity has been increased as far as it will go. Its maximum speed is over 200km/h. It does not have any bombs, and it cannot detonate. It has no combat capabilities; it is simply for pure enjoyment.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button to activate.
Hold the Use Backpack Tool button to stop.

A high-caliber sniper rifle with a focus on tremendous destructive and penetrative power alike. Its shots can pierce through any enemy and inflict damage on any target within the line of fire. Its range and accuracy are also high. However, because of its unique build, it must be reloaded after each and every shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

The powered-up Slugger NN2. Its performance has finally reached stable. It can keep the destructive power while enhancing the accuracy. In order to make flexible use of accuracy, it's equipped with a laser sight. The convenience in usage exceeds Slugger NN2.

Fires a special bullet with excellent penetrating power. Penetrates targets up to half the range of the projectile.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the T3 Stork. It's redesigned into a rapid-fire rifle, making it more stable in performance. The accuracy is also improved and it's equipped with a laser sight.
The speed reduction due to air resistance is solved to some extent and make it a very powerful weapon.

Pulling the trigger (pressing the attack button) will consecutively fire three shots.

A device that enhances the thruster and the booster simultaneously.
Enables 3 consecutive thrust-dashes.
Enables 4 consecutive boost jumps.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster or a Jump Booster)

The enhanced Minion Buster. Its destructive power is greatly improved. In order to avoid hurting its user, the explosion countdown is set to be longer.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will consecutively fire armor-piercing high explosive shells.
The APHE shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stages—hitting the target and the explosion that follows.
The large shells result in slow speed and short range, but can cause devastating damage. The explosion power doesn't reduce with distance, so it's very effective even for enemies in long range.

A sniper multicopter equipped with a single-shot rifle.
The high performance of the marker ejector makes it possible to strike targets even from a great distance.  

It silently approaches the marker impact position and fires.
It flies at high speed, but some time is required between aiming and firing.

A specially-made grenade with outstanding destructive power. 
It ricochets off obstacles very well.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade, which will then explode in a few seconds.
There is a definite pause between the throw and the explosion, so it is difficult to blow oneself up. It is also possible to bounce grenades off the walls of a building and/or throw them inside.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. The VM Jet Core's energy capacity has been taken to a whole new level.

An extremely large piece of artillery. Launches laser-guided missiles which boast extreme destructive power.
This weapon is devastating, but cannot be used alone: it must be paired with an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit (or a guide beacon) to establish a viable target lock. 

Through the Laser Guide Kit, the lock-on location is confirmed. When the laser guide location (or a guide beacon) is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. After the lock-on, releasing the attack button will launch the missile. The missile will fly at the targeted location and cause a tremendous explosion, damaging the whole area. 

Although it's a powerful weapon with a wide explosive range, it takes long to lock on. Please be cautious when using it.

A thruster enhancer.
Enables 4 consecutive thrust-dashes.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster)

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Auto-Acquisition Autocannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1500 Damage:12.75 Range:480.0m)</font>
Rocket Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:48 Damage:204.0 (8 burst) Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>

1 person.
A ground support helicopter equipped with an Auto-acquisition Autocannon that can detect enemies within the angle of fire and automatically lock on the targets. Its ground support capability is overwhelming and can easily decimate enemies below it. The lower firing angle makes it a ground support weapon only, however--it can't handle airborne foes. 
It does come equipped with a discharge-type Rocket Cannon, giving it an overall combat potential far in excess of the Eros.

In order to request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A new grenade launcher with an excellent rate of fire. It successively fires grenades with incredible speed.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A particle beam rifle developed for use by Wing Divers. It is more accurate and destructive than a ballistic weapon.
The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. 
However, its output decreases as the power stored in its energy core depletes. When the power left in its energy core is at half of its maximum amount, its greatest level of destruction falls to about 25 percent of the maximum amount. For that reason, as long as the situation allows it, you should reload to preserve its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from combat bombers. A squad of 18 combat bombers will come in to launch a low strafing run upon the target area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

The finalized version of the Spark Whip. It diffuses 12 beams of energy horizontally, enabling it to attack over a wider area. Its energy consumption has also been reduced, making it easier to handle.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

An upgraded version of Slugger NN3. Equipped with a laser sight and a scope, it's a rifle easier to use.

Fires a special bullet with excellent penetrating power. Penetrates targets up to half the range of the projectile.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A large-caliber Minion Buster, which can fire super-large armor-piercing high explosive shells. The AP shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stages—hitting the target and the explosion that follows.

The mechanism is designed semi-auto to fire these super-large bullets.
It fires a single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed).

The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful.

A twin grenade launcher with incredible firepower that fires grenades in two directions. The grenades detonate on impact, creating a huge explosion. Extreme caution is advised at close range. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

Use this device to launch the flechette bomb ‘Splendor’. The bombs attach to where they land (friend, foe, or vehicle), and can be detonated remotely with the Zoom/Activate button. When detonated, several flechettes will be fired into the surrounding area. The flechettes are made of a special material, so they will ricochet off walls. This means that they will affect a wide area, but in a confined space, they can deal impressive damage. If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.
An upgraded flame cannon that emits deadly flames.

A next-generation high-performance rifle in the Stork series. Its mechanism has been thoroughly changed, successfully improving the overall performance. It's an excellent assault rifle without faults. Equipped with a laser sight.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded Reverse Shooter that launches capsules, which explode on impact and disperse the nanomachines inside across a large area. More nanomachines in each capsule means greater recovery and a wider radius. However, its firing distance is largely reduced. Also effective on the user. Cannot be reloaded.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.)

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

A weapon developed from the M2 Raven. It successfully solves the problem of power decline by air resistance. In order to make a good use of the rapid-fire performance, the magazines are further improved to contain more ammos.
However, reloading takes some time because of the magazine's size.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A mortar that fires shrapnel. The shrapnel travel in a parabolic path and detonate on impact over a large area. Though the attack area is wide, the range is short and the recoil is intense, often leaving the wielder frozen and vulnerable until the powered exoskeleton has fully absorbed the impact.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

The special-ops version of UM Grenade Launcher. 
Its firepower and blast area surpass even those of the UMAZ. Easily one of the most powerful weapons ever made.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A stationary automatic enemy tracking gun that fires high-speed rockets.
It has excellent firepower and can turn swiftly. This gun is the pinnacle of automatic tracking weapon technology.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

A device that generates a special energy barrier by curving space. Visible light rays can pass through the shield, allowing the user to see who or what is on the other side.

Blocks enemy attacks but allows attacks from allies to pass through. This wall requires a large amount of energy and can only be maintained for a short time.

Developed to compensate for the Wing Diver's low defensive capabilities.
Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

The final model of Stork assault rifle. All performances are pushed to the limit.
Although it was developed as a trump card to turn the tide, it's difficult to mass-produce, so only a few prototypes are given to the elite soldiers.
Equipped with a laser sight and a scope.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

High performance plasma sphere generator.
Creates numerous small plasma balls to be thrown by hand. After being thrown, the plasma spheres continue to drift through the air and explode when they touch an object, causing damage over a wide area.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit.
Therefore, it can be used even during an emergency charge so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. It only takes a short time to reload.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

An enhanced weapon developed from the Slugger. It's a prototype based on Slugger's mechanism, but it has a long shooting range.
Similar to Slugger, its power declines with air resistance; however, because its range of fire is long, it is still effective against enemies at mid-range.

Although its power is inferior to that of the Slugger, it can still penetrate targets up to 1/5 of its range.
Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The powered-up T4 Stork.
The bullets have been changed to special AP bullets. They can pierce targets and cause damages to multiple enemies.
A laser sight has been attached.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A device that generates an energy barrier by curving space. Visible light rays can pass through the shield, allowing the user to see who or what is on the other side.

Blocks both friendly and enemy attacks. Soldiers and enemies alike can pass through the barrier.

Developed to compensate for the Wing Diver's low defensive capabilities.
Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)
An enhanced model of the V4 Plasma Core. It has been improved in various aspects.

A pump-action style shotgun developed by the EDF. Its biggest feature is that it can be quickly loaded with box magazines. Although it's still a prototype, the overall performance is fairly complete. Ammo capacity is reduced.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

The final model of the Fang. A high-caliber sniper rifle with a focus on tremendous destructive and penetrative power alike. Its shots can pierce through any enemy and inflict damage on any target within the line of fire. Its range and accuracy are also high. However, because of its unique build, it must be reloaded after each and every shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

The new Slugger assault rifle. In keeping with the original Slugger concept, range and accuracy have been sacrificed to achieve greater destructive power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A super high-output Plasma Cannon that fires super high-density plasma balls. It's a formidable weapon that takes firepower and blast area to an unimaginable whole new level.
The super high-density bullets begin to drop from the weight of gravity shortly after discharge. In order to hit the target locations, this weapon has to be aimed high and fired towards the sky just as a mortar. It can also be used to attack from the sky.

Because it was designed with the idea that it would consume a lot of energy, when its stored energy is low, its power reduces significantly.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.
Special exoskeleton tuned for gunfire. Equipped with stabilizers to absorb recoil and enhanced performance required for shooting.

A weapon developed from the M3 Raven. ROF is dramatically improved, but it's unstable and the accuracy isn't satisfying. Some see this as a failure.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.
A power-up version of the ME4 Emerald. It is possible to lock on to four targets at once, and both its lock-on system and homing capacity are improved.

A modified version of the MG hand grenade.
Resized for greater portability, increasing the number that can be carried at once.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

The new version of the G&M semi-auto rifle.  
The special AP bullets have enough power to penetrate objects and deal damage to multiple enemies they hit. 
Besides, the large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.
It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

A new Rapier equipped with a power amplification device called 'Casket.' Its Plasma Gun is modified to be able to shoot rays of energy that diffuse vertically.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy in the Casket. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will discharge the accumulated energy and fire off the Plasma Gun continuously in a certain time span.
The output is amplified according to the amount of stored energy and so is destructive power. The more energy accumulated, the greater flying distance, shot number and firepower. Also, the diffusion range converges more toward the front.
Although the Plasma Gun is very extremely effective , its power decreases greatly with distance, so you have to be as close as possible to the enemy, make it a high-risky weapon to use.

An upgraded version of the Slaughter E22GA. Developed to fight against Aliens, the bullets are concentrated to the front, enabling great damage in a small area. When all rounds hit at short distance, it should cause overwhelming damage to Aliens' armors.
It's equipped with a laser sight for accurate firing.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A pump-action style shotgun. It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range and enough force to pierce its target.
However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their power significantly declines depending on distance. It is difficult to deliver fatal damage at long distances. It also takes some time to load the bullets.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

An upgraded version of the T4 Stork with various performances improved. It takes less time to load the bullets and there's a laser sight attached.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An enhanced version of the ZE-Gun that is more lightweight.
This model makes it possible to install several guns at once, in order to create a defensive line. Basic performance is also high.

Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

An impulse directional landmine customized for use against aircraft. Both the ejection tube for the ball bearings and the enemy detection sensor point diagonally upward in order to target and attack airborne foes.

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

The powered-up M3 Raven. Its loading mechanism has been improved and equipped with a laser sight and a scope.

Since there were problems found in M4's design, they constantly renovate the stable M3 Raven, and come out with this product that exceeds M4 in overall performances.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A new-model sniper rifle that can fire three-round bursts to strike enemies at long range. Pull the trigger (press the attack button) to fire three shots consecutively. It's a highly effective weapon that can easily target fast-moving enemies.

Overall performance has been improved, but its accuracy isn't satisfying.

There's virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

The finished version of the Stork assault rifle. All performances are upgraded to the limit. Equipped with a scope.


Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A complete spec Raven assault rifle. Penetrates the enemy at very close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A special grenade launcher that fires as many as 20 splash grenades at once. These grenades bounce around and explode after a few seconds. Since they bounce in an unpredictable pattern, caution is advised.

The ultimate Minion Buster. Not only the range is longer, its destructive power also becomes a lot more powerful. In order to avoid hurting its user, the explosion countdown is set to be longer.
Equipped with a laser sight.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will consecutively fire armor-piercing high explosive shells.
The APHE shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stages—hitting the target and the explosion that follows.
The large shells result in slow speed and short range, but can cause devastating damage. The explosion power doesn't reduce with distance, so it's very effective even for enemies in long range.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Bike:</font> Driver
Light Machine Gun (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1200 Damage:27.0 Range:160.0m)</font>
Light Machine Gun (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1200 Damage:27.0 Range:160.0m)</font>

A specially-made version of the military motorcycle Freed. 
To compensate for power shortage, a high output engine is replaced. Although the power issue is solved, fuel efficiency deteriorates extremely. The grip also fails to catch up with the increasing power and becomes difficult to control.

Able to request underground.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A new type of gun that emits rapid bolts of electricity that damage whatever they hit. Because the bolts leap from target to target throughout their range, they can take out several targets at a time.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. The more power stored, the longer time you can fire.
As the accumulated energy decreases, accuracy declines.

An unmanned multicopter equipped with a high-spec bomb. Improved onboard equipment enables it to target and then strike the enemy within a short amount of time.

The user indicates the target using a laser guidance system.
Once the target has been set, the entire aircraft swoops down upon it and detonates.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.
Naturally, this results in a longer reload time.

The final specs of the Flame Geyser, a special flame-discharging gun. This device can be easily directed at any target and will completely engulf it on contact, generating a giant column of fire where it previously stood. Because the device ejects in the opposite direction of the surface, it is possible to choose the surface and thus control the direction. For example, if fired towards the ground, the column of fire will reach up into the sky. If fired at a wall, a horizontal pillar of flame will be ejected (perpendicular to the surface of the wall). For this reason, it has many uses such as blocking the progress of an enemy.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A device which launches a sticky bomb that attaches to whatever surface it strikes.

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode.
A protective suit that resist impacts. Able to destroy small obstacles during dash.

The final model of the G&M semi-auto rifle.
The special AP bullets have enough power to penetrate objects and deal damage to multiple enemies they hit. 
The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.
It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
XE Requiem Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:12 Damage:37500.0 Blast Range:Radius 30.0m)</font>
Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:900 Damage:500.0 Range:480.0m)</font>

Grenade Discharger (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:48 Damage:6000.0 (8 burst) Range:120.0m)</font>

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner (Left):</font> Melt Streamer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:3000 Damage:200.0 Range:600.0m)</font>
Grenade Discharger (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:48 Damage:6000.0 (8 burst) Range:120.0m)</font>

3 people.
A modified version of the giant fighting vehicle, Titan, equipped with two melt streamers on top of its main cannon. It fires powerful melt streamers at high speed, even over a great distance.
Its main gun is the XE Requiem Cannon, an enhanced version of the Requiem Cannon with more destructive power and higher projectile speed.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

The final Acid Gun model. 
Its destructive power has been dramatically improved using a more powerful type of acid newly developed.

A new Slugger-type assault rifle. Equipped with an innovative loading system to reduce reload time. Various other specs have also been improved.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A new rocket launcher that fires small rockets.  Each rocket has weaker firepower due to its small size, but its extremely high rapid fire makes it possible to easily destroy a target once you continuously fire on it.
The small rockets have been light weighted to the limit for an improved rapid fire performance and thus lead to a lower accuracy.

Improvements since the prototype have resulted in a slight increase in accuracy.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

An improved weapon developed from the M4 Raven. This ultimate Raven assault rifle is a re-design based on the M4 model.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A high-caliber sniper rifle with a focus on firepower. It largely surpasses the current sniper rifles. However, due to the large bullets and its complex loading mechanism, it's unable to fire consecutively.

It's only a prototype without the expected designed performance.

A scope and a laser sight are equipped.

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

An enhanced version of the ZER-Gun with emphasis on rapid-fire.
The gun's quick turning ability makes it able to accurately target even fast-moving enemies.

Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

An enhanced Vibro Hammer F3. A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted to objects, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked.
Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Release to unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output. The second stage attack is a long-range high voltage attack. When the output has increased to maximum, a maximum voltage attack will be unleashed after stepping forward. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The Vibro Drive is not suitable for rapid attacks. Equipping two hammers at the same time is recommended.

The strongest and final Power Blade model. It delivers eight slashes in a single swing.

A blade for close combat. It produces a jet of light to slash the enemy.
Its range is very short, forcing the user to attack point-blank. However, it delivers massively destructive blows.

Unlike the Force Blade, it can be swung without too much effort. Therefore, it can be used effectively even when wielded single-handedly.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A booster enhancer.
Enables 4 consecutive boost jumps.
(Must be used with a Jump Booster)

A semi-auto shotgun.
It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A rapid-fire version of the Mirage brainwave-guided weapon. 
It rapidly fires fast-moving spears of energy that will chase down the enemy. 
When a target is captured within its sight (represented by a red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack of a heavy bomber, which is equipped with cluster bombs, on the target area. The cluster bombs will be scattered, causing damage over a wide area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this Limpet Gun for a precise, long-range launch of sticky bombs with a wider range and improved rate of fire.

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode. It is mounted with a laser sight to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

To prevent allies from being attacked, it is equipped with a high performance safety device. You don't have to worry about allies getting hit or self exploding.

An enhanced DNG long-range throwing grenade. It has amazing destructive power and an excellent blast range.

Due to its large size and weight, throwing it requires the use of the entire body. Although it takes some time from the start of the throwing motion until it is actually released, it is possible to change direction during the throw.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

Combat Burner <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:3000 Damage:3.88 Range:84.0m)</font>

Canister Shot (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:20 Damage:[PT]38.75×10 Blast Range:----)</font>
Canister Shot (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:20 Damage:[PT]38.75×10 Blast Range:----)</font>

1 person.
A powered exoskeleton that has been customized for close combat. Its mobility has been improved with close combat in mind. In particular, its legs have been improved, increasing its jump power. It has also made speed jumps possible. It has a Combat Burner and a machine gun on its arms, granting it amazing ability to exterminate at close-range. It is also equipped with huge Canister Shots on both shoulders. Because of the dispersal nature of its weapon, it can attack a wide area, and it can also penetrate objects to defeat several enemies. Its range is short because it is a dispersal weapon, so it is only really best at close-range.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A high caliber anti-material sniper rifle with long range and high accuracy, making it possible to snipe enemies from afar, and it's powerful enough to penetrate armored vehicles. There's virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.
It's a bolt action firearm so manual loading is required after each shooting.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

Formation of 2 unmanned bombers. Flies in a V-shaped formation to strike a wider area.
Due to the weight of the bombs, its flight speed is slower than that of other portable UAVs, and the return time is longer.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, bomb from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
140mm High Pressure Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:30 Damage:11200.0 Blast Range:Radius 18.0m)</font>

1 person.
Redesigned version of the EDF's most advanced combat vehicle with improved driving performance and increased shell carrying capacity.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A new model of gun that fires a converged particle beam. The high-density converged laser beam can pierce through objects and inflict damage on everything within the line of fire.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will shoot off beams continuously.
This weapon is extremely powerful when it's fully charged, but when the stored power decreases, the shooting range shortens accordingly, and so does its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

A napalm discharge device for military use. Napalm sets everything it touches ablaze. The intense flames damage not only its target, but the surrounding area as well. Napalm can be sent at different trajectories so it is possible to hit enemies hiding behind obstacles. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A new model of the Slaughter.
Since the E20 LS model made its bullets concentrated in a smaller area, its hit rate has decreased. As a result, the Slaughter E21 LS is developed with the expectation to be both wide-ranged and powerful. Not only its scattering range and attack power are improved, its discharge capacity also increases, making it possible to shoot in a distance and strike massive enemies. 
Equipped with a laser sight, you can fight while checking the range of fire.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A rapid-fire version of the Thunder Crossbow. It takes a shorter time to accumulate energy, and its rapid-fire capability is increased.
Its rate of fire is improved, but the significantly increased energy cost cannot be overlooked.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The more power accumulated, the more likely the lightening concentrates on the aiming direction; whereas the energy accumulation decreases, the lightening diffuses. In that case, it's difficult to hit the target, but you can attack in a wider range.

Railgun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:[PT]1080.0 Range:2025.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Right):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:10.8 Range:210.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Left):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:10.8 Range:210.0m)</font>

3 people.
An enhanced model of the Epsilon Self-Propelled Railgun. The destructive power of the electromagnetic launcher is improved and its armor fortified. The maximum speed of the engine is also slightly increased with adjustment.

A vehicle equipped with a state-of-the-art electromagnetic launcher (Railgun) with accelerated shells and rapid fire support. The shells can penetrate objects and inflict damage on many enemies. The Railgun is equipped with a laser sight to ensure pinpoint accuracy, and the trajectory can be confirmed with the red line before firing. This is a very powerful weapon, but it lacks the blast area of the Howitzer, making it somewhat difficult to use in combat against monsters. To make up for this shortcoming, it's been fitted with a right and left Machine Gun on the rotating turret, which can be manned from either of the gunner seats. However, gunners should be aware that the seats face whatever their respective turrets are aiming at.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A large-caliber shotgun that can fire countless rounds over a wide area, making it possible to hit several enemies at once. It also has high firepower, and can deal unrivaled damage when all shots hit. However, because it covers a wide area, its range is much shorter. 

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

An enhanced output model of the Anti-Aircraft Bunker. When installed, it creates a wall of energy that extends upwards and sideways. Therefore, it can be used to defend against aerial and ground attacks. The wall senses objects that collide with it. The wall not only acts as a shield, but also permits the users to fire from behind it safely.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

A new model of the Slaughter. With some changes of the basic structure, its discharge capacity has increased, releasing greater firepower.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

An upgraded version of the high-caliber anti-material sniper rifle KFF50 with a better accuracy. Equipped with a scope and a laser sight.

It's with long range and high accuracy, making it possible to snipe enemies from afar, and it's powerful enough to penetrate armored vehicles. There's virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.
It's a bolt action firearm so manual loading is required after each shooting.

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

A bomb designed for special tasks. Although it can be set in place, it is far more powerful than a hand grenade. The blast area is wide, and the bomb must be detonated from a sufficient distance after it is placed.
Because of its destructive power, the user must be very careful. Being caught in the explosion means certain death.

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. After installation, Hold the Use Backpack Tool button to detonate.

A high-output plasma arc cannon that mounts on the shoulder and can discharge a continuous plasma arc to decimate the enemy. Its destructive power is immense, but its output may be a little overzealous: after activation, it will continue firing until it runs out of power. Also, Fencers that don't carry Plasma Generators will not be able to reload on the battlefield.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

Use this communication system to request support from heavy bombers equipped with enhanced napalm bombs.
Two heavy bombers will proceed to drop multiple napalm payloads upon the designated area.
The enhanced version of napalm bombs burn faster, but with increased destructive power.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

A semi-auto shotgun with a higher ammo capacity compared with the SGN-7. Since the magazine is bigger, the reload time becomes longer.

It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Combat Burner <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:3000 Damage:3.0 Range:84.0m)</font>
Combat Burner <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:3000 Damage:3.0 Range:84.0m)</font>
Grenade Pod (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:40 Damage:72.0 (8 burst) Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>
Grenade Pod (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:40 Damage:72.0 (8 burst) Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>

1 person.

A metal-coated version of the Nix enhanced exoskeleton. Only a very small number were ever produced. It is coated with a special paint that reflects radar waves, but the actual effect has not been proven.

This boardable enhanced exoskeleton was designed to counter terrorism in urban warfare. The full-body armor can block blasts, while offering mobility to carry out various tasks. Hold the Jump button to activate jet thrusters in the back to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.
