An upgraded Grant Rocket Launcher. The rockets are improved with a greater firepower, a wider explosive area and a higher rate of fire.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

Complete Z-type autonomous combat aircraft equipped with a high-power laser cannon. 
It has powerful offensive capabilities, but its high energy consumption results in a short operating time.
Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

An upgraded version of the E22 with a wider firing range. The redesigned loading mechanism also shortens the reload time.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A complete small multicopter equipped with mortars.
Flies around the user. When the target is indicated by a hand-thrown beacon, it moves into position and fires a series of shots at the beacon's impact point.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

A chemical explosive.
Throwable capsule containing several chemical substances. When the capsule hits a target, the chemicals inside it mix to produce a corrosive gas. While the gas is airborne, it slowly eats away nearby objects.

Because it destroys biomatter as well as machines, it has been classified as a highly dangerous weapon, banned from use by international treaty. However, as circumstances worsened, its use was permitted under special exemption only during wartime.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

Formation of 3 unmanned attack aircraft equipped with machine guns.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, machine gun fire rains down from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
Can distiguish friend from foe, posing no danger to the user and his/her allies.
A new model of the Plasma Core. It boasts far better performance than the V3, and it greatly increases the Wing Diver's ability.

A large-caliber shotgun that can fire over a wide area. This refurbishment of the D35 Breacher makes it possible to fire more shots than before.
It has a short range, but can fire an incredible number of bullets simultaneously, resulting in overwhelming damage when all rounds hit at short distance.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

An enhanced weapon developed from the SGN semi-auto shotguns. It uses a larger magazine that can contain more bullets, but it takes longer to reload due to the complex loading mechanism.
It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A device that enhances the thruster and the booster simultaneously.
Enables 4 consecutive thrust-dashes.
Enables 4 consecutive boost jumps.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster or a Jump Booster)

A pump-action style shotgun developed by EDF. Reload time has been considerably shortened by improving the magazine. 
The dispersal area has been increased for better accuracy.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

An upgraded version of the Slaughter E23 with overall performances improved.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

This brainwave-guided weapon fires spears of energy that obey the user's thoughts. The spears are not high-speed, but their homing performance is excellent, and they will chase any target down.
When a target is captured within its sight (represented by a red square), it will be automatically locked on. At this time, you may press the attack button to discharge.

The weapon is operated by linking to the brainwave-guided kit 'Psionic Link' that is fitted in the Wing Diver's helmet. As this 'brainwave-guided' requires a certain trait, only certain people are capable of wielding this weapon.

Improved version of the Dunkel N236 full-auto sniper rifle with maximum rapid-firing performance. Also has an expanded magazine that gives it a much greater bullet capacity.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots. 
A scope and a laser sight are attached.

A large shield with excellent damage reduction capabilities and high durability, but a hefty weight that makes it a bit unwieldy.

Holding the attack button will keep raising the shield and reduce Damage coming from the front. (The defense angle differs based on shields. Please refer to %dq%Defense Angle.%dq%)
Some weapons allow you to attack with the shield raised. While it is not possible to pair the shield with a hammer or blade that requires full body usage, it is possible to attack with the Blasthole Spear and other weapons that can be fired with one hand when the shield is raised. 
The heat will increase as it continues to absorb attacks. When it reaches the limit, it won't be usable again until it has cooled down. 

There is a device called Deflector installed inside the shield.  It forms a magnetic field which reverses physical motion by 180 degrees. The Deflector is activated with the use button. It can repel any attack with the right timing.

A special hammer infused with multiple 'Vibro Drive' generators. By reducing contact surfaces, it's possible for the vibrations to diffuse in multiple directions instead of the usual two. With the increased output, enemies over a wider range can be attacked. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Release to unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack from the Combat Bomber Kamuy.
The combat system has been upgraded with increased ammo capacity and precision-guided bombing.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

A guided rocket launcher that fires off small rockets equipped with semi-active Laser Guide Kit. The sensor will detect the laser light from the launcher and change the route.

Moving the sight can control the landing location after firing.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A long-range sentry gun (automatic enemy tracking gun).
The high-performance sensor enables the gun to target enemies at greater distances. The gun's range and power have also been enhanced.

Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

An upgraded version of the Suppress Gun MH. It has a 2-round ammo capacity and is much easier to use.

This weapon fires multiple special bullets at once, which will scatter widely, even an Air Raider with poor shooting skills can capture the target. These special bullets can penetrate object and neutralize the enemy. 
However, because it scatters in ultrahigh speed, its range is very short. Also, since its uses is limited, it's better to equip it as a sub weapon instead of a main weapon.

Air Raiders may not be able to perform well in an urban scuffle or a close-range combat. Carrying this shotgun could possibly increase their survival rate.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Right):</font> Dauntless Heavy Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:80 Damage:[PT]360.0 Range:720.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Left):</font> Dauntless Heavy Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:80 Damage:[PT]360.0 Range:720.0m)</font>

3 people.
A large attack helicopter equipped with high-caliber autocannons--basically a flying fortress. Its armaments include Dauntless Heavy Guns on the left and right, which fire armor-piercing ammunition that can one-shot multiple foes. There are gunner seats located on the left and right as well, to operate this weaponry. The one disadvantage is that additional gunners are absolutely required to operate these weapons--a pilot alone will have no ability to use them.
Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle, but anyone can ride in the gunner seats.

In order to request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A Mag Blaster equipped with a large tank. Because a large tank can store more energy, the weapon can fire for a long time. However, it also takes more time and requires more energy to fill up a large tank.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. 
However, its output decreases as the power stored in its energy core depletes. When the power left in its energy core is at half of its maximum amount, its greatest level of destruction falls to about 25 percent of the maximum amount. For that reason, as long as the situation allows it, you should reload to preserve its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

The derivative of the SGN that is redesigned to be a full-auto shotgun equipped with a laser sight. 
Like SGN-K9, it uses a larger magazine. Since this weapon has full-fire and its ammo capacity has been increased, it's a very powerful weapon.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

An upgraded sticky grenade launcher. It fires one sticky grenade at a time, but each one can cause immense destruction. These grenades stick to whatever they hit and detonate after 4 seconds.

Equipped with a scope.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Vulture (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:150 Damage:2200.0 (5 burst) Range:1200.0m)</font>
Vulture (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:150 Damage:2200.0 (5 burst) Range:1200.0m)</font>
Twin Napalm Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:60 Damage:1650.0 (6 burst))</font>

1 person.
A enhanced model of the N9 Eros equipped with an enhanced version of the %dq%Vulture%dq% laser cannon. The destructive power of this high-output laser has been increased to its maximum level, but in case that's not enough, this vehicle also comes equipped with twin napalm guns as secondary weapons. Multiple napalm bombs can be fired at the same time, which can burn an entire combat site on impact. With takeoff performance and mobility both top-notch as well, this is easily the best attack helicopter around.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An improved version of the Harmonic Shield. Effect duration has been doubled by reducing the defense area.
Blocks enemy attacks but allows attacks from allies to pass through.

Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

An improved version of the Bolt Shooter. It has been improved in all aspects.
It fires super high-voltage bolts of lightning from a long distance accurately, making it possible to snipe distant targets.

It is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the weapon to be fired upon flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

A pump-action style shotgun developed by EDF that boasts an improved rate of fire after upgrading the loading mechanism. Its magazine is also modified to increase ammo capacity.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A thruster enhancer.
Enables 6 consecutive thrust-dashes.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster)

An upgraded version of the full-auto shotgun SGN-10A with various performances improved. The magazine is much bigger and this increases the magazine capacity. 
It's equipped with a laser sight.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

The ultimate model of the Gleipnir. Discharges a ball of energy. The ball stays in the air and continuously releases missiles that home in on nearby enemies.
It requires mastery of the brainwave-guided kit Psionic Link, so only the elite members from Wing Divers are capable of using it.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

An upgraded version of the Slaughter E23DA with various performances improved and a laser sight attached. It's a powerful but stable shotgun.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A device that generates a sphere of energy. The sphere radiates light energy in one direction while airborne.
Its lethal light ray can act as a trap when placed in the enemy's path.

If used effectively, it can stop a large number of enemies at once, increasing Wing Divers' rate of survival.

Ally soldiers' equipment is covered with a special reflective coating, preventing them from taking damage.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

The ultimate Monsoon. This terrifying version pushes firepower to the limit. 

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

The ultimate Closed Laser upgrade. It has the longest range of any Closed Laser, and the projection time to match.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will continuously irradiate the laser until the stored energy runs out.
The projection time increases with the amount of energy accumulation. The more the accumulation is, the higher the energy efficiency can be and the longer time for the weapon to fire.

Formation of 4 unmanned attack aircraft that carry a large amount of ammunition for extended periods of attack.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, machine gun fire rains down from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
Can distiguish friend from foe, posing no danger to the user and his/her allies.

A thruster enhancer.
Enables 8 consecutive thrust-dashes.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster)

A large-caliber shotgun that can fire over a wide area. This refurbishment of the D79 Breacher pushes the number of shots to the limit.
It has a short range, but can fire an incredible number of bullets simultaneously, resulting in overwhelming damage when all rounds hit at short distance.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

The final SGN semi-auto shotgun. Although semi-auto, destructive power and rate of fire have been pushed to the limit in this ultimate model.
It uses a larger magazine that can contain more bullets, but it takes longer to reload due to the complex loading mechanism.

It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A perfect version of the FZ-Gun. After installation, it detects enemies using cameras and sensors and fires automatically.

No safety mechanism is installed, as priority was given to increasing the power output.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

A new-model sniper rifle that fires three-round bursts to strike enemies at long range. Pull the trigger (press the attack button) to fire three shots consecutively. It's a highly effective weapon that can easily target fast-moving enemies.

This rifle is with long range and high accuracy, making it possible to snipe enemies from afar. There's virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

A prototype of a super high-output long-range laser gun that fires off all of its accumulated energy at once to instantly destroy the target in the distance.
Firing off a huge amount of energy at once results in errors in the laser projection angle, and the lower-than-expected output.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.

The ultimate Slaughter shotgun. Various performances have been improved to the limits and it's equipped with a laser sight.

Although developed as the last trump card, there are only a limited supplies because it has been difficult to manufacture.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

An anti-aircraft Diffuser model. Designed to be fired upward, and is thus especially effective against flying enemies. Discharges a ball of energy which stays in the air and fires off arrows of light in the vicinity continuously. When discharged (the speed will have an impact on the direction) it is possible to control the height and trajectory.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A long-range laser gun. It has a long range, making it possible to snipe distant enemies. Its firepower is lower, but can destroy a target by continuously firing on it.

Compared to the early type, its firepower is increased, and it can fire continuously for a longer period of time.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will continuously irradiate the laser until the stored energy runs out.
The projection time increases with the amount of energy accumulation. The more the accumulation is, the higher the energy efficiency can be and the longer time for the weapon to fire.

The final model of Grant Rocket Launcher. Issues of the MA50 are solved, enhancing the acceleration of the rockets, and all performances are improved to the limit.

It's literally the most powerful rocket launchers, but hard to mass-produce. Only the selected elites are qualified to use them.

It includes a scope attachment for a long-distance attack.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

An extra large Plasma Core based on the Big Core. It has been improved on various aspects by increasing the size of the core unit. In particular, the maximum energy it can accumulate, and the power supply speed to weapons are several times of the previous models.
However, its flying ability is greatly reduced as a trade-off of the increased weight of the unit.

A special gun that sprays strong acid that can dissolve metal in an instant. 

The original plan was to have the weapon spray acid over a wide area, but this is just a prototype and has only a narrow spray area.

A full-auto sniper rifle. Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
It's designed with self-loading functionality, the bullets are smaller and thus weaker; however, its fast shot speed can hit enemies at long range.

Equipped with a scope and a laser sight.

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

A new type of long-range laser gun. Its laser penetrates objects and damages everything in the line of fire.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will continuously irradiate the laser until the stored energy runs out.
The projection time increases with the amount of energy accumulation. The more the accumulation is, the higher the energy efficiency can be and the longer time for the weapon to fire.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver Smooth-Bore Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:360 Damage:[PT]72.0 Range:600.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Compartment 1:</font> None
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Compartment 2:</font> None
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Compartment 3:</font> None

4 people.
An enhanced model of the Grape. The Howitzer has been replaced with a Smooth-Bore Gun.  It can fire armor-piercing ammunition and one shot can hit many enemies. The driving force has been adjusted and it has been equipped with a custom engine that permits performance at high speeds. Its acceleration is slow and its climbing ability is reduced. However, its maximum speed is high. Because it can hit high speeds, it is suitable for quick troop transport. 

An armored vehicle. Aside from the pilot, there are rear compartments for up to three troops. The main role of this vehicle is to transport soldiers to the battlefield. 
Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle, but anyone can ride in the rear compartments.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A long-barrel sniper rifle with high accuracy and a very long range that can hit enemies in distance.
It's equipped with an exclusive high-performance scope to take the best advantage of its excellent range and thus it's called the sniper rifle with an eagle eye.
This semi-auto weapon can fire one shot by pulling the trigger (pressing the attack button).

It's also attached with a laser sight. There's virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.

Creates plasma balls to be thrown by hand.
The Plasma Balls fly in a gentle parabola and explode on impact, causing damage over a wide area.
It's equipped with an independent energy generator, so it doesn't deplete the energy of the aerial unit. Reloading is also possible during an emergency charge.
Although not particularly devastating, it can be an excellent sub-weapon when equipping a high consumption weapon.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Bike:</font> Driver
Light Machine Gun (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1200 Damage:157.5 Range:160.0m)</font>
Light Machine Gun (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1200 Damage:157.5 Range:160.0m)</font>

The military motorcycle Freed equipped with a turbo engine. Running performance is highly improved while its acceleration and maximum speed are also at supreme level. Excellent grip, making it possible to proceed steadily even on a bumpy road. 

Able to request underground.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack.
Four heavy bombers will proceed to launch an airstrike on the designated area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

A piece of equipment that launches a special capsule full of nanomachines. On impact, the capsule bursts and spreads the nanomachines across a large area. It boasts much better firing distance and wider spreading range than previous Reversers. Also effective on the user. (The nanomachines are safe to transport and have not been deactivated, which means they're effective on the user as well.)

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.)

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Autocannon (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1800 Damage:[PT]200.0 Range:160.0m)</font>
Autocannon (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1800 Damage:[PT]200.0 Range:160.0m)</font>
Missiles <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:20 Damage:2400.0 Blast Range:Radius 12.0m)</font>

1 person.
Heavily armed version of EDF's state-of-the-art armed helicopter, the Heron.

In addition to two autocannons, it also carries missiles.
The missiles automatically lock onto enemies within its sight (red square).

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A new-model sniper rifle that can fire three-round bursts to strike enemies at long range. Pull the trigger (press the attack button) to fire three shots consecutively. It's a highly effective weapon that can easily target fast-moving enemies.

This rifle is with long range and high accuracy, making it possible to snipe enemies from afar. There's virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

A hammer that is installed with a high output ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. It has tremendous destructive power, but control is difficult and attacks while moving are not possible. Its short range may also pose difficulties. An improvement on the base Vibro Roller, offering greater roller performance. Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the output of the roller. Immediately after it has been swung down, a charge attack will be unleashed by the roller. 
The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Release to unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output.  The third stage is particularly terrifying, but requires tremendous output to execute.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack.
Three heavy bombers will proceed to launch an airstrike on the designated area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

An enhanced grenade; not as destructive as the J-type, but more stable.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A new, fully-developed, battle-ready sniper rifle. Due to its complex loading mechanism, it's unable to fire consecutively, but it's extremely powerful.

A scope and a laser sight are attached. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use the equipped scope.

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%
A flamethrower that has been strengthened for combat.

A multi-barreled grenade launcher for support fire. It fires several small grenades simultaneously. By aiming this weapon into the air, you can carpet bomb the enemy with grenades. Its speed has been sacrificed, however, to increase its accuracy and efficacy.

A new model KFF high-caliber anti-material sniper rifle. This weapon boasts improved overall performance and its shot speed is twice as fast as the 50.

This rifle is with long range and high accuracy, making it possible to snipe enemies from afar. There's virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.

A scope and a laser sight are attached. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use the equipped scope.

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

A special sniper rifle that fires eight shots at once, each with a trajectory slightly different from others that will scatter and hit the targets around.

A scope and a laser sight are attached. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use the equipped scope. 

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

A full-auto sniper rifle. Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
It's with excellent rapid fire performance, but that also reduces its accuracy.

A scope and a laser sight are attached. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use the equipped scope. 

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

An enhanced model of the Closed Laser. It has the longest range of any Closed Laser, and the projection time to match. It's a powerful weapon, but costs a great deal of energy.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will continuously irradiate the laser until the stored energy runs out.
The projection time increases with the amount of energy accumulation. The more the accumulation is, the higher the energy efficiency can be and the longer time for the weapon to fire.

A new model of the Eagle long-barrel sniper rifle that boasts an improved rate of fire after upgrading the loading mechanism. 

It's with high accuracy and a very long range that can hit enemies in distance.
To take the best advantage of its excellent range, this weapon is equipped with an exclusive high-performance scope and thus it's called the sniper rifle with an eagle eye.
This semi-auto weapon can fire one shot by pulling the trigger (pressing the attack button).

There's virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
V2 Anti-Aircraft Gun (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1500 Damage:7.5 Range:360.0m)</font>
V2 Anti-Aircraft Gun (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1500 Damage:7.5 Range:360.0m)</font>

Improved version of the KG6 Kepler Self-Propelled Anti-Aircraft Gun, equipped with a powerful V2 Anti-Aircraft Gun.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A new model KFF high-caliber anti-material sniper rifle. It's a rush project after the 51LS, so it's structurally defected. Although the firepower has been improved, it takes time to reload and the accuracy drops slightly.

There's virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.

A scope and a laser sight is attached. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use the equipped scope.

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

A Ptarmigan semi-auto sniper rifle. Pull the trigger (press the attack button) to fire one shot.

Different from a bolt action firearm, there's no need for manual loading after each shot, so a shooter can be more focused on the targets and perform better with greater accuracy.

A scope and a laser sight are attached. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use the equipped scope. 

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
V3 Anti-Aircraft Gun (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1500 Damage:75.0 Range:320.0m)</font>
V3 Anti-Aircraft Gun (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1500 Damage:75.0 Range:320.0m)</font>

Improved version of the KG6 Kepler Self-Propelled Anti-Aircraft Gun, equipped with a powerful V3 Anti-Aircraft Gun.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An upgraded version of the KFF60 LS with all issues solved. It's an excellent firearm.

There's virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.

A scope and a laser sight are attached. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use the equipped scope. 

Laser sight is a device sending out linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed.
(Laser beam is only light without attack power.)
The beam can also used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

A new sniper rifle that fires special needle-shaped bullets with the power to penetrate objects.
Compared with the high-caliber Fang, these needle-like bullets are smaller and weaker, but with high rapid fire. It's a fairly effective weapon if one can good make use of it.

A scope and a laser sight are attached.

A special type of thermite round. It is made up of several small projectiles that, when thrown, separate and fly off in different directions.
Hand-thrown incendiary device. Ignites upon impact, discharging tremendous heat.
Its flames cannot be extinguished with water, meaning it can be used underwater or underground because it does not require oxygen for combustion.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

A rocket launcher firing off up to twelve successive rockets which scatter vertically.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

Activate the Spritefall's Super Destroy mode.
All Limiters have been removed, allowing it to fire consecutively at maximum power.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Full-auto sniper rifle. Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots. 
Both the accuracy and range are improved, but it takes longer to reload.

A scope and a laser sight are attached.

Officially known as the Zero Range Plasma Arc Gun, this is a super weapon specifically developed for the Wing Divers. Best for close-range combat with only 30-meter range, however it's amazingly destructive, and can discharge countless plasma arc blades to destroy almost everything. Since you have to use it close to the target, it's highly risky, but its overwhelming power in close range is certain.

Compared to the early type, it can fire continuously for a longer time, and is also easier to handle, but it also requires more energy when reloading.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire plasma arc blades.

A new sniper rifle that fires multiple special small needle-shaped bullets simultaneously with the power to penetrate objects. The bullets are shot in a side-ways direction, delivering damage to enemies over a wide area.

It's a fairly effective weapon if one can good make use of its high rapid fire.

A scope and a laser sight are attached.

Blow-up dolls created by the EDF Public Relations Department for the purpose of recruiting soldiers, converted into combat decoys.
They were made to resemble idols contracted by the Public Relations Department to recruit young people at events.

The doll is equipped with a function that allows it to be moved by fine-tuning the air pressure in various parts. It also has a small built-in speaker and can talk.
Although these functions are excessive for a decoy, it can be difficult for the enemy to tell that it's not a real soldier, making it an effective decoy against monsters.

The content of its speech remains unchanged from its time as a recruitment tool.
Its song repertoire includes the official EDF theme used in the recruitment commercials. A different version is sung by the soldiers.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button(briefly) to install. Press and hold to remove the installed device and prepare for re-use (reload).

A Ptarmigan semi-auto sniper rifle. Pull the trigger (press the attack button) to fire one shot.

Different from a bolt action firearm, there's no need for manual loading after each shot, so a shooter can be more focused on the targets and perform better with greater accuracy.

A scope and a laser sight are attached.

A massive missile. It has unbelievable destructive power, but lock-on takes a long time. The missile will ride for a few seconds, and then descend on the target. Therefore it is possible to attack a target on the other side of an obstacle. Equipped with a scope to confirm point of impact.

A complete spec Vibro Hammer. Its performance surpasses that of the Finest Hammer.
A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is formed in the area of the massive vibration which reduces the damage taken when attacked. 
Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output, and when it's reached its max, release to unleash a powerful slashing maximum voltage attack.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A special sniper rifle that fires twelve shots at once, each with a trajectory slightly different from others that will scatter and hit the targets around.

A scope and a laser sight are attached. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use the equipped scope.

A device that discharges extreme performance nanomachines. The effective area is greatly increased. 
It automatically discharges nanomachines to living targets and weapons within the effective range. The nanomachines will solidify on a target, forming an invisible wall around the target. Temporarily repairs damaged armor and can be used to restore vehicle durability and Armor.

This device does not distinguish between friend and foe. It is very large and it cannot be reloaded.

Installed by (briefly) pressing the Use Backpack Tool button.
(If you hold down the button, it will not install.)

A new-model sniper rifle developed to strike enemies at long range. Pull the trigger (press the attack button) to fire four shots consecutively. It's a highly effective weapon that can easily target fast-moving enemies.

There's virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

An enforced Penetrator that fires multiple special small needle-shaped bullets simultaneously with the power to penetrate objects. The bullets are shot in a side-ways direction, delivering damage to enemies over a wide area.

A scope and a laser sight are attached.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
140mm Long-Range Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:32 Damage:12800.0 Blast Range:Radius 15.0m)</font>

1 person.
Reinforced version of the Blacker E10. Not only is it about twice as heavily armored, but its speed has also been increased. In addition, it can now acquire more items.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A new Rapier equipped with a power amplification device called 'Casket.'

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy in the Casket. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will discharge the accumulated energy and fire off the Plasma Gun continuously in a certain time span.
The output is amplified according to the amount of stored energy and so is destructive power. The more energy accumulated, the greater flying distance, shot number and firepower. Also, the diffusion range converges more toward the front.
Although the Plasma Gun is very extremely effective , its power decreases greatly with distance, so you have to be as close as possible to the enemy, make it a high-risky weapon to use.
An assist system for use in guided weapons such as missiles. Able to lock on a single enemy multiple times.

An extra high-performance six-barreled missile launcher. 
Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target is captured with the sight (within the lock in range), a positive lock will be established, up to the pre-established maximum of six. Release the attack button to unleash missiles on the locked-on target or targets. The missiles will track the targets and explode on contact.

An enhanced model of the Closed Laser MX. Its destructive power and range have been improved, but at the cost of a slightly reduced projection time.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will continuously irradiate the laser until the stored energy runs out.
The projection time increases with the amount of energy accumulation. The more the accumulation is, the higher the energy efficiency can be and the longer time for the weapon to fire.

The ultimate Lysander. It's the most powerful sniper rifle that possesses awesome destructive power.

Due to an alien attack to the factory, few of the model were successfully manufactured and they have been lost.

Equipped with a scope and a laser sight.

A modified version of the T44 Mouse, a small hand grenade.
Comprised of three bombs. When thrown, the three bombs separate and land in different places.
Although it can attack a wide area, it is timed to avoid the risk of misfiring.

Since it is smaller than the MG model, a larger number can be carried at once, which can be thrown in quick succession.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade, which will then explode in a few seconds.
There is a definite pause between the throw and the explosion, so it is difficult to blow oneself up. It is also possible to bounce grenades off the walls of a building and/or throw them inside.

It discharges high-density plasma balls. The plasma balls discharged are very dense and heavy, so their trajectory changes quickly. Just as firing a mortar, you have to aim high when you fire this weapon.
Be careful not to injure yourself by aiming too low.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
When the accumulated power reaches the maximum amount, this weapon can attack with its full power, and its effective area will be the widest.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Treatment Room 1:</font> None (Treatment) Recovery (Total):40000.0 Recovery:7.0
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Treatment Room 2:</font> None (Treatment)
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Treatment Room 3:</font> None (Treatment)

4 people.
The final battle spec of the Caravan Armored Vehicle, equipped with a new engine for improved movement speed and mobility alike. This has made it a hard target to hit on the battlefield, allowing skilled pilots to quickly get to the injured without taking any damage at all. It can also carry much more medicine--it really is the ultimate support vehicle.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A piece of personal artillery that fires rockets.
Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A quick-fire model of the Bound Gun. It fires high speed compressed plasma bullets which rebound off walls and continue to fly till they reach the range limit.
Although it's not deadly destructive, both of its rate of fire and range are excellent.

The power isn't reduced by air resistance, making it possible to cause consistent damage to objects at long distances.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Perfect spec DNG long-range throwing grenade.

Due to its large size and weight, throwing it requires the use of the entire body. Although it takes some time from the start of the throwing motion until it is actually released, it is possible to change direction during the throw. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the energy supply to weapons. Supplies energy to weapons faster.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Railgun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:[PT]600.0 Range:2025.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Right):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:6.0 Range:210.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Left):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:6.0 Range:210.0m)</font>

3 people.
A vehicle equipped with a state-of-the-art electromagnetic launcher (Railgun) with accelerated shells and rapid fire support. The shells can penetrate objects and inflict damage on many enemies. The Railgun is equipped with a laser sight to ensure pinpoint accuracy, and the trajectory can be confirmed with the red line before firing. This is a very powerful weapon, but it lacks the blast area of the Howitzer, making it somewhat difficult to use in combat against monsters. To make up for this shortcoming, it's been fitted with a right and left Machine Gun on the rotating turret, which can be manned from either of the gunner seats. However, gunners should be aware that the seats face whatever their respective turrets are aiming at. Since this vehicle needs to transport the electromagnetic railgun, its mobility and functionality alike are a bit lacking.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A new rocket launcher that fires small rockets.  Each rocket has weaker firepower due to its small size, but its extremely high rapid fire makes it possible to easily destroy a target once you continuously fire on it.
The small rockets have been light weighted to the limit for an improved rapid fire performance and thus lead to a lower accuracy.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)
A device that probes and collects surrounding items.

A special alloy shield with greatly improved durability. 

Holding the attack button will keep raising the shield and reduce Damage coming from the front. (The defense angle differs based on shields. Please refer to %dq%Defense Angle.%dq%)
Some weapons allow you to attack with the shield raised. While it is not possible to pair the shield with a hammer or blade that requires full body usage, it is possible to attack with the Blasthole Spear and other weapons that can be fired with one hand when the shield is raised. 
The heat will increase as it continues to absorb attacks. When it reaches the limit, it won't be usable again until it has cooled down. 

There is a device called Deflector installed inside the shield.  It forms a magnetic field which reverses physical motion by 180 degrees. The Deflector is activated with the use button. It can repel any attack with the right timing.

A guided rocket launcher that fires off rockets equipped with semi-active Laser Guide Kit. The sensor will detect the laser light from the launcher and change the route.

Moving the sight can control the landing location after firing.
It's equipped with a scope that can guide the rockets to far places. To use the attached scope, press the Zoom/Activate button.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A large rocket launcher with devastating destructive power that can cause serious damages to a wide area.

It includes a scope attachment for an outstanding long-distance accuracy.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

Improved Pulsar Spear with a shorter reloading time.

In order to shorten the reload time, the sphere's total energy was halved.
Therefore, its beam can only be emitted for a short period of time.

A device that produces an energy sphere that fires a particle beam.
The sphere emits a powerful beam while airborne, albeit for a short period of time.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

Boasts as the most powerful MLRA series missile launcher.
Greatly improved from MLRA-TW, this new model has greatly enhanced rate of fire and now it can lock on to multiple targets. 
This weapon fires small missiles with good guidance system at once. Shots are fired to the left and right before chasing the enemy.

A device that discharges a beacon to offer lock-on information. The beacon focuses on a hit point and transmits location information. The beacon confirms the lock-on target for ally tracking weapons, making it possible to lock-on. The lock-on time is reduced and the lock-on range is increased. Even though it does not have the performance of the Laser Guide Kit, it has a wide variety of uses as it is not necessary to maintain the beacon until the target has been hit. It is possible for multiple lock-ons. By using the beacon on the enemy, it is possible to launch multiple missiles at the enemy. Also, the target can be attacked many times as the beacon will not be lost even after the missile has hit. Enemies that have been hit by the beacon will not be able to escape. Pressing the reload button releases the beacon, then it reloads.

The Hornet Rocket Launcher. These Hornet rockets ignite the moment being fired and their acceleration is excellent, enabling to hit targets at a high speed.
Compared with the Grant, the destructive power of a single shot is weaker, but the rate of fire is higher.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A guided rocket launcher that fires off rockets equipped with semi-active Laser Guide Kit. The sensor will detect the laser light from the launcher and change the route.

Moving the sight can control the landing location after firing.
It's equipped with a scope that can guide the rockets to far places. To use the attached scope, press the Zoom/Activate button.

Its capacity and homing capability are both much improved compared to the M2.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A long-range weapon developed for use by Wing Divers. It fires super high-voltage bolts of lightning from a long distance accurately, making it possible to snipe distant targets. The trajectory blurring, which was a drawback of the initial model, has been improved.

It is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the weapon to be fired upon flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

Most weapon of the Wing Diver can only show their true value when close to the enemy and the Bolt Shooter was developed to reduce such combat risk. Since the Wing Diver can still attack in long distance when flying, their survival rate is significantly improved.

A rocket launcher firing off up to six successive rockets.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A special capsule containing nanomachines. When the capsule strikes a target, it explodes and disperses nanomachines over a wide area.
The nanomachines drift through the air in a cloud, affecting surrounding objects. The density of the cloud increases as one approaches the detonation site, as does its effect.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user. Heals allies, vehicles, and the user, but also enemies in the cloud.)

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the projectile.

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

High-power type of Harmonic Shield. Produces a larger shield that can be maintained for a longer period of time. Requires a large amount of energy, so it takes time to recharge for reuse.

Blocks enemy attacks but allows attacks from allies to pass through.

Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

An improved Gatling gun with exceptional rapid-fire performance. Can be aimed at multiple targets within a set range, making it ideal for attacking enemies over a wide area.
It does take a short time for the first shot to leave the gun, but its rate of fire and the power of subsequent shots are terrifying. Press and hold the attack button to start the barrel rotation. When rotation reaches a certain speed, it will start firing. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A guided rocket launcher that fires off rockets equipped with semi-active Laser Guide Kit. The sensor will detect the laser light from the launcher and change the route.

Moving the sight can control the landing location after firing.
It's equipped with a scope that can guide the rockets to far places. To use the attached scope, press the Zoom/Activate button.

Its homing capability is much improved compared to the primitive model.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

The ultimate Reverse Shooter, triggering a fierce blast to disperse nanomachines over a wider area. (The nanomachines are safe to transport and have not been deactivated, which means they're effective on the user as well.)

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.)

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

An enforced modification of the Grant Rocket Launcher with improved capacity.
It's equipped with a scope for use at great distances.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

The Hornet Rocket Launcher. These Hornet rockets ignite the moment being fired and their acceleration is excellent, enabling to hit targets at a high speed.
Compared with the Grant, the destructive power of a single blast is weaker, but the rate of fire is higher. 

Nevertheless, the speed of the rockets is faster than that of the E9 model.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A new type of short-range weapon that diffuses 6 rays of energy. The diffuse energy concentrates on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

The final spec form of the Blasthole Spear, further modifications to the MSXE model have resulted in an increase in power output.

A mechanical spear that stretches with a high speed to attack. Rotating the spear can penetrate several objects and afterwards high-pressure plasma will be released from the front end, destroying objects from within. The expansion and contraction of the spear are instantaneous, making it an extremely fast attack. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable and can penetrate multiple targets at a time. It is also possible to use it with a shield. This is the main weapon of a Fencer. It has short range, so it is necessary to get accustomed to it, but it's a valuable weapon. During a continuous attack, the second attack will be a rush. These attacks can be sustained over a long period.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A mechanical spear that incorporates an acceleration mechanism. As a result of this improvement, it can now better support continuous attacks, though it lacks the strength of a standard Blasthole Spear. Press and hold the attack button to launch multiple attacks. Each spear will rotate to penetrate the target, after which point high-pressure plasma will be released from its tip, destroying the object from within. The expansion and retraction of the spear are virtually instantaneous, allowing for extremely fast attacks. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable. It can penetrate multiple targets with its power. Pairs well with a shield.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A small hand grenade.
Since it is smaller than the MG model, a larger number can be carried at once, which can be thrown in quick succession.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

An upgraded and enhanced version of the Cascade 1. Both firepower and blast radius are greatly improved, and its accuracy has also been improved.

Each rocket has weaker firepower due to its small size, but its extremely high rapid fire makes it possible to easily destroy a target once you continuously fire on it.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A hammer that is installed with a high output ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. It has tremendous destructive power, but control is difficult and attacks while moving are not possible. Its short range may also pose difficulties.
The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked.
Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Release to unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output. The second and third stage attacks create enormous explosions on impact, which can be used to destroy enemies in a wide area.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A special alloy shield. 
Holding the attack button will keep raising the shield and reduce Damage coming from the front. (The defense angle differs based on shields. Please refer to %dq%Defense Angle.%dq%)
Some weapons allow you to attack with the shield raised. While it is not possible to pair the shield with a hammer or blade that requires full body usage, it is possible to attack with the Blasthole Spear and other weapons that can be fired with one hand when the shield is raised. 
The heat will increase as it continues to absorb attacks. When it reaches the limit, it won't be usable again until it has cooled down. 

There is a device called Deflector installed inside the shield.  It forms a magnetic field which reverses physical motion by 180 degrees. The Deflector is activated with the use button. It can repel any attack with the right timing.

A high-caliber mortar that's mounted on the shoulder. Its shells move in a parabolic arc and detonate on impact. Though the attack area is wide, the high caliber of this particular armament results in some truly intense recoil, often leaving the wielder frozen and vulnerable until the powered exoskeleton has fully absorbed the impact.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

Portable unmanned bomber. It inflicts damage over a wide area using air strikes.
Due to the weight of the bombs, its flight speed is slower than that of other portable UAVs, and the return time is longer.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, bomb from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

A smoke grenade used to request a Cannon attack from the Artillery Squad directed at the location of impact. 
The powerful armor-piercing ammunition can cause extraordinary damages to the hit objects.
Although these shells scatter widely, they don't detonate like howitzers, so the attack range is fairly small. You must throw the smoke grenade precisely to hit the enemy.

Press and hold the attack button to wind up your throw, then release to let the smoke grenade fly. Its expected trajectory will be indicated by a red line.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An enforced version of the Grant M40 with a modified loading mechanism and an improved rapid fire performance. The speed of rockets has become faster as well.
It's equipped with a scope for use at great distances.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

The Hornet Rocket Launcher. These Hornet rockets ignite the moment being fired and their acceleration is excellent, enabling to hit targets at a high speed.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A new model of the Grant Rocket Launcher. Its destructive power has been improved by enlarging the rockets. However, its acceleration is slow and thus hard to hit.

It's equipped with a scope for use at great distances.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

An ultra-high performance model of Grant Rocket Launcher. This firearm really is the ultimate rocket launcher designed and manufactured by the top talents.
The precisely structured weapon is with excellent accuracy and includes a scope attachment for a long-distance attack.

Although it's capable to turn the tide, there're only very few of the products and they have been lost in chaos.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
130mm Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:4400.0 Blast Range:Radius 13.0m)</font>

1 person.
An enhanced model of the combat vehicle Blacker E3. Its armor is improved and its main cannon has better destructive power. The engine has been improved, accelerating its movement speed. The turret rotation is also sped up, so it can respond quickly in combat against enemies. Its main cannon is a 130mm Howitzer. It fires shaped charges that detonate on impact, causing damage to a wide area.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Finalized version of the MG-type hand grenade. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

An upgraded and enhanced version of the quick-fire rocket launcher Cascade 2 with improved capacity and rate of fire.

The rockets are fortified. Both firepower and blast radius are greatly enhanced, making it a horrible weapon.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

Use the guide kit to launch a powerful attack with the laser weapon Spritefall.
Fire at a lower rate under this mode, but with higher damage output, and wider projection range.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Epsilon Blast <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:[PT]15000.0 Range:5062.5m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Right):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:150.0 Range:210.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Left):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:150.0 Range:210.0m)</font>

3 people.
A vehicle equipped with the best-performance railgun--Epsilon Blast Electromagnetic Launcher. This final model of the Epsilon Blast is far more destructive than the prototype.
Its engine has been improved as well to enhance the mobility.

A vehicle equipped with a state-of-the-art electromagnetic launcher (Railgun) with accelerated shells and rapid fire support. The shells can penetrate objects and inflict damage on many enemies. The Railgun is equipped with a laser sight to ensure pinpoint accuracy, and the trajectory can be confirmed with the red line before firing. This is a very powerful weapon, but it lacks the blast area of the Howitzer, making it somewhat difficult to use in combat against monsters. To make up for this shortcoming, it's been fitted with a right and left Machine Gun on the rotating turret, which can be manned from either of the gunner seats. However, gunners should be aware that the seats face whatever their respective turrets are aiming at.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A giant guided missile with a focus on destructive power. It has a good lock-on range, so it can attack from afar. Its firing speed is slow, but its homing capability is excellent. After being fired, it will descend a little, so it is necessary to aim upwards to avoid injury to yourself. As this is a prototype, its essential destructive power is not as great as it could be and its lock-on time is relatively long. 

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

The completed Goliath rocket launcher model. Both destructive power and blast area are improved to the top.
Its rockets are well modified to enhance the speed.

It includes a scope attachment for an outstanding long-distance accuracy.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A massive missile launcher. It launches enormous laser-guided missiles. 
Because a laser guide is necessary for targeting, this weapon cannot be used alone: it must be paired with an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit (or a guide beacon) to establish a viable target lock. Through the Laser Guide Kit, the lock-on location is confirmed. When the laser guide location (or a guide beacon) is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. Then, when the attack button is released, the missile will launch directly toward the targeted location. On impact, it will explode spectacularly, inflicting damage across the entire area.
The lock-on process requires not only the support of an Air Raider, but also a considerable amount of time. When used effectively, however, it can be a formidable weapon, wiping out the enemy in the entire area.

A good performance guide beacon gun. It is possible to discharge multiple guide beacons. Its performance is improved. The beacon focuses on a hit point and transmits location information. The beacon confirms the lock-on target for ally tracking weapons, making it possible to lock-on. The lock-on time is reduced and the lock-on range is increased. Even though it does not have the performance of the Laser Guide Kit, it has a wide variety of uses as it is not necessary to maintain the beacon until the target has been hit. It is possible for multiple lock-ons. By using the beacon on the enemy, it is possible to launch multiple missiles at the enemy. Also, the target can be attacked many times as the beacon will not be lost even after the missile has hit. Pressing the reload button releases the beacon, then it reloads.

The final version of the rapid-fire rocket launcher Cascade 2. Both firepower and blast radius are greatly improved, as well as the capacity. This is a rocket launcher that causes devastating destruction.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A special alloy shield. 

Holding the attack button will keep raising the shield and reduce Damage coming from the front. (The defense angle differs based on shields. Please refer to %dq%Defense Angle.%dq%)
Some weapons allow you to attack with the shield raised. While it is not possible to pair the shield with a hammer or blade that requires full body usage, it is possible to attack with the Blasthole Spear and other weapons that can be fired with one hand when the shield is raised. 
The heat will increase as it continues to absorb attacks. When it reaches the limit, it won't be usable again until it has cooled down. 

There is a device called Deflector installed inside the shield.  It forms a magnetic field which reverses physical motion by 180 degrees. The Deflector is activated with the use button. It can repel any attack with the right timing.

Use this enhanced Limpet Gun for a precise, long-range launch of sticky bombs with a wider range and improved destructive power.

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.
