Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode. It is mounted with a laser sight to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

To prevent allies from being attacked, it is equipped with a high performance safety device. You don't have to worry about allies getting hit or self exploding.

The final completion model of Leopard Guided Rocket Launcher. It fires off rockets equipped with semi-active Laser Guide Kit. The sensor will detect the laser light from the launcher and change the route.

Moving the sight can control the landing location after firing.
It's equipped with a scope that can guide the rockets to far places. To use the attached scope, press the Zoom/Activate button.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

Ultra high-power Mag Blaster model.
It fires long-range beams with excellent destructive power at regular intervals. However, due to its high output, its power decreases significantly as supply depletes.

An enhanced weapon developed from the Goliath rocket launcher which fires off the new large rockets with a firepower surpassing the limitation of personal artillery.
Rate of fire of those large rockets is fairly low, but they're equipped with semi-active Laser Guide Kit. 

Moving the sight and you can control the landing location after firing.
It's attached with a scope that can guide the rockets to far places. To use the attached scope, press the Zoom/Activate button.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A final completion model of Grant Rocket Launcher. This firearm really is the ultimate rocket launcher designed and manufactured by the top talents.
The precisely structured weapon is with excellent accuracy and includes a scope attachment for a long-distance attack.

Although it's capable to turn the tide, there're only very few of the products and they have been lost in chaos.

A new directional landmine. It has better performance and its deployment number has been increased too. 

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

A shield that reverses movement.
As long as the attack button is held down, it continues to form a magnetic field that reverses movement by 180 degrees.
The heat value increases during activation and cools (reloads) when it reaches its maximum limit.

A missile launcher with a rapid rate of fire. It fires small missiles so its destructive power is poor. However, it can lock-on to multiple targets at once and attack them at the same time. Also, once it has locked on, even if the target moves away from the sight (for a short time), the sight will follow, making it easy to lock-on to multiple enemies. It is a very powerful weapon, but its lock-on range is short. It is thus necessary to have the support of Air Raiders when using in ranged combat. 

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A high-performance Laser Guide Kit. The range and lock-on speed are both massively improved. 

Device that sends the lock-on information to your allies' homing weapons (missiles, etc.) The device has no ability to attack by itself. 
 
By projecting a laser to a spot, it 'paints' the target, confirming the location for an allied lock-on target weapon. The lock-on time for your allies' homing weapons is greatly reduced. Also, the range is extended up to 3 times their own range. 
 
The homing weapon locks on to the point indicated by this weapon, not the enemy itself. When your allies launch the homing missile, it will head in the direction indicated by the laser. Therefore, if the laser is moved after launch, the missile will move accordingly. For that reason, the laser needs to be maintained until the target is hit.
 
Usually only one missile can be launched per lock-on, but it is possible to have multiple lock-ons for the laser point. It is therefore possible to launch multiple missiles at one target.  
 
The majority of Fencer missiles rely on the support of this device. When Fencers are equipping missiles, you should equip this device as well.

A battle-ready version of the Emerald personal guided missile launcher. A vastly improved guidance system makes this an excellent weapon. 

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

An enhanced napalm discharger that releases giant napalm payloads carrying terrifying firepower. It has to be reloaded after each shot. Napalm sets everything it touches ablaze. The flames damage not only its target, but the surrounding area as well. Napalm can be sent at different trajectories so it is possible to hit enemies hiding behind obstacles.

A missile launcher that fires 15 small missiles with good guidance system at once. It can only lock-on to one target at a time with its multiple missiles. For this reason, it can inflict a lot of damage on a single target. The sight is smaller, but this is to make it easier to select a single target. 

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A new Rapier equipped with a power amplification device called 'Casket.'
This weapon is a very powerful weapon designed for striking multiple enemies at once. For this purpose, the Plasma Gun is modified to be able to shoot rays of energy that diffuse horizontally. But because it is unable to focus its attacks on a single target, it may not be suitable for all situations.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy in the Casket. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will discharge the accumulated energy and fire off the Plasma Gun continuously in a certain time span.
The output is amplified according to the amount of stored energy and so is destructive power. The more energy accumulated, the greater flying distance, shot number and firepower. Also, the diffusion range converges more toward the front.
Although the Plasma Gun is very extremely effective , its power decreases greatly with distance, so you have to be as close as possible to the enemy, make it a high-risky weapon to use.

A long-range weapon developed for use by Wing Divers. It fires super high-voltage bolts of lightning from a long distance accurately, making it possible to snipe distant targets. Because the weapon is an early model, its trajectory may not be very accurate.

It is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the weapon to be fired upon flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

Most weapon of the Wing Diver can only show their true value when close to the enemy and the Bolt Shooter was developed to reduce such combat risk. Since the Wing Diver can still attack in long distance when flying, their survival rate is significantly improved.

Complete spec G-type formation of 4 unmanned attack aircraft equipped with machine guns.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, machine gun fire rains down from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
Can distiguish friend from foe, posing no danger to the user and his/her allies.

Use the Laser Guide Kit to activate the Spritefall's rapid fire mode.
Under this mode, all systems will be pushed to their limits, allowing it to fire at the highest rate consecutively.
It fires all laser beams instantaneously, inflicting damage across a wide area.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A triple-barreled particle beam cannon that shoots out particle beams in three directions. It's an improved version of the Mag Blaster V, which could only fire in a V shape. This weapon, however, can fire straight ahead. It also improves on Mag Blaster V's poor accuracy.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire laser beams continuously.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

The second version of the large guided missile Air Tortoise. Firepower is increased tremendously, making it effective in actual combat. The resulting explosion measures 40 meters in diameter. The lock-on distance is fairly good, making it possible to attack from a distance. After being fired, it will descend a little, so it is necessary to aim upwards to avoid injury to yourself. 

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A powered-up FORK-A20. 
This model fires 20 small high-speed missiles at once. 
It has improved destructive power and better lock-on range.

An enhanced output Electromagnetic Bunker. A device that creates a wall of energy which is stronger than the Electromagnetic Bunker M2. The wall not only stops bullets but also optical weapons as well. It can act as a shield, but it cannot block blasts. The defensive wall senses objects that collide with it. Allies are allowed to pass through it.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

An upgraded MLRA missile launcher with improved homing capability.  Missiles are constantly guided towards the enemy, making this model an extremely powerful weapon. However, the lock-on distance is slightly shorter, and in ranged battles, an Air Raider's support is necessary.

Once locked-on, even if the target moves away (for a short time), it will stay locked-on. Therefore, by moving the sight, it is easy to lock on to several enemies.


Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from combat bombers. Four combat bombers will enter the designated attack area from different angles and launch a strafing run.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

A large guided missile with terrifying destructive power. The lock-on distance is long so it can be used in ranged combat. The missile will ride for a few seconds, and then descend on the target. Therefore it is possible to attack a target on the other side of an obstacle. Equipped with a scope to confirm point of impact.

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

A powered-up Emerald personal missile launcher. It is possible to lock on to three targets at once, and its destructive power has enhanced. The lock-on distance is also improved. Fortified firepower makes this an even better weapon, but lock-on time has increased.

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

1 person.
Improved version of the state-of-the-art combat vehicle, the Varius TZ2.
Its 125mm high-pressure multipurpose Howitzer has been enhanced, greatly increasing its destructive power. Shells are ejected at ultra-high speed and land instantly.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A giant guided missile with immense destructive power. Its blast range and firepower are greatly improved. It has a good lock-on range, but lock-on takes longer. The missile will ride for a few seconds, and then descend on the target. Therefore it is possible to attack a target on the other side of an obstacle. Equipped with a scope to confirm point of impact.

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
120mm High-Pressure Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:24 Damage:720.0 Blast Range:Radius 12.0m)</font>

1 person.
EDF's most advanced combat vehicle. It was deployed in actual combat ahead of schedule due to the escalation of the war.
It is equipped with a 120mm high-pressure multipurpose Howitzer developed by the Advanced Technologies Lab. It has both high armor-destroying abilities and ranged attack power. Shells are ejected at ultra-high speed and land instantly.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.
(Charge Close Range Charge:0.0 Damage:$0 Effective Range:Radius 2.0m)

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Revolver Rocket Cannon (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:80 Damage:2100.0 (6 burst) Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>
Revolver Rocket Cannon (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:80 Damage:2100.0 (6 burst) Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>
Dispersal Howitzer (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:12 Damage:1050.0×15 Blast Range:Radius 15.0m)</font>
Dispersal Howitzer (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:12 Damage:1050.0×15 Blast Range:Radius 15.0m)</font>

1 person.
An enhanced model of the Nix Buster Cannon. It is a heavy machine equipped with a very powerful firearm. It is equipped with Dispersal Howitzers on both shoulders that discharge multiple dispersal shots. They explode on impact, encompassing an area in the blast. It has an excellent destructive power and attack area, but its range is relatively short. It has Revolver Rocket Cannons on both arms. It discharges rockets and is good for attacks over a wide area. It has impressive firepower, but the firearms are heavy and this means mobility is reduced. However, in order to compensate for this shortcoming, the rotation speed of the upper body has been improved. The thruster performance has been improved, so a longer discharge is possible.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An enhanced version of FZ-Gun D. It spits massive flames, and the number of installations is also increased from the D-type.

A new type of sentry gun (automatic enemy tracking gun) equipped with a flamethrower. After installation, it detects enemies using cameras and sensors and fires automatically.

No safety mechanism is installed, as priority was given to increasing the power output.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

The final specs of Volatile Napalm, which is a napalm discharge device for military use. Napalm sets everything it touches ablaze. The intense flames damage not only its target, but the surrounding area as well. Napalm can be sent at different trajectories so it is possible to hit enemies hiding behind obstacles. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A modified version of the Mouse, a small hand grenade.
Since it is smaller than the MG model, a larger number can be carried at once, which can be thrown in quick succession.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A missile launcher that fires 20 small high-speed missiles at once. It can only lock on to one target, and all missiles will be fired at the singular target. Thus it can inflict a huge amount of damage on one target. The sight is small, but this is to make it easier to select a single target.

Pressing the attack button will begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within the applicable range and get it in your sight (red square). The sight will change shape when a lock has been successfully established. Release the button to fire.

An improved version of the Emerald personal missile launcher. Overall performance is massively improved. It is possible to lock on to four targets at once. It has a wider range and improved destructive power. The lock-on distance is also improved. The time it takes to lock on has been greatly reduced.

A battle-ready Air Tortoise missile that boasts even greater firepower than the prototype model and causes an explosion of 60 meters in diameter. Missile speed is still characteristically slow. After launch, the projectile will descend slightly, making it necessary to aim upward in order to avoid self injury.

A powered-up MLRA model. This is a double-barreled version that fires 2 small guided missiles at once. Each missile now has greater firepower. This terrifying missile launcher can lock on to multiple targets and fire small missiles with good guidance system at once. Shots are fired to the left and right before chasing the enemy.

The final spec High Cycle Reverser that sprays high-performance nanomachines. It sprays a large amount of liquefied nanomachines.

Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.)

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

Probe and ally relief assistance, all in one device.
Can collect items within a wide range and heal subordinate soldiers.

A giant guided missile with immense destructive power. Its blast range and firepower are greatly improved. It has a good lock-on range, but lock-on takes longer. The missile will ride for a few seconds, and then descend on the target. Therefore it is possible to attack a target on the other side of an obstacle. Equipped with a scope to confirm point of impact.

A personal grenade launcher. It fires high performance grenades that explode on impact. Since these shots travel along an arc, it is possible to attack enemies hidden in trenches or behind cover.

Since the grenades fly in a parabolic trajectory, it is difficult to predict the point of impact (compared to a rocket launcher, which has a straight trajectory). However, skilled soldiers can make predictions (shown as a red line) through experience and intuition.
Though not an exact science, one can take advantage of the grenades' parabolic trajectories to attack enemies hidden behind shields or in trenches.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A new model of the Spread Grenade that's smaller than Firecracker 1 in size, and considerably more can be thrown at once. Thus, more deadly.

Officially known as the Spread Grenade, this weapon throws out multiple coin-sized grenades at a time.
It's not powerful enough of a single grenade, but the rounds can be spread over a wide area, making it possible to hit several enemies at once.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

Use this device to fire strong sticky bombs with this drastically improved model. Its destructive power and blast area have both increased dramatically. 

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode.

A new grenade launcher model with amazing performance. Its firepower is a step above the previous model and blast area is large. Shots fly unhindered towards the target, making it possible to fire accurately at distant targets with practice. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from the combat bomber. Two combat bombers will enter the designated attack area from different angles and launch a strafing run.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

A new directional landmine that detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range.
Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation. After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
125mm Long-Range Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:2550.0 Blast Range:Radius 13.0m)</font>

1 person.
A custom model of the combat vehicle Blacker built for long distance firing. It is installed with a main 125mm Long-range Howitzer. The bullets are fast, so accurate aim is possible at long-distances. However, recoil has also increased.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Anti-Aircraft Explosive Artillery (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1000 Damage:396.0 Range:500.0m Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>
Anti-Aircraft Explosive Artillery (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1000 Damage:396.0 Range:500.0m Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>

Mass production prototype of KG7. It can be requested immediately after arrival upon the battlefield due to its improved performance and lower production cost.
New anti-aircraft guns are mounted on the body of a KG6 that rapid-fires multipurpose explosive shells. It can counter not only aircraft, but also alien invaders and androids on the ground.
The shells explode upon impact and inflict damage over a wide area.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An impulse directional landmine customized for use against aircraft. Both the ejection tube for the ball bearings and the enemy detection sensor point diagonally upward in order to target and attack airborne foes. The sensor's detection range is greater and thus easier for it to detect flying enemies.

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.
Scientists from around the world have rallied to the cause of exterminating Earth's invaders, producing a fearsome weapon that emits ultra-high-pressure flames as a result.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Atomic Ray Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:7000  Damage:6.5 (1000 burst)  Range:600.0m)</font>

A large combat vehicle equipped with a super weapon still under development—the Atomic Ray Cannon. This super weapon is able to generate and irradiate high-pressure energy capable of destroying a mountain instantly.
It can cause terrible damage, but the energy consumption and costs are enormous. The current manufacturing cost is said to be 100 million dollars per vehicle, making it impractical for actual combat. However, in order to destroy the aliens' golden armor, dozens of these vehicles have been produced in a hurry.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.
A prototype special grenade launcher. It fires as many as 20 sticky grenades at a time. These grenades stick to whatever they hit and detonate after 4 seconds.

Model E Stuncopters in a formation of 4 for greatly enhanced performance.
Fires an electrode attached by a wire that pierces its target and delivers an electric shock.
This weapon was first developed as a stun gun for riot control, but its output was increased to lethal levels for use against monsters.

When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter fires an electrode.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
The most powerful flamethrower available that emits deadly flames.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
140mm High Pressure Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:30 Damage:13200.0 Blast Range:Radius 18.0m)</font>

1 person.
Mass production prototype of the Varius TZ4-R. Due to its reduced production cost, it can be requested immediately upon arrival at the battlefield.
Modifications to the vehicle's body have resulted in further improved stability. Though a combat vehicle, it offers a comfortable ride.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A special gun that discharges flames. This device can be easily directed at any target and will completely engulf it on contact, generating a giant column of fire where it previously stood. Because the device ejects in the opposite direction of the surface, it is possible to choose the surface and thus control the direction. For example, if fired towards the ground, the column of fire will reach up into the sky; if fired at a wall, a horizontal pillar of flame will be ejected (perpendicular to the surface of the wall). For this reason, it has many uses such as blocking the progress of an enemy. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.
A light and impact-resistant protective suit.

A new gun developed by EDF. It fires high speed compressed plasma bullets which rebound off walls and continue to fly till they reach the range limit.
The power isn't reduced by air resistance, making it possible to cause consistent damage to objects at long distances.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

A 2-round burst Dragoon Lance that fire 2 rounds of high-output beams.
Burst mode allows for vastly increased destructive power, but the weapon's power also reduces drastically with distance, so the weapon is only effective at close range.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

An upgraded BRUTE-J triple grenade launcher that fires grenades in 3 directions simultaneously. These grenades now explode upon impact, making it easier to use in battle.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A super weapon that can only be used by Wing Divers. Discharges a ball of energy which stays in the air and releases numerous rays of light down. When discharged (the speed will have an impact on the direction) it is possible to control the height and trajectory. When activated in a high location, the light will disperse over a wide area; conversely, when activated in a lower location, the dispersal area is small and the damage will be concentrated on a single group of enemies.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).
A special grenade launcher. It fires as many as 20 sticky grenades at a time. These grenades stick to whatever they hit and detonate after 4 seconds.

A supreme version of the UM grenade launcher. Its firepower and blast area have been pushed to the limit in this ultimate model. The grenades of this fearsome weapon detonate on impact and can utterly annihilate enemies with their tremendous force.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.
A powered-up version of the Stampede M1 grenade launcher. This fearsome weapon fires more shots than before, launching a rain of grenades to drop onto the enemy.
Light protective clothes that resist impacts. Able to destroy small obstacles during dash.

The finalized version of the UM grenade launcher. The ultimate grenade launcher based on the UMAX model design.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.
New powered exoskeleton designed to use guided weapons. Equipped with a guidance aid software that improves the distance and speed of missiles.

An upgraded Stampede M2 grenade launcher.
It fires a greater number of shots and creates a larger explosion, making it one of the strongest weapons capable of obliterating anything over a wide area.

An upgraded Geist brainwave-guided weapon featuring greatly improved firepower and slightly reduced shot speed. When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on to. Pressing the attack button will discharge the weapon, and the discharge will explode on impact. Also it is excellent at tracking an enemy.

Because it requires long-term use of a Psionic link, the demands on the users are high and so few people are suitable.

The final Plasma Cannon upgrade. An ultimate weapon that is high-output and energy-efficient.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

An enhanced model of the Plasmafall. It is able to attack over a much wider area.
The plasma balls discharged are very dense and heavy, so their trajectory changes quickly. Just as firing a mortar, you have to aim high when you fire this weapon.
Be careful not to injure yourself by aiming too low.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
When the accumulated power reaches the maximum amount, this weapon can attack with its full power, and its effective area will be the widest.
A special gun that fires strong acid steadily. Compared with Acid Shower, this weapon fires a stream of acid directly at the target and its rate of fire is well improved.
The completed Acid Shower model. This special gun fires a spray of strong acid over a wider area than before.

A gas burner for welding.
Since it's for job purpose, one should lower the expectation of it as a weapon.
Special protective clothes that prevents explosion debris.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
FK210 Gatling Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1600 Damage:330.0 Range:240.0m)</font>
High-Cycle Launcher (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:320 Damage:495.0 Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>
High-Cycle Launcher (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:320 Damage:495.0 Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>

1 person. Can be requested from underground locations.
Mass-produced model V prototype. The initial achievement value required to request it is higher due to the lower production cost.

A long-ranged model of the Bound Gun. It fires high speed compressed plasma bullets which rebound off walls and continue to fly till they reach the range limit.
Although it's not deadly destructive, its range is notably improved.

The power isn't reduced by air resistance, making it possible to cause consistent damage to objects at long distances.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Autocannon (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1800 Damage:[PT]250.0 Range:160.0m)</font>
Autocannon (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1800 Damage:[PT]250.0 Range:160.0m)</font>
Missiles <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:20 Damage:3000.0 Blast Range:Radius 12.0m)</font>

1 person.
The final battle spec of the N9 Eros, featuring the most advanced maneuverability of any model in the entire line. Its takeoff performance is excellent and it can reach high altitudes quickly. This is easily the most powerful attack helicopter there is.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An enhanced version of the long-ranged Bound Gun. It fires high density plasma bullets which rebound off walls and continue to fly till they reach the range limit.
Although it's powerfully destructive, the bullet speed has been reduced.

The power isn't reduced by air resistance, making it possible to cause consistent damage to objects at long distances.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

A new shotgun developed by the EDF that fires lots of compressed plasma bullets which rebound off walls and continue to fly till they reach the range limit. 
Its range is exceedingly longer than other shotguns and the firepower isn't reduced by air resistance, making it an amazing weapon.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1250 Damage:17.4～2.4 Range:240.0m)</font>
Rocket Cannon (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:20 Damage:145.0 Blast Range:Radius 5.0m)</font>

1 person.
This boardable enhanced exoskeleton was designed to counter terrorism in urban warfare. The full-body armor can block blasts, while offering mobility to carry out various tasks. Hold the Jump button to activate jet thrusters in the back to fly for a short period of time.

Being able to carry multiple weapons is one of its key features. Both arms can be mounted with weapons that provide excellent firepower. It is practical in many uses because of the multiple weapons with different purposes.

An enhance model A with improved armor and firepower. It has a machine gun on its right arm, and a Rocket Cannon on its left.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A piece of equipment that launches a special capsule full of nanomachines. On impact, the capsule bursts and spreads the nanomachines across a large area. It boasts much better firing distance and wider spreading range than previous Reversers. (The nanomachines are safe to transport and have not been deactivated, which means they're effective on the user as well.)

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.)

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

The prototype of a special piece of equipment called %dq%Reverser%dq% that sprays nanomachines, which is almost useless due to its low performance.

A device for applying nanomachines to others. Not originally intended to be used on oneself... but can also be used to bounce nanomachines off walls and other surfaces to recover the user's health.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.)

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

A special piece of equipment that sprays nanomachines.

A device for applying nanomachines to others. Not originally intended to be used on oneself... but can also be used to bounce nanomachines off walls and other surfaces to recover the user's health.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.)

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat 1:</font> Flamethrower <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:6000 Damage:5.4)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat 2:</font> Flamethrower <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:6000 Damage:5.4)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat 3:</font> Missiles <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:200 Damage:225.0 Blast Range:Radius 5.0m)</font>

4 people.
A giant humanoid battle machine. It is one of the trump cards for the EDF's land battles. It does not have the greatest mobility because of its large size, but the large weaponry offers impressive destructive power. It has special plate armor all over its body, so its defensive capabilities are much higher than a tanks. It can carry a large amount of ammo. It is a walking fortress with excellent combat ability. But it is necessary to have four people to make use of its potential. One person must be a pilot. So you need to have gunners if you want to attack. 

Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle. 
Anyone can ride in the gunners seat. 

In order to request this, you need to achieve a certain amount of credits in the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

The Psiblade's ultimate model that has been improved to the maximum level possible. Its destructive power and blast range are extraordinary.
Within two seconds of the arrows of light being released, they will fly straight for the target which has been locked-on. It will pierce the enemy and explode. It got its name by the fact that it looks like a glittering blade.
This weapon pushes the Psionic Link to the maximum, and it once destroyed the nervous system of the test subject. It is thus feared by many and no one uses it.

A piece of equipment that launches a special capsule full of nanomachines. On impact, the capsule bursts and spreads the nanomachines across the area. It has a longer range than previous Reversers and can heal your friends at a distance.

A device for applying nanomachines to others. Not originally intended to be used on oneself... but can also be used to bounce nanomachines off walls and other surfaces to recover the user's health.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.)

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

Use the guide kit to launch a concentrated attack with the laser weapon Spritefall. The concentrated shooting mode combines all of Spritefall's energy and releases it instantaneously. Although it can only fire at a single target, it has impressive destructive power. The system doesn't overload, so it requires less credit to re-request.

The improved control system allows it to fire at once.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A prototype DNG long-range hand grenade. It has an improved blast radius and detonates on contact with amazing destructive power.

Due to its large size and weight, throwing it requires the use of the entire body. Although it takes some time from the start of the throwing motion until it is actually released, it is possible to change direction during the throw. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A rapid-fire version of the Bolt Gun. It fires fewer electric bolts at once, but boasts an excellent rate of fire.

The bolts will diffuse and then concentrate on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point. This characteristic can be used to enable all of the bolts to hit a single target.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from the combat bomber. Three combat bombers will come in to launch a low strafing run upon the target area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.
The final spec Stampede model grenade launcher with maximized destructive power.

The ultimate Reverser, emitting high-performance nanomachines.

A device for applying nanomachines to others. Not originally intended to be used on oneself... but can also be used to bounce nanomachines off walls and other surfaces to recover the user's health.

Nanomachines can cluster and harden to form invisible armor and temporarily fix damaged armor. It's also used to heal friendly soldiers' health and vehicles' durability. (Since extended nanomachine contact is harmful, these have been tweaked to have no effect on the user.)

NOTE: Very limited supplies due to difficult production process. There are no reloads.

A device that converts Side Thrusters into Jump Boosters.
Converted boosters are powerful and allow for continuous boosted jumps.
(Must be used with either a Side Thruster or a Jump Booster)

A basic hand grenade that detonates on contact.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

Ultra-high performance Dragoon Lance whose output exceeds even that of the ZM model.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Bike:</font> Driver
Light Machine Gun (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1200 Damage:330.0 Range:160.0m)</font>
Light Machine Gun (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1200 Damage:330.0 Range:160.0m)</font>

The final model of the military motorcycle Freed.
Equipped with a high power turbo engine, its speed and acceleration are successfully pushed to the limit. Due to its overly-high power, this bike is hard to control; a sudden acceleration can bring the front tire float. Nevertheless, the basic performance is high, so it would be the fastest bike if one can properly control it.

Able to request underground.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An upgraded MG12 hand grenade. Its power is a step above the previous model.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. After all the effort put into development, the flying speed is finally improved.

A device that creates a wall of energy. When installed, it creates a semi-circular wall of energy in front. Can block attacks from multiple directions. The wall not only stops bullets but also optical weapons. It can act as a shield, but it cannot block blasts. The defensive wall senses objects that collide with it. Allies are allowed to pass through it.


Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

The final model Force Blade, specially designed for the last boss battle. 
The force field generated by the blade is launched forward to cut through enemies from a distance as the blade is swung. It does not have the destructive power of the Vibro Hammer, but its attack speed is better and it can attack aerial enemies. Press and hold the attack button to increase the output, then release it when the maximum has been reached in order to unleash a powerful slashing attack.

It is recommended that you equip two Force Blades concurrently, as the pairing of this weapon type with itself is the best way to unlock its true potential.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

Officially known as the Spread Grenade, this weapon throws out multiple coin-sized grenades at a time.
It's not powerful enough as a single grenade, but the rounds can be spread over a wide area, making it possible to hit several enemies at once.

Originally developed for riot control, now it has been fairly fatal after constant improvements.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

A specially improved version of the Mirage brainwave-guided weapon. It has greatly improved destructive power and homing capabilities. However, its output can be difficult to control, so the direction of discharge can be unstable. As the direction of each discharge changes, there is a risk of hitting the ground and injuring yourself. For that reason, this weapon is highly recommended for aerial use. Despite its shortcomings, it has excellent homing capability and thus good accuracy.

A powered-up MG11 hand grenade with a far greater blast radius, making this an effective weapon. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.
A new powered exoskeleton that improves the output of arms. It lowers the influence on swirls when wielding a heavy weapon or a shield, enabling you to quickly aim and attack.

A finalized model of Hornet Rocket Launcher with its destructive power being pushed to the limit.

Equipped with a scope.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A modified version of the T5 Mouse, a small hand grenade.
Comprised of two bombs (in the shape of a figure 8). When thrown, the two bombs separate and land in different places.

Since it is smaller than the MG model, a larger number can be carried at once, which can be thrown in quick succession.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

An air-to-surface Diffuser model that focuses its output downward, effectively dealing damage to enemies below, but having no reach above. Discharges a ball of energy which stays in the air and fires off arrows of light. When discharged (the speed will have an impact on the direction) it is possible to control the height and trajectory.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from combat bombers. Two combat bombers will enter the designated attack area in a side-by-side and launch a strafing run.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

An upgraded MG13 grenade. The weight remains unchanged, but it now features a timed detonator, giving its wielder time to escape before the blast.

Because it is extremely heavy, it is difficult to throw far. However, thanks to its timed detonator, the wielder can retreat in the event of a missed throw.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade, which will then explode in a few seconds.
There is a definite pause between the throw and the explosion, so it is difficult to blow oneself up. It is also possible to bounce grenades off the walls of a building and/or throw them inside.

Armed multicopter with large guns that can fire several heavy metal bullets at once.
When the bullets strike an object, they ricochet over a wide area.

The user indicates the target by ejecting a marker. One machine fires at the point of impact.
One marker corresponds to one aircraft. By ejecting markers in succession, the user can direct multiple aircraft.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

This super weapon operates in midair. Discharges a ball of energy which stays in the air and fires off numerous bolts of lightning downward continuously. When discharged (and note that speed will have an impact on direction), it is possible to control the height and trajectory. When activated in a high location, the lightning will disperse over a wide area; conversely, when activated in a lower location, the dispersal area is small and the damage will be concentrated on a single group of enemies.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A large-caliber canister cannon that discharges canisters which disperse specialized shells within the target area. These shells then bounce off of obstacles to create utter chaos in the vicinity. Though it's a destructive beast within its range, its range is fairly limited, and it takes a significant amount of time to reload. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

An upgraded MG11J (J type) time-detonated grenade.
It no longer detonates on contact, but has excellent destructive power and blast range as a result.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade, which will then explode in a few seconds.
There is a definite pause between the throw and the explosion, so it is difficult to blow oneself up. It is also possible to bounce grenades off the walls of a building and/or throw them inside.

An improved Dexter Automatic Shotgun D1. A large shotgun with a self-loading mechanism. It can now fire 15 shots, and boasts improved destructive power and range as well, making it an excellent weapon.

It's possible to launch a wide range attack, but it has short effective range. Once the distance is long, its power decreases sharply.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Menace Electromagnetic Launcher <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:[PT]3180.0 Range:3375.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Right):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:31.8 Range:210.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Left):</font> Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:500 Damage:31.8 Range:210.0m)</font>

3 people.
A vehicle equipped with an improved Menace electromagnetic launcher (Railgun). It's amazingly destructive, but because of the increased weight of the electromagnet launcher, it's poor in mobility.


A vehicle equipped with a state-of-the-art electromagnetic launcher (Railgun) with accelerated shells and rapid fire support. The shells can penetrate objects and inflict damage on many enemies. The Railgun is equipped with a laser sight to ensure pinpoint accuracy, and the trajectory can be confirmed with the red line before firing. This is a very powerful weapon, but it lacks the blast area of the Howitzer, making it somewhat difficult to use in combat against monsters. To make up for this shortcoming, it's been fitted with a right and left Machine Gun on the rotating turret, which can be manned from either of the gunner seats. However, gunners should be aware that the seats face whatever their respective turrets are aiming at.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A DNG long-range throwing grenade. It has an extraordinary blast radius and detonates on contact with amazing destructive power.

Due to its large size and weight, throwing it requires the use of the entire body. Although it takes some time from the start of the throwing motion until it is actually released, it is possible to change direction during the throw.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A more powerful grenade. 
Its destructive power has been greatly improved. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

An improved version of the Mag Blaster B1. Its tank is slightly smaller, but its firepower is greatly increased, and requires less time and energy to reload.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. 
However, its output decreases as the power stored in its energy core depletes. When the power left in its energy core is at half of its maximum amount, its greatest level of destruction falls to about 25 percent of the maximum amount. For that reason, as long as the situation allows it, you should reload to preserve its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

A new model of the Spread Grenade that boasts its destructive power. Both firepower and blast radius are greatly improved compared to the previous model.

Officially known as the Spread Grenade, this weapon throws out multiple coin-sized grenades at a time.
It's not powerful enough of a single grenade, but the rounds can be spread over a wide area, making it possible to hit several enemies at once.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

A strong grenade with high destructive output. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade, which will then explode in a few seconds.
There is a definite pause between the throw and the explosion, so it is difficult to blow oneself up. It is also possible to bounce grenades off the walls of a building and/or throw them inside.

A high-output Power Post. Its effective area is greatly increased, and it can supply a great number of allies with power. They link to ally equipment when in range. They supply power and increase attack power. They will confer benefits on all allies in range. They will also have an impact on passengers in vehicles. Also, they can determine friend from foe and will not increase the attack power of enemies. This is a top-secret device, so its origins are not fully known.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

Use the Laser Guide Kit to transmit coordinates to the hidden military base, Barren Land, to launch the large Tempest AT missile. The laser must be maintained until the Tempest missile hits. The Tempest AT has terrifying destructive power, and will destroy anything in its blast area.

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.
The Laser Guide Kit is equipped with a scope.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A new model of the Spread Grenade. Its size has been reduced even further, allowing for even more to be thrown at once and causing greater damage.

Officially known as the Spread Grenade, this weapon throws out multiple coin-sized grenades at a time.
It's not powerful enough of a single grenade, but the rounds can be spread over a wide area, making it possible to hit several enemies at once.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
A special Plasma Core with improved the energy-generating speed. It recovers energy quickly, and its emergency charge time is reduced.

A more powerful grenade. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

This nine-barreled Pulse Machine Gun breaks through the final limits of the multi-barreled Pulse Machine Gun line. It fires pulse energy bullets in 9 directions.

When a pulse energy bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

Armed multicopter with a shotgun that fires multiple bullets at once. The bullets diffuse and can strike a wide range of enemies.

The user indicates the target by ejecting a marker. One machine fires at the point of impact.
One marker corresponds to one aircraft. By ejecting markers in succession, the user can direct multiple aircraft.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

A more powerful MG-type hand grenade. 
Its destructive power has been greatly improved. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A quintuple-barreled Reflectron Laser. Can be discharged in a narrow passage, and due to the trajectory change when it's reflected off of walls, the laser blast will zigzag along the corridor. Very effective in a scuffle as it can reach the limit of its range without being obstructed.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount. 

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire a laser beam continuously. Its output decreases as the power stored in its tank depletes. Its destructive power also reduces with distance, so it may not be able to deal heavy damage to distant targets.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

This ultimate model of the Spread Grenade boasts incredible firepower.

Officially known as the Spread Grenade, this weapon throws out multiple coin-sized grenades at a time.
It's not powerful enough of a single grenade, but the rounds can be spread over a wide area, making it possible to hit several enemies at once.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

A weapon that fires multiple powerful bolts of electricity. It requires a great deal of energy for each shot, but it boasts incredible firepower and a wide range.
The bolts will diffuse and then gather immediately, shooting straight towards the aiming direction.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The more power accumulated, the more likely the lightening concentrates on the aiming direction; whereas the energy accumulation decreases, the lightening diffuses. In that case, it's difficult to hit the target, but you can attack in a wider range.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
V2 Anti-Aircraft Gun (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1500 Damage:18.0 Range:360.0m)</font>
V2 Anti-Aircraft Gun (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1500 Damage:18.0 Range:360.0m)</font>

Improved version of the KG6 Kepler Self-Propelled Anti-Aircraft Gun, equipped with a powerful V2 Anti-Aircraft Gun.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Final version of the Mouse, a small hand grenade.

Since it is smaller than the MG model, a larger number can be carried at once, which can be thrown in quick succession.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

Perfect version of the MG-type hand grenade. 

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

Perfect model of the Spread Grenade.

Officially known as the Spread Grenade, this weapon throws out multiple coin-sized grenades at a time.
It's not powerful enough of a single grenade, but the rounds can be spread over a wide area, making it possible to hit several enemies at once.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

The final Blink Ball upgrade. It has been improved to the maximum level possible in all aspects.
The Plasma Balls fly in a gentle parabola and explode on impact, causing damage over a wide area.
It's equipped with an independent energy generator, so it doesn't deplete the energy of the aerial unit. Reloading is also possible during an emergency charge.
Although not particularly devastating, it can be an excellent sub-weapon when equipping a high consumption weapon.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

Perfect version of the Mouse, a small hand grenade.

Since it is smaller than the MG model, a larger number can be carried at once, which can be thrown in quick succession.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A large thermite round.
Hand-thrown incendiary device. Ignites upon impact, discharging tremendous heat.
Its flames cannot be extinguished with water, meaning it can be used underwater or underground because it does not require oxygen for combustion.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

Perfect thermite round model.
Hand-thrown incendiary device. Ignites upon impact, discharging tremendous heat.
Its flames cannot be extinguished with water, meaning it can be used underwater or underground because it does not require oxygen for combustion.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Leg assist device. It improves running ability.

The final form of the Impulse series, with its firepower pushed to the absolute limit and a much greater area of effect. It scatters ball bearings at enemies in a wide horizontal area.

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

Formation of 8 unmanned attack aircraft, flown side-by-side to sweep a wide area. Carries a large amount of ammunition for extended periods of attack.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, machine gun fire rains down from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
Can distiguish friend from foe, posing no danger to the user and his/her allies.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. The flying speed has been taken to a whole new level.

A bomb designed for special tasks. There are five interlocking explosives that can be placed at once. They also detonate simultaneously.

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. After installation, Hold the Use Backpack Tool button to detonate.

A specially designed machine gun. With constraints placed on its rapid-fire capabilities, its destructive power has been successfully increased. It can fire 3 high-caliber bullets at a time. These three shots are fired at very short intervals, but there is an interruption between every 3 shots, hurting its usability a bit. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each firing.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. The EX Bird Core's energy capacity has been taken to a whole new level.

A high-performance bomb. The blast range is extremely wide, and care must be taken not to harm oneself or one's allies. It also has tremendous destructive power.

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. After installation, Hold the Use Backpack Tool button to detonate.

Improved version of the R3 Multicopter with improved marker ejection speed and fuselage performance.

Multiple units activate simultaneously and fly out in front of the user.
When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter moves into position and fires at the marker's impact point.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

A new directional landmine. It has better performance compared with the Y8 and its deployment number has been increased too. 

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

A booster enhancer.
Enables 8 consecutive boost jumps.
(Must be used with a Jump Booster)

An upgraded Y11 Impulse landmine model. The number of mines that can be set before detonation is maximized, giving it a much broader application in battle.

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Anti-Aircraft Explosive Artillery (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1000 Damage:360.0 Range:500.0m Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>
Anti-Aircraft Explosive Artillery (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1000 Damage:360.0 Range:500.0m Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>

A multi-purpose combat vehicle developed hastily in response to the critical state of the war.
New anti-aircraft guns are mounted on the body of a KG6 that rapid-fires multipurpose explosive shells. It can counter not only aircraft, but also alien invaders and androids on the ground.
The shells explode upon impact and inflict damage over a wide area.
As this vehicle was rushed into production, not many have been made yet.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

The final model of the anti-aircraft impulse landmine. The sensor's performance is massively improved. It is possible to attack even high flying enemies. Large ball bearings are scattered out, and although they are not so many in number, they are enough to cause massive damage. 

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.
An all-new type of acid gun developed by scientists from around the world. It fires a powerful acid that can only be produced in special facilities. The acid diffuses laterally.

A highly upgraded Impulse directional landmine that spreads out enormous ball bearings. Despite being few in number, its destructive power is still excellent. Also, when it discharges, it scatters the ball bearings forward in a focused manner, destructing the targets when hitting. Although its attack area is small, the damage it inflicts is extraordinary. The sensor has been adjusted to work within a smaller range in front of the weapon, but it can sense much further away. 

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

A 2-round burst Power Lance. It can fire 2 rounds of high-output beams, which are able to destroy the armor and inside of the enemy at once, and deal fatal damage. But the firepower of the weapon is reduced drastically with distance, so it is only effective at close range.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
140mm Long-Range Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:32 Damage:12000.0 Blast Range:Radius 15.0m)</font>

1 person.
The final enhanced version of the Blacker E series. Equipped with a new type 140mm long-range Howitzer that fires molded explosive shells. The shells explode upon impact, inflicting damage over a wide area.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A new type of sentry gun (automatic enemy tracking gun) equipped with a flamethrower. After installation, it detects enemies using cameras and sensors and fires automatically.
