Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

A high-output Power Lance. It deals great damage with a single shot. However, it requires several times the energy of a standard Power Lance, so it has a longer charge time.

As a result of its improved design, its power does not reduce as drastically as a standard version, and it is easier to handle.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

A combat blade made using Force Field (Shield Screen) technology. The force field generated by the blade is launched forward to cut through enemies from a distance as the blade is swung. It does not have the destructive power of the Vibro Hammer, but its attack speed is better and it can attack aerial enemies. Press and hold the attack button to increase the output, then release it when the maximum has been reached in order to unleash a powerful slashing maximum voltage attack.

It is recommended that you equip two Force Blades concurrently, as the pairing of this weapon type with itself is the best way to unlock its true potential. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A particle beam rifle developed for use by Wing Divers. It is more accurate and destructive than a ballistic weapon.
The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

Compared to A1, its firepower is increased, and its energy cost when reloading is also reduced.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. 
However, its output decreases as the power stored in its energy core depletes. When the power left in its energy core is at half of its maximum amount, its greatest level of destruction falls to about 25 percent of the maximum amount. For that reason, as long as the situation allows it, you should reload to preserve its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Treatment Room 1:</font> None (Treatment) Recovery (Total):12000.0 Recovery:4.0
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Treatment Room 2:</font> None (Treatment)
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Treatment Room 3:</font> None (Treatment)

4 people.
An enhanced model of the Caliban Armored Vehicle. It is equipped with a high-performance engine which has increased its movement speed. This has made very fast deployments possible on the battlefield. The healing speed and amount of medicine are greatly increased. It is an amazing support vehicle. 

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An improved version of FZ-Gun. Two units can now be controlled simultaneously.

A new type of sentry gun (automatic enemy tracking gun) equipped with a flamethrower. After installation, it detects enemies using cameras and sensors and fires automatically.

Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

Use this communication system to request support from the heavy bomber equipped with napalm bombs. It will proceed to drop its napalm payload upon the designated area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

A stationary sentry gun (automatic enemy tracking gun). After installation, it detects enemies using cameras and sensors and fires automatically.

Equipped with a high-performance machine gun with excellent rapid-firing performance. To make the most of its specs, the gun's turret has enhanced swivel capabilities. This makes it possible to accurately target airborne enemies.

Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

An improved version of FZ-Gun with enhanced output and flame-throwing range.

A new type of sentry gun (automatic enemy tracking gun) equipped with a flamethrower. After installation, it detects enemies using cameras and sensors and fires automatically.

Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

A new long range laser gun developed based on the Closed Laser. It inflicts tremendous damage to all enemies in the firing line.
It releases all its power with each shot, so the power of the flying unit is transferred immediately after firing.
This weapon's power efficiency is somewhat poor due to the fact that it was hastily designed.
The ultimate Plasma Core. The Wing Diver's ability has been improved to the maximum level possible.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Right):</font> Heavy Flame Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:2000 Damage:98.0 Range:80.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Left):</font> Heavy Flame Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:2000 Damage:98.0 Range:80.0m)</font>

3 people.
An armored model of the HU04 Brute. The body is covered in thick armor so it can continue battling even under heavy attack. It's also equipped with dual Heavy Flame Guns (a type of large flamethrower), which have short range but can inflict some serious damage if you're able to get in close. There are gunner seats for each of the flame guns. So, including the pilot, three people are necessary for this vehicle. Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle, but anyone can ride in the gunner seats. 

In order to request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A stationary automatic enemy tracking gun that fires rockets.
By far the best firepower of any sentry gun.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Combat Burner <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:3000 Damage:37.5 Range:84.0m)</font>
Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1250 Damage:180.0～2.4 Range:240.0m)</font>
Canister Shot (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:20 Damage:[PT]375.0×10 Blast Range:----)</font>
Canister Shot (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:20 Damage:[PT]375.0×10 Blast Range:----)</font>

1 person.
A Powered Exoskeleton that has been customized for close combat. Output has been improved. It has the mobility of the Nix Red Shadow, and armor is improved. It has been equipped with new thrusters and this has greatly increased its flying distance. This aircraft specializes in overwhelming the enemy at close range. It has a Combat Burner and a machine gun on its arms. It is also equipped with huge Canister Shots on both shoulders. Because of the dispersal nature of its weapon, it can attack a wide area, and it can also penetrate objects to defeat several enemies. Its range is short because it is a dispersal weapon.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A new type of sentry gun (automatic enemy tracking gun) equipped with a flamethrower. After installation, it detects enemies using cameras and sensors and fires automatically.

No safety mechanism is installed, as priority was given to increasing the power output.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

The ultimate Spine Blaster upgrade. Its destructive power has been pushed to the limits, and its range is long.
Its high-density converged laser beam can pierce through objects and inflict damage on everything within the line of fire.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will shoot off beams continuously.
This weapon is extremely powerful when it's fully charged, but when the stored power decreases, the shooting range shortens accordingly, and so does its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

A prototype of the brainwave-guided weapon known as 'Mirage.' When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on to. Pressing the attack button will fire spears of the homing energy, which will explode on impact. The weapon is operated by linking to the brainwave-guided kit 'Psionic Link' that is fitted in the Wing Diver's helmet. As this 'brainwave-guided' requires a certain trait, only certain people are capable of wielding this weapon.

A high-performance guide beacon gun. Discharges a beacon to provide lock-on information, marking any foe it hits as a lock-on target for allied weapons. This, in turn, decreases the time it takes to establish a lock and increases the effective range of those weapons. Though these beacons can't offer the same level of precision as a Laser Guide Kit, they also require no maintenance of any kind until a target has been hit, giving them numerous situational advantages. Each beacon also supports multiple lock-ons, allowing for easy bombardment of particularly troublesome foes. Additionally, marked targets can be attacked as many times as needed, as beacons will remain intact even after missile detonation. If it should become necessary to reset a beacon in play, simply press the reload button to destroy it and ready a new one.

A perfect version of the MD-type FZ-Gun. This high-performance weapon spits massive flames and can attack a wide area.

No safety mechanism is installed, as priority was given to increasing the power output.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

The final model in the ZE-Gun series.
The gun turret's high rotation speed results in excellent rapid-fire performance. The  ammunition used and destructive power have also been increased, making it the ultimate automatic weapon.

Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
130mm Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:2800.0 Blast Range:Radius 13.0m)</font>

1 person.
A new model of the combat vehicle Blacker. There has been a full refurbishment of the Blacker E2 and this has significantly improved its performance. Its main cannon is a 130mm Howitzer. Its blast area on impact has significantly increased because of the larger caliber. Its mobility performance is greatly improved through the installation of a new-generation engine. The maximum speed, turning performance and turret rotation speed have all been improved. However, the output is very high, and control can become difficult. It should only be operated by a skilled driver.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.
A protective suit both strong and light.

A mortar that fires shrapnel. The shrapnel travel in a parabolic path, and detonate on impact over a large area.Though the attack area is wide, the range is short and the recoil is intense, often leaving the wielder frozen and vulnerable until the powered exoskeleton has fully absorbed the impact.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.
A protective suit that absorbs impacts. It slows down the speed reduction when being hit.
A light Liquid Armor that can slow down the speed reduction and make it easier to move when being hit.
A new model of the Lightweight Protector. It has been made even lighter while maintaining its strength.

An improved version of the Destroyer Blaster. With its beams concentrated to the front, it can deal devastating damage to a single target. But once its powered stored is lowered, its beams diffuse.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. When the energy in tank reduces, the beams able to shoot lessens accordingly. Therefore if the situation allows, you should reload at any time to keep the firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

The final model of the Geist. It is a super weapon with extraordinary firepower. It can lock on to three targets. It fires three spears of energy at the same time. It requires a high talent to use the Psionic Link, and only one person to this day has shown that talent. For that reason, it was never mass-produced and still remains in testing.

A high-powered device designed to continuously fire sticky bombs. Its performance has been pushed to the limit.

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode.
The ultimate Liquid Armor. Completely prevent the speed reduction from happening when being hit.
A new model of the Liquid Armor which is light and impact-resistant.

An improved version of the Destroyer Blaster. It shoots out diffuse beams horizontally.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. When the energy in tank reduces, the beams able to shoot lessens accordingly. Therefore if the situation allows, you should reload at any time to keep the firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

An assist system for use in guided weapons such as missiles. Able to lock on a single enemy multiple times.
The lock-on speed is also improved.

A high-performance Gatling gun that boasts impressive destructive power, but it can take a while for the first shot to leave the barrel. Press and hold the attack button to start the barrel rotation. When rotation reaches a certain speed, it will start firing. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

Use this communication system to request an air strike.
Heavy bombers will then bring large cluster munitions, which have extremely high destructive power and fall in a diffuse manner.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.
A light and impact-resistant explosion-proof suit.
A device that assists the lock-on system of guided weapons such as missiles.

An equipment to heal subordinate soldiers.
Increase recovery amount of ally units when obtaining heal items.

A plasma arc cannon that mounts on the shoulder and can discharge a continuous plasma arc to decimate the enemy. Its destructive power is immense, but its output may be a little overzealous: after activation, it will continue firing until it runs out of power. Also, Fencers that don't carry Plasma Generators will not be able to reload on the battlefield.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

The final perfected spec Force Blade model with destructive power at extreme levels. Its maximum voltage attack spreads out and destroys enemies in a wide area.

Holding down the Attack button increases the power output. When output reaches maximum, release the button to unleash a powerful slash.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.
A Plasma Core specifically designed for a fast-paced aerial combat. Its power consumption during boosting is reduced, and it can take the full advantage of the speed during combat.

Improved Stun Copter with greatly increased flight speed.
Fires an electrode attached to a wire that pierces its target and delivers an electric shock.
This weapon was first developed as a stun gun for riot control, but its output was increased to lethal levels for use against monsters.

When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter fires an electrode.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

An enhanced model of the Splasher with improved firing speed and range, making it easier to handle. It also takes shorter time to accumulate energy.

A new weapon that fires numerous high-density plasma balls continuously. The high-density plasma balls are small but heavy, so they will fall quickly after they are fired, making the weapon a short-range weapon. But it can be fired towards the sky or be used in the air to strike multiple enemies.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. 
The number of bullets fired increases according to the amount of charged power.

Light Machine Gun (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1200 Damage:16.5 Range:160.0m)</font>

A military motorcycle fully armored and equipped with light machine guns on the flanks since it's produced for combat use. Able to gallop on the battlefield and eliminate enemies with its firepower.

Since it's still under tests and adjustments, there are some issues unsolved. The engine output is insufficient because it's been heavily armored, and the size of the fuel tank is thus smaller than planned, making it difficult to run for a long time. Other than that, its body balance is lost, and has to be equipped with smaller-caliber weapons.

Able to request underground.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

4 people.
An armored vehicle. Aside from the pilot, there are rear compartments for up to three troops. The main role of this vehicle is to transport soldiers to the battlefield. 
Aside from its basic use as a troop carrier, it also has a rotating turret on top, giving it some measure of combat ability. The shells discharged from the turret will explode on impact, causing area-of-effect damage. Its movement speed is also quite fast, giving it a variety of uses.

Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle, but anyone can ride in the rear compartments.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.
Heavy Bomber Vesta B Plan X2

An upgraded version of the military motorcycle Freed. Running system, such as wheels (including tires and rims), is fully improved and grip is greatly enhanced.

Able to request underground.

1 person.
The main attack helicopter of the EDF. It comes equipped with two fixed autocannons and missiles. When a target is within its sights (represented by a red square), the tracking system will lock on automatically.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A special cannon that emits a highly reflective laser. Can be discharged in a narrow passage, and due to the trajectory change when it's reflected off of walls, the laser blast will zigzag along the corridor. Very effective in a scuffle as it can reach the limit of its range without being obstructed.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount. 

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire a laser beam continuously. Its output decreases as the power stored in its tank depletes. Its destructive power also reduces with distance, so it may not be able to deal heavy damage to distant targets.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

The military motorcycle Freed equipped with a high output engine. 
Acceleration is greatly improved. Although the grip fails to catch up with the increasing power, this defect can be compensated by the rider's skills.

Able to request underground.

A large attack helicopter equipped with double rapid-fire cannons. Its offensive and defensive capabilities are of the highest class, making this something of a flying fortress. It is equipped with Pitbull Quickfire Cannons on both sides and can fire armor-piercing ammunition to one-shot multiple enemies. There are gunner seats located on the left and right as well to operate this weaponry. The one disadvantage of having this heavy weaponry is that they cannot be used if you don't have a gunner. Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle, but anyone can ride in the gunners seat. 

In order to request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Able to request underground.

Anti-air attack vehicle. Not only is it equipped with a powerful anti-aircraft machine gun, but its body is protected by armor that is greater than that of the BLACKER.

Originally, anti-aircraft guns were not designed for ground combat and were lightly armored, but this machine was given a heavily armored body in order to be a key component of ground forces in the war against aliens.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Heavily armed version of EDF's state-of-the-art armed helicopter, the Heron.

In addition to two autocannons, it also carries missiles.
The missiles automatically lock onto enemies within its sight (red square).

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An enhanced model of the Dexter Automatic Shotgun. A large shotgun with a self-loading mechanism. It has larger shells, but at the cost of a reduced magazine capacity. Automatically loads shells in the magazine with each shot, making continuous fire possible. When the magazine is empty, however, it takes several seconds to reload. Its range is fairly short, making it effective only in close-range combat.

It's possible to launch a wide range attack, but it has short effective range. Once the distance is long, its power decreases sharply.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

The ultimate autocannon with impressive destructive power. Fires high-caliber bullets, decimating the enemy. Due to its powerful recoil, however, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

105mm Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:245.0 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>

1 person.
The main combat vehicle of the EDF. It has been designed small in size under the assumption of urban warfare, so it can go off unimpededly either in urban main roads or narrow alleys. Both its firepower and defense are second to none comparing to current combat vehicles.

Its main cannon is a 105mm Howitzer. It has been developed for urban battles against terrorists, so its attack range has been prioritized over penetration power. It fires shaped charges which detonate on impact, causing damage to a wide area. 


In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Its blast area on impact has greatly increased because of the larger caliber.

A vehicle equipped with a new type Menace electromagnetic launcher (Railgun). It's amazingly destructive, but because of the increased weight of the electromagnet launcher, it's poor in mobility.


A vehicle equipped with a state-of-the-art electromagnetic launcher (Railgun) with accelerated shells and rapid fire support. The shells can penetrate objects and inflict damage on many enemies. The Railgun is equipped with a laser sight to ensure pinpoint accuracy, and the trajectory can be confirmed with the red line before firing. This is a very powerful weapon, but it lacks the blast area of the Howitzer, making it somewhat difficult to use in combat against monsters. To make up for this shortcoming, it's been fitted with a right and left Machine Gun on the rotating turret, which can be manned from either of the gunner seats. However, gunners should be aware that the seats face whatever their respective turrets are aiming at.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An enhanced Force Blade with an improved output limit. Takes a long time until this limit is reached, but when it is, a powerful long-shot is fired off.
The force field generated by the blade is launched forward to cut through enemies from a distance as the blade is swung. It does not have the destructive power of the Vibro Hammer, but its attack speed is better and it can attack aerial enemies. Press and hold the attack button to increase the output, then release it when the maximum has been reached in order to unleash a powerful slashing attack.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

3 people.
A huge combat vehicle, spanning a massive 25 meters. Basically a mobile fortress developed for land combat. Equipped with a main battleship-class cannon and two rotating turrets, as well as thick armor. The trade-off, however, is that all of these features add to its weight, making it a bit sluggish.

Its main cannon is the EDF's state-of-the-art Requiem Cannon, originally developed as a naval gun but then equipped on tanks after reducing the size of its barrel. This has resulted in a further reduction to its initial velocity, so some skill is necessary to hit the desired target.

There are two sub-cannons located on the top of the main cannon. It can fire armor-piercing ammunition and one shot can hit many enemies. The main cannon and sub-cannons all rotate. The sub-cannons are located on the top of the main cannon so when the main cannon rotates, the direction of the sub-cannons will also change. It is equipped with a missile launcher on the left and right to prevent enemies from approaching.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A vehicle equipped with a proto railgun--Epsilon Blast Proto Electromagnetic Launcher. This railgun was developed by the EDF as an ultimate weapon using high-performance electromagnetic launcher. Although it's just a prototype, it's destructive power already surpasses all current weapons.

A vehicle equipped with a state-of-the-art electromagnetic launcher (Railgun) with accelerated shells and rapid fire support. The shells can penetrate objects and inflict damage on many enemies. The Railgun is equipped with a laser sight to ensure pinpoint accuracy, and the trajectory can be confirmed with the red line before firing. This is a very powerful weapon, but it lacks the blast area of the Howitzer, making it somewhat difficult to use in combat against monsters. To make up for this shortcoming, it's been fitted with a right and left Machine Gun on the rotating turret, which can be manned from either of the gunner seats. However, gunners should be aware that the seats face whatever their respective turrets are aiming at.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Atomic Ray Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:7000  Damage:62.5 (1000 burst)  Range:600.0m)</font>

A large combat vehicle equipped with a super weapon still under development—the Atomic Ray Cannon. This super weapon is able to generate and irradiate high-pressure energy capable of destroying a mountain instantly.
It can cause terrible damage, but the energy consumption and costs are enormous. The current manufacturing cost is said to be 100 million dollars per vehicle, making it impractical for actual combat. However, in order to destroy the aliens' golden armor, dozens of these vehicles have been produced in a hurry.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A high-output Plasma Cannon. It's a powerful weapon that boasts a wide blast area, but the speed of its plasma balls is slow, and its energy cost is high.

A weapon that fires plasma balls. Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

The perfect insect-shaped bomb. The Advanced Technologies Lab has personally seen to its successful development.
The number of bombs that can be activated simultaneously has been increased and they spread out to cover a wider area.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. Press and hold the Use Backpack Tool button to detonate.

Equipped with two autocannons.

An enhanced version of the ground support helicopter, Nereid. The range of the Auto-acquisition Autocannon has been improved, along with its mobility and its general ability to seek and destroy targets. 

The Auto-acquisition Autocannon can detect enemies within the angle of fire and it will automatically target them. Its ground support capability is overwhelming and the Nereid can easily decimate enemies below it. Its lower firing angle makes it a ground support weapon only, however--it can't handle airborne foes.

A final battle spec of this large attack helicopter. It is equipped with Dauntless SA Heavy Guns on both sides, which fire armor-piercing ammunition that can one-shot multiple foes. It has improved firing speed and ballistic speed when compared with traditional models. There are gunner seats located on the left and right as well to operate this weaponry. The one disadvantage of having this heavy weaponry is that they cannot be used if you don't have a gunner. Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle, but anyone can ride in the gunners seat.

1 person.
The latest battle spec of the ground support helicopters, Nereid. The range of the Auto-acquisition Autocannon has been improved significantly and it can clear enemies from a high altitude. Its mobility has also been improved to the highest level, making it an outstanding attack helicopter with terrible devastating power. 

The Auto-acquisition Autocannon can detect enemies within the angle of fire and it will automatically target them. Its ground support capability is overwhelming and the Nereid can easily decimate enemies below it. Its lower firing angle makes it a ground support weapon only, however--it can't handle airborne foes.

In order to request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A Blood Storm convergent missile cannon. Missiles launched from this weapon will separate in the air and rain down on the enemy's head. Their damage pattern isn't limited to a single target, but an entire area. Though exceptionally powerful, misuse of the homing feature when the enemy is too close can reduce its effect.

Press and hold the attack button to display the sight, represented by a red square. When a target within the lock-on range is captured with the sight, a positive lock will be established. A maximum of two enemies may be locked on at any given time. Release the attack button to unleash missile to the locked-on target or targets.

A weapon that fires multiple powerful bolts of electricity. It requires a great deal of energy for each shot, but it boasts incredible firepower and a wide range.
The bolts will diffuse and then gather immediately, shooting straight towards the aiming direction.

Compared to the early model, it has a higher rate of convergence of bolts. 

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The more power accumulated, the more likely the lightening concentrates on the aiming direction; whereas the energy accumulation decreases, the lightening diffuses. In that case, it's difficult to hit the target, but you can attack in a wider range.

Officially known as the Zero Range Plasma Arc Gun, this is a super weapon specifically developed for the Wing Divers. Best for close-range combat with only 30-meter range, however it's amazingly destructive, and can discharge countless plasma arc blades to destroy almost everything. Since you have to use it close to the target, it's highly risky, but its overwhelming power in close range is certain.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire plasma arc blades.

All-new long-range sentry gun.
The high-performance sensor enables the gun to target enemies at greater distances. The gun's range and power have also been enhanced.

Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

An enhanced model of the Closed Laser MSA with greatly increased firepower. Its accuracy and projection time have seen improvements as well.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will continuously irradiate the laser until the stored energy runs out.
The projection time increases with the amount of energy accumulation. The more the accumulation is, the higher the energy efficiency can be and the longer time for the weapon to fire.

%dq%Power Lance%dq% is a generic term for a category of short-ranged particle laser cannons, which are made for Wing Divers. Their range is extremely short, but their firepower is devastating.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

The first prototype of a new short-range weapon currently under development. Emits rays of energy to destroy its target.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

A long-range Power Lance. Its range is increased, but as a trade-off, it requires more energy to be fully charged.

%dq%Power Lance%dq% is a generic term for a category of short-ranged particle laser cannons, which are made for Wing Divers. Their range is extremely short, but their firepower is devastating.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

Output-enhanced Rapier. Destructive power is greatly improved. On the other hand, it takes time to recharge.

Officially known as the Zero Range Plasma Arc Gun, this is a super weapon specifically developed for the Wing Divers. Best for close-range combat with only 30-meter range, however it's amazingly destructive, and can discharge countless plasma arc blades to destroy almost everything. Since you have to use it close to the target, it's highly risky, but its overwhelming power in close range is certain.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire plasma arc blades.

A high-output Power Lance. It deals great damage with a single shot. However, it requires several times the energy of a standard Power Lance, so it has a longer charge time.

Compared to the early type, its firepower is greatly increased, but it also costs more energy, and has a longer charge time.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

A weapon based on the Spark Vine. It diffuses 12 beams of energy. Different from the Spark Vine, which focuses its attack on a single point, this weapon can attack over a wider area.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

A weapon developed from the Spark Vine. Pull the trigger (press the Attack button) to shoot 6 rays of energy continuously.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

An upgraded version of the Double Lance, a 2-round burst Power Lance. It fires 2 rounds of high-output beams, which will slightly diffuse, and can attack multiple targets at once depending on the situation. As a result of its improved design, its destructive power no longer decreases with distance. It has a long range, and is easy to handle.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

A Spine Driver specializing in destructive power. With each press of the attack button, the hammer extends three times in succession.

A mechanical hammer with great destructive power. Instead of attacking with a spear, it attacks with a hammer fitted with a blade to crush the target. During impact, high-pressure plasma will be released from its tip, destroying the target from within. Though it has no penetrative power, its recoil is excellent. Press the attack button to attack with the hammer. Even allows for its user to attack while wielding a shield.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

An enhanced model of the Spark Vine Y6. It emits 6 rays of energy at the same time. The diffuse energy concentrates on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

A large shotgun with a self-loading mechanism that automatically loads new shells in the magazine after each shot, making continuous fire possible. When the magazine is empty, however, it takes several seconds to reload. As its shot will spread out after being fired, its range is shorter. Therefore, this weapon should be considered a close-range weapon.

It's possible to launch a wide range attack, but it has short effective range. Once the distance is long, its power decreases sharply.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A high-output Power Lance. It deals great damage with a single shot. However, it requires several times the energy of a standard Power Lance, so it has a longer charge time.

It is successfully enhanced in all aspects, and has stable performance.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

A new type of Power Lance. When fully charged, it reaches its maximum performance, and can discharge an incredibly destructive beam. If it is fired before it is fully charged, its power will greatly decrease.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

An improved version of the ZDM Pulse Machine Gun with greatly improved destructive power as a result of limiting its area of effect.

It fires high-powered pulse energy bullets. When the bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

Use this high rapid-fire device to fire continuous sticky bombs. 

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode.

A weapon developed from the Spark Whip. It diffuses 3 beams of energy in different directions, respectively. Because it can attack over a wider area, it is effective against a legion of enemies.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

An super high-performance Plasma Cannon. Compared to the D, its blast area is smaller, but has been improved in many other aspects.

A weapon that fires plasma balls. Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

An enhanced Flame Revolver. It discharges flames of much greater intensity than a regular flamethrower by generating a high temperature inside its cylinders, and then rotating them at high speeds. Though it boasts tremendous power, it takes some time to reach the necessary temperature, resulting in a four-second delay between pressing the attack button and seeing any results. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing. This means you need to adjust your aim regularly in order to hit your targets continuously. When you are wielding two weapons, it is nearly impossible to adjust your aim at the same time.

Its emitted flame gets cooled down by the air, making the firepower to greatly decrease with distance. In order to use the weapon effectively, you need to get as close as possible to the enemy.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A Beacon Discharger.
Use this beacon to signal a 190mm Cannon attack from the gunship that is circling the skies, and it will launch an attack where the beacon hits.

The 190mm Cannon is huge, even larger than the 180mm Cannon, which is why it takes slightly longer to aim and to reload.
The Cannon can fire only once per request, but it can fire consecutively if loaded with multiple shells.

Press the attack button to discharge a beacon which will start guiding only when hitting an object, so it could be useless if you target at somewhere with no objects. Also, a beacon out of range will activate its safety device and disable it. In short, the beacon must hit an object in range. There is a laser device equipped on the Beacon Discharger to determine the range. Once you confirm the laser light has hit the object in range, you can discharge the beacon with certainty that the beacon can be activated properly.

The loading work for the coming fire is conducted in a gunship, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

A high-output Power Lance. It deals great damage with a single shot. However, it requires several times the energy of a standard Power Lance, so its has a longer charge time.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

A 3-round burst Power Lance that fires 3 rounds of high-output beams. It is able to destroy multiple targets at once depending on situations.
It boasts numerous functional improvements, making it a very powerful weapon.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

A weapon developed from the Spark Vine. Pull the trigger (press the Attack button) to shoot 8 rays of energy continuously.
Compared to the Y6, it can accumulate more energy. Its capacity is greatly increased, but it also requires more energy when reloading.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

A rapid-fire version of the Lightning Bow.
Its rate of fire is so high that it consumes all of its stored power in no time. But this also proves that the weapon can provide massive firepower for a short period of time.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. The more power stored, the longer time you can fire.
As the accumulated energy decreases, accuracy declines.

A new Rapier equipped with a power amplification device called 'Casket.'
This weapon is a very powerful weapon designed for striking multiple enemies at once.  For this purpose, the Plasma Gun is modified to be able to shoot rays of energy that diffuse horizontally. But because it is unable to focus its attacks on a single target, it may not be suitable for all situations.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy in the Casket. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will discharge the accumulated energy and fire off the Plasma Gun continuously in a certain time span.
The output is amplified according to the amount of stored energy and so is destructive power. The more energy accumulated, the greater flying distance, shot number and firepower. Also, the diffusion range converges more toward the front.
Although the Plasma Gun is very extremely effective , its power decreases greatly with distance, so you have to be as close as possible to the enemy, make it a high-risky weapon to use.

This weapon developed from the Spark Whip. It diffuses 5 beams of energy in different directions.
Compared to the W3, its firing speed is greatly increased.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

A power-enhanced model of the Dexter Automatic Shotgun. A large shotgun with a self-loading mechanism. By increasing the caliber, the destructive power has been dramatically increased. However, this has reduced the firing speed. Its chamber capacity is much greater than the D model, but its range has been reduced, and it takes a bit longer to reload.

It's possible to launch a wide range attack, but it has short effective range. Once the distance is long, its power decreases sharply.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A burst-fire Power Lance that fires 2 shots of high-output beams in succession.
Because a Triple Power Lance placed too much load on the body of the weapon itself, the 2-round burst Power Lance was enhanced instead. As a result, this formidable weapon boasting numerous functional improvements was developed.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

A super weapon with terrifying power, its existence itself is treated as top secret. It discharges two balls of energy into the air which hang there silently, then release numerous bolts of lightning in all directions.

Because it requires a large amount of energy, it placed a heavy burden on the flight unit when it was first developed. However, the problem was solved by installing a high-performance generator. It has become one of the best equipment for wing divers.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

This ultimate Rapier is at the top of its class--so powerful that no one could wield it effectively for the longest time, resulting in it being sealed away and nearly forgotten.
Its capacity and firepower are both high, and its reload time is short.

Officially known as the Zero Range Plasma Arc Gun, this is a super weapon specifically developed for the Wing Divers. Best for close-range combat with only 30-meter range, however it's amazingly destructive, and can discharge countless plasma arc blades to destroy almost everything. Since you have to use it close to the target, it's highly risky, but its overwhelming power in close range is certain.

A rapid-fire version of the Bolt Shooter that fires super high-voltage bolts of lightning from a long distance accurately, making it possible to snipe distant targets.

It is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the weapon to be fired upon flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

A 3-round burst Dragoon Lance that fires 3 high-output beams. Its energy cost is greatly increased, but it also has impressive destructive power.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

A perfected Spark Vine. It emits 12 rays of energy. The diffuse energy concentrates on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

A new type of Power Lance. While it is single-barreled, it has the longest range of any Power Lance. It also has greatly improved destructive power.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

This ultimate burst-fire Power Lance. It fires 3 high-output beams in succession. It is able to destroy multiple targets at once depending on situations.
Compared to the single-barreled Power Lance ZA, it has a shorter range, but has a greater destructive power in general.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

An improved Mirage 15. It can lock on to 15 targets at once, and after discharge, it'll fire 15 needles of light, which will disperse and pierce the enemy. When a target is captured within its sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. You can then press the attack button to discharge. This weapon was developed for use against huge throngs of enemies, and is not generally recommended for small groups. It also uses the same amount of energy regardless of the number of enemies being targeted, so efficiency is not one of its strong points.

The perfected Spark Whip. It diffuses 12 beams of energy. Different from the Spark Vine, which concentrates its attack on a single point, this weapon can attack over a wider area.

Although it's devastating, the emitted energy disappears instantly and its range is short.
The energy tends to be reflected when it hits objects, so can be used to attack multiple enemies at a time.

A high-performance Dragoon Lance that excels in all fields.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Attack power differs according to the charging amount: the better charged, the greater output.
Also, the converged energy diffuses and the firepower drops when the distance between you and enemies increases.
Compared with the Power Lance, its decline in power caused by distance is dramatic and it cannot rapid fire.
This is a very powerful weapon, but precise shooting skills and tactics to approach enemies are required, so always staying calm is the key to use it.

A long-range version of the Flashing Spear, with more than twice the range and increased destructive power of the M5 model.

A mechanical spear that incorporates an acceleration mechanism. As a result of this improvement, it can now better support continuous attacks, though it lacks the strength of a standard Blasthole Spear. Press and hold the attack button to launch multiple attacks. Each spear will rotate to penetrate the target, after which point high-pressure plasma will be released from its tip, destroying the object from within. The expansion and retraction of the spear are virtually instantaneous, allowing for extremely fast attacks. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable. It can penetrate multiple targets with its power. Pairs well with a shield.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The final model of the Phalanx. It fires all of its plasma guns out front, destroying its target completely.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy in the Casket. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will discharge the accumulated energy and fire off the Plasma Gun continuously in a certain time span.
The output is amplified according to the amount of stored energy and so is destructive power. The more energy accumulated, the greater flying distance, shot number and firepower. Also, the diffusion range converges more toward the front.
Although the Plasma Gun is very extremely effective , its power decreases greatly with distance, so you have to be as close as possible to the enemy, make it a high-risky weapon to use.

New powered exoskeleton designed for close combat. Features a very fast walking speed and enhanced lateral boost jumps when equipped with jump boosters. When equipped with side thrusters, thruster dash reuse intervals are shorter.
Also has a wider range of item recovery.

A diffuse beam cannon. It fires numerous beams over a wide area. It has a short range, but boasts immense destructive power.
It is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. When the energy in tank reduces, the beams able to shoot lessens accordingly. Therefore if the situation allows, you should reload at any time to keep the firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

A particle beam rifle developed for use by Wing Divers. It is more accurate and destructive than a ballistic weapon.
The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

Compared to the early type, its firepower is greatly increased, but it also requires more energy when reloading.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. 
However, its output decreases as the power stored in its energy core depletes. When the power left in its energy core is at half of its maximum amount, its greatest level of destruction falls to about 25 percent of the maximum amount. For that reason, as long as the situation allows it, you should reload to preserve its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

A diffuse beam cannon. It fires numerous beams over a wide area. It has a short range, but boasts immense destructive power.
It is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. When the energy in tank reduces, the beams able to shoot lessens accordingly. Therefore if the situation allows, you should reload at any time to keep the firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

An extra high-performance large missile launcher. Launches laser-guided missiles.
This weapon is devastating, but cannot be used alone: it must be paired with an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit (or a guide beacon) to establish a viable target lock. 

Through the Laser Guide Kit, the lock-on location is confirmed. When the laser guide location (or a guide beacon) is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. After the lock-on, releasing the attack button will launch the missile. The missile will fly at the targeted location and cause a tremendous explosion, damaging the whole area. 

Although it's a powerful weapon with a wide explosive range, it takes long to lock on. Please be cautious when using it.

A double-barreled particle beam cannon that fires two beams simultaneously in a V pattern. The double-barreled cannon has more firepower than previous models, but its accuracy is severely decreased.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire a laser beam continuously.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.
An enhanced model of the V3 Plasma Core. It has been improved in various aspects.

An incredibly powerful super weapon that discharges a ball of energy into the air which splits apart and launches rays of devastating light forward continuously.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

1 person.
An improved model of the N9 Eros. Takeoff performance is greatly improved. The ability to takeoff quickly, means it is easier to operate on the battlefield. It also has Twin Napalm Guns equipped instead of missiles. Multiple napalm bombs can be fired at the same time, which can burn the site on impact.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An anti-air Diffuser model. Designed to be fired upward, and is thus especially effective against flying enemies. Discharges a ball of energy which stays in the air and fires off arrows of light in the vicinity continuously. When discharged (the speed will have an impact on the direction) it is possible to control the height and trajectory.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A high-output Mag Blaster, this new model boasts considerably higher firepower than any other previous model. But it can only maintain its massive firepower for a short period of time. When the power stored is depleted to half, its destructive power is reduced to 1/8 of the original.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire a laser beam continuously.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

A double-barreled Reflectron Laser that fires in two directions. Can be discharged in a narrow passage, and due to the trajectory change when it's reflected off of walls, the laser blast will zigzag along the corridor. Very effective in a scuffle as it can reach the limit of its range without being obstructed.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount. 

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire a laser beam continuously. Its output decreases as the power stored in its tank depletes. Its destructive power also reduces with distance, so it may not be able to deal heavy damage to distant targets.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

Improved version of the Electromagnetic Shaft 2L. Radiates energy in 5 directions to reach long distances.

A device that generates a sphere of energy. The sphere radiates light energy in one direction while airborne.
Its lethal light ray can act as a trap when placed in the enemy's path.

If used effectively, it can stop a large number of enemies at once, increasing Wing Divers' rate of survival.

Ally soldiers' equipment is covered with a special reflective coating, preventing them from taking damage.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

An enhanced model of the Plasma Cannon C. It can accumulate energy in a short period of time, allowing it to fire continuously. It has been improved in all aspects.

A weapon that fires plasma balls. Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A smoke grenade used to request a crossfire attack from the specially-formed Mortar Squad directed at the location of impact. The shells from this attack detonate as they land, causing damage to the area. 

Lots of mortars are required, so you'll need much more credits to request this.

Press and hold the attack button to wind up your throw, then release to let the smoke grenade fly. Its expected trajectory will be indicated by a red line.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A particle beam rifle developed for use by Wing Divers. It is more accurate and destructive than a ballistic weapon. 
The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the Wing Diver to fire the weapon when flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. 
However, its output decreases as the power stored in its energy core depletes. When the power left in its energy core is at half of its maximum amount, its greatest level of destruction falls to about 25 percent of the maximum amount. For that reason, as long as the situation allows it, you should reload to preserve its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

A brainwave-guided weapon that creates powerful arrows of light. After an arrow has been released, it will speed toward its target. It will pierce the enemy and explode. It got its name by the fact that it looks like a glittering blade. It is excellent at tracking an enemy. Once locked on, even if the enemy leaves line of sight for a short time, the weapon will maintain the lock-on.  When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge.

A high-caliber sniper rifle with a damaged scope. Its shots can pierce through any enemy and inflict damage on any target within the line of fire. Its range and accuracy are also high. However, because of its unique build, it must be reloaded after each and every shot.

A quintuple-barreled Reflectron Laser. Its destructive power has been pushed to the limits, and its firepower no longer decreases greatly as the power stored depletes.

Can be discharged in a narrow passage, and due to the trajectory change when it's reflected off of walls, the laser blast will zigzag along the corridor. Very effective in a scuffle as it can reach the limit of its range without being obstructed.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, which provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount. 

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire a laser beam continuously. Its output decreases as the power stored in its tank depletes. Its destructive power also reduces with distance.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

An improved version of the Destroyer Blaster F. With its beams concentrated to the front, it can deal devastating damage to a single target. But once its powered stored is lowered, its beams diffuse.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank, which provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. When the energy in tank reduces, the beams able to shoot lessens accordingly. Therefore if the situation allows, you should reload at any time to keep the firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

The final model of the Mag Blaster, with all aspects improved to the max.

By holding the trigger (holding the attack button), a beam will continue to fire. 
However, its output decreases as the power stored in its energy core depletes. When the power left in its energy core is at half of its maximum amount, its greatest level of destruction falls to about 25 percent of the maximum amount. For that reason, as long as the situation allows it, you should reload to preserve its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

A new type of gun that fires pulse energy bullets rapidly. It's a super weapon that has recently been developed.
When a pulse energy bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.
Although it's not as destructive as a ballistic weapon, it boasts an excellent rate of fire, allowing it to be able to strike multiple targets at the same time, making it a powerful weapon overall.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.
