1 person.
The final spec combat vehicle Blacker E. It has reached the peak of its performance. Its mobility is particularly impressive. Its main cannon is a 140mm Howitzer which fires shaped charges. They detonate on impact, causing damage to a fairly wide area.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An improved version of the Pulse Machine Gun. It fires fast-moving bullets, but its effective range is smaller.

When a pulse energy bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.
Although it's not as destructive as a ballistic weapon, it boasts an excellent rate of fire, allowing it to be able to strike multiple targets at the same time, making it a powerful weapon overall.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

A new shotgun developed for Air Raiders to protect themselves in city combat.

This weapon fires multiple special bullets at once, which will scatter widely, even an Air Raider with poor shooting skills can capture the target. These special bullets can penetrate object and neutralize the enemy. 
However, because it scatters in ultrahigh speed, its range is very short. Also, since its uses is limited, it's better to equip it as a sub weapon instead of a main weapon.

Air Raiders may not be able to perform well in an urban scuffle or a close-range combat. Carrying this shotgun could possibly increase their survival rate.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A super weapon that fires numerous pulse energy bullets at once. As it is just a prototype, it can only fire 20 projectiles simultaneously.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more energy stored, the more energy bullets able to shoot. As the amount of accumulation increases, energy efficiency increases, it is suggested to accumulate as much energy as possible.

A triple-barreled pulse machine gun that shoots out pulse energy bullets in three directions.
When a pulse energy bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

A new model of the Pulse Machine Gun that boasts an improved rate. Its rate of speed has been pushed to the limits.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

A quadruple-barreled Pulse Machine Gun that fires pulse energy bullets in 4 directions. With increased rate of accumulation in power, it can be fully charged in a short time.

When a pulse energy bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

Use an enhanced version of the Limpet Sniper for use at long-range.
Its destructive power and blast radius are both greatly increased. Its destructive power is particularly phenomenal. 

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode. It is mounted with a laser sight to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

To prevent allies from being attacked, it is equipped with a high performance safety device. You don't have to worry about allies getting hit or self exploding.

A super weapon that fires numerous pulse energy bullets at once. It can't fire continuously, but it can fire a maximum of 100 pulse energy bullets at once, making it an incredibly powerful weapon.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more energy stored, the more energy bullets able to shoot. As the amount of accumulation increases, energy efficiency increases, it is suggested to accumulate as much energy as possible.

A quintuple-barreled Pulse Machine Gun that fires pulse energy bullets in 5 directions.
When a pulse energy bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

A pulse machine gun that fires numerous diffuse pulse energy bullets.
As a super weapon with terrifying power, it requires a great deal of stored energy. The weapon can still fire continuously for a long period without being fully charged, but it is hard to accumulate energy in this state.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more energy stored, the more energy bullets able to shoot. As the amount of accumulation increases, energy efficiency increases, it is suggested to accumulate as much energy as possible.

A six-barreled Pulse Machine Gun that fires pulse energy bullets in 6 directions.
This six-barred weapon is considered to have reached the limits of a multi-barreled Pulse Machine Gun. It is extremely effective against multiple monsters.

When a pulse energy bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.

It can't fire continuously, but it can fire a maximum of 100 pulse energy bullets at once, making it an incredibly powerful weapon.

Compared to the early model, this weapon focuses its pulse energy bullets to the front, increasing its hit rate.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more energy stored, the more energy bullets able to shoot. As the amount of accumulation increases, energy efficiency increases, it is suggested to accumulate as much energy as possible.

When a pulse energy bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

A high-output Stardust Cannon with increased firepower and effective range, but it also requires more energy.

It can't fire continuously, but it can fire a maximum of 100 pulse energy bullets at once, making it an incredibly powerful weapon.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more energy stored, the more energy bullets able to shoot. As the amount of accumulation increases, energy efficiency increases, it is suggested to accumulate as much energy as possible.

A ten-barreled Pulse Machine Gun that fires pulse energy bullets in 10 directions.
When a pulse energy bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

The final enhanced model of the Stardust Cannon, with greatly improved performance.

A super weapon that fires numerous pulse energy bullets at once.
It can't fire continuously, but it can fire a maximum of 100 pulse energy bullets at once, making it an incredibly powerful weapon.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more energy stored, the more energy bullets able to shoot. As the amount of accumulation increases, energy efficiency increases, it is suggested to accumulate as much energy as possible.

An enhanced Force Blade with an improved output limit. Takes a long time until this limit is reached, but when it is, a powerful long-shot is fired off. 
The force field generated by the blade is launched forward to cut through enemies from a distance as the blade is swung. It does not have the destructive power of the Vibro Hammer, but its attack speed is better and it can attack aerial enemies. Press and hold the attack button to increase the output, then release it when the maximum has been reached in order to unleash a powerful slashing attack.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The final completed Lightning Bow. Its performance far surpasses that of the ZA model.

It continually emits rapid bolts of electricity that damage whatever they hit. Because the bolts leap from target to target throughout their range, they can take out several targets at a time.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. The more power stored, the longer time you can fire.
As the accumulated energy decreases, accuracy declines.

The final model of the Pulse Machine Gun. It fires high-powered pulse energy bullets. When the bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.  The weapon boasts a wide effective range, and its destructive power is formidable.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

A new type of gun that fires multiple electric bolts at once.
The bolts will diffuse and then concentrate on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point. This characteristic can be used to enable all of the bolts to hit a single target.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

A new type of gun that fires multiple electric bolts at once.
The bolts will diffuse and then concentrate on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point. This characteristic can be used to enable all of the bolts to hit a single target.

Compared to the early model, this weapon fires more bolts with increased destructive power. Its range is also increased, causing the bolts to converge on a farther point.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

The final enhanced model of the rapid-firing brainwave-guided weapon Fenrir that can lock on to 5 targets and attack them simultaneously. When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Pressing the attack button will discharge the weapon, and the discharge will explode on impact. It requires a user with extraordinary Psionic Link capabilities, and no one has yet been found who fits the bill.

A Thunder Crossbow that shoots out diffuse electric bolts horizontally.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The more power accumulated, the more likely the lightening concentrates on the aiming direction; whereas the energy accumulation decreases, the lightening diffuses. In that case, it's difficult to hit the target, but you can attack in a wider range.

A shoulder-mounted mortar. The shells will move in a trajectory, and cause a large detonation on impact. It is an effective weapon in combat over a wide area. Its recoil will be absorbed by the powered exoskeleton, but it may take some time to adjust the posture. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

The ultimate Bolt Shooter. It fires more bolts of lightning, boasting outstanding destructive power.

It is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the weapon to be fired upon flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

An enhanced model of the Bolt Gun that sacrifices firing speed for a greatly increased number of electric bolts it fires at a time. It has exceptional firepower.

The bolts will diffuse and then concentrate on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point. This characteristic can be used to enable all of the bolts to hit a single target.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

An enhanced model of the Thunder Crossbow with a focus on firepower. Despite its massive power, it requires a great deal of energy for each shot.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

Completed Luminous Shield type that produces 4 shields consecutively.

Blocks both friendly and enemy attacks. Soldiers and enemies alike can pass through the barrier.

Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

The completed model of the Flame Geyser flamethrower series with dramatically increased output and destructive power.

A special gun that discharges flames. This device can be easily directed at any target and will completely engulf it on contact, generating a giant column of fire where it previously stood. Because the device ejects in the opposite direction of the surface, it is possible to choose the surface and thus control the direction. For example, if fired towards the ground, the column of fire will reach up into the sky; if fired at a wall, a horizontal pillar of flame will be ejected (perpendicular to the surface of the wall). For this reason, it has many uses such as blocking the progress of an enemy. 

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

A small multicopter equipped with a large caliber heavy mortar. It fires powerful shells over a wide area.
The weight of its ammunition maxes out its carrying capacity, resulting in a relatively slow flight speed.

Flies around the user. When the target is indicated by a hand-thrown beacon, it moves into position and fires a series of shots at the beacon's impact point.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

The final spec form of the Blasthole Spear, further modifications to the MS model have resulted in an increase in power output.

A mechanical spear that stretches with a high speed to attack. Rotating the spear can penetrate several objects and afterwards high-pressure plasma will be released from the front end, destroying objects from within. The expansion and contraction of the spear are instantaneous, making it an extremely fast attack. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable and can penetrate multiple targets at a time. It is also possible to use it with a shield. This is the main weapon of a Fencer. It has short range, so it is necessary to get accustomed to it, but it's a valuable weapon. During a continuous attack, the second attack will be a rush. These attacks can be sustained over a long period.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The ultimate Bolt Gun upgrade. Its discharge capacity has been increased to the maximum, making it a formidable weapon.

The bolts of electricity it discharges will diffuse and then concentrate on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point. This characteristic can be used to enable all of the bolts to hit a single target.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

The ultimate Thunder Crossbow upgrade. Its rate of fire is improved, and it is more energy efficient.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The more power accumulated, the more likely the lightening concentrates on the aiming direction; whereas the energy accumulation decreases, the lightening diffuses. In that case, it's difficult to hit the target, but you can attack in a wider range.

A long-range laser gun. It has a long range, making it possible to snipe distant enemies. Its firepower is lower, but can destroy a target by continuously firing on it.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will continuously irradiate the laser until the stored energy runs out.
The projection time increases with the amount of energy accumulation. The more the accumulation is, the higher the energy efficiency can be and the longer time for the weapon to fire.

An enhanced version of the long-range laser gun. It can fire for a much longer period of time.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will continuously irradiate the laser until the stored energy runs out.
The projection time increases with the amount of energy accumulation. The more the accumulation is, the higher the energy efficiency can be and the longer time for the weapon to fire.

Formation of 4 unmanned attack aircraft, with two in the front and two in the back to achieve full coverage of the target area.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, machine gun fire rains down from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
Can distiguish friend from foe, posing no danger to the user and his/her allies.

An ultra high powered long-range weapon that fires off stunning lightening to instantly destroy the target in long distance. Its power greatly surpasses the Monster, but it consumes tremendous energy, not even the aerial unit can afford. To accumulate power to the max, emergency charge is required.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
Since it was designed on the premise of large energy consumption, as the stored energy reduces, the power decreases badly accordingly, and so does its accuracy.

An output-enhanced Bolt Shooter. It sacrifices its capacity and rate of fire for greatly increased firepower.
It fires super high-voltage bolts of lightning from a long distance accurately, making it possible to snipe distant targets.

It is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the weapon to be fired upon flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

A high-output version of the Monster. Although it requires several times the energy of a standard Monster, it boasts formidable destructive power that can penetrate its target and destroy multiple enemies at once.
As a result of its high output, the stability of the body of the gun is reduced, and its accuracy is also slightly decreased.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
Because it was designed with the idea that it would consume a lot of energy, when its stored energy is low, its power reduces significantly.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Electromagnetic Laser Cannon (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:10000 Damage:18.0)</font>
Electromagnetic Laser Cannon (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:10000 Damage:18.0)</font>
Particle Beam Cannon (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:5 Damage:[PT]10500.0)</font>

1 person.
Version of the Powered Exoskeleton Eiren that was officially deployed.
Equipped with a particle beam cannon.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A rapid-fire version of the Bolt Shooter. Its rapid-fire capability is higher than that of the RA.

It is equipped with a small energy tank, allowing the weapon to be fired upon flying. The energy tank provides the power for firing the weapon, so the weapon doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the maximum amount.

An improved version of the atomic ray gun Blazer. Assuming combat with a large number of monsters, it fires a large number of horizontal light rays simultaneously. It can defeat a wide range of enemies.

Because it has been adjusted for use against monsters, each time the trigger is pulled, it takes only an instant to fire.
In addition, the output of each ray is suppressed and tends to spread out. Therefore, the further away from the point of impact, the less powerful the beam becomes (although only slightly).

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

The final model of the super high-output long-range laser gun 'Monster'.  It fires off all of its stored energy at once to instantly destroy the target in the distance.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
Because it was designed with the idea that it would consume a lot of energy, when its stored energy is low, its power reduces significantly.

A weapon that fires plasma balls. Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A 2-round burst Plasma Cannon that fires 2 plasma balls in a row.
Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.
'2' signifies the number of rounds. There is no 'Plasma Burst Cannon 1'.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A mortar that fires shrapnel. The shrapnel travel in a parabolic path, and detonate on impact over a large area. Though the attack area is wide, the range is short and the recoil is intense, often leaving the wielder frozen and vulnerable until the powered exoskeleton has fully absorbed the impact.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A new weapon that fires numerous high-density plasma balls continuously. The high-density plasma balls are small but heavy, so they will fall quickly after they are fired, making the weapon a short-range weapon. But it can be fired towards the sky or be used in the air to strike multiple enemies.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. 
The number of bullets fired increases according to the amount of charged power.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack from the scout bomber, and it will start bombing the indicated area.
It is mostly equipped with scout equipment and carries a smaller bomb load.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

A special machine gun that incorporates Plasma Cannon technology.
Fires multiple small, high-speed plasma bullets at a time that explode on impact. It has a wide blast area, allowing it to take out multiple enemies at once,
The small plasma bullets are lighter, and their trajectory is straighter than that of the balls fired by the Plasma Cannon, so this weapon can be used at a significant distance.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. 
The number of bullets fired increases according to the amount of charged power.

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from combat bombers. Three combat bombers will enter the designated attack area in a side-by-side and launch a strafing run.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

A six-barreled Plasmafall that fires 6 high-density plasma balls at once. Because the six plasma balls have different initial speeds when discharged, they cover different distances. As the weapon can hit 6 different places per shot, it is capable of attacking over a very wide area.

The plasma balls discharged are very dense and heavy, so their trajectory changes quickly. Just as firing a mortar, you have to aim high when you fire this weapon.
Be careful not to injure yourself by aiming too low.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
When the accumulated power reaches the maximum amount, this weapon can attack with its full power, and its effective area will be the widest.

A 3-round burst Plasma Cannon that fires 3 plasma balls in a row.
Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A 4-round burst Plasma Cannon that fires 4 plasma balls in a row. It features excellent firepower and a wide blast area.
The interval between each shot is short, and it can shoot out 4 plasma balls instantly. But as a result, it can't deal with multiple enemies by hitting at different locations.

Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A device that enhances the thruster and the booster simultaneously.
Enables 4 consecutive thrust-dashes.
Enables 5 consecutive boost jumps.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster or a Jump Booster)

An improved version of the Plasma Cannon with greatly improved accuracy and shot speed.

A weapon that fires plasma balls. Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

An enhanced model of the Grit Shot. It fires multiple small, high-speed plasma bullets at a time that diffuse horizontally.
These bullets explode on impact. The weapon has a much longer range and can be used at a more significant distance than the more standard shotgun used by Rangers. It also boasts a high rate of fire.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. 
The number of bullets fired increases according to the amount of charged power.

A special machine gun that incorporates Plasma Cannon technology.
Fires multiple small, high-speed plasma bullets at a time that explode on impact. It has a wide blast area, allowing it to take out multiple enemies at once,
The small plasma bullets are lighter, and their trajectory is straighter than that of the balls fired by the Plasma Cannon, so this weapon can be used at a significant distance.

It is a very powerful weapon, but since the development of the Pulse Machine Gun got too far ahead, research of the Grit Gun has to be called off.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. 
The number of bullets fired increases according to the amount of charged power.

A triple-barreled Plasma Cannon. It fires 3 plasma balls that diffuse over a horizontal arc at once.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

The ultimate model of the Mirage brainwave-guided weapon. It can lock on to 15 targets and attack them simultaneously. It boasts a high rate of fire, and can deal great damage to multiple enemies. Such a brainwave-guided weapon can only be used by those with extraordinary psionic aptitude, but even within the Wing Divers, there is no one yet who has quite made the grade for it.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
120mm Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:1200.0 Blast Range:Radius 11.0m)</font>

1 person.
An advanced model of the Blacker E2. Its armor has been increased to the maximum level possible. Its main cannon is a 120mm Howitzer which has been improved as well. It fires shaped charges which detonate on impact, causing damage to a wide area.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A 2-round burst Plasma Cannon that fires 2 plasma balls in a row. It's a high-performance weapon, but its shot speed and accuracy are not always perfect.
Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A 10-barreled Plasmafall that fires 10 high-density plasma balls at once. Because the plasma balls have different initial speeds when discharged, they cover different distances. As the weapon can hit multiple locations per shot, it is capable of attacking over a very wide area.

The plasma balls discharged are very dense and heavy, so their trajectory changes quickly. Just as firing a mortar, you have to aim high when you fire this weapon.
Be careful not to injure yourself by aiming too low.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
When the accumulated power reaches the maximum amount, this weapon can attack with its full power, and its effective area will be the widest.

A final battle spec Flame Revolver with its output increased to the max. It delivers intense heat that can evaporate everything it touches. It takes time to generate such high temperatures, however, requiring up to 6 seconds before discharge, and increasing recoil dramatically. Whosoever wields this must have the highest of skill levels.

Its emitted flame gets cooled down by the air, making the firepower to greatly decrease with distance. In order to use the weapon effectively, you need to get as close as possible to the enemy.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A high-performance guard capsule whose upgrades are based on actual battle data. Two units can now be activated simultaneously in order to protect the user from a distance. Both units can respond independently to multiple approaching targets.

Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

An enhanced model of the Plasma Heavy Cannon that fires super high-density plasma balls. It's a formidable weapon that takes firepower and blast area to an unimaginable whole new level.
Compared to the Plasma Heavy Cannon, the projectile speed is significantly faster, striking the target instantly. As a result, long-range attacks have become possible.

Because it was designed with the idea that it would consume a lot of energy, when its stored energy is low, its destructive power reduces significantly.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A high-performance Plasma Cannon. It boasts a wide blast area, and excels in many other aspects.

A weapon that fires plasma balls. Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The impact part has become a roller. Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the output of the roller. Immediately after it has been swung down, a charge attack will be unleashed by the roller.
The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the output. Releasing the button will unleash a three stage attack depending on the output.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A double-barreled Plasma Cannon. It shoots out 2 plasma balls that diffuse over a horizontal arc at once.
Compared to the Triple Plasma Cannon, its discharge capacity is lower, but has a better rate of fire.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

The ultimate Grit Shot upgrade.  It fires multiple small, high-speed plasma bullets at a time that diffuse horizontally.
These bullets explode on impact. The weapon has a much longer range and can be used at a more significant distance than the more standard shotgun used by Rangers. It also boasts a high rate of fire.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. 
The number of bullets fired increases according to the amount of charged power.

A multicopter equipped with an electrical discharge device.
The user indicates the target with a laser, and the aircraft fires a bolt of electricity at it from above, damaging surrounding objects.
Since electrical energy weakens as it diffuses, the further away the aircraft is from the target, the less damage it inflicts.

Electricity can be fired continuously for a certain period of time, so by moving the laser point, another target can be selected.

Once the aircraft's energy is depleted, it crashes.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.

An enhanced model of the Plasma Burst Cannon 4D that fires 4 plasma balls in a row. It features excellent firepower and a wide blast area.
The interval between each shot is stable, making it easier to handle.

Plasma balls flash and explode on impact, causing damage to the vicinity. While this weapon can attack over a wide area, making it a formidable weapon, the balls' gentle parabola makes the weapon unsuited for long-range attacks.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

A 20-barreled Plasmafall that fires 20 high-density plasma balls at once. Because the plasma balls have different initial speeds when discharged, they cover different distances. As the weapon can hit multiple locations per shot, it is capable of attacking over a very wide area.

The plasma balls discharged are very dense and heavy, so their trajectory changes quickly. Just as firing a mortar, you have to aim high when you fire this weapon. Be careful not to injure yourself by aiming too low.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
When the accumulated power reaches the maximum amount, this weapon can attack with its full power, and its effective area will be the widest.

A quintuple-barreled Mirage brainwave-guided weapon that can lock on to five targets. It fires 5 spears of energy at once, able to attack multiple enemies. The speed and homing performance are excellent. When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge. The energy spears will detonate on impact.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Guided Missile <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:100 Damage:570.0 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>

1 person.
An improved model of Naegling Self-Propelled Missile Launcher. The engine output has improved, increasing the movement speed. However, because of the high power, it is easy to lose control of the vehicle when turning.

The missiles have a homing feature so that they can directly target enemies. When a target is within the sight, it will lock-on. It is possible to lock-on to several enemies at once. Use the attack button to discharge.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An improved version of the Mirage 5-Way with greatly improved shot speed and rate of fire. A powerful weapon, although the homing feature can struggle to keep up with the faster shot speed.

When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge. The energy spears will detonate on impact.

A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). Through the improvement, a third stage attack is possible. It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted to objects, so it has no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. 
Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Release to unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output. The second stage attack is a long-range high voltage attack. When the output has increased to maximum, a maximum voltage attack will be unleashed after stepping forward. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The Vibro Drive is not suitable for rapid attacks. If you want to engage with a large number of monsters, equipping two hammers at the same time is recommended.

A 15-barreled brainwave-guided weapon. It can lock on to 15 targets at once, and after discharge, it'll fire 15 needles of light, which will disperse and pierce the enemy. When a target is captured within its sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge. This weapon was developed for use against huge throngs of enemies, and is not generally recommended for small groups. It also uses the same amount of energy regardless of the number of enemies being targeted, so efficiency is not one of its strong points.
An enhanced model of the V5 Plasma Core. It has been improved in various aspects.

A triple-barreled version of the Geist brainwave-guided weapon. It can lock on to three targets. It fires three spears of energy at the same time. It has greatly improved blast range and speed, making it a fearsome weapon. When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Pressing the attack button will discharge the weapon, and the discharge will explode on impact. 

It requires mastery of the Psionic Link, so very few people can use it, and as a result, only a few units were made.

A brainwave-guided weapon with superlative rate of fire, the Fenrir is based on the Rapid Mirage, and its performance is on a whole new level. It only locks-on to a single target, but it can shatter that target with its frightening shot speed.
When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Pressing the attack button will discharge the weapon, and the discharge will explode on impact.

A perfected five-barreled Mirage, with excellent destructive power and homing performance. Its speed has been reduced as a side effect of its improved output, but its overall performance is much greater.

A 30-barreled brainwave-guided weapon. It's a fearsome weapon that can attack 30 targets simultaneously.
When a target is captured within the sight (red square), it will be automatically locked on. Press the attack button to discharge spears of energy. The spears will chase down their targets and explode on impact.

It is very effective against multiple enemies, but because it releases too many spears of energy at once, the trajectory is difficult to control, and will result in the spears shooting in different directions. When the spears shoot downwards, they might injure the user on the ground. For that reason, it is most suitable for aerial combat.

Compared to the early model, it has a wider blast area, and thus it is more dangerous when in use on the ground. So it's highly recommended that this weapon be limited to aerial deployment only.

Creates numerous small plasma balls to be thrown by hand.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit.
Therefore, it can be used even during an emergency charge so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. It only takes a short time to reload.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

The ultimate Thunder Cluster, designed to be operated in midair. Discharges a ball of energy which stays in the air and fires off bolts of lightning downward continuously. When discharged (and note that speed will have an impact on direction), it is possible to control the height and trajectory. When activated in a high location, the lightning will disperse over a wide area; conversely, when activated in a lower location, the dispersal area is small and the damage will be concentrated on a single group of enemies.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A special Blink Ball designed to increase the survival rate of Wing Divers.

A plasma ball will fall quickly after it is thrown. It's not powerful when it hits, but it can still inflict damage across an wide area. It can be used even during an emergency charge so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. It only takes a short time to reload.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from high-speed bombers. Two high-speed bombers will enter the designated attack area in a side-by-side and launch a strafing run.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Creates numerous small plasma balls to be thrown by hand.
The plasma balls will diffuse vertically.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit.
Therefore, it can be used even during an emergency charge so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. It only takes a short time to reload.

Hold down the Use Independently Operated Equipment button to see the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release to throw the grenade.

High-power type of Luminous Shield. Produces a larger shield that can be maintained for a longer period of time.

A device that generates an energy barrier by curving space. Visible light rays can pass through the shield, allowing the user to see who or what is on the other side.
Blocks both friendly and enemy attacks. Soldiers and enemies alike can pass through the barrier.

Developed to compensate for the Wing Diver's low defensive capabilities.
Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

Twin-type Luminous Shield that produces 2 shields at once.

Blocks both friendly and enemy attacks. Soldiers and enemies alike can pass through the barrier.

Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

Completed Harmonic Shield type that produces 5 shields consecutively.

Blocks enemy attacks but allows attacks from allies to pass through. This wall requires a large amount of energy and can only be maintained for a short time.

Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

A device that generates a blade of energy.
Small and lightweight, it is used as a sidearm by Wing Divers.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. However, the blade maintains its form for only a brief moment immediately after being swung. This weapon's destructive power is rather low, and it is intended only for emergency self-defense.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use. Press and hold to reload.

A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is formed in the area of the massive vibration which reduces the damage taken when attacked. 
Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output, and when it's reached its max, release to unleash a powerful slashing maximum voltage attack.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The Vibro Drive is not suitable for rapid attacks. If you want to engage with a large number of monsters, equipping two hammers at the same time is recommended.

Lightweight Handy Saber.
Short-range but capable of high-speed swings.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. However, the blade maintains its form for only a brief moment immediately after being swung. This weapon's destructive power is rather low, and it is intended only for emergency self-defense.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use. Press and hold to reload.

High-powered Handy Saber with excellent destructive power and range, but it is rather large and requires more strength to use.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. However, the blade maintains its form for only a brief moment immediately after being swung. This weapon's destructive power is rather low, and it is intended only for emergency self-defense.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use. Press and hold to reload.

The final Handy Saber model. High-powered and lightweight, it has a longer range and improved swing speed.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. However, the blade maintains its form for only a brief moment immediately after being swung. This weapon's destructive power is rather low, and it is intended only for emergency self-defense.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use. Press and hold to reload.

A device that fires guided energy projectiles, developed for emergency self-defense.
Although it requires the helmet's brain wave guidance system, it is not connected to the Plasma Core and operates solely on the built-in battery. Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

An improved tracer drone equipped with a high-pressure, short-range laser cannon that can penetrate the enemy.

It is designed to memorize the user's movement and attack a target position.
Its simple AI allows for more drones to be activated at once, compared with other models.

Since it is equipped with advanced safety devices, there is no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

Use the Laser Guide Kit to transmit coordinates to a large airship to launch 20 small missiles. The laser must be maintained until the missiles hit. 

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.
The Laser Guide Kit is equipped with a scope.

Missile reloading is conducted in an airship, so  the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

A device that generates a sphere of energy. Increased power. It is now possible to release energy for a longer period of time.

The sphere radiates light energy in one direction while airborne.
Its lethal light ray can act as a trap when placed in the enemy's path.

If used effectively, it can stop a large number of enemies at once, increasing Wing Divers' rate of survival.

Ally soldiers' equipment is covered with a special reflective coating, preventing them from taking damage.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A device that produces an energy sphere that fires a particle beam.
The sphere emits a powerful beam while airborne, albeit for a short period of time.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

A high-powered Pulsar Spear. It radiates a beam of tremendous destructive power, albeit for a short period of time.

A device that produces an energy sphere that fires a particle beam.
The sphere emits a powerful beam while airborne, albeit for a short period of time.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

A high-powered Pulsar Spear. It radiates a beam of tremendous destructive power in 3 directions, albeit for a short period of time.

A device that produces an energy sphere that fires a particle beam.
The sphere emits a powerful beam while airborne, albeit for a short period of time.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

A top-secret super weapon. Its very existence is highly classified; it's anyone's guess how exactly it works. Discharges a ball of energy which stays in the air and releases arrows of light in the vicinity continuously. When discharged (the speed will have an impact on the direction) it is possible to control the height and trajectory.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A super weapon that can only be used by Wing Divers. Discharges a ball of energy. The ball stays in the air and continuously releases missiles that home in on nearby enemies. One shot won't do much, but this weapon can launch continuous attacks, making it a very effective weapon.
It requires mastery of the brainwave-guided kit Psionic Link, so only the elite members from Wing Divers are capable of using it.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A Heaven's Gate model that discharges a total of 10 balls of energy which send light pillars down to the ground. All who touch these pillars will be devastated. When discharged (and note that speed will have an impact on direction), it is possible to control the height and trajectory.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack from the Combat Bomber Kamuy.
It uses newly designed missiles with an increased blast area and ammo capacity.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

An enhanced Diffuser. It's a super weapon that destroys everything around it indiscriminately. Once it's activated, it brings calamity. Discharges a ball of energy which stays in the air and fires off arrows of light in the vicinity continuously. When discharged (and note that speed will have an impact on direction), it is possible to control the height and trajectory.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A mysterious super weapon. Its very existence is highly classified; it's anyone's guess how exactly it works. Discharges balls of energy which hang silently in the air and extend a pillars of light downward toward the ground. All who touch the pillars will be devastated. When discharged (the speed will have an impact on the direction) it is possible to control the height and trajectory.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

An improved Psi Cluster that concentrates its attack directly ahead of the user, releasing numerous points of light forward. Only really does damage ahead of the user, however, and thus should be reserved for just the right occasion. When discharged (and note that the speed will have an impact on the direction) it is possible to control the height and trajectory. When activated in a high location, its effects will disperse over a wide area; conversely, when activated in a lower location, the dispersal area is small and the damage will be concentrated on a single group of enemies.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Requiem Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:10 Damage:3375.0 Blast Range:Radius 30.0m)</font>
Machine Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:900 Damage:45.0 Range:480.0m)</font>

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Right):</font> Smooth-Bore Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:80 Damage:[PT]360.0 Range:900.0m)</font>
Missile Launcher (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:48 Damage:450.0 Range:240.0m)</font>

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Gunner Seat (Left):</font> Smooth-Bore Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:80 Damage:[PT]360.0 Range:900.0m)</font>
Missile Launcher (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:48 Damage:450.0 Range:240.0m)</font>

3 people.
A huge combat vehicle, spanning a massive 25 meters. Basically a mobile fortress developed for land combat. Equipped with a main battleship-class cannon and two rotating turrets, as well as thick armor. The trade-off, however, is that all of these features add to its weight, making it a bit sluggish.

Its main cannon is the EDF's state-of-the-art Requiem Cannon, originally developed as a naval gun but then equipped on tanks after reducing the size of its barrel. This has resulted in a further reduction to its initial velocity, so some skill is necessary to hit the desired target.

There are two Smooth-Bore Guns above the main cannon. It can fire armor-piercing ammunition and one shot can hit many enemies. The left and right weaponry has been changed to missile launchers to improve its combat capabilities. 
The main cannon and sub-cannons all rotate. The sub-cannons are located on the top of the main cannon so when the main cannon rotates, the direction of the sub-cannons will also change. 

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An enhanced Heaven's Gate 10 that discharges a total of 10 balls of energy each of which send light pillars down to the ground. All who touch these pillars will be devastated. When discharged (and note that speed will have an impact on direction), it is possible to control the height and trajectory.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

An air-to-surface Diffuser model that focuses its output downward, effectively dealing damage to enemies below, but having no reach above. Discharges a ball of energy which stays in the air and fires off arrows of light downward continuously. When discharged (the speed will have an impact on the direction) it is possible to control the height and trajectory.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. Its boost speed at charging forward and sideways is increased.

The Plasma Core is the heart of the Wing Diver's aerial unit. It is the device for generating energy. The performance of the aerial unit varies with equipped Plasma Core type.

A high-performance core can generate more energy than what is needed for flying. In addition, a powerful weapon requires high energy, and it will not be operational without a high-performance core. So it's no exaggeration to say the Plasma Core's performance directly affects the Wing Diver's combat strength.

Use the Laser Guide Kit to transmit coordinates to the hidden military base, Barren Land, to launch the large Tempest ATS missile. The laser must be maintained until the Tempest missile hits. The Tempest ATS is one of the ultimate destructive weapons.

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.
The Laser Guide Kit is equipped with a scope.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability.
Forward acceleration is increased.

A Beacon Discharger.
Use this beacon to signal a 105mm Consecutive Destruction Rapid-fire Cannon attack from the gunship that is circling the skies, and two guns will fire 105mm shells consecutively, aiming at several targets in the area where the beacon hits.

Press the attack button to discharge a beacon which will start guiding only when hitting an object, so it could be useless if you target at somewhere with no objects. Also, a beacon out of range will activate its safety device and disable it. In short, the beacon must hit an object in range. There is a laser device equipped on the Beacon Discharger to determine the range. Once you confirm the laser light has hit the object in range, you can discharge the beacon with certainty that the beacon can be activated properly.

The loading work for the coming fire is conducted in a gunship, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

A Plasma Core with increased maximum energy capacity. The maximum amount of energy the core can accumulate is greatly increased. However, its power supply efficiency to the aerial unit is low, so the flying speed is slightly reduced.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
FK200 Gatling Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1600 Damage:250.0 Range:120.0m)</font>
Rapid Bazooka (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:320 Damage:250.0 Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>
Rapid Bazooka (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:320 Damage:250.0 Blast Range:Radius 4.0m)</font>

1 person. Can be requested from underground locations.
A custom version of the Depth Crawler IV that's been tweaked almost beyond recognition. Now comes equipped with heavy Rapid Bazookas, yet suffers no loss of mobility as a result. These bazookas fire powerful rockets consecutively and do a great deal of damage to enemies.

A new model of the plasma core. Compared to the previous models, the performance of this model has been greatly improved.

The newly developed weapons for Wing Divers are all high-performance weapons, but they also have sky-high energy cost. This Plasma Core not only makes it possible to use them, but also greatly increases a Wing Diver's combat ability.

A hammer that is installed with a high output ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. It has tremendous destructive power, but control is difficult and attacks while moving are not possible. Its short range may also pose difficulties.
The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked.
Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the output. Releasing the button will unleash a three stage attack depending on the output. The second and third stage attacks create enormous explosions on impact, which can be used to destroy enemies in a wide area.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.
An enhanced model of the Turbo Core. The forward boost speed has been improved to the maximum level possible.

A Gatling gun with excellent destructive power, made possible to carry due to the development of the powered exoskeleton. It does take a short time for the first shot to leave the gun, but its rate of fire and the power of subsequent shots are terrifying. Press and hold the attack button to start the barrel rotation. When rotation reaches a certain speed, it will start firing. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.
An improved model of the V2 Plasma Core. It raises the Wing Diver's abilities to a new level
A new model of the Plasma Core. It boasts better performance than the V2.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Guided Missile <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:100 Damage:1300.0 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>

1 person.
An enhanced model of the Naegling Self-Propelled Missile Launcher D1 with improved destructive power and armor, as well as enhanced movement stability.

Its rockets have a homing feature so that they can directly target enemies. When a target is within the sight, it will lock-on. It is possible to lock-on to several enemies at once. Use the attack button to discharge.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

High-power Cosmic Laser model. It inflicts tremendous damage to all enemies in the line of fire.. It inflicts tremendous damage to all enemies in the firing line.
It releases all its power with each shot, so the power of the flying unit is transferred immediately after firing.
This weapon's power efficiency is somewhat poor due to the fact that it was hastily designed.

A big Plasma Core. It has been improved on various aspects by increasing the size of the core unit. In particular, the maximum energy it can accumulate, and the speed of supplying power to weapons are several times of the previous models.
However, its flying ability is slightly reduced as a trade-off of the increased weight of the unit.

A smoke grenade used to request an Enhanced Howitzer attack from the Artillery Squad directed at the location of impact. The shells from this attack detonate as they land, causing damage to the area. The attack area is enormous, so it's recommended the requester take care to throw this grenade as far as possible, lest he or she (as well as any nearby allies) get caught in the blast.

Press and hold the attack button to wind up your throw, then release to let the smoke grenade fly. Its expected trajectory will be indicated by a red line.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Blow-up dolls created by the EDF Public Relations Department for the purpose of recruiting soldiers, converted into combat decoys.
They were made to resemble idols contracted by the Public Relations Department to recruit young people at events.

The doll is equipped with a function that allows it to be moved by fine-tuning the air pressure in various parts. It also has a small built-in speaker and can talk.
Although these functions are excessive for a decoy, it can be difficult for the enemy to tell that it's not a real soldier, making it an effective decoy against monsters.

The content of its speech remains unchanged from its time as a recruitment tool.
Its song repertoire includes the official EDF theme used in the recruitment commercials. A different version is sung by the soldiers.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button to install. Press and hold to remove the installed device and prepare for re-use (reload).
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. In order to increase the survival rate of Wing Divers, the boost speed at charging backward and sideways is improved.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
New Revolver Cannon (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:600 Damage:288.0 Range:322.0m)</font>
New Revolver Cannon (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:600 Damage:288.0 Range:322.0m)</font>
Missile Pod (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:40 Damage:960.0 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>
Missile Pod (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:40 Damage:960.0 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>

1 person.
A Powered Exoskeleton that has been customized for anti-aircraft combat. New Revolver Cannons are equipped on both arms. The firing speed is improved, and this makes it possible to accurately aim at fast-moving targets. In order to make the most of the New Revolver Cannon's performance, the upper body's rotation turning speed has been improved to the maximum possible. If the pilot is skilled, fast flying enemies can be targeted and shot down. It is equipped with large missile pods on both shoulders.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A Plasma Core specifically improved on its maximum energy. The maximum amount of energy the core can accumulate is greatly improved. However, its power supply efficiency to the aerial unit is low, so the flying speed is slightly reduced.

An insect-shaped special bomb that has been redesigned and equipped with a flight function. It flies forward and attaches itself to the first thing it touches. Once attached, it's not easy to shake off.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. Press and hold the Use Backpack Tool button to detonate.

This superweapon was completed following immense research expenses, but the project was terminated after its development. However, the research was passed on to the Advanced Technologies Lab.

A final spec Quake Haken. A special hammer that is installed with multiple ultra-vibration generators (Vibro Drive). By reducing contact surfaces, it is possible for the vibrations to diffuse in several directions. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the Vibro Drive output. Releasing the attack button will unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output. The second stage releases vibrations in multiple directions while the user is moving forwards. The third stage focuses the majority of its output to the rear.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.
The latest Plasma Core model. It boasts far better performance than the V4.
Highest performance Plasma Core. The VZ Plasma Core's energy capacity has been taken to a whole new level.

A new type of portable support drone equipped with a heavy machine gun. It has low rapid-firing capability, but fires large-caliber rounds with excellent destructive power.
It carries a large amount of ammunition and can remain active for a long period of time.

Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A Blood Storm convergent missile cannon. Missiles launched from this weapon will separate in the air and rain down on the enemy's head. Their damage pattern isn't limited to a single target, but an entire area. Though exceptionally powerful, misuse of the homing feature when the enemy is too close can reduce its effect.
