Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured with the sight, a positive lock will be established. A maximum of two enemies may be locked on at any given time. Release the attack button to unleash missile to the locked-on target or targets.
A Plasma Core that specializes in the enhancement of the flying ability. Its boost speed at charging forward and sideways is greatly increased.

Improved Beam Carrier with a much longer fire duration. Redeployment takes longer due to charging.

The user indicates the target with a laser, and the aircraft fires a beam of energy at it from above.
The beam can be fired continuously for a certain period of time, so by moving the laser point, another target can be selected.

Once the aircraft's energy is depleted, it crashes.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.

All-new Bolt Gun. Further improvements were made to the Bolt Maximum Gun, the previous finalized model, to raise its destructive power to the utmost limit.
The bolts of electricity it discharges will diffuse and then concentrate on the aiming direction, eventually hitting a single point. This characteristic can be used to enable all of the bolts to hit a single target.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

A new type of portable support drone, two units can now be activated simultaneously in order to protect the user in dangerous environments.
Equipped with a flamethrower and automatically attacks approaching enemies.

Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target.
An improvement on the Vibro Hammer, the impact part has become a roller to compensate for the short range. Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the output of the roller. Immediately after it has been swung down, a charge attack will be unleashed by the roller. 
The vibrations are transmitted through objects, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the output. Releasing the button will unleash a three stage attack (regular attack, high voltage, maximum voltage) depending on the output.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.
(Clash Close Range Charge:0.0 Damage:$0 Effective Range:Radius 2.0m)

A personal heavy artillery that fires special shells with excellent penetrating force. Easily one of the largest personal weapons available, the weapon is so heavy that it takes the full strength of a powered exoskeleton only to barely lift it. Because of its large caliber, the recoil on discharge could kill an unarmored person. The recoil takes even a powered exoskeleton time to absorb. And in that time, you will be left completely vulnerable. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack.
Two heavy bombers will proceed to launch an airstrike on the designated area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.
High-Speed Bomber KM6 F2 Plan W2

An enhanced Vibro Hammer FA. A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted to objects, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked.
Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Release to unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output. The second stage attack is a long-range high voltage attack. When the output has increased to maximum, a maximum voltage attack will be unleashed after stepping forward. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The Vibro Drive is not suitable for rapid attacks. Equipping two hammers at the same time is recommended.

A high-performance flamethrower. It discharges flames of much greater intensity than a regular flamethrower by generating a high temperature inside its cylinders, and then rotating them at high speeds. Though it boasts tremendous power, it takes some time to reach the necessary temperature, resulting in a four-second delay between pressing the attack button and seeing any results. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing. This means you need to adjust your aim regularly in order to hit your targets continuously. When you are wielding two weapons, it is nearly impossible to adjust your aim at the same time.

Its emitted flame gets cooled down by the air, making the firepower to greatly decrease with distance. In order to use the weapon effectively, you need to get as close as possible to the enemy.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked.
Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Release to unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output. The second stage attack is a long-range high voltage attack. When the output has increased to maximum, a maximum voltage attack will be unleashed after stepping forward. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

This Vibro Hammer cannot be used by just anyone--only Fencers equipped with an Powered Exoskeleton.

A lighter Force Blade. Its output can be increased rapidly. As a result of its improved design, it is easier to use as a blade.
The force field generated by the blade is launched forward to cut through enemies from a distance as the blade is swung.. Press and hold the attack button to increase the output, then release it when the maximum has been reached in order to unleash a powerful slashing maximum voltage attack.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

An improved Vibro Haken with dramatically increased destructive power, but requiring increased output for attacks over a wide range. 

A special hammer that is installed with multiple ultra-vibration generators (Vibro Drive). By reducing contact surfaces, it is possible for the vibrations to diffuse in several directions. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. Holding down the attack button will increase the Vibro Drive output. Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Release to unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output. The second stage releases vibrations in multiple directions while the user is moving forwards. The third stage focuses the majority of its output to the rear.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

Finalized MG-type hand grenade.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.
Has a built-in impact detonation mechanism, which causes the grenade to explode upon contact with an object after it is thrown.

A device to specially fortify the Deflector System installed on the shield and make it protective. It will instantly strengthen the shield when getting hit. Although Damage can be greatly reduced, a massive load is put on the shield and increases its consumption rate.

The perfected Dexter Automatic Shotgun. Compared to the ZG model, it fires with reduced scattering to deliver more damage to the target. Its destructive power also greatly exceeds that of the ZG.

It's possible to launch a wide range attack, but it has short effective range. Once the distance is long, its power decreases sharply.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A combat blade made using Force Field (Shield Screen) technology. The force field generated by the blade is launched forward to cut through enemies from a distance as the blade is swung. It does not have the destructive power of the Vibro Hammer, but its attack speed is better and it can attack aerial enemies. Press and hold the attack button to increase the output, then release it when the maximum has been reached in order to unleash a powerful slashing attack.

It is recommended that you equip two Force Blades concurrently, as the pairing of this weapon type with itself is the best way to unlock its true potential. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A lighter model of the Force Blade. Its output can be increased rapidly. As a result of its improved design, a third phase attack is also included. 
The force field generated by the blade is launched forward to cut through enemies from a distance as the blade is swung. Press and hold the attack button to increase the output, then release it when the maximum has been reached in order to unleash a powerful slashing attack.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The final spec of the Vibro Hammer. It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted to objects, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked.
Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the Vibro Drive output. Releasing the attack button will unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output. The second stage attack is a spinning attack. When the output has increased to maximum, a maximum voltage attack will be unleashed after stepping forward.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

The final model of the Force Ax. Its output can be increased in a shorter span of time. As a result of the redesign, a third stage is added to its attack profile. 
The force field generated by the blade is launched forward to cut through enemies from a distance as the blade is swung. Press and hold the attack button to increase the output, then release it when the maximum has been reached in order to unleash a powerful slashing attack. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A Beacon Discharger.
Use this beacon to signal a Vulcan Cannon attack from the gunship that is circling the skies, and it will launch an attack where the beacon hits.

Press the attack button to discharge a beacon which will start guiding only when hitting an object, so it could be useless if you target at somewhere with no objects. Also, a beacon out of range will activate its safety device and disable it. In short, the beacon must hit an object in range. There is a laser device equipped on the Beacon Discharger to determine the range. Once you confirm the laser light has hit the object in range, you can discharge the beacon with certainty that the beacon can be activated properly.

The loading work for the coming fire is conducted in a gunship, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

The strongest Force Blade, specially designed for the Storm Team. 
The force field generated by the blade is launched forward to cut through enemies from a distance as the blade is swung. It does not have the destructive power of the Vibro Hammer, but its attack speed is better and it can attack aerial enemies. Press and hold the attack button to increase the output, then release it when the maximum has been reached in order to unleash a powerful slashing attack.

It is recommended that you equip two Force Blades concurrently, as the pairing of this weapon type with itself is the best way to unlock its true potential.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A complete spec Vibro Hammer featuring further improvement on the Finest Hammer's output.

It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked. Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output. Release to unleash a powerful three-stage attack depending on the output.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A mechanical spear that stretches with a high speed to attack. Rotating the spear can penetrate several objects and afterwards high-pressure plasma will be released from the front end, destroying objects from within. The expansion and contraction of the spear are instantaneous, making it an extremely fast attack. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable and can penetrate multiple targets at a time. It is also possible to use it with a shield. This is the main weapon of a Fencer. It has short range, so it is necessary to get accustomed to it, but it's a valuable weapon. During a continuous attack, the second attack will be a rush. These attacks can be sustained over a long period.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
135mm Long-Range Howitzer <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:25 Damage:6900.0 Blast Range:Radius 15.0m)</font>

1 person.
A new model of the combat vehicle Blacker. There has been a full refurbishment and this has significantly improved its performance. It is equipped with a new type of engine, and its mobility has been improved to the maximum level possible. It has a thick armor. Its main cannon is a 135mm Long-range Howitzer. The speed of the bullets are fast and accurate aim is possible at long-distance. Its structure is well designed to absorb recoil.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A mechanical hammer with great destructive power. Instead of attacking with a spear, it attacks with a hammer fitted with a blade to crush the target. During impact, high-pressure plasma is released from its tip, destroying the target from within. Though it has no penetrative power, its recoil is excellent. Press the attack button to attack with the hammer. Even allows for its user to attack while wielding a shield.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Guided Missile <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:100 Damage:140.0 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>

1 person.
A tank equipped with multi-purpose missiles. The missiles have a homing feature so that they can directly target enemies. When a target is within the sight, it will lock-on. It is possible to lock-on to several enemies. Use the attack button to discharge. 

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A personal Gatling gun, made possible to carry due to the development of the powered exoskeleton. It does take a short time for the first shot to leave the gun, but its rate of fire and the power of subsequent shots are terrifying. Press and hold the attack button to start the barrel rotation. When rotation reaches a certain speed, it will start firing. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A new type of portable support drone, two units can now be activated simultaneously in order to protect the user in dangerous environments.
Equipped with a machine gun and automatically attacks approaching enemies.

Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A special alloy shield.
Holding the attack button will keep raising the shield and reduce Damage coming from the front. (The defense angle differs based on shields. Please refer to %dq%Defense Angle.%dq%)
Some weapons allow you to attack with the shield raised. While it is not possible to pair the shield with a hammer or blade that requires full body usage, it is possible to attack with the Blasthole Spear and other weapons that can be fired with one hand when the shield is raised. 
The heat will increase as it continues to absorb attacks. When it reaches the limit, it won't be usable again until it has cooled down. 

There is a device called Deflector installed inside the shield.  It forms a magnetic field which reverses physical motion by 180 degrees. The Deflector is activated with the use button. It can repel any attack with the right timing.

An excessive piece of personal heavy artillery that fires special shells with excellent penetrating force. Easily one of the largest personal weapons available, the weapon is so heavy that it takes the full strength of a powered exoskeleton only to barely lift it. Because of its large caliber, the recoil on discharge is too much for even a powered exoskeleton to absorb, requiring use of the thrusters to balance it out.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

An ultra high-performance Laser Guide Kit. Lock-on range is improved. 

Device that sends the lock-on information to your allies' homing weapons (missiles, etc.) The device has no ability to attack by itself. 

By projecting a laser to a spot, it 'paints' the target, confirming the location for an allied lock-on target weapon. The lock-on time for your allies' homing weapons is greatly reduced. Also, the range is extended up to 4 times their own range.

The homing weapon locks on to the point indicated by this weapon, not the enemy itself. When your allies launch the homing missile, it will head in the direction indicated by the laser. Therefore, if the laser is moved after launch, the missile will move accordingly. For that reason, the laser needs to be maintained until the target is hit.

Usually only one missile can be launched per lock-on, but it is possible to have multiple lock-ons for the laser point. It is therefore possible to launch multiple missiles at one target.  

The majority of Fencer missiles rely on the support of this device. When Fencers are equipping missiles, you should equip this device as well.

A shield equipped with a high-performance deflector. Due to its diminutive size, its defense angle is smaller. But the deflector performance is high, and with its fast activation, it is easy to deploy with the proper timing.

Holding the attack button will keep raising the shield and reduce Damage coming from the front. (The defense angle differs based on shields. Please refer to %dq%Defense Angle.%dq%)
Some weapons allow you to attack with the shield raised. While it is not possible to pair the shield with a hammer or blade that requires full body usage, it is possible to attack with the Blasthole Spear and other weapons that can be fired with one hand when the shield is raised. 
The heat will increase as it continues to absorb attacks. When it reaches the limit, it won't be usable again until it has cooled down. 

There is a device called Deflector installed inside the shield.  It forms a magnetic field which reverses physical motion by 180 degrees. The Deflector is activated with the use button. It can repel any attack with the right timing.

A large assault rifle developed for elite units. Because of its size and weight, it requires skillful handling.
Its destructive power is tremendous, and its penetrate the enemy up to 80 meters.

Equipped with a scope and laser sight.

Power-enhanced version of the heavy armed multicopter. Equipped with a large caliber heavy mortar that fires powerful shells over a wide area. Enhanced mobility enables speedy returns.

Flies around the user. When the target is indicated by a hand-thrown beacon, it moves into position and fires a series of shots at the beacon's impact point.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

A light autocannon for personal use. Despite its light weight, it is a massive piece of mobile machinery, and therefore can only be used when you are equipped with a powered exoskeleton. It fires large caliber bullets rapidly, making it the most powerful personal firearm. But due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A high-performance six-barreled missile launcher that can fire six missiles at once.
Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured with the sight, a positive lock will be established, up to the pre-established maximum of six. Release the attack button to unleash missiles, which will track the target or targets and explode on contact.

Activate the Bulge Laser's precision mode.
Under this mode, the cannon rotation is sped up, so that the laser guide location of the guide kit can adjust its firing angle swiftly.
The projection can be maintained for a long time. Moving the target location of the guiding system allows it to attack multiple enemies.
The projection can reach the cannon's melting point, so it will have a very long cool down.

The loading work is conducted on a satellite, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

A cannon with excellent rapid fire performance. Despite its light weight, it is a massive piece of mobile machinery, and therefore can only be used when you are equipped with a powered exoskeleton. It fires large-caliber bullets rapidly, making it a powerful weapon. But due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A Gatling gun with an excellent ammo capacity, designed to fire for 40 seconds straight. Its destructive power is outstanding.
Press and hold the attack button to start the barrel rotation. When rotation reaches a certain speed, it will start firing. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

An enhanced model of the Galleon Lightweight Cannon. A light autocannon for personal use. Despite its light weight, it is a massive piece of mobile machinery, and therefore can only be used when you are equipped with a powered exoskeleton. Fires large-caliber bullets, limiting its rapid-fire abilities but increasing the raw force of its projectiles. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A portable support drone.
One of the Capsule Soldier series, robotic soldiers (drones) produced by the Soulless Soldier Project led by the Advanced Technologies Lab.
The drone deploys via fan blades, allowing it to fly about and defend the user.
As AI technology is still in its infancy, it is unable to make advanced judgments and can only be active for a short period of time.

It is designed to follow the user and fire at targets.
Since it is equipped with advanced safety devices, there is no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Once all rounds are fired, the equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

The Advanced Technologies Lab developed weapons based on existing technology, while the Advanced Technologies Lab developed weapons based on alien technology. Both were later merged into a single organization.
Weapons born from the fusion of both technologies are called the Seventh Generation Type.

An enhanced Flame Revolver with its temperature increased to ludicrous, terrifying levels. Because of the high temperature, only Fencers with their heavy armor are able to use this weapon. Because of the increase in temperature, the discharge time is extended to 5 seconds, and the recoil is notably more powerful.

Its emitted flame gets cooled down by the air, making the firepower to greatly decrease with distance. In order to use the weapon effectively, you need to get as close as possible to the enemy.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

An improved Galleon Lightweight Cannon with greatly increased destructive power and range. Despite its light weight, it is a massive piece of mobile machinery, and therefore can only be used when you are equipped with a powered exoskeleton. It fires large-caliber bullets continuously. It has great destructive power, but as a trade-off it also has powerful recoil, which may cause the muzzle to drift upward when firing, resulting in issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A custom model of the Dexter Automatic Shotgun created for the final battle. A large shotgun with a self-loading mechanism. It takes larger shells and has an increased chamber capacity of 20. Its capacity and range are excellent, making it a terrifying weapon.

It's possible to launch a wide range attack, but it has short effective range. Once the distance is long, its power decreases sharply.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

Its impossible momentum allows it to make its way up slopes or on bumpy roads without losing speed.
It locks onto a target and automatically finds its way approaching the enemy. When a direct path is blocked by an obstacle, it will detour, making it possible to attack enemies hiding behind a building.
It will explode when close to the target. Should the target disappear before the bomb reaches it (or a certain time has passed), it explodes itself for safety reasons. In this case, the scale of the explosion will be small to avoid damaging the surroundings.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button to activate.
Hold the Use Backpack Tool button to stop.

The ultimate plasma arc cannon. It can discharge a continuous plasma arc to decimate the target. Its destructive power is immense, but its output may be a little overzealous: after activation, it will continue firing until it runs out of power. Also, Fencers that don't carry Plasma Generators will not be able to reload on the battlefield.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A final battle spec Dexter Automatic Shotgun with its discharge capacity increased to the max. A large shotgun with a self-loading mechanism. Boasts unthinkable power, but it's slow to reload due to its massive shells.

It's possible to launch a wide range attack, but it has short effective range. Once the distance is long, its power decreases sharply.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A personal artillery that fires armor-piercing ammo with excellent penetration power. This large-caliber weapon is impossible for an unarmored human to handle. It can only be managed with a powered exoskeleton. Even then, the powered exoskeleton requires a second to absorb the recoil. In that period, you will be defenseless so it is necessary to take proper precautions when handling it. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

A high-output beam cannon that's directly mounted onto a powered exoskeleton.
Discharges a high-output beam that penetrates the enemy.
Because its output is very high, it requires a lot of electricity to recharge, meaning it cannot be reloaded on the battlefield.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

Personal dispersal artillery that discharges multiple armor-piercing shots at once. Absolutely terrifying to anyone within its range, but its range is notably quite limited. Because multiple shells are fired at once, the recoil is greater than average and may take some time to absorb. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
90mm Smooth-Bore Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:30 Damage:[PT]1960.0 Blast Range:----)</font>

1 person.
An advanced model of the Blacker A2. Its armor has been increased to the maximum level possible. Its main cannon is a 90mm Smooth-Bore Gun with improved firepower. It fires armor-piercing ammunition capable of penetrating many enemies at once.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An excessive piece of personal heavy artillery that fires special shells with excellent penetrating force. Easily one of the largest personal weapons available, the weapon is so heavy that it takes the full strength of a powered exoskeleton only to barely lift it. Because of its large caliber, the recoil on discharge could kill an unarmored person. The recoil takes even a powered exoskeleton time to absorb. And in that time, you will be left completely vulnerable. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

Personal dispersal artillery that fires multiple armor-piercing rounds at once. Its dispersal area isn't that wide, but it has excellent destructive power. Because multiple shells are fired at once, the recoil is greater than average and may take some time to absorb. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A cannon with top specs across the board. It fires armor-piercing rounds with virtually unmatchable penetrating force. Would be impossible for a human being to wield were it not for the invention of the powered exoskeleton--but even with a powered exoskeleton, the recoil is quite severe, requiring one second to absorb it. During that time, the wielder will be rendered completely defenseless, so it is necessary to take proper precautions when handling it. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

An ultimate piece of personal heavy artillery that fires shells specially designed for massive penetrating force. Easily one of the largest personal weapons available, the weapon is so heavy that it takes the full strength of a powered exoskeleton only to barely lift it. Because of its large caliber, the recoil on discharge could kill an unarmored person. The recoil takes even a powered exoskeleton time to absorb. And in that time, you will be left completely vulnerable. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

A high-caliber mortar with super-high performance. Its shells move in a parabolic arc and detonate on impact. Though the attack area is wide, the excessive caliber of this particular armament results in some truly intense recoil, often leaving the wielder frozen and vulnerable until the powered exoskeleton has fully absorbed the impact.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

The final model of the YH Dispersal Mortar. Fires shrapnel that travel in a parabolic path, and detonate on impact over a large area. Though the attack area is wide, the range is short and the recoil is intense, often leaving the wielder frozen and vulnerable until the powered exoskeleton has fully absorbed the impact.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A high-caliber mortar with top specs across the board. Its shells move in a parabolic arc and detonate on impact. Though the attack area is wide, the excessive caliber of this particular armament results in some truly intense recoil, often leaving the wielder frozen and vulnerable until the powered exoskeleton has fully absorbed the impact.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver Howitzer S <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:240 Damage:618.75 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Compartment 1:</font> None
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Compartment 2:</font> None
<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%> Compartment 3:</font> None

4 people.
An armored vehicle. Aside from the pilot, there are rear compartments for up to three troops. The main role of this vehicle is to transport soldiers to the battlefield. 
Aside from its basic use as a troop carrier, it also has a rotating turret on top, giving it some measure of combat ability. The shells discharged from the turret will explode on impact, causing area-of-effect damage. Its movement speed is also quite fast, giving it a variety of uses.

Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle, but anyone can ride in the rear compartments.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An arm-mounted missile launcher capable of attacking multiple enemies at once.
Holding down the attack button will display the sight (red square). When a target is captured with the sight (within the lock in range), lock-on will begin.
It's possible to lock on multiple foes. Releasing the attack button will unleash a missile, which will chase down the locked-on targets and explode on impact.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

Double portable support drone, two units can now be activated simultaneously in order to protect the user in dangerous environments.
Equipped with a machine gun and automatically attacks approaching enemies.

Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A long-range attack weapon based on the Raijin. By conserving power output, it is now possible to fire multiple times. It is also equipped with a small energy tank, allowing it to be operated without overloading the flight unit.
These improvements have made the weapon easier to handle and have increased its versatility in battle.

A massive multi-missile launcher that can fire multiple laser guided missiles.
This weapon cannot be used alone: it must be paired with an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit (or a guide beacon) to establish a viable target lock. 
Through the Laser Guide Kit, the lock-on location is confirmed. When the laser guide location (or a guide beacon) is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. After the lock-on, releasing the attack button will launch the missile. The missile will fly at the targeted location and cause a tremendous explosion, damaging the whole area.

A high-performance six-barreled missile launcher that can fire six missiles at once.
Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured within the sight, a positive lock will be established, up to the pre-established maximum of six. Release the attack button to unleash missiles, which will track the target or targets and explode on contact.

A high-performance missile launcher designed for urban warfare. It has excellent hit performance. After firing, the missile will rise to a high altitude, and then be directed towards its target on descent. Due to its high arc, obstacles such as buildings will have little impact on its targeting capability. The lock-on speed is fast and it is possible to attack several enemies. It is an easy-to-use weapon.

Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured with the sight, a positive lock will be established. Release the attack button to unleash a missile on the locked-on target or targets.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A Laser Guide Kit that transmits coordinates to a submarine aircraft carrier to launch 35 Lionic missiles. This laser lock must be maintained until the missiles hit.
The guiding system of the Lionic missiles has been improved, and will make the missiles correctly hit the designated target location. Moving the laser grants the missiles the ability to destroy multiple targets.

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.
The Laser Guide Kit is equipped with a scope.

Missile reloading is conducted in a submarine carrier, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

An enhanced weapon developed from the Goliath rocket launcher, now with greater destructive power than ever as a result of its super-sized rockets.
These rockets are slower due to their size, but they gradually accelerate.

Equipped with a scope.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

A device that creates a wall of energy. When installed, it creates a wall of energy that extends upwards. Attacks from above can be blocked.  The wall senses objects that collide with it. Allies are allowed to pass through it. It not only acts as a shield, but also permits the users to fire from behind it safely.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

A massive missile launcher with top specs across the board. It launches enormous laser-guided missile. Because a laser guide is necessary for targeting, this weapon cannot be used alone: it must be paired with an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit (or a guide beacon) to establish a viable target lock.

Through the Laser Guide Kit, the lock-on location is confirmed. When the laser guide location (or a guide beacon) is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. Then, when the attack button is released, the missile will launch directly toward the targeted location. On impact, it will explode spectacularly, inflicting damage across the entire area.

The lock-on process requires not only the support of an Air Raider, but also a considerable amount of time. When used effectively, however, it can be a formidable weapon, wiping out the enemy in the entire area.

An extra high-performance missile launcher that fires high-altitude missiles. After firing, the missile will rise to a high altitude. It will then be directed towards its target on descent. Due to its high arc, obstacles such as buildings will have little impact. The lock-on speed is fast and it is possible to attack several enemies. It is an easy-to-use weapon. 

Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured with the sight, a positive lock will be established. Release the attack button to unleash a missile on the locked-on target or targets.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

An ultimate high-performance six-barreled missile launcher.
Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured with the sight, a positive lock will be established, up to the pre-established maximum of six. Release the attack button to unleash missiles, which will track the locked-on target or targets and explode on contact.

A thruster enhancer.
Enables 10 consecutive thrust-dashes.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster)

A thruster enhancer.
Enables 12 consecutive thrust-dashes.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster)

A booster enhancer.
Enables 5 consecutive boost jumps.
(Must be used with a Jump Booster)

Improved version of Harmonic Shield S that produces three shields simultaneously. The shields are small but last longer.

Blocks enemy attacks but allows attacks from allies to pass through.

Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

A booster enhancer.
Enables 6 consecutive boost jumps.
(Must be used with a Jump Booster)

A shotgun that can fire armor-piercing ammunition %dq%Slugger Bullets%dq% and it fires only one shot at a time without scattering.
However, the bullets contain tremendous destructive power and penetrative power until it reaches the limit of its range.

Due to its large size, Slugger Bullets fired are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance with a shorter effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

A device that enhances the thruster and the booster simultaneously.
Enables 3 consecutive thrust-dashes.
Enables 3 consecutive boost jumps.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster or a Jump Booster)

A device that enhances the thruster and the booster simultaneously.
Enables 4 consecutive thrust-dashes.
Enables 3 consecutive boost jumps.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster or a Jump Booster)

A device that enhances the thruster and the booster simultaneously.
Enables 5 consecutive thrust-dashes.
Enables 4 consecutive boost jumps.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster or a Jump Booster)

A device that converts Jump Boosters into Side Thrusters.
Converted thrusters are powerful and allow for continuous thrust-dashes.
(Must be used with either a Jump Booster or a Side Thruster)

A device to keep the Deflector System installed on the shield working with small output. Since it functions with small output, it's powerless to repel attacks; however, the impact of bullets can be reduced.
By being equipped with armor plating, the shield is increased in size, and as a result, its defense angle is increased. Its durability is also improved thanks to the armor plating.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Guided Particle Beam Cannon <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:2000 Damage:150.0 Blast Range:Radius 2.0m)</font>

1 person.
Equipped with a guided particle beam cannon developed by scientists from around the world. It can instantly lock onto a large number of enemies and can re-fire within a short period of time after firing.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A small multicopter equipped with a machine gun.
Four units activate simultaneously and fly out in front of the user.
When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter moves into position and fires at the marker's impact point.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
A stabilizer installed on a powered exoskeleton to absorb the recoil of a firearm.
A new Powered Exoskeleton. Its actuator on the whole body is enforced, increasing its power and speed.

<font color=%dq%#80ff80%dq%>Pilot Seat:</font> Driver
Revolver Cannon (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:600 Damage:79.2 Range:320.0m)</font>
Rocket Cannon (Left) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:20 Damage:330.0 Blast Range:Radius 5.0m)</font>
Missile Pod (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:40 Damage:264.0 Blast Range:Radius 8.0m)</font>

1 person.
A Powered Exoskeleton built for guerrilla warfare. This upgraded model of the Nix B features improvements in its performance and mobility.
The C1 model is customized for guerrilla warfare and equipped with a variety of weaponry, making it suitable for any number of uses. 

Equipped with a large guided missile pod on the right shoulder, it is now a versatile machine that exhibits top-notch performance at close and mid-range alike. Has a Revolver Cannon on the right arm with superb firing rate, and a Rocket Cannon on the left arm.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.
Eqpt Weight Impact on Rotational Inertia
A new powered exoskeleton that improves the output of legs. The walking speed is significantly increased and it won't decrease that easily when wielding a heavy weapon or a shield.

Improved version of the large caliber missile launcher Phoenix, featuring doubled destructive power. Its guidance system has been further enhanced to enable independent lock-on. It no longer requires the support of an Air Raider and can be operated by an individual. However, it takes time to lock on.

A portable support drone.
One of the Capsule Soldier series, robotic soldiers (drones) produced by the Soulless Soldier Project led by the Advanced Technologies Lab.
As AI technology is still in its infancy, it is unable to make advanced judgments and can only be active for a short period of time.

The drone deploys via fan blades, allowing it to fly about and defend the user.
It is designed to follow the user and fire at targets.
Since it is equipped with advanced safety devices, there is no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Once all rounds are fired, the equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A smoke grenade used to request a Mortar attack from the Artillery Squad directed at the location of impact. The shells from this attack detonate as they land, causing damage to the area.

The Mortar is small in built, making it easy to use. Only requires a small amount of Credit to re-launch.

Press and hold the attack button to wind up your throw, then release to let the smoke grenade fly. Its expected trajectory will be indicated by a red line.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A smoke grenade used to request a Howitzer attack from the Artillery Squad directed at the location of impact. The shells from this attack detonate as they land, causing damage to the area.  While this weapon can attack over a wide area, it may wipe out all foes.

Press and hold the attack button to wind up your throw, then release to let the smoke grenade fly. Its expected trajectory will be indicated by a red line.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A complete version of the EMC (Atomic Ray Cannon) gun, the Blazer. In theory, it has 30% of the output of an EMC.
It has a longer range and strikes the target instantly.

A smoke grenade used to request a Large Howitzer attack from the Artillery Squad directed at the location of impact. The shells from this attack detonate as they land, causing damage to the area. The attack area is enormous, so it's recommended the requester take care to throw this grenade as far as possible, lest he or she get caught in the blast.

Press and hold the attack button to wind up your throw, then release to let the smoke grenade fly. Its expected trajectory will be indicated by a red line.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Improved autonomous combat aircraft. Equipped with a high-power laser cannon by the Advanced Technologies Lab. 
It has powerful offensive capabilities, but its high energy consumption results in a short operating time.
Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

An enhanced version of the Suppress Gun. Its special bullets are bigger, providing increased destructive power. However, it takes longer to reload.

This weapon fires multiple special bullets at once, which will scatter widely, even an Air Raider with poor shooting skills can capture the target. These special bullets can penetrate object and neutralize the enemy. 
However, because it scatters in ultrahigh speed, its range is very short. Also, since its uses is limited, it's better to equip it as a sub weapon instead of a main weapon.

Air Raiders may not be able to perform well in an urban scuffle or a close-range combat. Carrying this shotgun could possibly increase their survival rate.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

FK200 Gatling Gun <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1600 Damage:10.0 Range:120.0m)</font>

Compact Cannon (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:120 Damage:[PT]40.0 Range:240.0m)</font>

1 person. Can be requested from underground locations.
A walking tank developed for underground battle. Since it has four hook-like limbs and moves in a crawling fashion, it performs well on rough roads and can even scale walls. Its hooks work in conjunction with its powerful joints to leap up and cling to walls or roofs. It also comes with large headlights that can greatly enhance visibility in the dark. They provide essential support to teams infiltrating the underground. Although it was designed primarily for subterranean combat, its versatility makes it a force to be reckoned with on the ground as well. It can chase enemies up the sides of buildings by using its hook-like limbs.
G4 Delta Portable Attack Aircraft (Machine Gun)

A smoke grenade used to request a Gigantic Howitzer attack from the Artillery Squad directed at the location of impact. The shells from this attack detonate as they land, causing damage to the area. It will wipe out any foes in its enormous attack area, so be careful not to get caught in the blast. It is recommended the requester to throw this grenade and leave the area immediately afterwards.

Press and hold the attack button to wind up your throw, then release to let the smoke grenade fly. Its expected trajectory will be indicated by a red line.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

New powered exoskeleton designed to improve stability while shooting.
Built-in stabilizers absorb gunfire recoil. It has excellent output in the legs and arms that balances the weight of its equipment.
However, since it is specialized for posture stabilization during gunfire, its mobility is relatively low.

A Beacon Discharger.
Use this beacon to signal a Rocket Cannon attack from the gunship that is circling the skies, and it will launch an attack where the beacon hits. It can discharge only one Rocket Cannon each time, but it can fire consecutively if loaded with multiple Rocket Cannons.

Press the attack button to discharge a beacon which will start guiding only when hitting an object, so it could be useless if you target at somewhere with no objects. Also, a beacon out of range will activate its safety device and disable it. In short, the beacon must hit an object in range. There is a laser device equipped on the Beacon Discharger to determine the range. Once you confirm the laser light has hit the object in range, you can discharge the beacon with certainty that the beacon can be activated properly.

The loading work for the coming fire is conducted in a gunship, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

An improved Guide Beacon Gun. It is possible to discharge multiple guide beacons. Lock-on range is improved. The beacon focuses on a hit point and transmits location information. The beacon confirms the lock-on target for ally tracking weapons, making it possible to lock-on. The lock-on time is reduced and the lock-on range is increased. Even though it does not have the performance of the Laser Guide Kit, it has a wide variety of uses as it is not necessary to maintain the beacon until the target has been hit. It is possible for multiple lock-ons. By using the beacon on the enemy, it is possible to launch multiple missiles at the enemy. Also, the target can be attacked many times as the beacon will not be lost even after the missile has hit. Enemies that have been hit by the beacon will not be able to escape. Pressing the reload button releases the beacon, then it reloads.

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from the combat bomber. It will come in to launch a low strafing run upon the target area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack from the Combat Bomber Kamuy, which will start bombing the indicated location.

Compared with a Heavy Bomber, Kamuy has lower bomb loads. However, its mobility is outstanding, it can reach the battlefield in high speed and start bombing the exact area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack from the heavy bomber, and it will launch an airstrike on the designated area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this communication system to request support from heavy bombers equipped with napalm bombs. Two heavy bombers will fly to the target area simultaneously, in an X pattern, and drop their napalm payloads.
The napalm has been improved and burns longer.


While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this communication system to request a strafe attack from combat bombers. A squad of nine combat bombers will come in to launch a low strafing run upon the target area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack.
A squad of ten heavy bombers will proceed to launch an airstrike on the designated area.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

A small multicopter equipped with a heavy machine gun. It has excellent attack power and can be deployed simultaneously a greater number of times. Marker ejection speed is also improved.
However, the weight of the gun barrel and bullets reduces its flight speed, making it unsuitable for long-range attacks.

Multiple units activate simultaneously and fly out in front of the user.
When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter moves into position and fires at the marker's impact point.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Use this communication system to request an aerial attack.
A heavy bomber will proceed to launch an airstrike on the designated area. Attacks from a distance and does not require much credit to request.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Formation of 4 unmanned attack aircraft, flown side-by-side to sweep a wide area.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, machine gun fire rains down from the sky.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)
Can distiguish friend from foe, posing no danger to the user and his/her allies.
Heavy Bomber Vesta C Plan W2

A top-secret EDF super-weapon.
It produces a sphere of energy that hovers in the air before exploding into countless smaller balls of light. The light balls are then pulled by gravity to the ground.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

While holding down the attack button, use the [[leftstick]] (movement keys) and [[rightstick]] (mouse control) to move around the bombing area indicated in red. The bombing area is determined when the attack button is released. The attack is initiated.

To request another attack, certain achievements (many enemies destroyed) are required on the battlefield. Achievements include defeats by comrades.

Four Phobos Zs will proceed to launch an airstrike on the designated area.

Use the Laser Guide Kit to transmit coordinates to a large airship to launch 4 missiles. The laser must be maintained until the missiles hit. 

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.
The Laser Guide Kit is equipped with a scope.

Missile reloading is conducted in an airship, so  the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

Use the Laser Guide Kit to transmit coordinates to a large airship to launch 4 missiles. The laser must be maintained until the missiles hit. 

The missiles fired are an improved version of the AH Cruise Missiles, with their firepower greatly increased.

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.
The Laser Guide Kit is equipped with a scope.

Missile reloading is conducted in an airship, so  the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

The Laser Guide Kit is equipped with a scope.

Missile reloading is conducted in a submarine carrier, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Use the Laser Guide Kit to transmit coordinates to a submarine aircraft carrier to launch missiles. The laser lock must be maintained while the missiles hit. At two second intervals, a total of 6 missiles will be launched at the target. For that reason, by changing the location of the laser guide, you can easily target something else.

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.

Missile reloading is conducted in a submarine carrier, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

Use the Laser Guide Kit to transmit coordinates to the hidden military base, Barren Land, to launch the large Tempest missile. The laser must be maintained until the Tempest missile hits. The upgraded Tempest missile version has greatly improved firepower.

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.
