In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A device that creates a wall of energy. When installed, it creates an oval wall of energy in front. It is possible to surround the enemy and effectively seal their attacks. It is different from a defensive bunker, in that it is a weapon used for exterminating the enemy. The wall not only stops bullets but also optical weapons as well. In addition, it senses objects that collide with it. Allies are allowed to pass through it.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

A Laser Guide Kit that transmits coordinates to a submarine aircraft carrier to launch 45 Lionic missiles. This laser lock must be maintained until the missiles hit. 

The Lionic missile is built with an excellent guidance system, and will make the missile correctly hit the designated target location. Moving the laser grants the missiles the ability to destroy multiple targets.

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.
The Laser Guide Kit is equipped with a scope.

Missile reloading is conducted in a submarine carrier, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

Use the Laser Guide Kit to transmit coordinates to a satellite to fire the Bulge Laser on the location. The laser must be maintained until the Bulge Laser hits.
The attack of the Bulge Laser will remain for a while. Changing the lock-on location will change the attack location. Therefore, it is possible to constantly attack different enemies if you can control the Bulge Laser.

The loading work is conducted on a satellite, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

Use the Laser Guide Kit to transmit coordinates to a satellite to fire the Bulge Laser on the location. The laser must be maintained until the Bulge Laser hits.
The upgraded guiding system allows the muzzle to quickly aim at the indicated target.

The loading work is conducted on a satellite, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

Use the guide kit to launch a concentrated attack with the laser weapon Spritefall. The concentrated shooting mode combines all of Spritefall's energy and releases it instantaneously. Although it can only fire at a single target, it has impressive destructive power. The system doesn't overload, so it requires less credit to re-request.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Use the Laser Guide Kit to transmit coordinates to a satellite to fire the Bulge Laser on the location. The laser must be maintained until the Bulge Laser hits.

The more upgraded guiding system allows the muzzle to aim at the indicated target at a faster pace.

The loading work is conducted on a satellite, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

Use the Guide Kit to transmit coordinates to a satellite to fire Spritefall, the EDF's top secret weapon, on the location. The laser must be maintained until the Spritefall hits.
Once the coordinates are transmitted, there is no need to maintain the laser.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Use the guide kit to launch a continuous attack with the laser weapon called Spritefall.
This mode retains the laser's projection power, allowing it to fire consecutively.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Use the guide kit to launch a concentrated attack with the laser weapon Spritefall. The concentrated shooting mode combines all of Spritefall's energy and releases it instantaneously. Although it can only fire at a single target, it has impressive destructive power. The system doesn't overload, so it requires less credit to re-request.

The firepower is increased, and the control system is also upgraded, which reduces its discharge time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Request to fire the Bulge Laser at maximum output.
It has tremendous destructive power, but there is a slight time lag before firing. It can be fired again after a short cooldown.

The loading work is conducted on a satellite, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

Activate the Spritefall's Destroy mode.
All Limiters have been removed, allowing it to fire consecutively at maximum power.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Use this enhanced model of the Limpet Gun to launch sticky bombs with improved destructive power.

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode.

Use this improved model of the Limpet Gun to launch sticky bombs with greatly increased destructive power. 

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode.

Use this improved device to launch a sticky bomb with better basic performance.

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode.

An upgraded version of the Limpet Splendor. A device which launches multiple ‘Splendor’ flechette bombs at once, allowing for a large number of simultaneous detonations.

These bombs attach to whatever they strike (be it friend, foe, or vehicle), and can be detonated remotely by pressing the Zoom/Activate button. When detonated, several flechettes will be fired into the surrounding area, bouncing off walls and creating havoc. This makes them useful both for wide open areas and, especially, for confined spaces where they can do some real damage. To defuse the bomb without detonating, simply press the reload button.

Use this device to fire motion sensor bombs. 
The sticky bombs attach to where they land (friend, foe, or vehicle). 
The bombs emit laser beams that detonate when an object breaks the beam. Flechettes will fly in all directions, inflicting damage in a wide area. 
Instead of directly firing these at an enemy, they are used to set up traps. 
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Use this improved Limpet Gun for a precise, long-range launch of a sticky bomb. The number that can be set at once has increased to three shots. The increase in the number that can be set means that the overall battle combat potential is higher. 

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode. It is mounted with a laser sight to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

To prevent allies from being attacked, it is equipped with a high performance safety device. You don't have to worry about allies getting hit or self exploding.

A new version of the 'Limpet Gun'. Use this device to launch multiple, high-capacity sticky bombs at the same time.

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode.

Use this device to launch canister bombs. It also fires large bombs. When they detonate, they unleash an insane amount of canister shots in all directions.
The bombs attach to where they land (friend, foe, or vehicle), and can be detonated remotely with the Zoom/Activate button. 
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Use this device to launch the flechette bomb ‘Splendor’. The bombs attach to where they land (friend, foe, or vehicle), and can be detonated remotely with the Zoom/Activate button. When detonated, several flechettes will be fired into the surrounding area. 
The flechettes are made of aspecial material, so they will ricochet off walls. This means that they will affect a wide area, but in a confined space, they can deal impressive damage. If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

1 person.
A heavy Powered Exoskeleton. A refurbished Nix Battle Cannon which has been equipped with powerful firepower. It is equipped with Dispersal Howitzers on both shoulders that discharge multiple dispersal shots. They explode on impact encompassing an area in the blast. It has an excellent destructive power and attack area, but its range is relatively short. It has Revolver Rocket Cannons on both arms. It discharges rockets and is good for attacks over a wide area. It has impressive firepower, but the firearms are heavy and this means mobility is reduced. However, in order to compensate for this shortcoming, the rotation speed of the upper body has been improved. It is easy to target moving targets. The thruster performance has been improved, so a longer discharge is possible.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

This is the final model of the Limpet Splendor.
The sticky bombs attach to where they land (friend, foe, or vehicle), and can be detonated remotely with the Zoom/Activate button. When detonated, several flechettes will be fired into the surrounding area. The flechettes are made of a special material, so they will ricochet off walls. This means that they will affect a wide area, but in a confined space, they can deal impressive damage. If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

This is a final model of the Limpet Gun for use at long-range. It has excellent destructive power. 

Pressing the attack button will discharge a sticky bomb that attaches to wherever it lands (friend, foe or vehicle), and it can be detonated with the zoom/activate button. It can be charged again afterwards.
If you do not want to detonate it, you can diffuse it by pressing the reload button.

Once the bomb flies beyond the range or it fails to stick on an object, the detonator will be removed and it will not explode. It is mounted with a laser sight to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

To prevent allies from being attacked, it is equipped with a high performance safety device. You don't have to worry about allies getting hit or self exploding.

Device that sends the lock-on information to your allies' homing weapons (missiles, etc.) The device has no ability to attack by itself. 
 
By projecting a laser to a spot, it 'paints' the target, confirming the location for an allied lock-on target weapon. The lock-on time for your allies' homing weapons is greatly reduced. Also, the range is extended up to 3 times their own range. (For example, if the Fencer has a weapon with a lock-on speed of 3 seconds and a lock-on distance of 100m, he can lock on the target that is up to 300 meters away 1 sec later when the Air Raider uses this weapon.)
 
The homing weapon locks on to the point indicated by this weapon, not the enemy itself. When your allies launch the homing missile, it will head in the direction indicated by the laser. Therefore, if the laser is moved after launch, the missile will move accordingly. For that reason, the laser needs to be maintained until the target is hit.
 
Usually only one missile can be launched per lock-on, but it is possible to have multiple lock-ons for the laser point. It is therefore possible to launch multiple missiles at one target.  
 
The majority of Fencer missiles rely on the support of this device. When Fencers are equipping missiles, you should equip this device as well.

An improved Laser Guide Kit model that improves lock-on speed at the cost of a shorter range. However, lock-on speed is dramatically improved.

Also, the range is extended up to 5 times their own range. (For example, if the Fencer has a weapon with a lock-on speed of 5 seconds and a lock-on distance of 100m, he can lock on the target that is up to 500 meters away 1 sec later when the Air Raider uses this weapon.)

The majority of Fencer missiles rely on the support of this device. When Fencers are equipping missiles, you should equip this device as well.

An enhanced Laser Guide Kit. The range and lock-on speed are both improved.

Scientists from around the world have rallied against the aliens, producing the highest performance atomic ray gun ever made. Although small in size, the Planet Blazer's firepower is comparable to that of an EMC, inflicting major damage to alien shields.
Due to the exceptionally high cost, only a small number were produced.

A device that launches a high-output guide beacon. It does not have much capacity, but the information output is high. When locked-on to a beacon, it is possible to lock-on within 4x the lock-on distance. Also, the time necessary to lock-on is reduced. The beacon focuses on a hit point and transmits location information. The beacon confirms the lock-on target for ally tracking weapons, making it possible to lock-on. The lock-on time is reduced and the lock-on range is increased. Even though it does not have the performance of the Laser Guide Kit, it has a wide variety of uses as it is not necessary to maintain the beacon until the target has been hit. It is possible for multiple lock-ons. By using the beacon on the enemy, it is possible to launch multiple missiles at the enemy. Also, the target can be attacked many times as the beacon will not be lost even after the missile has hit. Pressing the reload button releases the beacon, then it reloads.

Improved Pulsar Spear that fires particle beams in 2 directions.

In order to shorten the reload time, the sphere's total energy has been halved.
Therefore, its beam can only be emitted for a short period of time.

A device that produces an energy sphere that fires a particle beam.
The sphere emits a powerful beam while airborne, albeit for a short period of time.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

A device that launches a high-output guide beacon. It is only possible to launch one beacon, but it has a high performance. The time it takes to lock on has been massively reduced. The beacon focuses on a hit point and transmits location information. The beacon confirms the lock-on target for ally tracking weapons, making it possible to lock-on. The lock-on time is reduced and the lock-on range is increased. Even though it does not have the performance of the Laser Guide Kit, it has a wide variety of uses as it is not necessary to maintain the beacon until the target has been hit. It is possible for multiple lock-ons. By using the beacon on the enemy, it is possible to launch multiple missiles at the enemy. Also, the target can be attacked many times as the beacon will not be lost even after the missile has hit. Pressing the reload button releases the beacon, then it reloads.

An upgraded version of the Suppress Gun. It has increased ammo capacity and is easy to use.

This weapon fires multiple special bullets at once, which will scatter widely, even an Air Raider with poor shooting skills can capture the target. These special bullets can penetrate object and neutralize the enemy. 
However, because it scatters in ultrahigh speed, its range is very short. Also, since its uses is limited, it's better to equip it as a sub weapon instead of a main weapon.

Air Raiders may not be able to perform well in an urban scuffle or a close-range combat. Carrying this shotgun could possibly increase their survival rate.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install.
(Cannot use by holding the button down.)

A device that discharges high-performance nanomachines. As a result of the improvements, the nanomachines can be used at range and their effective area is increased. It automatically discharges nanomachines to living targets and weapons within the effective range. The nanomachines will solidify on a target, forming an invisible wall around the target. Temporarily repairs damaged armor and can be used to restore vehicle durability and Armor.

This device does not distinguish between friend and foe. It is very large and cannot be reloaded.

Installed by (briefly) pressing the Use Backpack Tool button.
(If you hold down the button, it will not install.)

A device that increases the attack power of allies. They link to ally equipment when in range, supplying power and increasing attack power. They will confer benefits on all allies in range. They will also have an impact on passengers in vehicles. Also, they can determine friend from foe and will not increase the attack power of enemies. This is a top-secret device, so its origins are not fully known.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

An improved tracer drone equipped with a laser cannon by the Advanced Technologies Lab.
Its range is short, but it makes up for it with its massive destructive power.

It is designed to memorize the user's movement and attack a target position.
Its simple AI allows for more drones to be activated at once, compared with other models.

Since it is equipped with advanced safety devices, there is no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A high-output Guard Post. Its effective area is much wider, so it is possible to protect a lot of allies. They create an invisible force field around allies in its effective range and can reduce the damage taken from attacks. They will confer benefits on all allies in range. They will also have an impact on passengers in vehicles. Also, they can determine friend from foe and will not interfere with ally attacks. Thus, the damage inflicted by allies on the enemy is not affected.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

A device which erects a wall of energy that not only stops bullets, but optical weapons as well. Also has on-the-spot collision detection, allowing all allies and friendly fire to pass through -- meaning it doesn't just offer cover, but serves as a legitimate shield that permits the users to fire from behind it safely.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

The final model of the A-type Multicopter series. All specs are greatly improved.

Multiple units activate simultaneously and fly out in front of the user.
When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter moves into position and fires at the marker's impact point.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

A device that discharges a balloon that mimics a human. Warmth, soft noises and particles come from the balloon, distracting the attention of the enemy. The balloon will only be active for a limited time. Afterward, it will self-destruct before the enemy realizes its true form. It will also be destroyed when it has no durability left. It has several uses, such as being installed on a vehicle as a decoy, or to distract the enemy in an area being bombed. It is a very useful weapon.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to activate the installed device.

A powerful Electromagnetic Bunker. When installed, it creates a wall of energy that extends forward. The wall provides lateral defense across its area. In addition, it senses objects that collide with it. Allies are allowed to pass through it. It not only acts as a shield, but also permits the users to fire from behind it safely.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

A device that generates a high-power defensive shield. It is designed to protect only one person. 
It expands a small, semi-circular defensive wall. It is only wide enough for one person, but its defensive capabilities are excellent. The defensive wall senses objects that collide with it. Allies are allowed to pass through it.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

Electromagnetic Bunker with a high output. When installed, it creates a wall of powerful energy that extends forward. The wall provides lateral defense across its area. In addition, it senses objects that collide with it. Allies are allowed to pass through it. The wall not only acts as a shield, but also permits the users to fire from behind it safely.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

A device that creates a wall of energy. It generates a circular surrounding wall. It is the ultimate Electromagnetic Bunker, blocking attacks from all directions. The wall not only stops bullets but also optical weapons. In addition, it senses objects that collide with it. Allies are allowed to pass through it.

Press Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to install. Press and hold to discard the installed device and start reloading for device reinstallation. Since the device performs the reload automatically, it is unnecessary for you to carry it.

An unmanned multicopter equipped with a small bomb.

The user indicates the target using a laser guidance system.
Once the target has been set, the entire aircraft swoops down upon it and detonates.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.
Naturally, this results in a longer reload time.

A special bomb that looks like a toy insect, but don't let its innocent exterior fool you: this fearsome device will skip forward and attach itself to the first thing it touches. Once attached, it's not easy to shake off.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. Press and hold the Use Backpack Tool button to detonate.

Its clever design camouflages the bomb into its surroundings, making it difficult for enemies to detect.

Final spec version of the Patroller self-propelled bomb.
A self-propelled bomb with built-in sensors. When set, it will start moving, and after several seconds, the sensors will activate. If an enemy is detected in range, the bomb will detonate automatically. If it hits an obstacle, it will change direction.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button to activate.
Hold the Use Backpack Tool button to stop.

A portable support drone.
One of the Capsule Soldier series, robotic soldiers (drones) produced by the Soulless Soldier Project led by the Advanced Technologies Lab.
The drone deploys via fan blades, allowing it to fly about and defend the user.
As AI technology is still in its infancy, it is unable to make advanced judgments and can only be active for a short period of time.

It is designed to follow the user and automatically attack approaching enemies.
Since it is equipped with advanced safety devices, there is no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Once all rounds are fired, the equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A all-new type of firearm developed with the help of alien scientific knowledge. It fires a particle beam that reflects off any obstacle it strikes.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will shoot off beams continuously.
This weapon is extremely powerful when it's fully charged, but when the stored power decreases, the shooting range shortens accordingly, and so does its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

Autonomous combat aircraft. Equipped with advanced AI and does not require control after activation.
Armed with a flamethrower, it flies around the user. When an enemy is detected, it attacks.
Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Since this weapon is still in the testing phase, it carries limited ammunition and has a short operating time.
Due to its long reloading time, it is recommended primarily for use as an emergency measure in a pinch.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

Complete Z-type autonomous combat aircraft, equipped with a high-power laser cannon.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A small multicopter. Its improved mortars offer continuous fire and greater destructive power.

Flies around the user. When the target is indicated by a hand-thrown beacon, it moves into position and fires a series of shots at the beacon's impact point.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

A larger caliber version of the Planet Sniper Cannon. Not only is its destructive power greatly improved, but the time required to fire it is now shorter.

The newest type of personal artillery. Firing it creates a shockwave so great that only the strongest soldiers can withstand it, and the user is left vulnerable to recoil immediately after firing.
Due to its severe recoil, using regular scopes may lead to injury. Since this weapon was introduced so rapidly, a new scope could not be completed in time, so the user must use a simple sight to aim.

Armed multicopter with a large caliber gun that fires heavy metal bullets.
The bullets ricochet through objects, damaging multiple enemies.
Some time is required between aiming and firing.

The user indicates the target by ejecting a marker. One machine fires at the point of impact.
One marker corresponds to one aircraft. By ejecting markers in succession, the user can direct multiple aircraft.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Improved Stun Copter now equipped with a scope.
Fires an electrode attached to a wire that pierces its target and delivers an electric shock.
This weapon was first developed as a stun gun for riot control, but its output was increased to lethal levels for use against monsters.

When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter fires an electrode.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

The highest performance electromagnetic bunker, further enhanced to double the durability of its energy wall.

Creates a wall of powerful energy. The wall not only stops bullets but also optical weapons. It can act as a shield, but it cannot block blasts. The defensive wall senses objects that collide with it. If it was fired by an ally, it will be allowed to pass through.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

A super weapon based on the Stardust Cannon that fires numerous pulse energy bullets at once.
The bullets fall rapidly after being fired due to their great mass.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more energy stored, the more energy bullets able to shoot. As the amount of accumulation increases, energy efficiency increases, it is suggested to accumulate as much energy as possible.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Formation of 2 unmanned bombers. Flies in an X-shaped formation for more effective air strikes.

Flies around the user. When a target is indicated, bomb from the sky.

Armed multicopter equipped with a high-powered beam cannon.
The user indicates the target with a laser, and the aircraft fires a beam of energy at it from above.
The beam can be fired continuously for a certain period of time, so by moving the laser point, another target can be selected.

Once the aircraft's energy is depleted, it crashes.
As such, it cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new one to arrive.

Armed multicopter that fires corrosive gas.
The user indicates the target with a laser, and the aircraft fires gas at it from above.
The gas is highly toxic to living organisms. It also corrodes metals, making it effective against machinery.
Gas can be fired continuously for a certain period of time, so by moving the laser point, another target can be selected.

It cannot be redeployed, so the user must wait for a new aircraft to arrive.

Enhanced version of the ZD model Limpet Splendor, further improvements were made to increase its destructive power.

The sticky bombs attach to where they land (friend, foe or vehicle), and can be detonated remotely with the Zoom/Activate button. When detonated, several flechettes will be fired into the surrounding area. The flechettes are made of special material so they will ricochet off walls. This means that they will affect a wide area, but in a confined space they can deal impressive damage. If you do not want to detonate it, you can defuse it by pressing the reload button.

A special shotgun that fires needle-like projectiles. The needles penetrate up to several hundred meters after being fired. They also spread laterally over a wide range, making it even easier to strike the enemy.

Equipped with a laser sight.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

Being able to carry multiple weapons is one of its key features. Both arms can be mounted with weapons that provide excellent firepower. It is practical in many uses because of the multiple weapons with different purposes.

Model A uses light armor and light weapons.
The right arm is equipped with a 'machine gun' and the left with a 'rocket cannon'.

1 person. Can be requested from underground locations.
An improved version of the Depth Crawler, equipped with flamethrowers called 'Incinerators' that are most highly effective in close combat situations. To further enhance its melee abilities, the weight of each part of its frame has been significantly reduced as well.

Since it has four hook-like limbs and moves in a crawling fashion, it performs well on rough roads and can even scale walls. Its hooks work in conjunction with its powerful joints to leap up and cling to walls or roofs. It also comes with large headlights that can greatly enhance visibility in the dark. They provide essential support to teams infiltrating the underground. Although it was designed primarily for subterranean combat, its versatility makes it a force to be reckoned with on the ground as well. It can chase enemies up the sides of buildings by using its hook-like limbs.

The Barga is a gigantic humanoid crane. It was developed by the government for the building of bridges and other constructions. A huge amount of funding was put into its development, but it caused too many safety and cost-related issues, that it was passed over to the EDF almost unused. It was put away in an underground warehouse, where it was forgotten by the entire world, until people found it might be useful for fighting against Archelus and had it readjusted.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

4 people.
A giant humanoid battle machine. It is one of the trump cards for the EDF's land battles. It does not have the greatest mobility because of its large size, but the large weaponry offers impressive destructive power. It has special plate armor all over its body, so its defensive capabilities are much higher than a tanks. It can carry a large amount of ammo. It is a walking fortress with excellent combat ability. But it is necessary to have four people to make use of its potential. One person must be a pilot. So you need to have gunners if you want to attack. 

Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle. 
Anyone can ride in the gunners seat. 

In order to request this, you need to achieve a certain amount of credits in the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An armored vehicle. Aside from the pilot, there are rear compartments for up to three troops. The main role of this vehicle is to transport soldiers to the battlefield.

Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle, but anyone can ride in the rear compartments.

A vehicle with a new Convergence Guided Missile Cannon installed. When a target is within the sight, it will lock-on. It is possible to lock-on to several enemies. Use the attack button to discharge.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

1 person.
The main combat vehicle of the EDF. Since it was designed for urban warfare, it is smaller in size, and can drive into streets and alleys with ease. However, its firepower and armor haven't regressed compared to the previous models of combat vehicles.

Its main cannon is a 90mm Smooth-Bore Gun, which can fire armor-piercing ammunition capable of penetrating many enemies at once. The Blacker Tank was designed to be equipped with a Smooth-Bore Gun in the first place, therefore the E model, which is equipped with a Howitzer has decreased armor and slower turret rotation. It's fair to say that the A model has gone back to its roots, which means improved armor and faster turret rotation compared to the E model.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A combat vehicle with a special paint job. It is said that this reduces its risk of being hit by bullets... but in reality, there is no such effect. Soldiers who risk their lives on the battlefield paint their vehicles for good luck only.

1 person.
Specially painted carrier equipped with multipurpose missiles. The missiles have a homing feature so that they can directly target enemies. 

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A special Plasma Core with improved the energy-generating speed. It recovers energy quickly, and its emergency charge time is reduced. The Plasma Core is the heart of the flight unit, and the performance of the flight unit changes depending on the Core equipped.

A hammer disguised as a body pillow with the same specs as the Vibro Hammer. Fencers' equipment looked terrifying, and many citizens around the base voiced their concerns. As a result, a less intimidating version was developed.

A hammer that is installed with an ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive). It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is formed in the area of the massive vibration which reduces the damage taken when attacked. 
Press and hold the attack button to increase the Vibro Drive output, and when it's reached its max, release to unleash a powerful slashing maximum voltage attack.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

An ultra high-power atomic ray gun developed for the final battle. Despite its small size, it has firepower comparable to that of an EMC. Its production cost is close to that of the EMC, so only a few were made.
It has a long range and strikes the target instantly.

Final model in the Orchid series of assault rifles. A fearsome rifle with tremendous destructive power.

Fires special bullets with excellent penetrating power. It can penetrate targets up to 1/4 of its range.
Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The final model Vulcan Hammer that is installed with a high output ultra-vibration generator (Vibro Drive), developed specifically for the last boss battle. It generates strong vibrations that affect an entire area as opposed to a single target. It has tremendous destructive power, but control is difficult and attacks while moving are not possible. Its short range may also pose difficulties.
The vibrations are transmitted through objects, not air, so they have no effect on aerial enemies. As an added bonus, during the swing a wall of air is created as a result of the massive vibrations. The wall reduces the damage taken when attacked.
Pressing and holding the attack button will increase the output. Releasing the button will unleash a three stage attack depending on the output. The second and third stage attacks create enormous explosions on impact, which can be used to destroy enemies in a wide area.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A special shotgun that fires diffuse, armor-piercing grenades.
The grenade contains an explosive charge and a delay fuse, penetrating the target's armor before exploding. Damage can be inflicted in two stages: when the shot hits the target and when it explodes.
The damage inflicted by the explosion is not affected by distance, making it effective even against faraway enemies.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

Redesigned SGN semi-auto shotgun. Not only the highest spec model, but now also an automatic thanks to its innovative loading system. Can now load more rounds than ever with a decreased reloading time.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

*The moment the bullet penetrates its target, a blue effect appears.

The newest type of personal artillery. It can be operated without a powered exoskeleton, and its performance is similar to that of the Gallic Heavy Cannon. Firing it creates a shockwave so great that only the strongest soldiers can withstand it, and the user is left vulnerable to recoil immediately after firing.

Due to its severe recoil, using regular scopes may lead to injury. Since this weapon was introduced so rapidly, a new scope could not be completed in time, so the user must use a simple sight to aim.

A redesigned version of the Volcano rocket launcher. Continuously fires 20 loaded rockets. The rockets are accurately fired in the forward direction.

Rockets explode on impact, attacking enemies over a wide field.
(Huge explosion expected. Extreme caution is advised to avoid getting caught in the blast.)

The final enhanced form of the Anti-Aircraft Impulse mine with dramatically improved sensor performance. It is capable of striking even the highest-flying enemies. Ejects larger ball bearings, and although it can be fired fewer times, each blast is more powerful than ever.

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

Customized Caliban Armored Rescue Vehicle SA Turbo with increased item acquisition range.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A stationary automatic tracking gun that fires high-speed rockets. An upgrade to the ZEX model, it fires rockets at high velocity to smash its targets.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.
Lightweight liquid armor. It is designed to reduce movement speed reduction when struck by bullets and to allow easy movement.

HV Anti-Aircraft Machine Gun (Right) <font color=%dq%#00ffff%dq%>(Shots:1500 Damage:[PT]102.0 Range:480.0m)</font>

Complete spec version of the KG6 Kepler Self-Propelled Anti-Aircraft Gun, equipped with a new heavy machine gun with excellent penetrating power.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Enhanced version of Rapier Nova with greatly improved output. It is the final, most powerful Rapier model.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will fire plasma arc blades.

Customized version of the Mag Blaster DX. In exchange for its high energy consumption, its destructive power and range have been improved.

It has tremendous firepower, but can only sustain it for a short period of time; at half its stored power, its destructive power drops to 1/8 of its original level.

As long as the trigger is pulled (or the attack button is held down), it will continue to fire its beam.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

Enhanced version of the Thunder Crossbow RZ with improved horizontal scattering performance.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The more power accumulated, the more likely the lightening concentrates on the aiming direction; whereas the energy accumulation decreases, the lightening diffuses. In that case, it's difficult to hit the target, but you can attack in a wider range.

The ultimate model of the super high-output long-range laser gun, Monster. It fires off all of its stored energy at once to instantly destroy the target in the distance.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
Because it was designed with the idea that it would consume a lot of energy, when its stored energy is low, its power reduces significantly.
The ultimate five-barreled Mirage, with excellent destructive power and homing performance.

The ultimate enhanced Geist weapon, based on the model D. It has been further improved to achieve a level of performance beyond all known limits.
By reducing blast range, its destructive power has been doubled. Bullet velocity, as well as the number of energy spears fired simultaneously has also been increased. This formidable weapon requires a highly talented user of the Psionic Link, of which there are very few.

A large Plasma Cannon developed for use by elite units. Its destructive power and blast range exceed those of the F-type.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire it off. Destructive power, explosion scale and shot speed all change according to the amount of energy accumulation.

The ultimate Handy Saber model with greatly enhanced destructive power.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. However, the blade maintains its form for only a brief moment immediately after being swung. This weapon's destructive power is rather low, and it is intended only for emergency self-defense.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use. Press and hold to reload.

Enhanced output model whose energy rays now reach even greater distances.

A device that generates a sphere of energy. The sphere radiates light energy in one direction while airborne.
Its lethal light ray can act as a trap when placed in the enemy's path.

If used effectively, it can stop a large number of enemies at once, increasing Wing Divers' rate of survival.

Ally soldiers' equipment is covered with a special reflective coating, preventing them from taking damage.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
Press and hold to discard. The equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

A Plasma Core specifically improved on its maximum energy. The maximum amount of energy the core can accumulate is greatly improved, and it generates a massive amount of power during an emergency charge.

However, its power supply efficiency to the aerial unit is low, so the flying speed is slightly reduced.

A Plasma Core that specializes in the energy supply to weapons. Supplies energy to weapons faster.

An improved version of the VM Rush Core. By decreasing the power supply speed to weapons, the maximum amount of power it can accumulate has been increased.

The highest performance machine gun with overwhelming destructive power. It fires large-caliber rounds that obliterate the enemy. Innovative design tweaks have reduced recoil while increasing destructive power.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

A piece of personal heavy artillery developed for the Storm Corps that fires shells specially designed for massive penetrating force. Easily one of the largest personal weapons available, the weapon is so heavy that it takes the full strength of a powered exoskeleton only to barely lift it. Because of its large caliber, the recoil on discharge could kill an unarmored person. The recoil takes even a powered exoskeleton time to absorb. And in that time, you will be left completely vulnerable. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

Equipped with a scope. Press the Use button to zoom.

An improved version of the FH29 Mortar with drastically enhanced rapid-firing performance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.
Highest-performance powered exoskeleton. Enhanced actuators throughout the body reduce recoil when firing.

Highly mobile powered exoskeleton. Enhanced actuators throughout the body enable it to run at high speeds.
The arms also have superior power output to reduce the armor's weight on the user.

A Laser Guide Kit that transmits coordinates to a submarine aircraft carrier to launch Lionic missiles. By continuously irradiating the laser, the coordinates are transferred to the submarine mothership. As many as 45 missiles are then continuously fired at that point, arriving at a higher speed than those of the UA45.

The Lionic missile is built with an excellent guidance system, and will make the missile correctly hit the designated target location. Moving the laser grants the missiles the ability to destroy multiple targets.

Since the laser must be maintained until the missiles hit, during the irradiation time, it's difficult for the airship to actually battle. If the lock-on location is changed during the guiding process, the attack location is changed. It's possible to control missiles freely with enough practice.
The Laser Guide Kit is equipped with a scope.

Missile reloading is conducted in a submarine carrier, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.

Heavily armed Powered Exoskeleton.
Its tank-like design is based on the concept of heavy armor and high firepower.
It was deployed in various regions as a key component of land battles, achieving great results. However, because of its outdated walking system and lack of mobility, it suffered heavy damage in the field.
Because of this, the Nix models, which are equipped with the latest mobility systems, became preferred... but in battles against monsters, the Gravis's firepower and armor have proven indispensable.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

1 person.
Powered Exoskeleton Eiren model designed for close combat.
It is equipped with the short-range laser cannon, Power Saber, on both arms, and the large high-power beam cannon, Power Dyne MC, on each shoulder.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

A complete spec version of the large assault rifle, Slade. Because of its size and weight, it requires skillful handling. Its destructive power is tremendous, penetrating enemies up to 120 meters away.

Equipped with a scope and laser sight.

A very high-power version of the Destruction Blazer. The rays of light emitted blast forward wildly, a result of maximizing power output and sacrificing lateral range.

Because it has been adjusted for use against monsters, each time the trigger is pulled, it takes only an instant to fire.
In addition, the further away from the point of impact, the less powerful the beam becomes (although only slightly).

Equipped with a scope. Press the Zoom/Activate button to use it.

The final spec High Altitude Impact Launcher model with greatly improved bullet velocity and homing performance.

After firing, the missile will rise to a high altitude. It will then be directed towards its target on descent. Due to its high arc, obstacles such as buildings will have little impact. The lock-on speed is fast and it is possible to attack several enemies. It is an easy-to-use weapon. 

Press and hold the attack button to display the sight (red square). When a target within the lock-on range is captured with the sight, a positive lock will be established. Release the attack button to unleash a missile on the locked-on target or targets.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

Enhanced version of the KFF70 sniper rifle, significantly modified to improve its destructive power. At close range, it is powerful enough to penetrate the target.

There is virtually no decrease in power due to air resistance within range.
A scope and a laser sight are attached.

The perfect Lysander model sniper rifle with a shortened firing interval. Destructive power has also been dramatically increased, penetrating the enemy from up to a distance of about 300 meters.

Equipped with a scope and a laser sight.

A timed detonation version of UMFF Grenade Launcher that fires grenades with more destructive power than that of the UMFF type.
Grenades explode at 3.0 sec after firing, inflicting damage over a wide area.

Each round of ammunition must be loaded by hand. Therefore, the more ammunition remaining when reloading, the shorter the loading time.

All-new personal missile launcher. Vertically launches a large number of highly guided missiles that fly toward a locked-on target.

Pressing the attack button initiates lock-on. It locates enemies within the sight (red square) that are in range. When the sight changes shape, lock-on is complete. Release the button to fire.

A powered-up FORK-X20. 
This model fires 20 small high-speed missiles at once with improved destructive power and better lock-on range. In addition, the missiles travel even faster than before and are guaranteed to strike the target.

An improved version of the Meta-Thermite Round with greatly increased destructive power. Its 10-piece projectile engulfs a wide area in flames.

It is made up of several small projectiles that, when thrown, separate and fly off in different directions. Ignites upon impact, discharging tremendous heat.
Its flames cannot be extinguished with water, meaning it can be used underwater or underground because it does not require oxygen for combustion.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

The highest spec stationary sentry gun (automatic enemy tracking gun), this super weapon's development was suspended for humanitarian reasons, due to the fact that it is so deadly.
Equipped with a laser cannon, it detects enemies using cameras and sensors and fires automatically.The laser penetrates the enemy and damages everything within range.

Out of concern for friendly fire, the gun is equipped with a high-performance safety device. Therefore, there is no need to worry about your allies being struck.
Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to set up. Press and hold to reload.

Improved version of the Firecracker 1000 Spread Grenade.

Officially known as the Spread Grenade, this weapon throws out multiple coin-sized grenades at a time.
It's not powerful enough of a single grenade, but the rounds can be spread over a wide area, making it possible to hit several enemies at once.

Hold down the Use Backpack Tool button to show the direction of the throw (indicated by a line). Release the button to throw the grenade.

The final form of the Impulse series, with its firepower pushed to the absolute limit.

Use Backpack Tool button (press briefly) to install. Requires a certain amount of time to activate after installation.
After settlement, it detonates automatically when an enemy enters its effective range. It spews out a large number of ball bearings, devastating whosoever they may strike. Can be reloaded by hold the Use Backpack Tool button. When being reloaded, the installed landmines will be invalid automatically, so no need to worry about unexploded ordnance left over from battles.

1 person.
Improved version of the Varius TZ4.
The vehicle body has been modified to improve stability while driving. Although it is a combat vehicle, it is also designed to be comfortable to ride in.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

An improved version of the ZA model with the longest range of any Power Lance. It also has greatly improved destructive power.

Hold the trigger to charge and release it to fire.
Its destructive power increases dramatically with energy. When reaching the max, it can one-shot an armed vehicle.
Its beam fades out with distance, as the target gets farther, the power drops significantly. Therefore in order to bring out the maximum firepower, you must approach the target when this weapon is fully charged.

An ultra high-power short-range laser gun developed based on the Monster. With reduced range for maximum destructive power, this weapon far surpasses the Monster's performance.

It shatters targets by firing a series of ultra-powerful lasers. Since it takes up to one second for its attacks to land, targets must be kept in focus until then. Effective operation will require a high level of skill.

Because it is more difficult to handle than the single-shot Power Lance, it was never tested in actual combat. As the war intensified, it was given only to select elite soldiers.

All-new quadruple-barreled Spine Blaster that fires particle beams in four directions simultaneously.
Its high-density converged laser beam can pierce through objects and inflict damage on everything within the line of fire.

The weapon is equipped with a small energy tank which provides the power for firing the weapon, so it doesn't put a load on the aerial unit. It consumes energy from the aerial unit only during reloading, for the purpose to recover the power of the tank to the max.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will shoot off beams continuously.
This weapon is extremely powerful when it's fully charged, but when the stored power decreases, the shooting range shortens accordingly, and so does its firepower.

Reloading transfers power from the flying unit until the tank is full. This energy transfer requires extra power.

An eight-barreled High-Pulse Machine Gun that fires pulse energy bullets in 8 directions.
When a pulse energy bullet hits, it triggers an electromagnetic explosion, dealing damage to everything within its effective range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The number of bullets fired changes along with the accumulated energy amount; the more power stored, the better energy efficiency. Please noted that it consumes much energy from the aerial unit during energy accumulation.

The highest performance Thunder Crossbow. Further improvements were made to the completed RZ model to push output beyond previously known limits.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will accumulate energy. Releasing the trigger (the attack button) will fire off the accumulated energy.
The more power accumulated, the more likely the lightening concentrates on the aiming direction; whereas the energy accumulation decreases, the lightening diffuses. In that case, it's difficult to hit the target, but you can attack in a wider range.

An improved version of Planet Saber. Scientists from all over the world joined forces to develop mankind's most powerful weapon, using an astronomical budget. Its performance far surpasses that of Planet Saber.

It is not connected to the Plasma Core and is driven by the built-in energy unit so as not to deplete the Wing Diver's energy. However, the blade maintains its form for only a brief moment immediately after being swung. This weapon's destructive power is rather low, and it is intended only for emergency self-defense.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use. Press and hold to reload.

Customized version of the Luminous Shield Z4, capable of generating three shields in a row.
Although the number of consecutive uses is lower than that of the Z4 model, the ZR3 has better reloading performance, allowing for more flexible use.

Blocks both friendly and enemy attacks. Soldiers and enemies alike can pass through the barrier.

Not connected to the Plasma Core and powered by an internal battery.
Therefore, there is no load on the flight unit and it can be reloaded even during an emergency charge.

Press the Use Independently Operated Equipment button (briefly) to use.
(Cannot use if button is held down.)

A complete Plasma Core that combines the characteristics of all others.
As such, each of its individual characteristics is inferior to those of a specialized Core.

A complete FG model Gatling gun that boasts impressive destructive power, but it can take a while for the first shot to leave the barrel. Press and hold the attack button to start the barrel rotating. When rotation reaches a certain speed, it will start firing. Due to its powerful recoil, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, so careful adjustments are mandatory for accurate aim.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

The final completed version of the Dexter Automatic Shotgun.
Modified from the ZGXE model. By slightly downsizing the load, its continuous-fire performance has been significantly improved.

It's possible to launch a wide range attack, but it has short effective range. Once the distance is long, its power decreases sharply.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

Enhanced version of the Red Blast Gatling whose rounds feature an expanded burn range after impact. Its destructive power has also been increased.

A high-performance firearm developed for exterminating monsters. It fires small napalm rounds at high speed, but due to the unique shape of the rounds, its accuracy is remarkably low. However, when a round lands, it bursts into flames that damage a wide area.

Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

The perfected Cannon Shot model. Due to its rounds' restricted spread, it can only be handled by skilled soldiers. If it strikes the target, it can inflict devastating damage.

Personal dispersal artillery that fires multiple armor-piercing rounds at once. Its dispersal area isn't that wide, but it has excellent destructive power. Because multiple shells are fired at once, the recoil is greater than average and may take some time to absorb. Additionally, the muzzle may drift upward when firing, causing issues with aiming. Therefore, the aim will need to be adjusted with each shot.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Jump Booster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%boost jump%dq% forward.

Enhanced version of the Planet Cannon. For greater destructive power, it fires double the amount of shells at once, resulting in even greater recoil. It fires six shells in succession, but there is an angular misalignment with each shot. Manual braking is therefore necessary to control the timing of the firing.

A huge piece of personal heavy artillery that fires special shells with excellent penetrating force. Easily one of the largest personal weapons available, the weapon is so heavy that it takes the full strength of a powered exoskeleton only to barely lift it. Because of its large caliber, the recoil on discharge is too much for even a powered exoskeleton to absorb, requiring use of the thrusters to balance it out.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

A new missile launcher developed based on the Arm Hound models.
The missiles it launches are small and have low destructive power, but its rapid-firing performance is very high.

Holding down the attack button displays a sight (red square). It starts locking on to enemies caught in the sight (and within lock-on distance).
Multiple enemies can be locked on at once. When the attack button is released, homing missiles are fired at the locked-on target(s) and explode upon impact.

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your powered exoskeleton must be equipped with a Side Thruster. Press the use button to perform a %dq%thrust-dash%dq% forward.

Enhanced version of the super-large missile launcher Leviathan with exponentially increased destructive power. Its guidance system has been further improved, allowing it to lock on to a target without the support of an Air Raider. However, it takes time to do so.

A perfected Ion Mirror Shield model equipped with a new type of deflector. The effective range has been expanded horizontally and the load on the shield when the deflector is activated has also been reduced.

Holding the attack button will keep raising the shield and reduce Damage coming from the front. (The defense angle differs based on shields. Please refer to %dq%Defense Angle.%dq%)
Some weapons allow you to attack with the shield raised. While it is not possible to pair the shield with a hammer or blade that requires full body usage, it is possible to attack with the Blasthole Spear and other weapons that can be fired with one hand when the shield is raised. 
The heat will increase as it continues to absorb attacks. When it reaches the limit, it won't be usable again until it has cooled down. 

There is a device called Deflector installed inside the shield.  It forms a magnetic field which reverses physical motion by 180 degrees. The Deflector is activated with the use button. It can repel any attack with the right timing.

A thruster enhancer.
Enables 13 consecutive thrust-dashes.
(Must be used with a Side Thruster)
New powered exoskeleton designed for rescue. Heals allies more when acquiring recovery items. Also has a wider range of item recovery.

New powered exoskeleton designed for close combat that is highly stabilized and won't get knocked over by explosions. Features a very fast walking speed and enhanced lateral boost jumps when equipped with jump boosters. When equipped with side thrusters, thruster dash reuse intervals are shorter.
Also has a wider range of item recovery.

A Beacon Discharger.
Use this beacon to signal a Rocket Cannon attack from the gunship that is circling the skies, and it will launch an attack where the beacon hits.

An improved version of the T2 Rocket Cannon. Its destructive power is the same, but the rockets will now strike the target even more swiftly than before.

Press the attack button to discharge a beacon which will start guiding only when hitting an object, so it could be useless if you target at somewhere with no objects. Also, a beacon out of range will activate its safety device and disable it. In short, the beacon must hit an object in range. There is a laser device equipped on the Beacon Discharger to determine the range. Once you confirm the laser light has hit the object in range, you can discharge the beacon with certainty that the beacon can be activated properly.

The loading work for the coming fire is conducted in a gunship, so the weapon can still be reloaded even if the Air Raiders are not carrying it.
Heavy Bomber Vesta E Plan X2

Customized model R Multicopter equipped with a small laser gun. By eliminating the use of live ammunition, it is lighter and can fly at higher speeds.

Multiple units activate simultaneously and fly out in front of the user.
When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter moves into position and fires at the marker's impact point.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

Customized model A Multicopter equipped with a laser gun.

Multiple units activate simultaneously and fly out in front of the user.
When a target is indicated by an ejectable marker, one copter moves into position and fires at the marker's impact point.
Each time a marker fires or strikes a target, another prepares to attack.
By continuously ejecting markers, multiple copters can attack at the same time.

Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

An improved version of the Heavily Armed Multicopter equipped with newly developed electromagnetic bombs that can be dropped over a wide area. When the bombs land, they inflict damage to the surrounding area for a certain period of time.

Flies around the user. When the target is indicated by a hand-thrown beacon, it moves into position and fires a series of shots at the beacon's impact point.
Returns automatically after each attack and can be ordered to attack again. (Cannot attack again until it returns.)

A portable support drone designed to destroy targets. It deploys horizontally in front of the target before firing a high-powered, long-range laser cannon with tremendous destructive power.
Preferably operated at close range, as its power decreases in proportion to its distance from the target.

Also equipped with advanced safety devices, posing no danger to the user or his/her companions.

Press the Use Backpack Tool button (briefly) to activate. (Cannot use by holding the button down.)
Once all rounds are fired, the equipment will then be ready for reuse (reloading).

4 people.
Customized version of the Armored Vehicle Grape RZ equipped with a newly developed rapid-fire shotgun. In addition, it can now acquire more items. 

An armored vehicle. Aside from the pilot, there are rear compartments for up to three troops. The main role of this vehicle is to transport soldiers to the battlefield. 
Only Rangers and Air Raiders can pilot this vehicle, but anyone can ride in the rear compartments.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

1 person.
A gigantic unloader designed to combat monsters. Its performance is superior to that of the War Barga.

A gigantic unloader that has been found to be effective against monsters. In order to speed up the introduction of this vehicle into actual combat, it was designed as a modified War Barga equipped with a Copper Cannon, a superweapon developed by the Advanced Technologies Lab. The Copper Cannon has the power to defeat monsters with a single blow.
Due to the astronomical cost of construction, only about 20 units have been completed to date, several of which have been sent to the battlefield to be used exclusively by the Storm Team.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

In order to reduce the maintenance cost of the Nix model powered exoskeletons, the walking system was detached so that only the upper body could be mounted onto a civilian wagon, rather than to a vehicle designed specifically for this purpose. As a result, stability is low and rough terrain can be hazardous. Care must be taken to avoid tipping over while traveling.
Since the vehicle was hastily constructed, there were no operational tests conducted, so its performance cannot be guaranteed.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.

Ultra-high performance powered exoskeleton. The leg mechanisms and actuators have been modified to improve operating speed. Armament and armor have also been greatly enhanced.

After jumping, keep holding the jump button to continue activating jet thruster. It is even possible to fly for a short period of time.

In order to re-request this, you need to achieve a certain number of credits during the mission by defeating enemies. Your allies' kills will also help you earn credits.
